65b2(bstod tshogs): med do zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de ltar na gang zhig la brten na dgos pa ma lus pa 'grub par 'gyur zhe na/ de'i phyir 'dir gang la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ ston pa gang la nyon mongs pa'i skyon bag chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa kun yod pa
65b3(bstod tshogs): ma yin la tshul khrims dang/ ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i yon tan ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad du yod par gyur na de nyid ni bdag gi ston pa yin zhing/ de nyid kho na 'gro ba ma lus pa'i skyabs yin gyi/ gzhan ni ma yin te/ kho bo ni ming tsam
65b4(bstod tshogs): ma bzod pa'i phyir de skad du smra ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na don gyi nyes pa yod pa yin no/ /des ni 'di skad ston pa yin te/ gal te lha chen po dang/ khyab 'jug dag la ni ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa yod pas de dag ston par gyur pa ma yin no zhes smra
65b5(bstod tshogs): ba ni rigs na/ tshangs pa la ni nyes pa 'ga' dang ldan pa ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de ni sa ma lus pa'i ston par rigs pa yin no/ /yang na 'di la nyes pa yod na smros shig ce na/ de brjod par bya ste/ yang dag par na 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags
65b6(bstod tshogs): dang bral ba yang ma yin na/ nyes pa'i dri ma ma lus pa 'di la med do/ /zhes brjod par lta ga la bya ste/ nyes pa de nyid 'di la brgya phrag yod de/ lha 'di gnyis dang tshangs pa mtshungs pa nyid du bshad de/ de yang lha mo u ma bag mar blangs pa'i tshe/ kha
65b7(bstod tshogs): khyer la bskor ba byed pa na/ de'i gzugs phul du byung ba mthong bas sems shor te brgyal zhing/ tshangs pa khu ba shor bar gyur to/ /zhes grag la/ de nas ngo tsha bas rkang pas mnyes pas dum bu brgya phrag du mar gyes pa dang de las byis pa brtse ba
66a1(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba'i drang srong stong phrag brgyad cu skyes par gyur to zhes bshad pa dang/ tshangs pas mchog byin pa las/ sa gsum la sund+ha dang/ u pa sund+ha zhes bya ba spun gnyis kyis shin tu gnod par byas pa dang/ de dag
66a2(bstod tshogs): bsad pa'i phyir lha thams cad kyi rang gis lus kyi gzi byin gyi cha bsdus pa las thig le'i mchog ma zhes bya ba sprul la/ de ji tsam na tshangs pa la phyag byed pa na de la chags pa'i dbang gis tshangs pas ngos bzhir gdong bzhi sprul la/ lha chen
66a3(bstod tshogs): pos de'i mgo dbus ma ni bcad par gyur to/ /zhes bya la sogs pa/ 'chol pa'i spyod pa mang du smos pa yin no/ /gzhan yang 'di'i ming gi rjes thogs las nyes pa gzhan yang 'byung zhing/ gzhan yang khyed rnams ni des sprul pa yin zhes log
66a4(bstod tshogs): pa nyid du byed pa por yang ston pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di dag gi tshig la nyes pa mang po yod par thos kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la ni nyes pa'i dri ma 'ga' yang mnga' ba ma yin no/ /de yang mos ldan phongs pa las 'dod pa/ /'tsho
66a5(bstod tshogs): ba'i tshe na mi nus kyi/ /de ni 'chi nas gdon bya zhes/ /lha de smra ba rdzun tshig yin/ /mes ni reg pas mi 'tshig gi /dran na tshig ces gang smra ba/ /gal te tshig de bden gyur tam/ /'di gnyis kyang ni de dang 'dra/ /bcom ldan yang ni
66a6(bstod tshogs): de 'dra na/ /las kyi bdag nyid can mi gsung/ /nyi mas sa yi gzhi lta bur/ /'gro ba'i rang bzhin gsal bar mdzad/ /'jig rten las min 'bras mi spyod/ /rang gi nyon mongs kyis las bsags/ /dge dang mi dge 'dod mi 'dod/ /'bras
66a7(bstod tshogs): bskyed sa bon lta bu yin/ /chos kun yongs su mkhyen pa dang/ /nyes pa thams cad zad pa dang/ /sems can kun la phan gyur pa/ /de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin no/ /don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir
66b1(bstod tshogs): gang la zhes bya ba sogs pa smos pa yin te/ dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa'o/ /thugs rje can zhes bya ba ni thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa ste/ de yang lha'i spyan rnam par dag pas 'jig rten ma lus pa la rgyun tu rnam par gzigs par mdzad de/ de yang sangs
66b2(bstod tshogs): rgyas kyi spyan gyi nyin dus gsum/ mtshan dus gsum du 'jig rten rnams la gzigs par mdzad do/ /zhes ji skad smos pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas 'gro ba 'di dag sdug bsngal las gdon par mdzad cing/ skyabs dang rten gyi dam pa
66b3(bstod tshogs): yin pas de la skyabs su 'chi zhing rten par phyed do zhes bya ba'i don to// //de ltar bstod pa de yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ pad+ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni gzugs kyi yon tan phul
66b4(bstod tshogs): du byung ba dang ldan pa'i phyir/ utpal sngon po kha bye zhing/ 'dab ma rgyas pa ltar dkyus ring la mdzes pa'i spyan mnga' ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ gzugs kyi sku'i dbang po'i mchog yin pa'i phyir/ spyan gyi mtshan nyid nye bar mtshon
66b5(bstod tshogs): pa tsam du smos pa yin no/ /de 'ba' zhig du ma zad kyi yon tan thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa yang yin te/ ji ltar chu klung stong phrag du ma 'bab pa'i rten dang gnas ni rgya mtsho yin pa dang 'dra bar yon tan gyi bstod pa'i chu klung brgya stong mang po 'byung
66b6(bstod tshogs): pa'i gnas dang gzhi ni bcom ldan 'das yin la/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i gnas su gyur pa de la tshul de ltar bstod cing bsngags pa brjod pa'i bstod pa'i tshig las/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing bskyed pa cung zad ci mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
66b7(bstod tshogs): 'dis/ sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces smos pa yin te/ 'dir nges par legs pa ni bde ba kha na ma thob med pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad bde ba dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba'i don to// //
67a1(bstod tshogs): skyob la lha las phul byung bar/ /bstod pa bdag gis rnam phye bas/ /'di las bsod nams gang bsags pa/ /des ni mya ngan 'das thob shog /lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher bshad pa/ slob dpon shes rab go gnang
67a2(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza randa na'i zhal snga nas dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos sgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /)
67a3(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha sya sto tra na ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis lhun po'i tshad las lhag pa'i dbu ni rab
67a4(bstod tshogs): tu byin/ /gang gis rgyu skar bas kyang mang ba'i brgya phrag spyan rnams kyang ni btang/ /sa gzhi dang mnyam rgya mtsho lta bu'i sha dang khrag rnams kyang/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad sangs rgyas bcom ldan rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /g.yo zhing 'khyug
67a5(bstod tshogs): 'gro'i glog 'dra'i sems ni gang gis dbang du gnas pa dang/ /'jig rten gsum po mi shes rgya mtsho las ni gang gis yang dag sgrol/ /srid 'joms bdud 'jig phyir du gang zhig slar yang srid par 'jug /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad
67a6(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis snying rje'i sdom pa'i khur bus sems can 'don la dgyes pa'i phyir/ /lha dang lha min 'jig rten gsum po'i gtso bos mi rtog rnam par spong/ /bkres sdug srog chags rnams la
67a7(bstod tshogs): brtse ba mchog gnas gang zhig lus rab ster/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis snying rjes 'thob pa'i sems can myur du bsgral zhing bskyab pa'i phyir/ /gang zhig phyugs dang nya dang ri
67b1(bstod tshogs): dags 'gro bar dgon pa'i nang du gnas/ /yun ring ngal dang nub pa bzod cing lus rnams kyang ni kun tu gtong/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sems can mang ba'i lus kyi nad la sman gyi
67b2(bstod tshogs): phyir du ni/ /'gro la byams pa 'am snying rje'i dbang gis mchog tu mu ge'i dgon pa ru/ nags tshol rnams su glang chen lus rnyed gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sel las sbyor/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu
67b3(bstod tshogs): ge'i zug ngu zug pa'i dus su dbu la skyes pa'i rin po che/ /bcad nas byin pas bram ze dang ni mi bdag la sogs gnas pa'i phyir/ /kun tu de bzhin thugs kyi byed pa sla bas thams cad sems can don/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad
67b4(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /nags rnams so sor gnas mdzad rmi lam bzang pos yang dag smra ba thob/ /ma dang rgyal po pha rol phan pa spyod pa rnams kyi seng+ge'i khrir/ /gnyis 'thung mche ba drug par 'khrungs te 'gro ba
67b5(bstod tshogs): gang phyir chos rnams kun/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims yon tan bzod pa'i rang bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang/ /shes rab rab gsung mtshungs par spyod pa'i byams
67b6(bstod tshogs): dang snying rje'i yon tan gyis/ /'brog dgon gnas pa'i 'gro ba 'dren pa'i ded dpon thob cing yang dag rtogs/ /de ltar dka' ba spyod mdzad bcom ldan sangs rgyas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma nor rgyun mas mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa
67b7(bstod tshogs): rdzogs so// //rab tu bsngags pa'i gnas chen po bal po yam bu'i grong khyer du sgra'i mkhan po dpal rgyal po'i snyan bzang po dang/ shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
68a1(bstod tshogs): sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/ // */ (/chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa bzhugs so/) /chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can
68a2(bstod tshogs): rnams la thugs brtse ba/ /phrad dang bral bar dgongs pa can/ /mi 'bral dgongs shing bde ba can/ /dgongs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrib pa kun las nges par grol/ /thub pas 'jig rten kun zil mnan/ /khyod kyi mkhyen pas shes bya khyab/ /
68a3(bstod tshogs): sems grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun/ /ma lus pa dag 'dul mdzad pa/ /nyon mongs sel ba nyon mongs pa/ /brtser bcas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhun gyis grub cing chags mi mnga' / /thogs pa mi mnga' rtag tu
68a4(bstod tshogs): yang/ /mnyam par bzhag cing 'dri kun gyi/ /lan ldon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang gnas pa bshad bya dang/ /tshig dang shes pa ston pa la/ /rtag tu blo gros mi thogs la/ /ston mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du bzhud dang de
68a5(bstod tshogs): dag gi /tshig dang spyod mkhyen 'ongs pa dang/ /'gro dang nges 'byung sems can la/ /legs 'doms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus can kun gyis khyod mthong na/ /skyes bu mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur/ /mthong ba tsam gyis dad 'gyur
68a6(bstod tshogs): bar/ /mdzad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /len dang gnas dang gtong ba dang/ /sprul pa dang ni bsgyur ba dang/ /ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes la/ /mnga' brnyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs dang skyabs dang dag pa dang/ /nges 'byung theg pa chen
68a7(bstod tshogs): po la/ /sems can rnams la bslu ba yi/ /bdud 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes dang ni spangs pa dang/ /nges 'byung bgegs byed ston mdzad pa/ /bdag gzhan don la mu stegs gzhan/ /mi tshugs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor
68b1(bstod tshogs): du tshang bcad gsung mdzad pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs gtan spangs pa/ /bsrung ba mi mnga' bsnyel mi mnga' / /tshogs sdud khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs bzhugs kun tu rtag par yang/ /kun mkhyen ma lags spyod mi mnga' / /khyod ni yang dag don du na/
68b2(bstod tshogs): kun mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun gyi don mdzad pa/ /khyod ni dus las yong mi 'da' / /rtag tu 'bras bu yod mdzad pa/ /mi bsnyel khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten kun la gdugs zhag gcig /lan drug tu ni gzigs mdzad pa/
68b3(bstod tshogs): thugs rje che dang ldan pa po/ /phan dgongs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gshegs dang thugs su chung ba dang/ /mkhyen pa dang ni phrin las kyis/ /nyan thos dang ni rang sangs rgyas/ /kun mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub chen po'i rnam pa kun/
68b4(bstod tshogs): sku gsung dag gis brnyes gyur pa/ /kun tu sems can thams cad kyi/ /dogs gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sri ba mi mnga' skyon mi mnga' / /rnyog pa mi mnga' bzhugs mi mnga' / /g.yo ba mi mnga' chos kun la/ /ma spros khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos
68b5(bstod tshogs): sku la gnas yon tan 'di la bdag gis rab bstod pas/ /yon tan drug ldan sku gsum po ni yongs su rdzogs par ni/ /bdag sogs 'gro ba rnams kyis myur du rtogs par shog /chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i yon tan thun mong ma yin pa la bstod pa/ /slob
68b6(bstod tshogs): dpon thogs med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ shi len+d+ra bo d+hi dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // */ (/de kho na nyid la bstod pa/) /
68b7(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ ta dwasta pa/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thogs pa kun las rnam grol ba/ /kha dog bral zhing ma skyes shing/ /rang gi ngo bo 'jig med pa'i/ /sku mnga' 
69a1(bstod tshogs): de bzhin gshegs phyag 'tshal/ /nyon mongs rags dang phra spangs pa/ /bdag gi mi mnga' sgrib pa dag /dag po yod pas stong pa'i phyir/ /don dam mkha' dkyil 'dra phyag 'tshal/ /rnam rtog sbrul ni spangs pas na//
69a2(bstod tshogs): ci dgyes par ni mdzad gyur pa/ /gter mchog de nyid rtag gzigs pa/ /ngan 'gro'i rgyud pa spangs phyag 'tshal/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /nyid kyis dgyes bdar ma byas sku/ /'khor dang zhi bar ro mnyam sku/ /rnam rtog
69a3(bstod tshogs): dri ma med phyag 'tshal/ /yang dag dgongs pas brnal mi mnga' / /gti mug bral zhing spangs pas bzhugs/ /rtag tu de nyid ma gsal ba/ /rang bzhin mkhas pas shar phyag 'tshal/ /bsam gtan tshes grangs yongs rdzogs pas/ /
69a4(bstod tshogs): mi rnams dga' ba skyed mdzad pa/ /rnam grol zla ba yid 'ong ba/ /lta na rab rib sel phyag 'tshal/ /dngos po dngos med gnyis 'das nas/ /rtog pa'i dri ma las grol ba/ /rtsen don med des mnyam gnas/ /spros mi mnga' la phyag
69a5(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /dri med chu rlabs bde ba'i rgyu/ /ma lus srog chags 'tsho mdzad pa/ /tsha zhing mdza' med tshad dang bral/ /de nyid rgya mtsho che phyag 'tshal/ /legs spyad du ma rgyas thob pa/ /dpe med ro zhim yid la 'bab/ /rga shi'i
69a6(bstod tshogs): 'jigs pa med mdzad pa/ /de nyid bdud rtsi la phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi yid la brtan ldan yang/ /khyab 'jug dbang phyug tshangs dbang dang/ /lha dang drang srong thabs med pa/ /thabs de skad cig brnyes phyag 'tshal/ /dri med rin thad mnyam med
69a7(bstod tshogs): pa/ /ngo bos 'dod rnams yongs rdzogs mdzad/ /bsod nams bsags pas dmigs gyur pa/ /yid bzhin byang chub sems phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i 'khor bas yongs dub pa'i/ /mchog tu lta ba bde ba'i gnas/ /byang chub yan lag
69b1(bstod tshogs): me tog ldan/ /zhi ba'i dpag bsam shing phyag 'tshal/ /shes bya shes med gnyis med cing/ /bra sgom dbye ba rnams las grol/ /sna tshogs dpe las 'das gyur pa/ /tshig gis brjed mi dus phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu rgyal zhing bsnyems mi mnga' / /
69b2(bstod tshogs): gzhan stobs 'joms byed mdud pa med/ /gnyis su med sku bsam mi khyab/ /gcig dpa' srid pa 'joms phyag 'tshal/ /bye brag med par dbang 'gyur zhing/ /dngos tshogs skad cig las bsregs pa/ /shin tu drag pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /rab 'bar
69b3(bstod tshogs): de nyid ma phyag 'tshal/ /'di ltar yang dag bstod pa las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa'i/ /bsod nams des ni 'gro ba ma lus zad 'gyur zhing/ /sems can rnams ni sdug bsngal dag dang bral gyur pa/ /bde ba dang ldan sgrib med mya ngan
69b4(bstod tshogs): 'das thob shog /de kho na nyid la bstod pa// //shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po many+dzu sh+rI b+ha dra dang/ dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
69b5(bstod tshogs): phab pa// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam gtan phyin ci log gis ci zhig dgongs mdzad skad cig legs par spyan dbye gzigs/ /lus med mda' yis gzir ba'i skye bo bdag cag skyob pas kyang ni
69b6(bstod tshogs): bsrung bar mi mdzad na/ /thugs rje ldan pa phyin ci log gyur khyod las mchog tu ma rung skyes bu gzhan ma mchis/ /phrag dog ldan pa bdud kyi bud med de skad smra yang rgyal ba skyob pa byang chub gyur/ /gzhan yang 'dod dbang gis ni kun tu gzhu dkar
69b7(bstod tshogs): bdud gzhan lag pa myur ba pa Ta ha sgra 'jebs dang ldan/ /dpa' bo smin ma bskyod dang nyer g.yo lta bur sgeg dang 'dzum dang rol pa med rnams kyis/ /thub dbang skyob pa byang chub ma brnyes par du bsam gtan las ni bskyod ma nus pa mthong gyur nas/ /
70a1(bstod tshogs): ngo mtshar gyur pas ba spu langs pa'i lus kyis grub pa rnams dang yan lag mchog rnams 'dud/ /ral pa 'khrugs shing lce rnams g.yo gsal kun tu bltams pas gang gi thugs rnams 'khrul par ma gyur cing/ /rab
70a2(bstod tshogs): gsal 'dod lha'i bdud rnams rtse mo mchog dag lag thogs glang po rta rnams gdong ldan seng+ge dang/ /stag gi gdong rnams rtswa bzhin grangs med gyur pa 'khor ba yis ni gang zhig brnyengs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni kun la gnod pa'i rnam pa 'dres pa
70a3(bstod tshogs): med par skyob pa sangs rgyas thub dbang 'jig rten mgon/ /bdud btul ba la bstod pa/ /rab dga' lha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ d+harma d+hA tu
70a4(bstod tshogs): stotA/ bod skad du/ chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig kun tu ma shes na/ /srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba/ /sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings
70a5(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de nyid sbyang ba byas pa las/ /dag pa de nyid mya ngan 'das/ /chos kyi sku yang de nyid do/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas/ /mar gyi snying po mi snang ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dang
70a6(bstod tshogs): 'dres pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo/ /ji ltar 'o ma rnams sbyangs pas/ /mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur/ /de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sbyangs pas/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas//
70a7(bstod tshogs): cung zhig snang bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo/ /phyogs ni gang dang gang dag nas/ /bum pa bu ga gtong gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs nyid nas/ /'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar
70b1(bstod tshogs): 'gyur/ /gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis/ /bum pa de ni bcag gyur pa/ /de tshe de ni nam mkha' yi/ /mthar thug par du snang bar byed/ /chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin/ /nam yang 'gag par 'gyur ba med/ /dus rnams kun tu nyon mongs
70b2(bstod tshogs): med/ /thog ma bar mdza' dri ma bral/ /ji ltar rin chen bai DUrya/ /dus rnams kun tu 'od gsal yang/ /rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na/ /de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgribs pa'i/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med pa'ang/
70b3(bstod tshogs): 'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /mya ngan 'das na 'od gsal 'gyur/ /khams yod na ni las byas pas/ /sa le sbram ngag mthong bar 'gyur/ /khams med par ni las byas na'ang/ /nyon mongs 'ba' zhig skyed par zad/ /ji ltar
70b4(bstod tshogs): sbun pas g.yogs gyur pas/ /so ba 'bras bu mi 'dod ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi brtag /ji ltar sbun pa las grol na/ /'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs las
70b5(bstod tshogs): grol na/ /chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal/ /chu shing snying po med do zhes/ /'jig rten na ni dper byed kyang/ /de yi 'bras bu snying po nyid/ /mngar po za bar byed pa ltar/ /snying po med pa'i 'khor ba las/ /nyon mongs gzeb dang bral gyur na/ /de yi 'bras
70b6(bstod tshogs): bu snying po nyid/ /lus can kun gyi bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /de bzhin sa bon thams cad las/ /rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'byung/ /sa bon med par 'bras yod par/ /shes ldan gang gis bsgrub par nus/ /sa bon gyur pa khams de nyid/ /
70b7(bstod tshogs): chos rnams kun gyi rten du 'dod/ /rim gyis sbyangs par gyur pa las/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /dri med nyi ma zla ba yang/ /sprin dang du ba khug rna dang/ /sgra gcan gdod dang rdul la sogs/ /sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur/
71a1(bstod tshogs): de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems/ /'dod dang gnod sems le lo dang/ /rgod pa dang ni the tshom ste/ /sgrib pa lnga yis bsgribs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar me yis dag pa'i gos/ /sna tshogs dri mas dri ma can/ /ji ltar me yi
71a2(bstod tshogs): nang bcug na/ /dri ma tshig 'gyur gos min ltar/ /de bzhin 'od gsal ba yi sems/ /'dod chags la sogs dri ma can/ /ye shes me yis dri ma sreg /de nyid 'od gsal ma yin no/ /stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo/ /rgyal bas ji snyed
71a3(bstod tshogs): gsungs pa gang/ /de dag kun gyis nyon mongs ldog /khams de nyams par byed ma yin/ /sa yi nang na gnas pa'i chu/ /dri ma med par gnas pa ltar/ /nyon mongs nang na ye shes kyang/ /de bzhin dri ma med par gnas/ /chos
71a4(bstod tshogs): dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin/ /bud med ma yin skyes pa min/ /gzung ba kun las rnam grol ba/ /ji ltar bdag ces brtag par bya/ /chags pa med pa'i chos kun la/ /bud med skyes pa dmigs ma yin/ /'dod chags kyis
71a5(bstod tshogs): gdungs gdul bya'i phyir/ /bud med skyes pa shes rab bstan/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stod pa zhes/ /bya ba gsum pos sems sbyong byed/ /mchog tu sems ni sbyong byed pa'i/ /chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin/ /ji ltar sbrum ma'i lto na
71a6(bstod tshogs): pu/ /yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pa/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi rnam rtog dang/ /ming gi 'du shes rgyu mtshan gyis/ /rnam rtog bzhi po 'byung ba yang/ /'byung
71a7(bstod tshogs): dang 'byung las gyur pas so/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi smon lam yang/ /snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med/ /so sor rang rig sbyor ldan nyid/ /sangs rgyas rtag pa'i chos nyid can/ /ji ltar ri bong mgo bo'i rwa/ /btags pa nyid de med pa ltar/ /
71b1(bstod tshogs): de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang/ /btags pa nyid de yod ma yin/ /phra rab rdul gyi ngo bo yis/ /glang gi rwa yang yod ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin/ /de la ci zhig brtag par bya/ /brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang/ /
71b2(bstod tshogs): brten nas 'gag par 'gyur bas na/ /gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no/ /byis pas ji ltar rtogs par byed/ /ri bong ba lang rwa yi dpes/ /ji ltar bde gshegs chos rnams nyid/ /dbu ma nyid du sgrub par byed/ /ji ltar nyi zla skar
71b3(bstod tshogs): ma'i gzugs/ /dang ba'i snod kyi chu nang du/ /gzugs brnyan mthong bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /mtshan nyid rdzogs pa'ang de dang 'dra/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /bslu ba med cing brtan pa yi/ /gang zhig de ltar bdag med la/ /ji
71b4(bstod tshogs): ltar bdag dang bdag gir brtag /ji ltar sos ka'i dus su chu/ /dro bo zhes ni brjod par byed/ /de nyid grang ba'i du su ni/ /grang ngo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /nyon mongs dra bas g.yogs ba na/ /sems can zhes ni brjod par bya/ /de nyid
71b5(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs bral gyur na/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni brjod par bya/ /mig dang gzugs la brten nas ni/ /dri ma med pa'i snang ba 'byung/ /skye med 'gag pa med nyid las/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rab tu shes/ /sgra dang rna ba la brten nas
71b6(bstod tshogs): rnam par dag pa'i shes pa gsum/ /mtshan nyid med pa chos kyi dbyings/ /rtog dang bcas pas thos par 'gyur/ /sna dang dri la brten nas snom/ /de ni gzugs su med pa'i dpe/ /de bzhin sna yi rnam shes kyis/ /chos kyi dbyings
71b7(bstod tshogs): la rtog par byed/ /lce yi rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ /ro yi khams kyang dben pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo yis/ /rnam par shes pa gnas med pa/ /dag pa'i lus kyi ngo bo dang/ /reg bya'i rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dag /rkyen dag las ni
72a1(bstod tshogs): grol gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod par bya/ /yid gtso 'gyur pa'i chos rnams la/ /rtog dang brtag pa rnam spangs nas/ /chos rnams rang bzhin med pa nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings su bsgom par bya/ /mthong
72a2(bstod tshogs): dang thos dang bsnams pa dang/ /myangs dang reg par gyur pa dang/ /chos rnams de ltar rnal 'byor pas/ /shes nas mtshan nyid rdzogs pa yin/ /mig dang rna ba sna dag dang/ /lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid/ /skye mched drug po rnam
72a3(bstod tshogs): dag pa/ /'di nyid de nyid mtshan nyid do/ /sems nyid rnam pa gnyis su mtho/ /ji ltar 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das/ /bdag tu 'dzin las 'khor ba ste/ /so sor rig na de nyid do/ /'dod chags zad pas mya ngan 'das/ /zhe sdang gti mug zad pa
72a4(bstod tshogs): dang/ /de dag 'gags pas sangs rgyas nyid/ /lus can kun gyi skyabs nyid do/ /shes dang mi shes pa dag las/ /lus 'di nyid las thams cad de/ /rang gi rnam par rtog pas bcings/ /bdag nyid shes nas grol bar 'gyur/ /byang chub ring min
72a5(bstod tshogs): nye ba'ang min/ /'gro min 'ong ba'ang ma yin zhing/ /nyon mongs gzeb gyur 'di nyid la/ /mthong ba dang ni ma mthong yin/ /shes rab mar me la gnas nas/ /mchog tu zhi bar gyur pa yis/ /bdag la rtag par gnas bya zhes/ /mdo
72a6(bstod tshogs): sde'i tshogs las gsungs pa lags/ /stobs bcu'i stobs kyis byis pa rnams/ /byin brlabs zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /nyon mongs can gyi sems can gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong ngo/ /ji ltar yi dwags rnams kyis ni/ /rgya
72a7(bstod tshogs): mtsho bskams par mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin mi shes pas bsgribs pas/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni med par btags/ /dman pa bsod nams dman pa la/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis ci bgyir mchis/ /ji ltar dmus long lag pa ru/ /
72b1(bstod tshogs): rin chen mchog ni bzhag pa 'dra/ /sems can bsod nams byas rnams la/ /'od kyis gsal zhing dpal ldan pa'i/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'bar ba/ /sangs rgyas de yi mdun na gnas/ /mgon po de yi gzugs kyi sku/ /bskal pa mang por
72b2(bstod tshogs): bzhugs nas ni/ /gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /dbyings nyid tha dad gyur pa lags/ /sems kyi yul ni nges rtogs nas/ /der ni shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/ /so so rang rig rnam dag na/ /sa rnams de yi bdag nyid gnas/ /dbang phyug
72b3(bstod tshogs): chen po'i gnas mchog dang/ /'og min nyid de rnam mdzes pa/ /shes pa gsum po gcig nyid du/ /'dres par gyur la bdag smra'o/ /byis pa'i nang na kun mkhyen dang/ /'phags pa'i nang na sna tshogs nyid/ /dbang phyug chen po tshe dpag med/ /bskal
72b4(bstod tshogs): pa tshe yi rgyu gang yin/ /phyi rol sems can mkhas kyi yang/ /dpag tu med pa'i bskal par ni/ /tshe yang gang gis bsrungs gyur cing/ /srog chags kun gyi srog gnas pa'i/ /rgyu yang mi zad pa de nyid/ /gang gis 'bras bu mi zad
72b5(bstod tshogs): gang/ /snang ba med pa'i bye brag gis/ /shes rab don du rab tu 'jug /byang chub ring bar mi bsam zhing/ /nye bar yang ni bsam mi bya/ /yul drug snang ba med par ni/ /yang dag ji bzhin rig gyur pa'o/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres
72b6(bstod tshogs): chu/ /snod gcig la ni gnas pa las/ /dang pas 'o ma 'thung byed cing/ /chu ni ma yin de bzhin gnas/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs nas/ /ye shes lus 'dir gcig gnas kyang/ /rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes len/ /
72b7(bstod tshogs): mi shes pa ni 'dor bar byed/ /bdag dang bdag gi zhes 'dzin pas/ /ji srid phyi rol rnam btags pa/ /bdag med rnam pa gnyis mthong nas/ /srid pa'i sa bon 'gag par 'gyur/ /gang phyir sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das/ /gtsang ba
73a1(bstod tshogs): rtag pa dge ba'i gzhi/ /dag phyir gnyis ni byis pas btags/ /de yi gnyis med rnal 'byor gnas/ /dka' sbyod sna tshogs sbyin pa dang/ /tshul khrims sems can don sdud dang/ /sems can phan byed bzed pa ste/ /
73a2(bstod tshogs): gsum po 'di yis khams rgyas 'gyur/ /chos rnams kun la brtson 'grus dang/ /bsam gtan la sems 'jug pa dang/ /rtag tu shes rab brtan pa ste/ /'di yang byang chub rgyas byed yin/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i shes rab dang/ /
73a3(bstod tshogs): smon lam rnam par sbyangs pa dang/ /stobs la des gnas ye shes te/ /khams rgyas byed pa'i chos bzhi po/ /byang chub sems phyag mi bya zhes/ /smra ba ngan pa smra ba ste/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma byung bar/ /chos kyi sku ni 'byung
73a4(bstod tshogs): ma yin/ /bur shing sa bon la sdang gang/ /kha ra spyad par 'dod pa des/ /bur shing sa bon med par ni/ /kha ra 'byung bar 'gyur ma yin/ /bur shing sa bon gang bsrungs nas/ /nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las/ /bu ram kha ra
73a5(bstod tshogs): dwags rnams ni/ /de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ltar/ /byang chub sems ni rab bsrungs nas/ /nye bar gnas shing bsgrubs pa las/ /dgra bcom rkyen rtogs sangs rgyas rnams/ /de las skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sA lu'i
73a6(bstod tshogs): sa bon sogs/ /zhing pas bsrung bar byed pa ltar/ /de bzhin theg mchog mos rnams la/ /'dren pa rnams kyis bsrung ba mdzad/ /ji ltar mar ngo'i bcu bzhi la/ /zla ba cung zhig mthong ba ltar/ /de bzhin theg mchog mos
73a7(bstod tshogs): rnams la'ang/ /sangs rgyas sku ni cung zad snang/ /ji ltar tshes pa'i zla ba la/ /skad cig skad cig rgyas par mthong/ /de bzhin sa la zhugs rnams kyang/ /rim gyis rim gyis rgyas par mthong/ /ji ltar yar ngo'i bco lnga la/ /
73b1(bstod tshogs): sla ba rdzogs par 'gyur ba ltar/ /de bzhin sa yi mthar thug na/ /chos kyi sku yang rdzogs shing gsal/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu mos pa brtan po yis/ /sems de yang dag bskyed byas nas/ /phyir mi ldog pa yang yang
73b2(bstod tshogs): 'byung/ /nag po'i gzhi ni yongs spangs nas/ /dkar po'i gzhi ni rab bzung bas/ /de tshe de ni nges rtogs pa/ /dga' ba zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /'dod chags la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /dri mas rtag tu dri ma can/ /dri ma med pas gang dag pa/ /
73b3(bstod tshogs): dri ma med ces brjod pa yin/ /nyon mongs dra ba rab 'gags nas/ /dri med shes rab rab gsal bas/ /tshad med pa yi mun pa dag /sel bar byed pas 'od byed pa'o/ /rtag tu dag pa'i 'od kyis gsal/ /'du 'dzi rnam par spangs pa yi/
73b4(bstod tshogs): ye shes 'od kyis rab bskor bas/ /sa de 'od 'phro can du 'dod/ /rig dang sgyu rtsal bzo gnas kun/ /bsam gtan rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /nyon mongs shin tu sbyangs dka' las/ /rnam par rgyal bas sbyad dkar 'dod/ /byang chub
73b5(bstod tshogs): rnam pa gsum po dang/ /phun sum tshogs kun bsdu ba dang/ /skye dang 'jig pa zab pa la/ /sa de mngon du gyur bar 'dod/ /'khor lo'i bkod pas rnam kun tu/ /bod kyi dra bas rtse ba dang/ /'khor ba'i mtsho yi 'dam brgal bas/
73b6(bstod tshogs): de la ring du song zhes bya/ /sangs rgyas kyis nges 'di bzung zhing/ /ye shes rgya mtshor zhugs pa dang/ /'bad med lhun gyis grub gyur pas/ /bdud kyi 'khor gyis mi g.yo ba'o/ /so so yang dag rig kun la/ /chos ston pa yi 'bel
73b7(bstod tshogs): ba'i gtam/ /rnal 'byor pa de mthar son pas/ /sa de legs pa'i blo gros 'dod/ /ye shes rang bzhin 'di yi sku/ /dri med nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dzin pa las/ /chos kyi sprin ni kun tu 'byung/ /sangs
74a1(bstod tshogs): rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi gnas/ /spyod pa'i 'bras bu yongs 'dzin pas/ /gnas ni yongs su gyur pa de/ /chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin/ /bag chags las grol bsam mi khyab/ /'khor ba'i bag chags bsam du
74a2(bstod tshogs): yod/ /khyod ni kun tu bsam mi khyab/ /gang gis khyod ni shes par nus/ /dag gi spyod yul kun las 'das/ /dbang po kun gyi spyod yul min/ /yid kyi shes pas rtogs bya ba/ /gang yang rung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rim gyis
74a3(bstod tshogs): 'jug pa'i lugs nyid kyis/ /sangs rgyas sras po grags chen rnams/ /chos kyi sprin gyi ye shes kyis/ /chos nyid stong pa mthong gyur nas/ /pad+ma chen po'i rang bzhin gyis/ /gang tshe sems ni rab bkrus pas/ /'khor
74a4(bstod tshogs): ba'i gzeb las 'das gyur nas/ /pad+ma chen po rang bzhin gyi/ /stan la de ni rab gnas 'gyur/ /'dab ma rin chen du ma'i 'od/ /'dod par bya ba'i ze'u 'bru can/ /pad+ma bye ba du ma yis/ /rnam pa kun tu yongs su bskor/ /stobs
74a5(bstod tshogs): bcu po yis yongs su gang/ /mi 'jigs pa yis yang dag ngoms/ /bsam mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas chos/ /spros med rnams las nyams mi mnga' / /legs par spyod pa'i las kun gyis/ /bsod nams ye shes rab bsags
74a6(bstod tshogs): pa'i/ /zla ba nya la skar ma yis/ /'khor du rnam pa kun gyis bskor/ /sangs rgyas phyag gi nyi ma der/ /dri med rin chen 'bar gyur des/ /sras kyi thu bo dbang bskur bas/ /dbang bskur ba ni kun tu stsol/ /rnal 'byor chen po der
74a7(bstod tshogs): gnas nas/ /rmongs pas dman pa'i 'jig rten rnams/ /sdug bsngal gyis g.yengs 'jigs pa la/ /lha yi spyan gyis gzigs gyur nas/ /de yi sku la 'od zer rnams/ /'bad pa med par 'byung 'gyur te/ /rmongs pa'i
74b1(bstod tshogs): mun par zhugs de yi/ /sgo rnams 'byed par mdzad pa yin/ /lhag bcas mya ngan 'das pa rnams/ /lhag med mya ngan 'das par 'dod/ /'dir ni mya ngan 'das pa nyid/ /dri ma med par sems gyur pa'o/ /sems can kun gyi dngos med
74b2(bstod tshogs): pa'i/ /ngo bo de yang de'i spyod yul/ /de mthong byang chub sems dpa' o/ /shin tu dri med chos kyi sku/ /dri ma med pa'i chos sku la/ /ye shes rgya mtsho gnas gyur nas/ /sna tshogs nor bu ji bzhin du/ /de bas sems can don rnams
74b3(bstod tshogs): mdzad/ /chos kyi dbyings su bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o// // */ (/dpe med par bstod pa/)
74b4(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ ni rU pa ma sta ba/ bod skad du/ dpe med par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig lta bas phongs pa yi/ /'jig rten 'di la phan brtson khyod/ /dngos po med pa'i don rig pas/ /
74b5(bstod tshogs): dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gang zhig khyod kyi cung zhig kyang/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs pa/ /khyod kyi gzigs pa bla med de/ /de nyid don ni rig pa lags/ /don dam pa yi yod pa nyid/ /rtogs dang rtogs bya mi
74b6(bstod tshogs): mnga' zhing/ /e ma ho mchog tu rtogs dka' ba'i/ /chos nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs/ /khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing/ /chos rnams bkag pa'ang ma lags la/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi lta ba yis/ /bla na med
74b7(bstod tshogs): ba'i go 'phang brnyes/ /'khor ba spangs par gyur ba yis/ /mya ngan 'das khyod mi bzhed kyis/ /'khor ba ma dmigs pa nyid kyi/ /zhi de mgon po khyod kyis rtogs/ /khyod kyis kun nas nyon mongs dang/ /rnam byang ro gcig
75a1(bstod tshogs): gyur rig pas/ /chos dbyings mngon par dbyer med pa/ /kun tu rnam par dag par gyur/ /gtso bo khyod kyi gang zhig tu/ /yi ge gcig kyang ma gsungs pa/ /gdul bya'i 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /chos kyi char gyis
75a2(bstod tshogs): tshim pa'ang mdzad/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' khyod/ /phung po khams dang skye mched la/ /chags par gyur pa mi mnga' bas/ /chos rnams kun la brten ma lags/ /mgon khyod sems can 'du shes kyis/ /'jug pa kun
75a3(bstod tshogs): tu mi mnga' yang/ /sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sems can la/ /snying rje'i bdag nyid gyur pa'ang khyod/ /bde dang sdug bsngal de gyur pa/ /rtag mi rtag sogs las gtso khyod/ /de lta'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyis/ /thugs ni chags par
75a4(bstod tshogs): gyur ma lags/ /chos rnams gang duAng 'gro 'ong med/ /de bzhin khyod kyi gshegs pa'ang lags/ /'ga' ru spungs pa'ang ma lags la/ /de bzhin don dam rig pa'ang lags/ /kun gyi rjes su zhugs gyur kyang/ /'ga' ru
75a5(bstod tshogs): 'byung yang ma lags la/ /skye dang chos dang sku rnams kyang/ /thub chen khyod kyi bsam mi khyab/ /gcig dang gzhan pa rnams spangs pa/ /brag ca lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams/ /'pho dang 'jig pa rnams spangs par/ /smad pa med par khyod kyis
75a6(bstod tshogs): rtogs/ /rtag dang chad pa dang bral zhing/ /mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam spangs par/ /gtso bos rmi lam sgyu sogs bzhin/ /'khor ba nges par rtogs pa lags/ /bag chags bzhir gyur mthar thug pa'i/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs sdig pa spangs
75a7(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs nyid kyi rang bzhin yang/ /khyod kyi bdud rtsi nyid du bsgrubs/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi gzugs rnams kyi/ /mtshan ma med mthong gzugs med bzhin/ /mtshan gyis 'bar ba'i sku nyid kyang/ /gzugs su spyod yul nyid du mthong/ /gzugs su mthong bas
75b1(bstod tshogs): ? med kyang/ /mthong ngo zhes ni rjod par byed/ /chos mthong bas ni shin tu mthong/ /chos nyid mthong ba ma yin no/ /khong stong khyod kyi sku la med/ /sha dang rus pa khrag kyang med/ /nam mkha' i dbang po'i gzhu bzhin du/ /khyod kyi sku ni ston par mdzad/ /sku la snyun med rus
75b2(bstod tshogs): pa'ang med/ /bkres dang skom pa 'byung med kyang/ /khyod ni 'jig rten rjes 'jug phyir/ /'jig rten spyod pa'ang bsten par mdzad/ /las kyi sgrib pa'i skyon rnams kyang/ /sdig med khyod kyi kun spangs kyang/ /khyod kyi sems can rjes
75b3(bstod tshogs): bzung? phyir/ /las spangs pa yang rab tu bstan/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /gtso bo theg dbye ma mchis kyang/ /khyod kyis theg pa gsum bstan pa/ /sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags/ /rtag cing brtan la zhi ba yi/ /chos
75b4(bstod tshogs): kyi rang bzhin khyod kyi sku/ /rgyal bas gdul bya dgrol ba'i phyir/ /khyod kyis mya ngan 'das par bstan/ /grangs med 'jig rten khams rnams su/ /'das dang bltams dang mngon byang chub/ /'khor ba thar par mos rnams kyi/ /khyod la
75b5(bstod tshogs): gus rnams kyis kyang mthong/ /mgon po sems pa mi mnga' zhing/ /rnam rtog g.yo ba mi mnga' yang/ /khyod kyis dang gis 'jig rten la/ /sangs rgyas mdzad pa'ang 'jug par 'gyur/ /de ltar bde bar gshegs pa bsam mi
75b6(bstod tshogs): khyab me tog/ /gis brgyan pa las bdag gi bsod nams gang thob par/ /gyur pa 'dis ni sems can ma lus pa 'di dag /mchog tu rtogs dka' thub pa'i chos kyi snod gyur cig /dpe med par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa
75b7(bstod tshogs): rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Ta paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/ // */ (/'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ lo kA tI ta sta pa/ bod skad du/ 'jig
76a1(bstod tshogs): rten las 'das par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu pa gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dben pa'i ye shes rig gyur pa/ /'jig rten 'das khyod phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /gang khyod 'gro la phan pa'i phyir/ /yun ring thugs rjes
76a2(bstod tshogs): ngal bar gyur/ /phung po tsam las grol ba yi/ /sems can med par khyod bzhed la/ /sems can don la'ang mchog gzhol bar/ /thub pa chen po khyod nyid bzhugs/ /blo ldan khyod kyi phung de'ang/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu dri za yi/ /grong
76a3(bstod tshogs): khyer rmi lam ji bzhin du/ /blo ldan rnams la rab tu bstan/ /gang dag rgyu las byung ba rnams/ /de med par ni yod min pas/ /gzugs brnyan nyid dang mtshungs pa ru/ /gsal bar ci yi phyir mi 'dod/ /'byung ba mig gi gzugs
76a4(bstod tshogs): min pas/ /de dngos mig gi ji ltar yin/ /gzugs nyid gzung bar rab bkag pa/ /gzugs nyid khyod kyis de ltar gsungs/ /tshor bya med par de med pas/ /tshor ba nyid ni bdag med pas/ /tshor ba de yang rang bzhin gyis/ /
76a5(bstod tshogs): yod pa med par khyod nyid bzhed/ /ming dang don dag tha dad min/ /me yis kha nyid 'tshig par 'gyur/ /gzhan na'ang rtogs pa med 'gyur zhes/ /bden pa gsung ba khyod kyis bstan/ /byed po rang dbang las nyid kyang/ /tha snyad du ni
76a6(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis bstan/ /phan tshun bltos pa can nyid du/ /grub par khyod ni bzhed pa lags/ /byed po yod ming spyod btags? med/ /bsod nams de min rten 'brel skyes/ /brten nas skyes kyang ma skyes zhes/ /tshig gi bdag po khyod kyis
76a7(bstod tshogs): gsungs/ /shes pa med par shes pa min/ /de med rnam par shes pa'ang med/ /de phyir shes dang shes bya dag /rang dngos med ces khyod kyis gsungs/ /mtshan nyid mtshon bya gzhan nyid ni/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid med par 'gyur/
76b1(bstod tshogs): tha dad min na'ang de med par/ /khyod kyis gsal po nyid du bstan/ /mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam bral zhing/ /tshig gis brjod pa rnam spangs par/ /khyod kyis ye shes spyan nyid kyis/ /'gro ba 'di dag zhi bar mdzad/ /dngos po yod pa nyid mi skye/ /med pa'ang
76b2(bstod tshogs): ma ? yod med min/ /bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/ /gnyis min skyes pa ji lta bu/ /yod pa gnas par rigs 'gyur gyi/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /med pa mi gnas par rig pas/ /'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /re
76b3(bstod tshogs): zhig zhig pa'i rgyu las kyang/ /'bras bu 'byung bar mi rigs la/ /ma zhig las min rmi lam dang/ /'dra ba'i skye ba khyod nyid bzhed/ /zhig dang ma zhig pa dag gis/ /rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba dag /sgyu ma 'byung ba bzhin du 'byung/ /kun kyang
76b4(bstod tshogs): de bzhin khyed kyis bsrungs/ /de phyir khyod kyis 'gro 'di dag /yongs su brtags pa las byung bar/ /kun tu shes bya 'byung ba na'ang/ /skye ba med cing 'gag med gsungs/ /rtag la 'khor ba yod ma yin/ /mi rtag pa la'ang 'khor ba med//
76b5(bstod tshogs): de nyid rig pa'i mchog khyod kyis/ /'khor ba rmi lam 'dra bar gsungs/ /sdug bsngal rang gis byas pa dang/ /gzhan gyis byas dang gnyis gas byas/ /rgyu med par ni rtog ge 'dod/ /khyod kyi rten nas 'byung bar gsungs/ /rten cing 'brel bar
76b6(bstod tshogs): gang byung ba/ /de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed/ /dngos po rang dbang yod min zhes/ /mnyam med khyod kyi seng ge'i sgra/ /kun rtog thams cad spangs pa'i phyir/ /stong nyid bdud rtsi ston mdzad na/ /gang zhig de la zhen gyur pa/ /de nyid khyod kyis shin
76b7(bstod tshogs): tu smad/ /bems po gzhan dbang stong pa nyid/ /sgyu ma bzhin du rkyen 'byung bar/ /mgon po khyod kyis chos kun gyi/ /dngos med goms par mdzad pa lags/ /khyod kyis cung zhig ma bskyed cing/ /'ga' yang bkag pa ma mchis la/ /
77a1(bstod tshogs): sngon gyi ji ltar phyis de bzhin/ /de bzhin nyid ni thugs su chud/ /'phags pa rnams kyi brten pa yi/ /bsgoms ma zhugs par mtshan med 'di/ /rnam par shes par 'gar 'gyur ram/ /mtshan ma med la ma zhugs par/ /
77a2(bstod tshogs): thab pa med ces gsungs pa'i phyir/ /de phyir khyod kyis theg chen rnams/ /ma lus par ni de nyid bstan/ /bstod pa'i snod khyod bstod pa las/ /bdag gi bsod nams gang thob pa/ /des ni 'gro ba ma lus rnams/ /mtshan ma'i 'ching las grol
77a3(bstod tshogs): gyur cig /'jig rten las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Ta paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
77a4(bstod tshogs): */ (/sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta badzra sta ba/ bod skad du/ sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis sems byung dra ba ni/ /sems
77a5(bstod tshogs): nyid kyi ni bsal mdzad de/ /sems kyi rmongs pa sel ba yi/ /rang sems de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs rnams/ /tha dad lha yi dmigs pa la/ /rin chen sems ni rnam grol las/ /lha gzhan bsgrub tu
77a6(bstod tshogs): yod ma yin/ /rim thob pa ni byang chub ste/ /sems ni 'gro ba lnga po yin/ /bde dang sdug bsngal mtshan nyid dag /sems las ma gtogs cung zad med/ /'gro ba kun gyis mthong ba rnams/ /cung zad bsgom pa'i rnam pa
77a7(bstod tshogs): yang/ /de kun sems kyi dra ba ru/ /de nyid gsung bas bstan pa yin/ /rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i sems/ /rnam par rtog pas sgo byas pa'i/ /'khor ba rnam rtog tsam nyid de/ /rnam rtog med pa thar pa yin/ /de
77b1(bstod tshogs): ?las kun gyis 'bad pa yis/ /byang chub sems la phyag bya'o/ /sems kyi rdo rje'i bsgom pa'i phyir/ /de ni byang chub mchog ces bya/ /khams bskyed sems ni lus kyis bcings/ /sems med khams ni khed par 'jug /de phyir sems ni kun
77b2(bstod tshogs): tu bsrung/ /bde legs sems la sangs rgyas 'byung/ /sems kyi rdo rje'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/don dam par bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ /ba ra ma thA rtha sta ba/ bod skad
77b3(bstod tshogs): du/ don dam par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye ba med cing gnas med la/ /'jig rten dpe las shin tu 'das/ /ngag gis brjod pa'i spyod yul min/ /mgon khyod ji ltar brjod par bgyi/ /de ltar
77b4(bstod tshogs): na yang gang 'dra bas/ /de bzhin nyid don spyod yul gyi/ /'jig rten btags pa la gnas nas/ /gus pa chen pos bdag gis bstod/ /skye ba med pa'i ngo bo yis/ /khyod la skye ba yongs mi mnga' / /mgon khyod gshegs dang byon mi mnga' / /dngos
77b5(bstod tshogs): mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dngos med ma lags dngos ma lags/ /chad pa ma lags rtag ma lags/ /mi rtag ma lags rtag ma lags/ /gnyis mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dmar dang ljang dang btsod mdog min/ /ser dang
77b6(bstod tshogs): nag dang dkar ma lags/ /khyod la kha dog yongs mi dmigs/ /mdog mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chen po ma lags chung ma lags/ /ring dang zlum pas ma lags la/ /tshad med pa yi dngos brnyes pa/ /tshad mi mnga' la phyag
77b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal 'dud/ /ring min nye ba ma lags shing/ /nam mkha' ma lags sa ma lags/ /'khor min mya ngan 'das ma lags/ /gnas mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi dngos gyur
78a1(bstod tshogs): cing/ /mchog tu zab pa nyid brnyes pas/ /zab mo khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /de lta'i bstod pas bstod bgyi'am/ /yang na 'di ni ci zhig bstod/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/ /gang la bstod cing gang gis
78a2(bstod tshogs): bstod/ /skye dang 'jig pa rnams spangs shing/ /gang la mdza' dang dbus med la/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa ma mchis pas/ /'dir ni khyod bstod nus pa gang/ /gshegs dang byon pa mi mnga' zhing/ /'gro spangs bde bar gshegs bstod pas/
78a3(bstod tshogs): bsod nams des ni 'jig rten rnams/ /bde gshegs gnas su 'gro bar bdog /don dam par bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas
78a4(bstod tshogs): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba//) //rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tri ya sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
78a5(bstod tshogs): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gcig min du ma ma yin bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa/ /dngos min dngos po med pa mi yin mkha' ltar ro gcig rtogs par dka' ba'i rang bzhin can/ /gos pa med cing mi
78a6(bstod tshogs): 'gyur zhi la mi mnyam mnyam pa khyab pa can te spros med pa/ /so so rang rig rgyal ba rnams kyi chos sku dngos? med gang yin de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rang gi 'byor pa 'jig rten las 'das bsam gyis mi khyab legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras
78a7(bstod tshogs): bu ni/ /blo can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed phyir 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs rgyas par ston mdzad cing/ /rtag tu dam pa chos kyi sgra skad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa po/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal srid gnas
78b1(bstod tshogs): pa gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang snang zhing/ /la la ru ni rdzogs par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi par gang snang la/ /sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyi rnam pa
78b2(bstod tshogs): du mar 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba/ /phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can don gcig rgyun tu mdzad cing bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung
78b3(bstod tshogs): ba'i/ /bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gsum yid dang tshig gi lam las rab tu 'das pa la/ /bdag gi dad pas phyag byas dge ba byang chub sa bon bsags par gyur pa gang yin des/ /sku gsum thob nas 'gro ba 'di dag ma lus byang chub
78b4(bstod tshogs): lam la nges par 'jug par shog /sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing
78b5(bstod tshogs): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ kA ya tra ya sto tra nA ma sya bi ba ra rgA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsum la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'grel pa/ /'phags pa
78b6(bstod tshogs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag nyid chen po'i sku gsum gyi/ /bstod pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ /gzhan gyis gsol bas bskul bas na/ /ji ltar bkod pa rnam par dbye/ /de la/ gcig min du ma ma yin zhes
78b7(bstod tshogs): bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyi brjod par bya ba dang/ dgos pa dang/ 'brel pa dang/ dgos pa'i yang dgos pa brjod par bya ste/ gang gi phyir brjod pa dang/ dgos pa dang/ 'brel pa med pa dag la ni so sor rtog pa sngon
79a1(bstod tshogs): du gtong bdag len par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir 'dir ci zhig 'chad par 'gyur zhes 'di la yang dag par rmongs pa dag dran pa 'jug par bya ba'i phyir brjod par bya ba bshad do/ /bshad pa don med par rtog pa dag nges par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
79a2(bstod tshogs): dgos pa bstan to/ /thabs med par dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir 'brel pa bshad de/ gzhan du na thabs med bdag la ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ de la 'dir sku gsum ni brjod par bya ba'o/ /de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad pa ni dgos pa ste/ de'i rang gi ngo bo nyid bshad
79a3(bstod tshogs): pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di byas so/ /de bas na dgos pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dag brjod pa dag brjod par bya ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa 'am/ tshig dang tshig can 'brel pa 'am/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa 'am/ /sgrub pa dang sgrub par bya ba'i
79a4(bstod tshogs): mtshan nyid du 'brel pa 'am/ bya ba dang byed pa'i mtshan nyid du 'brel pa ni 'brel pa'o/ /de nas 'bad pa dang rtsol ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par rang nyid kyis sku gsum gyi don dang bya ba mthar phyin pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa yin par shes par bya ste 'di ni re
79a5(bstod tshogs): zhig don gyi spyi yin no/ /da ni yan lag gi don brjod par bya ste/ gcig min du ma ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/ gcig dang du ma ni gcig dang du ma ste/ gcig ni gnyis pa med pa nyid do/ /du ma ni mang po nyid de/ gcig dang du mar ma gyur pa'i chos kyi
79a6(bstod tshogs): sku gang yin pa de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /ci'i phyir gcig kyang ma yin la du ma yang ma yin zhe na/ de'i phyir gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o zhes 'byung bas na gang thog ma nyid nas ma skyes pa de la gcig dang du ma'i gnas skabs su bya bar mi nus
79a7(bstod tshogs): te/ nam mkha' ltar yongs su chad pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid las byung bas na/ de'i phyir gang zhig gang las byung bar gyur pa ste/ /gang gis sna tshogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pa de ma mthong ste/ sa lu la sogs pa'i sa bon las
79b1(bstod tshogs): ? 'bras bu'o/ /de bzhin du stong pa nyid las gang zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni rtag pa dang chad par mi 'gyur te/ gang gi phyir kun tu rtog pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang stong zhing sgyu ma dang 'dra bar gzigs so/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i
79b2(bstod tshogs): phyir bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs chen gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba smos te/ bdag dang gzhan ni bdag dang gzhan te/ de dag la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir gyur pa ni mngon par mtho ba dang/ des par legs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi phun
79b3(bstod tshogs): sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gang gi phyir chos kyi dbyings gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i ngo bo thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du bshad na/ ji ltar na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin
79b4(bstod tshogs): zhe na/ nyes pa med de/ 'di ltar ma rig pa'i bag chags kyi stobs kyi snod dang bcud kyi tshul du gnas pa ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa chen po'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/ rmi lam la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin no/ /gal te ma rig pa'i
79b5(bstod tshogs): bag chags dang chos kyi dbyings thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i ngo bo de yang la rig pa'i bag chags su gyur pa ni gla rtsi la sogs pas bsgos pa bzhin te/ dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid ni de lta bu'o/ /de bas na bdag dang gzhan la phan pa phun sum tshogs pa'i gzhir
79b6(bstod tshogs): gyur pa yin no/ /gzhan yang dge ba'i gshes gnyen dang phrad cing lam bzang po rnyed pas ma rig pa'i bag chags glo bur ba ring du byas shing yongs su dag par gyur pa ni gser dang zangs kyi dri ma dang bral ba bzhin te/ 'di la yon tan dang nyes pa len cing spong pa
79b7(bstod tshogs): yod pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa kho na tsam du zad de/ de'i phyir 'di la bsal bya ci yang med/ /bzhag par bya ba gang yang med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag blta/ /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol zhes gsungs pa gang 'di
80a1(bstod tshogs): ltar rkyen dang ldan pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par thal bar 'gyur gyi ma skyes pa skye bar ni ma mthong ngo/ /skyes pa 'gag pa dag las kyang cung zad skye ba med de/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni mar me dang mtshungs so/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya
80a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i phyir/ dngos min dngos po med pa ma yin zhes bya ba smos te/ dngos po ni gzugs su yod pa'o/ /de med par gyur pa ni dngos po med pa ste/ gnyi ga las ldog par 'gyur bas na dngos min dngos po yod pa ma yin zhes bya ste/ yod pa dang med pa dang
80a3(bstod tshogs): dbus las 'das par gyur pa'o/ /de nyid kyis nam mkha' ltar ro gcig pa ste/ nam mkha' ltar zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra bar ro gcig cing mnyam pa'i rang bzhin du gang gyur pa de ni nam mkha' ltar ro gcig ces bya'o/ /de nyid kyis na rtogs par dka' 
80a4(bstod tshogs): pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyi ga dang gzhan las btsal ba dang bral ba nyid do/ /de bas na gos pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyes pa'i dri ma dang bral ba nyid do/ /de nyid kyis ni mi 'gyur ba ste rang gi ngo bo nyid la mi
80a5(bstod tshogs): 'pho ba'o/ /zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar gyur pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa ni mtshungs pa med pa'o/ /mnyam pa ni chos thams cad kyi gzhir mtshungs par gyur pa'o/ /khyab pa can ni thams cad du song bar gyur pa'o/ /spros pa med pa ni spros pa
80a6(bstod tshogs): thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa'o/ /khyad par du bya ba gzhan yang so so rang rig ces bya ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi so so rang gis rig par gyur pa gzhon nu ma'i bde ba dris pa bzhin no/ /dpe med pa ni dpe las 'das par gyur pa ste/ de skad du yang mtshungs pa 'ga' yang yod min te/ /tshig lam
80a7(bstod tshogs): pa'ang gang zhig yod/ /cung zad nye ba 'am ring ba ni/ /'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/ /'dren pa mnyam pa med gyur pa/ /de la dper bya gang zhig gzhal/ /skabs 'byed gzhi dang bral ba yi/ /mnyam med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bshad
80b1(bstod tshogs): pa'o/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi sku ste chos kyi lus de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji lta bu su la zhe na/ rgyal ba rnams te shes bya ma lus pa thugs su chud pas thugs byin gyis brlabs pa la lus dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /rang gi 'byor ba ni khams
80b2(bstod tshogs): gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan nyid do/ /khyad par ji lta bu zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ste 'jig rten las rgal ba'o/ /bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni sems kyi yul las ring du gyur pa'o/ /legs mdzad brgya yi 'bras bu zhes bya ba
80b3(bstod tshogs): ni sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yun ring por nye bar bsags pa las skyes pa'o/ /gang gi zhe na/ blo can rnams kyi ste/ byams pa dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ ngan song thams cad spong ba dang/ mya ngan thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i
80b4(bstod tshogs): blo gros la sogs pa'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir te rab tu mgu ba'i rgyur ro/ /'khor ni byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs te de rnams kyi nang du'o/ /sna tshogs pa ni rnam pa du ma'o/ /rgyas par ston par mdzad pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can mos
80b5(bstod tshogs): pa sna tshogs pa dag gi bsam pa'i khyad par gyi dbang du mdzad nas bye brag du mar 'chad par mdzad pa'o/ /rtag tu dam pa'i chos kyi sgra skrad rgya chen 'jig rten kun tu 'phro bar mdzad pa po zhes bya ba ni shin tu rgya che ba'i dam pa'i chos kyi gsung ngo/ /thams cad
80b6(bstod tshogs): du 'jug pas na rgya che ba'o/ /de nyid kyis na de rgyun mi 'chad par spro bas na shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba la sogs pa'i dam pa'i chos ston cing gsung bar 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni chos kyi de kho na nyid ji lta ba bzhin du brnyes
80b7(bstod tshogs): shing thugs su chud pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku zhes bya ba ni rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug gi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos ston pa la sogs pas longs spyod par mdzad pa'o/ /de'i phyir 
81a1(bstod tshogs): khyad par gzhan yang chos kyi rgyal srid chen po la bzhugs pa gang yin zhes bya ba smos te/ chos kyi srid kyang yin la chen po yang yin pas na chos kyi rgyal srid chen po ste khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po'o/ /de la gnas
81a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i sku gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis sku rnam pa gnyis po'i rang gi ngo bo nye bar bstan nas/ sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams ni smin par mdzad phyir la la dag tu me 'bar bzhin du gang
81a3(bstod tshogs): snang zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can rnams ni srog chags rnams so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ smin par mdzad pa'i phyir te yongs su smin pa'i don du'o/ /gang gis dus la la dag tu me dang 'dra zhing byin za bzhin du kun nas 'bar bar snang zhing 'od
81a4(bstod tshogs): dang ldan pas rab tu 'bar bar snang ba'o/ /gnas gang du snang zhen/ smras pa/ rdzogs par byang chub ces pa ste/ byang chub pa nyid du'o/ /chos kyi 'khor lo ni wa ra NA sir drang song smra ba ri dags kyi gnas su'o/ /rab tu zhi bar gang snang la zhes
81a5(bstod tshogs): pa ni gyad kyi nye 'khor shing sa la zung gi tshal du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'o/ /khyad par ci zhig ce na/ sna tshogs thabs tshul rnams kyis zhes bya ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems
81a6(bstod tshogs): dpa' dang/ tshangs pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du ston pa'o/ /bye brag ji lta bu zhe na/ rnam pa du mar 'jug cing zhes pa ste/ gdul bya sna tshogs pa rnam pa du ma'i rjes su
81a7(bstod tshogs): 'jug par mdzad pa'o/ /khyad par ci zhig ce na/ srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs sel ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa ste srid pa gsum gyi sems can rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa'i nyes pa ring du mdzad pa ni 'jigs pa sel
81b1(bstod tshogs): ba'o/ /gzhan yang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir phyogs bcur chub mdzad thub pa rnams kyi sprul sku don chen zhes bya ste/ phyogs bcur chub par mdzad pa ni phyogs bcu po rnams su rjes su khyab pa'o/ /thub pa ni sku dang gsung thub pa dang ldan pas na thub pa ste sangs rgyas bcom
81b2(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das so/ /don chen ni mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu stsol ba 'am thob par mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku gang yin pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes slob dpon klu sgrub kyis gsungs pa yin no/ /de ni 'di skad du ston par 'gyur te/
81b3(bstod tshogs): gang gis bdag nyid kyis bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan gyi gzhal yas khang na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' dam pa tog dkar pos thugs kyi rang bzhin gyis byams pa dang/ snying
81b4(bstod tshogs): rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ gtang snyoms dang/ bsam gtan bzhi bsgoms pa'i rim gyis rnal 'byor chen po'i gnas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rim pas yang dag par sangs rgyas so/ /de nas sprul pa'i skus de bzhin gshegs pa
81b5(bstod tshogs): thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bzhugs pa dang/ ri rab chen po'i steng du rdo rje nor bu rin po che'i gzhal yas khang gi rtse mor gshegs te/ dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhir mngon par sprul par mdzad nas/ slar yang dga' ldan gyis gnas mchog tu
81b6(bstod tshogs): bzhugs pa'i dam pa tog dkar po 'ang gcig tu gyur nas lhums su 'jug pa dang/ bltams pa dang/ btsun mo'i nang na rol pa mdzad par bstan pa dang/ mtshan mo mngon par byung ba dang/ dka' ba mdzad pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs
81b7(bstod tshogs): pa dang/ bdud btul pa dang/ mngon par byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas ji srid tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyis 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don mdzad par rab tu ston pa'i sprul pa'i sku la bdag lus dang ngag dang yid
82a1(bstod tshogs): kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de nyid kyi phyir na/ 'og min gnas ni nyams dga' bar/ /gtsang ma'i gnas kyi steng bzhugs te/ /yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/ /sprul pa dag ni 'dir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
82a2(bstod tshogs): gsungs pas so/ /de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis sku gsum bstan nas/ gzhan yang smon lam byed par 'dod pa'i phyir sems can don gcig rgyun du mdzad cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ sems can gyi don ni srog chags rnams
82a3(bstod tshogs): kyi 'dod pa'i don rab tu sgrub ces bya ba'i don yin pas na/ 'gro ba'i don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi don gcig rgyun du mdzad pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems can gyi don mdzad pa de la phyag byas pas zhes bya bar sbyar ro/ /yon tan
82a4(bstod tshogs): ji lta bu dang ldan zhe na/ bsod nams ye shes chen po dpag med las byung ba'i zhes bya ba smos te/ bsod nams dang ye shes chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'o/ /de yongs su chad pa med par bsags pa ni dpag tu med pa ste/ bsod nams
82a5(bstod tshogs): dang ye shes chen po dpag tu med pa las byung ba ni de las skyes pa'o/ /de su zhig ce na/ bde bar gshegs pa ste mdzes par gshegs pa 'am slar mi ldog par gshegs pa'i chos can nyid yin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /yang na nyid kyi
82a6(bstod tshogs): don mthar phyin pas na bde bar gshegs pa'o/ /rnams kyi sku gsum ni chos kyi sku dang/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang/ sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'i sku gsum pa'o/ /de bas na de'i yon tan gyi khyad par ji lta zhe na/ yid dang tshig gi lam
82a7(bstod tshogs): las rab tu 'das pa zhes bya ba ste/ dmigs su yod pa'i yid kyi yul las shin tu 'das pa'i don to/ /de lta bur gyur pa la mos pa'i dad pas 'dud cing phyag byas pa las so/ /bdag gis dge ba byang chub sa bon zhes bya ba ni byang chub pa'i sa bon ni
82b1(bstod tshogs): byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba'i don to/ /de bsgrubs shing bsags pa'o/ /des na de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs gang yin pa des chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi sku gsum thob cing reg nas 'gro ba ma lus shing lhag ma med pa dag
82b2(bstod tshogs): byang chub kyi lam la 'dzud pa ste/ byang chub pa'i lam ni byang chub lam ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i lam chen po de la rab tu 'dzud cing 'god par shog cig ces bya ba'i don to/ /bstod pa'i rgyal po mkhas shing yon tan phul byung spyod
82b3(bstod tshogs): yul pa/ shin tu nyams med rgya chen snying po don gyi tshogs sbas pa/ /bdag gis 'dir ni lo 'dab rtse tsam blangs nas rnam bshad kyis/ /mchog tu mkhas shing don gyi rjes 'brang 'dir ni tshad ma yin/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i sku gsum
82b4(bstod tshogs): la bstod pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rad+d+hA kar warma dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bande rin chen bzang pos gsar du bsgyur cing zhus pa lags so// // */ (/sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa/) /
82b5(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ satwA ra dA na sta pa/ bod skad du/ sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nga la gus pa sems can don te gus pa gzhan dag min/ /gang gis snying rje ma btang de yis nga la gus pa ste/ /snying rje btang
82b6(bstod tshogs): nas gnas par gyur pa lhung ba gang yin pa/ /de ni de las snying rjes bslang bar nus kyi gzhan gyis min/ /gang gi snying rje sems can la ni rjes su zhugs gyur pa/ /des ni nga yang mnyes byas des ni bstan pa'i khur yang bzung/ /tshul khrims thos pa snying rje
82b7(bstod tshogs): dag dang blo dang gsal ba dag /gang la yod pa des ni rtag tu bde bar gshegs pa mchod/ /nga nyid sems can phan 'dogs gyur pas grub 'di brnyes pa ste/ /sems can kho na'i don du nga yis sku 'di yang dag bzung/ /sems can rnams la yid kyis
83a1(bstod tshogs): gnod par sems de gang gi phyir/ /nga la mi bltos pas na de yi don ston par mi 'gyur/ /sems can phan pa chung yang nges ni mchod pa 'byung 'gyur te/ /gang gis yid ni mgu bar byed pa mchod pa yin pas so/ /gnod
83a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i bdag nyid can nam gzhan la rnam par 'tshi 'ang rung/ /legs par sbyar nas mchod par gyur kyang des ni mchod mi 'gyur/ /chung ma dag dang bu dang 'byor dang rgyal srid chen po dang/ /sha rnams dang ni khrag dang tshil dang mig dang lus rnams
83a3(bstod tshogs): kyang/ gang la brtse ba'i dbang du byas nas nga yi yongs btang ba/ /nges na de la gnod pa byas (nang la gnod byas 'gyur) de nas sems can phan pa byas na nga la mchod pa'i mchog /sems can gnod pa byas pa nga la shin tu gnod pa'i mchog /bde dang
83a4(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal ba dang sems can mtshungs par myong bas na/ /sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa nga yi slob ma ji ltar yin/ /sems can rnams la brtan nas sangs rgyas mnyes dang dge ba byas/ /sems can mang po'i don la rab gnas pha rol phyin
83a5(bstod tshogs): pa thob/ /sems can don la brtson pa'i yid kyis bdud kyi stobs kyang bcom/ /sems can rnams la de lta de ltar spyad pa des na nga sangs rgyas/ /skye ba skye bar gces par gyur pa'i gnyen 'dra srog chags med gyur na/ /dngos po gang la 'dir
83a6(bstod tshogs): ni snying rje byams las dmigs pa nges par 'grub/ /btang snyoms dga' ba la sogs dngos po'i ? dang rnam par thar la sogs gang la/ /gang gi don du snying rje de la 'bad pa'i yid kyis bzod pa yun rings bsgoms/ /glang po la sogs 'gro ba
83a7(bstod tshogs): sems can rnams nyid du ma nga yis sbyin pa byas/ /sems can rnams nyid snod nyid du yang nye bar gyur bas nga yis sbyin pas bsdus/ /sems can rnams nyid sna tshogs dngos por gyur pas nga yis snying rje 'phel bar gyur/ /gal te sems can rnams
83b1(bstod tshogs): nyid bsrung ma byas na gang gi don du don 'di bsgrubs/ /gal te sems can med na 'khor bar nyon mongs mi bzad rab tu mang po las/ /skye ba brgyud par gnod pa mtshungs pa med las gang la brten nas phan 'di bsgrubs/ /bde bar gshegs kyi bdag
83b2(bstod tshogs): nyid chen po ngo mtshar che ba 'khor ba'i rgyan gyur 'di/ /gal te nga la sems can rnams la brtse med gyur na gang gi don du nye bar bsgrubs/ /ji srid nga yi bstan pa 'gro ba rnams la phan pa 'dir ni 'bar gyur pa/ /de srid gzhan la mchog tu phan par
83b3(bstod tshogs): 'dod pa khyed kyis gnas par gyis/ /thos pas nga yi legs par sbyang ba sems can don la mi skyo thos bgyid la/ /skyo ba med par lus 'di las ni snying po dag ni blang bar gyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod ba tshwa'i chu klung zhes bya ba'i lung las bcom
83b4(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po bcu drug la bka' stsal pa/ sems can mgu bar bya ba'i bstod pa slob dpon klu sgrub kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas bsdus pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI baM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na
83b5(bstod tshogs): dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ (/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa bzhugs so/) //rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nya pA ra mi ta sto taM/ bod skad du/
83b6(bstod tshogs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang khyod sku kun nyes med la/ /nyes med rnams kyis gzigs mdzad pa/ /dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /rnam par ma rtog
83b7(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nam mkha' bzhin du gos med cing/ /spros pa med cing yi ge med/ /bsam yas khyod mthong gang yin pa/ /des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong/ /'phags ma yon tan phyug khyod dang/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i bla ma rnams/
84a1(bstod tshogs): khyad par yod par ma 'khums te/ /zla ba dang ni zla 'od bzhin/ /gus la byams ma sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos kyi sngon 'gro khyod brtan nas/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid mnyam med pa'i/ /bdag nyid chen por bde blag 'gro /lan cig tsam
84a2(bstod tshogs): yang bsam dag pas/ /khyod la tshul bzhin blta ba gang/ /des kyang mthong ba don yod kyi/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /gzhan don mngon dga' i bdag nyid can/ /dpa' bo dag ni thams cad kyi/ /gso mdzad bskyed par mdzad pa ste/ /khyod ni
84a3(bstod tshogs): byams ma'i yum lags so/ /gang slad sangs rgyas 'jig rten gtso/ /thugs rje can rnams khyod kyi sras/ /de yi slad du dge ma khyod/ /sems can kun gyi phyi mo lags/ /pha rol phyin pa dri med pa/ /kun gyis ma smad pa khyod kyi/ /dus kun rjes su 'brang
84a4(bstod tshogs): lags pa/ /rgyu skar rnams kyis zla ris bzhin/ /gdul bya'i 'gro ba la brten nas/ /de dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/ /khyod nyid gcig pu tshul mang du/ /sna tshogs mtshan gyis bsngags pa mdzad/ /zil pa'i chu yis thigs pa rnams/
84a5(bstod tshogs): nyi ma'i 'od dang 'jal ba bzhin/ /rgol ba rnams kyi rtsod dang skyon/ /khyod dang 'jal na 'jig par 'gyur/ /khyod nyid byis pa rnams la ni/ /skrag byed mthong na 'jigs pa dang/ /mkhas pa rnams la dbugs 'byin pa/ /skyed pas mthong na zhi
84a6(bstod tshogs): ba lags/ /khyod mgon gang la khyod la yang/ /mngon par chags pa mnga' min na/ /de la yum cig ji ltar na/ /gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung/ /khyod ni gang nas ma byon zhing/ /gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas/ /gnas ni thams cad
84a7(bstod tshogs): dag du yang/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags/ /gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas/ /bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang/ /bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba/ /de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags/ /khyod nyid mthong na zhi
84a8(bstod tshogs): ba lags/ /khyod mgon gang la khyod la yang/ /mngon par chags pa mnga' min na/ /de la yum cig ji ltar na/ /gzhan la 'dod chags zhe sdang 'byung/ /khod ni gang nas ma byon zhing/ /gang du yang ni mi gshegs pas/ /gnas ni thams cad
84a9(bstod tshogs): dag du yang/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dmigs ma lags/ /gang khyod de ltar ma 'khums nas/ /bsam pa yis ni bsgrubs pa dang/ /bsgrubs pa las ni rnam grol ba/ /de 'dir rmad byung chen po lags/ /khyod nyid mthong na 'chid 'gyur
84b1(bstod tshogs): zhing/ /ma mthong na yang 'ching bar 'gyur/ /khyod nyid mthong na grol 'gyur zhing/ /ma mthong na yang grol bar 'gyur/ /e ma ya mtshan cher 'ong ma/ /drags ldan ma khyod bzang mo lags/ /shin tu rtogs dka' sgyu ma bzhin/ /snang zhing mi snang ba yang
84b2(bstod tshogs): lags/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /nyan thos rnams kyis nges bstan ma/ /khyod nyid gcig pu thar pa'i lam/ /de ltar gzhan dag med par des/ /lus can rnams la phan don du/ /tha snyad mdun du mdzad nas ni/ /brtse bas
84b3(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten mgon rnams kyis/ /khyod bstan ma bstan par yang gda' / /'dir khyon bstod par sus rngo thog /mtshan ma med cing gos pa med/ /dag gi yul kun las 'das ma/ /gang khyod 'gar yang rten mi mnga' / /de ltar gda' yang kun rdzob tu/
84b4(bstod tshogs): bdag cag ngag lam 'di 'dra bas/ /khyod ni bstod byar mi gda' na'ang/ /bstod pas shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /shes rab pha rol phyin bstod las/ /bdag gi dge ba gang bsags pa/ /de yis 'jig rten ma lus pa/ /shes rab pha rol phyin gzhol
84b5(bstod tshogs): shog /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //kha tsho'i paNdi ta thig le bum pa dang/ /lo tsA ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// //
84b6(bstod tshogs): */ (/bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ a tsin+ta sta ba/ bod skad du/ bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig dngos po rten 'byung rnams/ /ngo bo med pa nyid du gsungs/
84b7(bstod tshogs): ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab/ /dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la/ /nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs/ /de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad/ /rkyen rnams las ni 'brel
85a1(bstod tshogs): 'byung ba/ /ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis de ma skyes/ /de phyir stong par rab tu bstan/ /ji ltar 'di na sgra brten nas/ /brag ca kun tu 'byung ba ltar/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang/ /de bzhin srid pa
85a2(bstod tshogs): kun tu 'byung/ /sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang/ /dri za'i grong khyer gzugs brnyan dang/ /rmi lam gal te ma skyes na/ /mthong ba la sogs dpe med 'gyur/ /ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba/ /de dag byas pa can du bzhed/ /de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kun/ /mgon
85a3(bstod tshogs): po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs/ /byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa/ /bgyis pa zhes bgyid de mchis te/ /chang pa stong pa 'dra ba lags/ /don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan/ /gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes/ /de tshe de ltar byung ba yi/ /gang zhig pas na 'das
85a4(bstod tshogs): par 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar bltos/ /rang las dngos po skye ba med/ /gzhan dang gnyis ka las ma yin/ /yod min med min yod med min/ /de tshe gang las gzhan zhig 'byung/ /ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med/ /de phyir gang las
85a5(bstod tshogs): kun tu 'byung/ /rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas/ /gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med/ /rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur/ /gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod/ /de dag bltos pa can du grub/ /pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs/ /
85a6(bstod tshogs): gang tshe ci la'ang mi bltos pa/ /de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung/ /gang tshe ring la mi bltos pa/ /de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis/ /ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa/ /'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa/ /nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin
85a7(bstod tshogs): te/ /yang dag log pa 'ang rang las ci/ /dngos gang rang las ma mchis na/ /de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis/ /gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te/ /rang gi rang bzhin med na min/ /gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa/ /de tshe dngos rnams
85b1(bstod tshogs): rang bzhin med/ /de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa/ /don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis/ /gdod ma nyid nas mnyam gyur pa/ /rang bzhin gyis kyang mya ngan 'das/ /yang dag par ni ma skyes lags/ /de slad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs/ /blo ldan
85b2(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis gzugs la sogs/ /ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa/ /dbu ba chu bur sgyu la sogs/ /smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags/ /dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs de/ /gal te yang dag mchis gyur na/ /byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur/ /
85b3(bstod tshogs): gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci/ /dbang po rnams ni bems po dang/ /tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang/ /lung ma bstan pa nyid dang ni/ /log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs/ /gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa/ /yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud nas//
85b4(bstod tshogs): des na 'jig rten mi shes pas/ /bsgribs pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs/ /yod ces pa ni rtag par lta/ /med ces pa ni chad par lta/ /des na mdza' gnyis bral ba yi/ /chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang/ /
85b5(bstod tshogs): bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags/ /rnam shes bya ba 'am ma lags la/ /rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang/ /zla ba gnyis la sogs mthong bzhin/ /'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos su/ /ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /ji ltar rgyu las rmi
85b6(bstod tshogs): lam na/ /'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du/ /dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin/ /'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags/ /de bzhin cha sogs sdug bsngal dang/ /'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs/ /tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang//
85b7(bstod tshogs): rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs/ /de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang/ /'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang/ /de bzhin bcings grol ye shes la/ /gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags/ /gang las skyes pa yod ma lags/ /de la mya ngan 'das gang
86a1(bstod tshogs): yod/ /sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na/ /don du bzod nas zhi nga nyid/ /skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa/ /sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed/ /de bzhin thams cad skyes pa 'am/ /yang dag par ni ma skyes lags/ /'jig rten mgon
86a2(bstod tshogs): po dpag med kyis/ /sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa/ /so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang/ /de dag gis kyang gang ma bkrol/ /thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams/ /rang las ma skyes de yi phyir/ /gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes/
86a3(bstod tshogs): de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs/ /ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas/ /dngos po stong pa de bzhin du/ /byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan/ /khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po/ /byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis/ /byas pa can du 'gyur ba lags/
86a4(bstod tshogs): yang na de yi bya ba byed/ /byed pa por ni thal bar 'gyur/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes/ /khyod kyis gsung ni bstod de gsungs/ /brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa/ /brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis/ /de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni/ /
86a5(bstod tshogs): rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs/ /gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i/ /rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa/ /la lar ma 'das pa yang lags/ /shes pa med cing shes bya 'ang med/ /med min yod min gang
86a6(bstod tshogs): lags dang/ /gang yang gcig min du ma'ang min/ /gnyis ka ma yin gcig kyang med/ /bzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang/ /bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang/ /gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang/ /chad pa med cing rtag med pa/ /de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba
86a7(bstod tshogs): lags/ /yi ge ye shes spyod yul min/ /de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung/ /de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags/ /dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs/ /de ni de nyid don dang ni/ /de bzhin nyid dang rdzas su bzhed/ /de
86b1(bstod tshogs): ni yang dag mi bslu ba/ /de rdzogs pas ni sangs rgyas brjod/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang/ /des na don du tha mi dad/ /bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang/ /des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags/ /dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min/ /de med par yang
86b2(bstod tshogs): dngos po med/ /de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos/ /stong pa lags par khyod kyis bstan/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags/ /gzhan gyis dbang las kun rdzob ste/ /gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs/ /dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin/ /ngo bo nyid dang rang
86b3(bstod tshogs): bzhin dang/ /yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags/ /brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags/ /btags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa/ /sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /byas pa chad nas med ces pa/ /chad
86b4(bstod tshogs): pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs/ /yang dag shes pas chad pa med/ /rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad/ /'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags/ /de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed/ /ji ltar ri dags skom chu ni/ /chad med rtag pa yod ma yin/ /de bzhin
86b5(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba thams cad kyang/ /chad med rtag pa med par gsungs/ /gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba/ /de la chang sogs 'jigs pa 'byung/ /de la 'jig rten mdza' yod dang/ /mdza' med par yang 'gyur ba lags/ /shes pa yod pas shes bya
86b6(bstod tshogs): bzhin/ /shes bya yod pas de shes bzhin/ /gang tshe gnyis ka ma skyes par/ /rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod/ /de ltar sgyu ma la sogs dpe/ /sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan nas/ /lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i/ /dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa
86b7(bstod tshogs): lags/ /ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa/ /de ni yang dag dam pa lags/ /dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyi/ /gso ba de ni bla na med/ /des na chos kyi mchod sbyin pa/ /mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du/ /'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg
87a1(bstod tshogs): mdzad/ /dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid cing/ /mu stegs ri dags 'jigs bgyid pa/ /bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra/ /rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs/ /stong pa nyid dang ches zab pa'i/ /chos kyi rnga chen brdung ba lags/ /
87a2(bstod tshogs): ngo bo nyid med dgra bo che'i/ /chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi/ /chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags/ /chos rnams kyi ni ngo bo nyid/ /nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan/ /gang yang skye dang 'gag la sogs/ /sems
87a3(bstod tshogs): can srog la sogs bstan pa/ /de ni bkri don kun rdzob tu/ /mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi/ /pha rol gang gis rang phyin te/ /bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyug /mgon khyod yon tan pha rol phyin/ /
87a4(bstod tshogs): de ltar dpe med bas mi khyab/ /'gro ba'i mgon po bstod pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des/ /'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog /bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
87a5(bstod tshogs): */ (/bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ ru tasti sta ba/ bod skad du/ /bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla med lam las gshegs pa yi/ /de
87a6(bstod tshogs): bzhin gshegs pa bstod 'das kyang/ /gus shing spro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bdag gis bstod 'das bstod par bgyi/ /bdag dang gzhan dang gnyis ka las/ /rnam par dben pa'i dngos gzigs kyang/ /khyod kyi thugs rje sems can las
87a7(bstod tshogs): ma log pa ni ngo mtshar lags/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes shing/ /tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul gyi/ /chos rnams khyod kyis gang bstan pa/ /de ni khyod kyi ngo mtshar lags/ /phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/ /khyod kyis bsgrags
87b1(bstod tshogs): par mdzad lags kyang/ /de dag yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ /slad kyis kyang ni bzlog par mdzad/ /gang zhig rkyen las de ma mchis/ /dngos rnams rkyen las ji ltar skye/ /de skad mkhas pa khyod gsungs pas/ /spros pa rnams ni bcang ba lags/ /gang dag tshogs
87b2(bstod tshogs): las rab grub na/ /tshogs pa rgyu las 'byung mthong ba/ /de dag mdza' gnyis brten par ni/ /khyod kyis shin tu gzigs pa lags/ /dngos po rkyen la brten grub par/ /khyod ni shin tu bzhed pa lags/ /de ltar byas pa'i skyon lags par/ /'di ltar
87b3(bstod tshogs): ston pa khyod kyis gzigs/ /gang nas kyang ni mchi ma lags/ /gang du yang ni mchis ma lags/ /dngos po thams cad gzugs brnyan dang/ /mtshungs par khyod ni bzhed pa lags/ /lta ba thams cad spang ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod kyis stong pa
87b4(bstod tshogs): gsungs/ /de yang yongs su btags pa ste/ /dngos su mgon po khyod mi bzhed/ /stong dang mi stong bzhed ma lags/ /gnyis kar khyod dgyes ma lags te/ /de la brtsod pa ma mchis par/ /khyod kyi gsung chen spyod pa lags/ /gzhan min dngos
87b5(bstod tshogs): po yod min zhing/ /gzhan min gnyis min zhes kyang gsungs/ /gcig dang gzhan nyid spangs pas na/ /ji lta bur yang dngos ma mchis/ /gal te skye sogs gsum mchis na/ /'dus byas mtshan nyid mchis par 'gyur/ /de dag gi yang skye la
87b6(bstod tshogs): sogs/ /gsum pa tha dad 'gyur ba lags/ /skye sogs gsum po so so ni/ /'dus byas las la nus ma lags/ /gcig la gcig tu 'dus pa rnams/ /phrad par yang ni mchis ma lags/ /de ltar mtshan gzhi mtshan ma mchis/ /de
87b7(bstod tshogs): ltar grub pa ma lags pas/ /'dus byas grub pa ma lags na/ /'dus ma byas lta ga la grub/ /smra ba'i seng ges de skad du/ /khyod nyid gsungs na seng ge yis/ /'bigs byed glang chen smra rnams kyi/ /rgyags pa bsal bar gyur pa bzhin/
88a1(bstod tshogs): lan zhugs gnod pa sna tshogs dang/ /lta ba'i lam ngan mi bsten ltar/ /khyod la brten nas yod pa dang/ /med pa nyid la'ang brten ma lags/ /khyod kyis dgongs nas gsungs pa dang/ /gang dag gis ni de ltar
