88a2(bstod tshogs): rtogs/ /de dag khyod kyis dgongs gsungs pa/ /phyir zhing rtogs par bgyi mi 'tshal/ /dngos kun mya ngan 'das mtshungs par/ /de ltar gang gis rnam shes pa/ /de tshe de la ji ltar bur/ /ngar 'dzin kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar
88a3(bstod tshogs): yang dag rig pa'i mchog /de nyid rig pa khyod bstod pa'i/ /bdag gi bsod nams gang yin des/ /'jig rten yang dag rig mchog shog /bstod pa las 'das par bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs
88a4(bstod tshogs): so// // */ (/bla na med pa'i bstod pa//) //rgya gar skad du/ ni rut+ta sta pa/ bod skad du/ bla na med pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi tshu rol pha
88a5(bstod tshogs): rol spangs/ /shes bya'i rang gi ngo bo mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis gsal/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gang la mkhyen dang mi mkhyen med/ /rnal 'byor ba dang tha mal dang/ /gang la bsgom dang mi bsgom med/ /bla med de
88a6(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gcig pu ye shes gsal/ /ma lus shes bya yongs su gcod/ /de ltar mnyam zhing gzhal med pa/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig rags dang phra ba dang/ /lci ba dang ni yang ba'i rdul/ /sbrul gyi rkang pa'i
88a7(bstod tshogs): rang bzhin med/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis srin bu'i stobs kyis ni/ /gang zhig thang la 'chi ba ltar/ /gang gi snang bas mun bsal ba/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sprul ldan rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gar mkhan rkang pa bskyod pa la/ /
88b1(bstod tshogs): gang zhig ma gzigs lam mkhyen pa/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig gis ni cha shas dang/ /don stong min te gnyis ka spangs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug gtso/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu nyes pa rnam spangs shing/ /dri ma'i
88b2(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid las ring ba/ /dngos dang dngos po med spangs pa/ /bla med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla na med pa'i bstod pa slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/)
88b3(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ Arya b+haTTA ra ka many+dzu sh+rI pa ramArtha stu ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byon pa ma lags bzhud mi mda'/ /bzhengs pa
88b4(bstod tshogs): ma lags bzhugs mi mda'/ /'jig rten pa las shin tu 'das/ /tshig las 'das pa'i spyod yul lags/ /mgon po khyod la ji ltar bstod/ /'on kyang 'jig rten btags brten gyis/ /khyod ni ci 'dra de bzhin du/ /bdag gis gus pas
88b5(bstod tshogs): bla ma bstod/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes te/ /khyod la skye ba yong mi mnga' / /mgon po gshegs dang byon mi mnga' / /dngos med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod la dngos dang dngos med min/ /chad pa ma lags ther zug min/ /khyod rtag ma lags mi rtag min/
88b6(bstod tshogs): gnyis med khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dmar dang ljang dang le brgan dang/ /ser dang dkar dang gnag ma lags/ /khyod la kha dog yong mi mnga' / /mdog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni che dang chung ba dang/ /sbom dang phra ba khyod min te/ /
88b7(bstod tshogs): ring dang thung ba'i khams ma lags/ /tshang med khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /shes pas srid la mi gnas shing/ /snying rjes zhi la mi gnas te/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor mi gnas/ /mi gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /chos rnams kun la mi
89a1(bstod tshogs): gnas shing/ /chos kun rtogs par thugs su chud/ /mchog tu zab pa nyid bsten pa/ /zab pa khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /de ltar bstod na bstod pa glang gi /gzhan du khyod la ji ltar bstod/ /chos rnams thams cad stong ba la/ /su la
89a2(bstod tshogs): bstod cing su yis bstod/ /mdza' ma mchis shing dbus ma mchis/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa'i/ /rtog bral khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla ma mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /don dam yang dag mtshan brjod pa'i/ /bsod nams 'di yis 'jig
89a3(bstod tshogs): rten 'di/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'dra bar shog /'phags pa rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi don dam par bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //('phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa bzhugs//)
89a4(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI b+haTwA ra ka kA ru Na sto tra/ bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal
89a5(bstod tshogs): zhing/ /thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab/ /dpal ldan rab tu bstan pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /bos shing pos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad/ /bdag
89a6(bstod tshogs): ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces/ /ci yi phyir na nges par sel mi mdzad/ /bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la/ /rnam pa kun tu thams cad gsol grag na/ /bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas so/ /de phyir bdag ni
89a7(bstod tshogs): shin tu skal dman lags/ /yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa/ /blo bzang 'gro kun skyob par brtson gyur na/ /bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang/ /phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni//
89b1(bstod tshogs): ? lta bu rig pa'i spyan gnyis kyis/ /'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par/ /mi gzigs pa ni kye ma sdug bsngal lo/ /khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi/ /phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag tu skyong/ /skal nyes pa yi tshabs de yang ni/ /thag ring du
89b2(bstod tshogs): ni ma? nyid du 'gyur/ /khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag /gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis/ /gzir te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod gyur kyang/ /bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur/ /rnam pa kun tu thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis/ /dmyal
89b3(bstod tshogs): bar cing pa'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na/ /sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni/ /thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' 'gyur/ /'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi/ /khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na/ /gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal
89b4(bstod tshogs): gyis gzir kyang/ /skyab par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes/ /'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes/ /glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces/ /de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang/ /bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che/ /gang
89b5(bstod tshogs): zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la/ /'phal du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes/ /de ltar brtson pa khyad kyi mkhyen rab kyis/ /ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad/ /khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde/ /khyed dang bsod nams dman pa zhig ma mchis/ /
89b6(bstod tshogs): bdag ni khyed la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar/ /ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs/ /sdug bsngal gcod mdzad sman pa chen po ni/ /gang tshe khyed kyang bdag la spong mdzad na/ /bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan su la/ /skyabs su mchi bar
89b7(bstod tshogs): bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs/ /'gro la rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi/ /brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol spyod pa/ /khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na/ /ngo tsha bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags/ /bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam gyis ni/
90a1(bstod tshogs): 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na/ /bdag ni bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs/ /rnam pa kun tu phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad/ /de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yon tan/ /cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge bsags
90a2(bstod tshogs): pa/ /gang yin des ni 'gro la bsod nams dag /rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs sku yi/ /zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi/ /khyod kyi gzhon nu'i lus su bdag gyur cing/ /skye ba kun tu
90a3(bstod tshogs): bdag po nyid gyur cig /rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta mahA s+tha na tsai ta sto tra/ bod skad du/ gnas chen po
90a4(bstod tshogs): brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i bla ma gcig pu lum pir bltams/ /ser skya'i grong khyer gzhi ru gnas par mdzad/ /yon tan rin chen bye bas brgyan pa yi/ /bde gshegs
90a5(bstod tshogs): mchod rten rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du/ /chu bo nai rany+dzan zhes bya ba'i/ /'gram bzhugs mchod rten yon tan rgya che ba/ /byang chub rten du gyur la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ka shi ka yi ba ra NA se ru/ /chos
90a6(bstod tshogs): kyi 'khor lo rnam grol rmad byung na/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa rnam par gcod mdzad pa/ /ye shes mchod rten bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyan du yod par gzhan stobs tshar bcad nas/ /dze ta'i tshal du chu 'phrul chen po bstan/ /sa
90a7(bstod tshogs): gsum dgongs pa mchog tu bsgrub mdzad pa/ /mu stegs pa ma mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /grong khyer dam pa mchog ni gsal ldan du/ /lha rnams gnas gshegs bla na med par babs/ /zhabs la tshangs dbang cod pan gyis mchod
90b1(bstod tshogs): pa/ /sum cu'i lhas mchod mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun dbyen du sngar gyur las/ /ston pa'i nyan thos rab mthun pa/ /rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal/ /byams ngos mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku tshe 'du byed btang ba las/ /slar
90b2(bstod tshogs): yang sku tshe byin brlabs pa/ /rnam grol yangs pa can gyi ni/ /byin brlabs mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /ku sha'i grong du 'gro ba rnams/ /dge ba la ni sbyor mdzad cing/ /'gran med gyad gnas zung gi tshal/ /mchod rten mya ngan 'das phyag 'tshal
90b3(bstod tshogs): shAka thub mchod rten brgyad po dang/ /phyogs bcu gzhan dang gzhan rnams na/ /bzhugs pa'i chos sku kun la 'dud/ /zhi la rtag tu spyis phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ltar spros pha kun bral dpe med dag cing dag par ngo bo nyid/ /sangs rgyas chos sku
90b4(bstod tshogs): mkhas ltar 'gro ba la khyab yang dag phyag 'tshal bas/ /bsod nams gangs ri'i kha dog ltar dkar bdag gi rgyud la gang bsags pa/ /des na sems can ma lus rigs 'dzin pa de rtogs byang chub thob par shog /gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/
90b5(bstod tshogs): slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta mahA s+tha na tsai ta sto tra/ bod skad du/ gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
90b6(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyed nas/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum du tshogs bsags te/ /byang chub snying por sangs rgyas bdud ni btul/ /byang chub chen po'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi gzhir gyur ser skya'i grong
90b7(bstod tshogs): khyer du/ /sgyu ma'i yum las zas gtsang shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs/ /sku bzhengs sta zur g.yas pa tshangs pas bzhes/ /bkra shis 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /wa ra NA si la sogs bsod snyoms gshegs/ /gzugs can snying
91a1(bstod tshogs): po'i glang chen smyon pa rnams/ /phyag gi ser mo'i stobs kyis btul nas kyang/ /grong khyer 'dul mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /ne sil dag tu bsnyel so mdzad pa'i tshe/ /ha lu many+dzus sbrang rtsi phul nas kyang/ /khron par dus
91a2(bstod tshogs): byang sum cu rtsa gsum skyes/ /thugs rje 'byung ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pas 'khor lo phul nas 'khor lo bskor/ /mu stegs ston pa drug ni stobs kyis btul/ /sprul pa'i grangs kyis lha mi tshim mdzad pa'i/ /cho 'phrul
91a3(bstod tshogs): bstan pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' bo la sogs klu yi tshogs rnams kyis/ /bsnyen bkur phul zhing bu mos 'o ma drangs/ /dkar dang 'jig rten ma lus tshar gcod pa/ /nyer zhi rgyal ba'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
91a4(bstod tshogs): sems dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ /nyan thos dgra bcom tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/ /sdom dang tshul khrims la ni rab bkod pa'i/ /rnam par dag pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can mi rtag 'dul ba'i dgongs pa dang/ /
91a5(bstod tshogs): lha las babs nas mdzad pa kun gyi mthar/ /tsun das gsol btab zla gsum nas mthar phyin/ /mya ngan 'das mdzad mchod rten phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas
91a6(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba/) rgya gar skad du/ dwId sha kA ra nA ma na yA sto traM/ bod skad du/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas shAkya
91a7(bstod tshogs): thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis dang por byang chub thugs bskyed nas/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs mdzad cing/ /dus 'dir mdzad pa rgya chen 'gro ba yi/ /mgon gyur khyod la bdag gis bstod par bgyi/ /lha
91b1(bstod tshogs): rnams 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i dus mkhyen nas/ /lha las babs nas glang chen ltar gshegs te/ /rigs la gzigs nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi/ /lhums su zhugs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba bcu rdzogs shAkya'i sras po ni/ /bkra shis lum
91b2(bstod tshogs): bi'i tshal du bltams pa'i tshe/ /tshangs dang brgya byin gyis btud mtshan mchog ni/ /byang chub rigs su nges mdzad phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu stobs ldan mi yis seng ge des/ /ad+ga ma ga d+ha ni sgyu rtsal bstan/ /skye bo dregs pa can rnams tshar bcad nas
91b3(bstod tshogs): 'gran zla med par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten chos dang mthun par bya ba dang/ /ngan mtho spang phyir btsun mo yi/ /'khor dang ldan mdzad thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /rgyal srid skyong bar mdzad la
91b4(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor pa'i bya ba snying po med gzigs nas/ /khyim nas byung ste mkha' la gshegs nas kyang/ /mchod rten rnam dag drung du nyid la nyid/ /rab tu byung bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtson pas byang chub 'grub par dgongs nas ni//
91b5(bstod tshogs): ne rany+dza na'i 'gram du lo drug tu/ /dka' ba sbyad mdzad brtson 'grus mthar phyin nas/ /bsam gtan mchog brnyes mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma med nas 'bad pa don yod phyir/ /ma ga d+ha yi byang chub shing drung du/ /skyil krung mi
91b6(bstod tshogs): g.yo mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ /byang chub rdzogs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes 'gro la myur du gzigs nas ni/ /ba ra NA se la sogs gnas mchog tu/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas gdul bya rnams/ /theg pa gsum
91b7(bstod tshogs): la 'god mdzad phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyi rgol ba ngan pa tshar bcad nas/ /mu stegs ston pa drug dang lhas byin sogs/ /khor mo 'jig gi yul du bdud rnams btul/ /thub pa g.yul las rgyal mdzad phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum
92a1(bstod tshogs): na dpe med yon tan gyis/ /mnyan du yod par cho 'phrul chen po bstan/ /lha mi 'gro ba kun gyi rang mchod pa/ /bstan pa rgyas par mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /le lo can rnams myur du bskul bya'i phyir/ /rtswa mchog grong gi sa gzhi gtsang ma ru/ /'chi
92a2(bstod tshogs): med rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig nas/ /mya ngan 'da' bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag nyid du 'jig pa med phyir dang/ /ma 'ongs sems can bsod nams thob bya'i phyir/ /de nyid du ni ring bsrel mang sbrul nas/ /cha brgyad sku gdung mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar
92a3(bstod tshogs): bstan pa'i bdag po bcom ldan gyi/ /mdzad pa'i tshul la mdo tsam bstod pa yi/ /dge bas 'gro ba kun gyi spyod pa yang/ /bde gshegs nyid kyi spyod dang mtshungs par shog /mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul la bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub gyis mdzad pa
92a4(bstod tshogs): rdzogs so// // */ (/phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ banda na sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ /phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod byed 'dod
92a5(bstod tshogs): chags zhe sdang dang/ /srid 'khor rmongs byed 'dra ba spangs/ /mchog sbyin mdzad pa rgyal ba mchog /mchog byung sangs rgyas bdag phyag 'tshal/ /yang dag thugs chud rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /lha dang lha min mchod byas pa/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bla
92a6(bstod tshogs): ma la/ /mi pham mnyam pa med gyur cing/ /bdud stobs pham mdzad bdag phyag 'tshal/ shAkya'i rgyal po'i sras su 'khrungs/ /gdung ni nyi ma'i rigs su grags/ /dpa' bo rmad byung sangs rgyas ni/ /yon tan tshogs ni bsdus pa la/ /lha mi rlung
92a7(bstod tshogs): lhas mchod phyag 'tshal/ /gser gyi ri bo'i rtse 'dra'i sku/ /pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i spyan mnga' ba/ /gser gyi mdog dang ldan gyur cing/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /shis ldan mtshan bzang phyag 'tshal lo/ /me dang glog dang me stag dang/
92b1(bstod tshogs): nye zhing stong ldan dkyil 'khor can/ /gang gis stobs ni brgyan gyur pa/ /mnyam med stobs ldan phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mchog ni 'bar ba ri/ /bsod dang dul bar yang dag ldan/ /thub pa'i dbang po mchog gyur pa/ /yang dag byang chub brnyes pa la/ /ches
92b2(bstod tshogs): dregs phyag byas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sems can phan mdzad cing/ /bde ba'i don phyir snying rjes 'jug yang dag don la zhugs gyur pas/ /mya ngan 'das grongs gshegs phyag 'tshal/ /'dis ni lto 'phye mi 'am ci/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa
92b3(bstod tshogs): bdag gis rgyal ba bstod pa las/ /bsod nams bdag gis gang bsags pa/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyang/ /byang chub khong du chud par shog /phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
92b4(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ na ra god+d+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/ /dbul ba'i 'dam du bying ba la/ yongs su mkhyen pa bskyed nas ni/ /de
92b5(bstod tshogs): bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /bdag ni rab rib khang par zhugs/ /mgon med sdug bsngal nyams su myong/ /bdag ni gnyen gyi tshogs kyis spangs/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /pha dang ma dang srid mo dang/ /bu dang chung ma
92b6(bstod tshogs): mdza' bshes mo/ /mig 'phrul lta bur bdag gis 'khums/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /bdag 'dir 'khor 'dab rnams kyi phyir/ /las gang legs dang nyes byas pa/ /de yis bdag ni gcig pur gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs
92b7(bstod tshogs): kyi bdag la skyobs/ /'khon rnying mi bzad chen po dang/ /gting med rgya mtsho dag rnams su/ /mgon po bdag cag long gyur na/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /rgya mtsho chen po rgal ba yi/ /gru ni gog bor zhugs pa ltar/ /bdag gis 
93a1(bstod tshogs): kyang ni rgal dkar 'khums/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /chos dang chos min ma 'tshal shing/ /bgrod dka' bgrod min mi rigs pas/ /'di ni sems med shing dang 'dra/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs
93a2(bstod tshogs): pa bsad pa dang ma bsad pa/ /kho bos mtshams med lnga bgyis pa/ /mi bzad rab rib mun par 'khums/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /bdag gis mchod rten 'jig par bgyis/ /dge 'dun dkor ni rnam par blangs/ /bdag gis
93a3(bstod tshogs): sems can 'tshe bar bgyis/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /'jig rten 'di na bde ba mchis/ /'jig rten pha rol 'tshal ma gyur/ /las kyi srad bus dkris pas na/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /de yi gzhon pa 'di
93a4(bstod tshogs): 'dra bas/ /mkha' la ka shi'i me tog ni/ /rlung gis btab nas 'phyan ba bzhin/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /'brog dgon dang ni tshor ma yi/ /ljon shing mang po brten med pa/ /de na bdag gi lam ma mthong/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi
93a5(bstod tshogs): bdag la skyobs/ /nyes pa med par phyugs rnams dang/ /ri dags mang po mangs bsad pas/ /de tshe bdag ni rgyal por rlom/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi bdag la skyobs/ /sems can dmyal bar 'tshang ba na/ /skyob pa 'ga' yang yong ma mchis/ /
93a6(bstod tshogs): gang la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /bdag la skyab par su zhig 'gyur/ /sman pa rnams kyi sman pa'i rgyal/ /nad rnams thams cad gso mdzad pa/ /khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba/ /skyob byed 'jig rten mgon po la/ /dmyal ba nas 'don pa zhes
93a7(bstod tshogs): bya ba slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'o// //'dis kyang 'gro ba du ma la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig/ //dpal ra sa ra mo che'i gtsug lag khang du grong khyer dpe med kyi paN+Di
93b1(bstod tshogs): ta til ka dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po shAkya'i dge slong pa tsha ba nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ (bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa sngags 'os bsngags bstod zhes bya ba dri za sde dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs//) //
93b2(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ bar Na ra ha ba ra Ne b+ha ga ba to/ /bud d+ha sto tra ya shAkya sta ba nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /dkon mchog gsum la
93b3(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhing dang zhing min ma 'tshal te/ /sgra tsam gyi ni rjes 'brangs nas/ /bdag gis nongs te sngon chad ni/ /bsngags min bsngags pa brjod pa gang/ /dag gi 'dam gyis gos pa de/ /thub pa bsod nams 'bab kyi stegs/ /
93b4(bstod tshogs): bzhud pa khyod la brten bcas nas/ /rab tu bkru ba 'di brtsam mo/ /'di ni bdag gis mchog tshogs la/ /gti mug ldongs pas nongs bgyis gang// /sdig pa de yi nongs pa dag /sel bar bgyid pa'i bsad byed lags/ /bdag ni mya ngan 'das
93b5(bstod tshogs): bar du/ /khyod kyi gsung dang khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan brjod pa gang lags pa'i/ /tshig lam gnyis las nyams ma gyur/ /gtam 'di tsam zhig snying por bas/ /de las gzhan don ma mchis pas/ /smran 'di nyid smra bar shog /yang na bdag ni mi
93b6(bstod tshogs): smrar shog /khyod kyi chos ni kho na dang/ /khyod mnyam khyod ni nyid la mnga' / /de slad chos gzhan thams cad ni/ /khyod las khyad du khor ma lags/ /gang te sangs rgyas chos rnams ni/ /bsam pa bgyis na thams cad kyi/ /phul du phyin gyur dngos
93b7(bstod tshogs): po gzhan/ /mi gtsang nyid dang 'dra bar gyur/ /khyod 'dra 'ga' yang ma mchis na/ /lhag pa lta zhig smos ci 'tshal/ /khyod pas khyad par cung zad kyis/ /dman pa tsam yang dga' ma mchis/ /'dren pa khyod la gang zhig gis/ /dper brjod
94a1(bstod tshogs): dpe ni ma mchis pas/ /dpe yi glags ni spangs pa po/ /dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos ni gzhal yas phyir/ /de las gzhan pa'i gang zag ni/ /rnam grol 'dra ba thob rnams kyang/ /khyod dang khyad par
94a2(bstod tshogs): shin tu che/ /sted pa tsam du 'dra slad du/ /su zhig khyad par ma 'tshal nas/ /ba spu'i bu ga stong pa ni/ /chung du nam mkha' dag dang sgrun/ /grangs med pa la su zhig bgrang/ /tshad med pa la su zhig 'jal/ /khyod kyi yon tan grangs dang ni/ /mthu la
94a3(bstod tshogs): dpogs pa ma mchis so/ /ji ltar dpag bsam shing gi tshol/ /'byam klas nang du 'khyams pa ltar/ /bdag ni khyod la legs spyod kyis/ /ngoms ma 'tshal te mdza' mi rtogs/ /yon tan rnams kyi yon tan mtsho/ /khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs
94a4(bstod tshogs): chos rnams/ /gal te bstan du mchis gyur na/ /nam mkhar yang ni shong mi 'gyur/ /khyod kyi mngon sum bsnyen bkur ba/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi sde dpon po/ /nyan thos kun gyi tog gyur pa/ /zab mo rjes su sgrogs pa la/ /kun mkhyen nyid phyir
94a5(bstod tshogs): bcom ldan gyis/ /rmas na ma mtshal zhes gsol pas/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi zab mo nyid/ /bsam 'tshal bar bshad pa lags/ /gal te gtso bo de dag kyang/ /khyod la nus pa rdugs lags na/ /bdag 'dra srid pa mi gtsang ba'i/ /
94a6(bstod tshogs): srin bus bsam skabs ga la mchis/ /sA la'i shing chen khyod nyid kyi/ /yon tan yal ga thugs brtse bas/ /btud pa rnams la skye bo 'di/ /cung zad 'ju ba tsam du bas/ /char sprin tshogs ni chen po yis/ /char gyi rgyun rnams
94a7(bstod tshogs): phab pa las/ /so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ /khungs rtas 'tshal na'ang ci zhig 'tshal/ /ma dros pa yi mtsho las ni/ /chu bo chen po bzhi 'bab kyang/ /de zad bgyid par mi nus na/ /gzhan dga' bab pas smos ci 'tshal/ /rin
94b1(bstod tshogs): chen 'byung khungs rnams kyis ni/ /'jig rten rgyas bgyis bas ma 'tshal/ /mgon khyod yon tan brjod pa'ang/ /bdag ni de 'dra kho nar sems/ /bsgribs nas khyod kyi bstan nyid las/ /yon tan me tog rnams btus te/ /rang gi me tog dag gis ni//
94b2(bstod tshogs): shing bzhin khyod la me tog gsol/ /rang gi dbyig gis 'byung khungs bzhin/ /rang gi tshon rtsis ri lta bur/ /rang gi dri yis tsandan bzhin/ /rang gi chu yis mtsho lta bur/ /rang las byung ba'i gser nyid kyis/ /gser 'byung ba yi rin chen bzhin/ /khyod
94b3(bstod tshogs): bstan nyid las btus pa yi/ /yon tan rnams kyis khyod mchod do/ /nam mkha' i dkyil nas zla 'od thams cad du/ /phros pa ril gyi 'bab 'gyur ma yin la/ /zla 'od sa steng bab pas kha phye na/ /me tog ku mu da tshal mi rgyas min/ /de bzhin yon tan
94b4(bstod tshogs): dpag med chu ldan pa/ /rgyal ba'i bsngags pa rgya mtsho mdza' med la/ /de yi phyogs gcig brjod pas dad ldan pa'i/ /skye bo 'ang 'dod pa'i 'bras bur mi ldan min/ /sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod tshig 'bras bu yod/ /skye ba'i zong brin bder
94b5(bstod tshogs): 'gyur gegs med lam/ /tshangs pa'i theg 'gyur dad sogs yon tan gyi/ /rtsa ba'i ser rme de la sogs pa yod/ /dbang po rab tu dad par gzhol gyur cing/ /sangs rgyas bstod pa'i gzhung la brtson pa rnams/ /skad cig re rer chos rgyun
94b6(bstod tshogs): 'byung ba gang/ /kun mkhyen min pas cung zad gzung mi nus/ /mthu bdog mi rtag par yang zhugs gyur la/ /dal 'byor 'di yang shin tu dka' ba las/ /gang dag las 'di la ni mi brtson pa/ /de las bslus par gyur pa gzhan ci yod/
94b7(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las bstod par mi nus par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// //bcom ldan khyod ni zhal bzhugs tshe/ /bdag ni dad dbang gzhol gyur pa/
95a1(bstod tshogs): gang slad thugs rjes brlan pa yi/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi thugs rje de nyid ni/ /yid la mchis pa mngon bgyis nas/ /phyag bgyir 'os pa khyod la bdag /mngon sum bzhin du phyag 'tshal lo/ /
95a2(bstod tshogs): kun mkhyen ma lags gang gis kyang/ /kun mkhyen khyod ko ji ltar rtogs/ /bdag nyid tshe rgyas bdag nyid kyis/ /mkhyen pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lags 'di 'dra'o zhes bgyir khyod/ /bdag 'dra ba'i yul ma lags/ /gang lags gang
95a3(bstod tshogs): 'dra 'ang mi sngo ste/ /khyod 'dra ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po khyod ni nyid dang 'dra/ /rgyal rnams ci 'dra khyod dang 'dra/ /gang 'dra gzhan 'ga' ang ma mchis pa/ /de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar khyod ni nyid kyis mkhyen/ /ji ltar khyod ni khyod
95a4(bstod tshogs): 'dras mkhyen/ /ji ltar khyod gzhan ma 'tshal ba/ /de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid kyis/ /thugs rje stobs bcu la sogs kyi/ /yon tan rnams kyis bsgrags mdzad pa/ /de 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /deng
95a5(bstod tshogs): nas bzung nas khyod kyi ni/ /yon tan 'byung gnas snying po dag /de nyid las ni mngos btus nas/ /ci nus khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mchod 'os khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /rigs pa khyod la
95a6(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /khyod la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen te/ /rin chen chos kyi rang bzhin lags/ /dge 'dun rin chen 'byung gnas te/ /rin chen gsum tshogs khyod la 'dud/ /mchod 'os khyod ni
95a7(bstod tshogs): rin chen te/ /thugs kyi dgongs pa'ang rin chen lags/ /dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas te/ /kun nas rin chen khyod la 'dud/ /rin chen kun gyi mchog gyur pas/ /rin chen thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /rin chen kun gyi 'byung
95b1(bstod tshogs): gnas pa/ /yang dag rin chen khyod la 'dud/ /phyag 'tshal rin chen thugs khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal rin chen chos khyod la/ /phyag 'tshal thams cad rin chen la/ /srid med bsgom pa goms mdzad pas/ /thub pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /phyag
95b2(bstod tshogs): bgyis 'os pa'i dgra bcom pa/ /khyod la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gal bar bgyis par gang lags pa/ /yang dag mdza' la gnas pa po/ /dge sbyong gi ni mthar phyin pa/ /bla med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa thams cad phun tshogs
95b3(bstod tshogs): pas/ /mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gnon cing/ /dus rnams kun tu dga' mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma khyod la 'dud/ /kha dog bzang la dri zhim zhing/ /blta na sdug la mi ring ba/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dkar/ /kha bye khyod la phyag
95b4(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /bde ba'i nying khu rab sbyangs pa/ /bzhed dgur reg pa brnyes pa po/ /skyid par bskrun pa'i dge sbyong ni/ /rab gzhon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'o brgyal 'bras bu mchis gyur pas/ /mthar phyin mdza' dag brnyes nas ni/ /dam pa
95b5(bstod tshogs): gsung bar dam bcas pa'i/ /dge sprod khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs spyod brten cing rig byed dang/ /rig byed kun gyi yan lag mkhyen/ /rig dang zhabs kyis bsangs pa yi/ /tshangs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa'i chos
95b6(bstod tshogs): ni mi 'phrogs shing/ /'phags pa'i 'phrin las phul du byung/ /'jig rten slob dpon bya ba mdzad/ /'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dag/ yang dag glangs pas gtsang mar mdzad/ /sdig pa thams cad
95b7(bstod tshogs): bkrus gyur pa/ /khrus mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnga' bdag mchog ni brnyes gyur cing/ /sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /seng ge'i nga ro sgrogs mdzad pa/ /seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs pa brjod pa'i
96a1(bstod tshogs): rjen shul che/ /dam chos spo la brten pa mdzad/ /chos gzhan thams cad 'jig pa po/ /glang chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid shin tu dka' ba'i lam/ /khyod min gzhan gyis mi bzod pa/ /gsal mdzad gshegs
96a2(bstod tshogs): pa 'jig rten gyi/ /lam gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /des la shin tu dul gyur bzod/ /shugs dang mdog bzang stobs dang ldan/ /yan lag rdzogs pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /cang mkhyen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs dang 'bab stegs spyod yul
96a3(bstod tshogs): mkhyen/ /brtan la gya gyur bzhud mi mnga' / /khyu mchog gnas ni brnyes pa yi/ /khyu mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gdul ba'i thabs ni mdza' dag la/ /mkhas shing le lo mi mnga' ba/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur/ /mchog rab khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang slad khyod bstan
96a4(bstod tshogs): ma mchis na/ /skal ba can yang don ma mchis/ /de slad kun gyi tshangs spyod du/ /gyur pa khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan phun sum ldan pa kun/ /yang dag shin tu yongs rdzogs pas/ /dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa kun/ /rgyun bcad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
96a5(bstod tshogs): nyid kyi don ni yongs rdzogs shing/ /gzhan gyi don la mngon brtson pa/ /dam chos bdud rtsi stsol ba po/ /tshim par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud/ /'jigs pa du mas 'jigs gyur pa/ /pha rol min pa'i mu spangs nas/ /chu bo chen po legs brgal zhing/ /pha
96a6(bstod tshogs): rol gshegs pa khyod la 'dud/ /nyon mongs nad ni kun sel cing/ /zug rngu thams cad 'byin mdzad pa/ /rig sngags 'chang ba grub pa po/ /sman pa'i gtso bo khyod la 'dud/ /mchog dang mchog min lam mkhyen cing/ /zhi ba'i phyogs ni ston par
96a7(bstod tshogs): mdzad/ /grub dang bde ba bskyed pa yi/ /ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag tu mun pa sel mdzad cing/ /rtag tu spyan ni 'byed par mdzad/ /rtag tu mi bsnyel chos mnga' ba/ /shin tu bzhengs pa khyod la 'dud/ /dri ma'i 'dam ni nges bkrus
96b1(bstod tshogs): pas/ /dam chos dri ma med pa'i chu/ /mchog tu rnam par byang ba po/ /shin tu rnam dag khyod la 'dud/ /sdig dang bsod nams spangs gyur cing/ /stong pa nyid kyi bsgos pa'i bdag /phan dang gnod pa bgyid snyom pa/ /shin tu chags bral khyod la 'dud/
96b2(bstod tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs bag chags kun/ /nges par bsal bas dri med thugs/ /rnam thar sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ /shin tu rnam grol khyod la 'dud/ /blta bas mi ngoms gzugs mnga' zhing/ /sku ni 'od kyis lha ger mdzes/ /blta bya kun gyi nang na ni/ /blta na
96b3(bstod tshogs): sdug mchog khyod la 'dud/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshon rnams ni/ /dpe byad bzang po'i tshogs bcas pa/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas/ /blta bar 'os pa khyod la 'dud/ /sangs rgyas chos ni bla med pa/ /mi 'jigs pa dang stobs sogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i
96b4(bstod tshogs): nang du sgra bsgrags pa/ /dga' bar 'os pa khyad la 'dud/ /'phags chos dkar po bla med pa/ /goms par bya ba rnams kyis ni/ /sku gnyis po dag bsgos gyur pa/ /bsgom par bya ba khyod la 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las rnams/ /shin tu
96b5(bstod tshogs): rnam par byang gyur pas/ /tshul khrims bsrung ba las 'das pa/ /gtsang sgra dag pa khyod la 'dud/ /nyon mongs pa yi brjod pa spangs/ /zhi ba'i las kyi mdza' la dgongs/ /mi gsung dang du bzhes mdzad pa/ /thub pa zhi ba khyod la 'dud/ /bde ba dang ni sdug
96b6(bstod tshogs): bsngal gyis/ /thugs mi 'phrogs la brtan pa'i thugs/ /thams cad zil gnon sems can gyi/ /snying po mchog gyur khyod la 'dud/ /kun la rnam pa thams cad dang/ /rten gyi blo dang dgongs pa dag /legs par gnas phyir mi bsnyel ba'i/ /chos
96b7(bstod tshogs): can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das kyi yon tan phyug/ 'jig rten zang zing rnam par 'jig/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa po/ /'jig rten mgon po khyod la 'dud/ /bshes dang dgra dang bar mar snyoms/ /sems can kun la phan dgongs
97a1(bstod tshogs): pa/ /rjes su brtse bar mdzad pa po/ /thugs rje chen po khyod la 'dud/ /chos kyi 'du shes kun rdzogs pa/ /skyob pa mngon shes chen po mnga' / /byas mkhyen ma byas mkhyen pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la 'dud/ /gla
97a2(bstod tshogs): kyi skabs ni kun spangs shing/ /kun nas 'ching ba bcang gyur pa/ /shes rab gsal bar mdzad pa po/ /sred pa bsal ba khyod la 'dud/ /mnyes par bgyi 'os phyag bgyir 'os/ /brgal bar 'os min nongs mi mnga' / /'bad de mchod par bgyis
97a3(bstod tshogs): 'os pa/ /rigs pa gsum ldan khyed la 'dud/ /phan pa ma lags sel mkhas shing/ /phan pa bskyed par mngon brtson pa/ /gcig tu brtse bar gzhol ba yi/ /bshes gnyen dam pa khyod la 'dud/ /skye dgu lam log zhugs pa rnams/ /
97a4(bstod tshogs): rtag tu dam pa'i lam la ni/ /mngon phyogs mdzad par mngon brtson pa/ /rtsa lag dam pa khyod la 'dud/ /go 'phang mkhyen pa rnams kyi phul/ /khyod kyis go 'phang mchog brnyes nas/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur pa/ /de las go 'phang 'phags
97a5(bstod tshogs): ma mchis/ /go 'phang bla na med brnyes nas/ /sdug bsngal thams cad sel mdzad cing/ /ma chags nyer len mi mnga' ba'i/ /rkang gnyis mchog gyur khyod la 'dud/ /khyod kyi bstan la ma brten par/ /'gas kyang de nyid mi mthong bas/ /
97a6(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten long nga lta bu yi/ /mig du gyur pa khyod la 'dud/ /sa steng gdugs ni ma mchis na/ /zhugs mchis mar me 'ang mchis gyur la/ /rgyu skar nor bu zla ba dag /mchis kyang gsal ba rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /snang ba de dang gzhan
97a7(bstod tshogs): dang ni/ /de pas khyad par ches 'phags pa/ /mchis kyang khyod ni mi bzhugs na/ /'gro ba snang ba mchis ma lags/ /de ltar 'jig rten ma rig pa'i/ /mun nag thibs pa'i ling tog gis/ /bsgribs pa'i sems ldan smag gyur pa'i/ /
97b1(bstod tshogs): sngon par gyur pa khyod la 'dud/ /chos la blo gros ma byang bas/ /phan pa'ang phan par ma 'tshal zhing/ /gnod pa'ang gnod par ma 'tshal la/ /byang ba'ang khyod la brten nas 'gyur/ /byis pa phal cher gnod pa dag /dor bar 'tshal la phan pa spong//
97b2(bstod tshogs): phan pa gnyer yang ma 'tshal bas/ /gnod nga so sor bsten par bgyid/ /de dag thabs ni ston mdzad phyir/ /khyod la brten nas gnyis ka yang/ /yang dag ji bzhin rtogs 'gyur bas/ /sman par gyur pa khyod la 'dud/ /gtso khyod gang gi blar gyur
97b3(bstod tshogs): pa/ /de yang 'jig rten bla ma lags/ /de slad bla ma rnams kyi yang/ /blar gyur bla ma khyod la 'dud/ /'jig rten mkhas pas mchod pa yang/ /yid ches ngo bo khyod la mchod/ /mchod 'os rnams kyis mchod bya ba/ /mchod 'os dam pa khyod la
97b4(bstod tshogs): 'dud/ /bsngags 'os bsngags pa gang lags pa'i/ /skye bo des kyang khyod bsngags te/ /bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyis kyang/ /bsngags par gyur pa khyod la 'dud/ /lha rnams kyang ni khyod la 'dud/ /khyod la drang srong rnams kyang 'dud/ /phyag
97b5(bstod tshogs): bgyir 'os pa rnams kyis kyang/ /'dud par bgyi ba khyod la 'dud/ /sems dang bcas pa su zhig ni/ /bsod nams zhing ni dpag med pa/ /'dud 'os khyod la phyag bgyid pas/ /nam zhig na ni ngoms par 'gyur/ /de ltas khyod la phyag 'tshal
97b6(bstod tshogs): 'dud/ /'dud par 'os pa khyod la 'dud/ /phyag gi rgyun ni mi 'chad par/ /rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtag tu dam pa'i spyod pa lam dang ldan/ /byas dang ma byas thob pa yang dag rig pa mkhyen/ /mchod pa che mnga' phyag bgyir 'os pa mtshungs
97b7(bstod tshogs): med pa/ /'dud bar 'os pa'i dgra bcom khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpe med yid 'ong sku mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog tu gsung snyan mngon sgrogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med rnam dag thugs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan
98a1(bstod tshogs): tshogs bsgoms bdag nyid khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhing zhes bsam pas sangs rgyas la 'dud pa/ /dri ma med la bkra shis thams cad kyis/ /char yang mi phod mchod sbyin kun gyis min/ /dka' thub brtul zhugs min
98a2(bstod tshogs): te khrus kun min/ /thub pa'i dbang po la 'dud pa/ /snyan par grags shing dpal du byed/ /sdig pa thams cad drungs nas 'byin/ /gzi brjid dag kyang rnam par 'phel/ /dgra rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /'jig rten dag na mi rnams kyi//
98a3(bstod tshogs): rgyud ni bde 'gror nges byed cing/ /nges mthar zhi ba'i 'bras bur smin/ /de ltar yon tan mang bsams shing/ /lus kyang 'jigs pa'i ngang bsams na/ /mkhas gang sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal las/ /lus kyi las gzhan spyad par byed/ /'chi
98a4(bstod tshogs): bdag sel bar byed pa yi/ /bstan pa 'di ni nub gyur cing/ /kun nas mun pas khebs gyur na/ /gang zhig la ni bkur sti bya/ /de lta bas na mtshungs med pa'i/ /mchod pa bya ba smyur te gyis/ /ma 'ongs pa yi 'jigs pa dag /da lta nyid nas
98a5(bstod tshogs): byung zin to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phyag 'tshal ba zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //nyi ma'i gnyen gyur nyi ma yi/ /'od pas shin
98a6(bstod tshogs): tu 'od gsal ba/ /phyag bya kun gyi rab dang mchog /phyag 'os phyag bgyis khyod la 'dud/ /stobs chen dpa' bo chen po pa/ /mngon shes che la mthu yang che/ /g.yul dong mda' chen 'phen mdzad pa/ /dga' ston chen po khyod la mchod/
98a7(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten mchod 'os mchod 'os mchog /'jig rten mchod pas mchod pa po/ /mchong ba'i snod ni bla med pa/ /mchod par 'os pa khyod la mchod/ /mchod dang mkhyen pas rtogs pa brnyes/ /dgongs pa nga rgyal bag mi mnga' / /
98b1(bstod tshogs): brjed bos khyod la nga rgyal gyi/ /sems bor nas ni brjed par bgyi/ /gus bgyid ma gus pa la snyoms/ /'jig rten gus pas mchod bgyis pa/ /khyod la bkur stir gzhol ba yi/ /dbang pos gus par bkur sti bgyid/ /khyod dang 'dra ba 'ga' ma
98b2(bstod tshogs): mchis/ /lhag pa ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de slad sems can kun la khyod/ /dgra zin snyoms ba'i mnyam med lags/ /ma 'dris 'phags pa'i gdud las byung/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skal ba mnyam/ /mdog dang shes rab snang ba yis/
98b3(bstod tshogs): phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan/ /mdom gang 'od kyi 'od zer spro/ /mtshan dang mthun pa'i dpe byad bzang/ /brgyad cus 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ /rgyal chen dpal dang ldan pa'i sku/ /kun gyi mdzes pa zil
98b4(bstod tshogs): gnon pa/ /'jig rten snang bar mdzad nas ni/ /nyi ma gzhan zhig lta bur bzhugs/ /bcom ldan dus kun rtogs pa'i chos/ /rnam kun 'byung gnas thams cad ni/ /phyag mthil skyu ru ra lta bur/ /khyod kyi thugs ni spyod yul gyur/ /chos
98b5(bstod tshogs): rnams g.yo dang mi g.yor bcas/ /gcig dang sna tshogs so so la/ /mkha' la rlung dag rgyu ba bzhin/ /khyod kyi thugs ni thogs mi mnga' / /bya ba mdzad pa khyod kyis ni/ /ji ltar thugs bskyed tsam gyis su/ /khyod la bzhed dgur kun 'grub
98b6(bstod tshogs): pa/ /de ltar chos dbyings legs thugs chud/ /dge mthar phyin pa khyod la ni/ /sbyor byung dge ba 'ga' mi mnga' / /khyod ni gang zhig bzhed na yang/ /bzhed pa tsam la rag las so/ /chos rnams kyi ni chos yod dang/ /chos nyid dang ni chos kyi
98b7(bstod tshogs): mthu/ /so sor rgyu dang bcas gnas shing/ /rkyen dang 'bras bur bcas pa dang/ /khams dang dbye ba tha dang bcas/ /skye dang 'jig bcas rgyas pa de/ /thams cad so sor rnam kun tu/ /kun mkhyen khyod kyis mkhyen gzhan min/ /khyod
99a1(bstod tshogs): la shin tu bsgribs pa 'ang mngon/ /shin tu ring ba'ang nye ba ste/ /shin tu 'dzings pa 'ang sal gyis dag /shin tu mthon po 'ang dma' ba lags/ /shin tu gnag pa'ang snang bar bcas/ /shin tu the tshom gnas kyang nges/ /shes
99a2(bstod tshogs): bya shin tu zab mo yang/ /khyod la sa ler gda' ba lags/ /dbang po chen po'i glang chen gyis/ /rked cing gser las bgyis pa ltar/ /chos nyid shin tu zab mos kyang/ /khyod ni 'o brgyal 'gyur ma lags/ /chos kyi nang na chags bral ltar/ /nges 'byin
99a3(bstod tshogs): nang na drang po ltar/ /phun tshogs nang na sangs rgyas ltar/ /khyod ni sems can kun gyi mchog /rnam grol nang na mi g.yo ltar/ /rigs pa'i nang na chos nyid ltar/ /shes rab nang na kun mkhyen ltar/ /khyod ni lus can kun gyi mchog /dag pa'i nang na
99a4(bstod tshogs): rnam grol ltar/ /de nyid nang na stong pa ltar/ /dka' thub nang na bzod pa ltar/ /khyod ni srog chags kun gyi mchog /gzugs kyi nang na khyod sku ltar/ /sems kyi nang na khyod thugs ltar/ /chos kyi nang na khyod chos ltar/ /khyod ni srog chags kun gyi
99a5(bstod tshogs): mchog /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid grub pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //bde bar gshegs pa khyod gcig pu/ /chos gcig
99a6(bstod tshogs): chos kun snang mdzad pa/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yis/ /de dang ldan gyi gzhan ma lags/ /khyod 'ba' zhig gi ye shes kyis/ /shes bya mdza' dag khyab lags kyi/ /khyod las gzhan pa thams cad kyi/ /shes bya kho na lhag pa lags//
99a7(bstod tshogs): rgyu rkyen 'di las 'bras bu 'di/ /'di las 'di ni ma yin zhes/ /gnas dang gnas min nges pa kun/ /khyod kyis mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis min/ /las chos yang dag blangs pa yi/ /rnam smin dus ni thams cad pa/ /sa kun rtogs pa thams cad ni/
99b1(bstod tshogs): rnam kun khyod mkhyen gzhan gyis min/ /rnal 'byor sa ni ma lus pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam gzhag dang/ /rnam par byang bcas zab mor bcas/ /khyod gcig kho nas thugs su chud/ /dbang po mchog dang mchog min pa/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen
99b2(bstod tshogs): po dang/ /cha shas dbye ba mdza' yas pa/ /khyod las gzhan gyis rtogs ma mchis/ /mthun par 'gyur ba gang lags dang/ /mi mthun 'gyur ba gang lags pa/ /mi yi nus pa sna tshogs kun/ /khyod gcig kho nas thugs su chud/ /'jig rten 'di
99b3(bstod tshogs): khams sna tshogs te/ /sna tshogs khams nyid mdza' dag ni/ /sna tshogs khams dbye khyod gcig pus/ /mkhyen gyi gzhan gyis ma lags so/ /rgyu dang rkyen ni sna tshogs las/ /sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam stobs kyis/
99b4(bstod tshogs): thams cad khyod kyis thugs su chud/ /thog med srid par byung ba dang/ /tha ma med par 'byung gyur gang/ /de la khyod kyis ye shes ni/ /mngon sum bzhin du gzigs pa 'jug /sngon gyi mdza' dang phyi ma'i mthar/ /'jig rten yang dag 'grub pa dang/ /de bzhin
99b5(bstod tshogs): nyid mtshams sbyor ba ni/ /mdza' yi bar bzhin khyod kyis gzigs/ /nye 'am yang na ring yang rung/ /ji ltar khyod la mngon sum pa/ /de ltar sgrib pa bag chags dang/ /bcas te khyod kyis spangs pa lags/ /dngos 'di yongs su ma mkhyen cing/ /nyon
99b6(bstod tshogs): mongs 'di yi bag chags ni/ /lhag ma lus shes mi bsnyad pa'i/ /go 'phang de ni khyod kyis brnyes/ /khyod kyis bar du gcod gsungs gang/ /nges par de dag bar du gcod/ /khyod kyis lam bstan gang lags pa/ /de gcig kho na nges par 'byin/
99b7(bstod tshogs): de yis bar gcod mi nus she 'am/ /de yis nges 'byin mi 'gyur zhes/ /gzhan gyi klan ka cha shas kyang/ /de la srid pa ma mchis so/ /khyod kyis rgyal bgyi ma rgyal min/ /shes bya mi snad bgyis ma mchis/ /dbang phyug khyod nyid kun mkhyen cing/
100a1(bstod tshogs): kun rgyal lags kyi gzhan ma lags/ /stobs ldan 'jigs mi 'gyur bas khyod/ /mi bsnyengs gang lags rigs lags na/ /mthu mnga' bzhin du 'ga' la yang/ /khyad du mi gsod gang de rmad/ /log pa'i nga rgyal can 'ga' zhig/
100a2(bstod tshogs): dregs dang 'bral ba mdzad pa gang/ /gdul ba yi ni thabs tsam ste/ /des ni stobs snyems yong ma lags/ /'jig rten dag na stobs ldan pas/ /kun las rgyal zhes gang brjod pa/ /de ni gzhan la bstod par bas/ /go 'phang de ni khyod la rdzogs/ /'dren pa
100a3(bstod tshogs): khyod la chos mthun par/ /'gas kyang brgal bar nus ma lags/ /klan ka btsal 'os ma lags te/ /nongs mi mnga' ba'i bde ba brnyes/ /nongs mi mnga' bas gang las kyang/ /bzhi ni bsrung bar bgyi mi 'tshal/ /bzhi po yongs su rdzogs slad du/ /khyod la sus
100a4(bstod tshogs): kyang glags mi thod/ /kun la mi thogs blo gros can/ /dgongs pa kun tu nye bar gnas/ /kun la thugs rje snyoms pa po/ /thugs ni kun la chags mi mnga' / /shes bya'i rgya mtsho kun rgal ba/ /bag chags thams cad gtan nas spangs/ /bar chad kun
100a5(bstod tshogs): gyi khyad par mkhyen/ /nges par 'byin pa kun la mkhas/ /kun gyi bsam pa mkhyen pa po/ /gdul ba thabs kyi pha rol gshegs/ /nyon mongs sna tshogs thams cad kyi/ /gnyen po la yang bsnyengs mi mnga' / /khyod la brten nas smra ba po/ /byis
100a6(bstod tshogs): pa shed bye ma gyur gang/ /de ni ma rig mun pa yi/ /tshang tshing mi bzad mthu lags so/ /khyod kyi bka' la brten nas kyang/ /bral bar ma gyur gang lags pa/ /de dang de sgrib ces bgyi ste/ /de dang de sgrib mi zad lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom
100a7(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //ji ltar thub pa khyod kyi bka' / /nyes dmigs brjod ldan thos pa ltar/ /'khor ba'i
100b1(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal mi bzad pa'i/ /me yis kun tu sbar kyang ni/ /'gro ba mi shes go dgos pa/ /de ltar skyo bar 'gyur ma lags/ /de ltar mgon po khyod kyi bka' / /mngon sum pas kyang don gsal rab/ /chos nyid zab mo gting yangs pa/ /bshad pas sa ler
100b2(bstod tshogs): gyur lags pas/ /khyod kyi bka' ni snrel zhi yi/ /cho 'phrul dag kyang mdzad pa lags/ /tshig gi mdza' ni mi mthong zhing/ /don gyi ting yang mi dpogs la/ /phan tshun rjes su zhugs pa ni/ /de las ya mtshan che ci mchis/ /smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka' / /rnam
100b3(bstod tshogs): grangs du ma nyid mchis shing/ /zlos bu yang ni ma mchis la/ /sbyor ba'i lugs kyang rigs pa lags/ /smra ba'i dam pa khyod kyi bka' / /gnas pa bzhi yi yon tan ldan/ /lung bstan bzhi yi rten gyur kyang/ /don du gnyis su 'gyur ma mchis/ /gnang
100b4(bstod tshogs): ba dang ni dgag pa la/ /khyod bka' la lar gcig tu nges/ /la lar nges pa ma lags la/ /phan tshun 'gal ba'ang ma mchis so/ /chos kyi de nyid don slad du/ /rtsod pa med pa'i go 'phang gzhi/ /rigs 'thad yon tan bzang po yis/ /ngan smra thams cad
100b5(bstod tshogs): sun 'byin pa/ /gcig tu don dam la gzhol la/ /kun rdzob la yang skyon ma mchis/ /bden pa gnyis dang mi 'gal bas/ /khyod kyi bka' ni rigs pa 'byung/ /nyon mongs med la gcig tu 'jam/ /nyon mongs can la nges brlang yang/ /khyod
100b6(bstod tshogs): kyi bka' ni bsnyen pa dang/ /srid pa'i skyon dang ldan ma !lags/ /rnam par byang ba'i rjes mthun la/ /de yi phyogs su lhung mi mnga' / /kun nas nyon mongs dgrar gyur la/ /mi bzod mi mnga' khyod kyi bka' / /smod pa'i tshig ni brgyas gang yang/ /
100b7(bstod tshogs): phyar ka btong ba'i skyon ldan min/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i tshig phyung kyang/ /'ga' la'ang rten pa mnga' ma lags/ /bsnan dang dor ba mi mnga' la/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa dang yang ldan/ /brtags shing 'thad par 'gyur lags la/ /dang po nas kyang
101a1(bstod tshogs): mi bzad min/ /shin tu snyan gsung chags mi 'gyur/ /mang la snying po ma mchis min/ /sna tshogs pa la don ma 'khrugs/ /bka' ni ngo mtshar mang po lags/ /gsung gi bdag po khyod kyi bka' / /yid 'phrog mdzad pa zhen mi mnga' / /
101a2(bstod tshogs): gzi byin can la gnod mi 'gyur/ /khyab la ngan pas rtogs ma lags/ /ba spu dag kyang ldang bgyid cing/ /rdul yang kun tu 'thon par bgyid/ /lus rnams dag ni ston bgyid cing/ /'dar ba dag kyang skyed par bgyid/ /lha yi 'jig rten skyo
101a3(bstod tshogs): bgyid cing/ /sgra yang kun tu sgrogs par bgyid/ /sa ni rnal mar gnas pa yang/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar bgyid/ /thog med dus nas goms pa yi/ /lus can rang bzhin bzlog mdzad cing/ rang bzhin 'dris pa ma lags pa/ /gzhan ni
101a4(bstod tshogs): snying la 'jog par mdzad/ /rang gi nyes pas mi 'gal la/ /yid ni gdung bar bgyid dang 'dra/ /rigs par zhugs pa mkhas rnams la/ /bdud rtsi'i char pa bab pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi bka' ni thog ma dang/ /bar dang tha mar dge ba dag /thos dang
101a5(bstod tshogs): sems dang sgom pa na/ /de sgrub pa la bdud rtsir 'gyur/ /mos pa du ma dang ldan pa/ /mang po 'khod par gyur pa la/ /gsung gcig dka' ni stsal ba las/ /du ma lta bur snang 'gyur te/ /kun gyis 'di ni bdag gi ched/ /khon bo snyam
101a6(bstod tshogs): du go ba gang/ /de las ya mtshan che ci mchis/ /de las ngo mtshar che ci mchis/ /chos nyid 'dor bar mi mdzad la/ /'jig rten kun rdzob dang yang mthun/ /rjes su sgrogs par mdzad bzhin du/ /cig shos rnam par bsgom pa'ang mdzad/ /
101a7(bstod tshogs): kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang mchis/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu 'ang mchis/ /de ldan byed du 'jug pa dang/ /byed pa ma mchis khyod kyi bka' / /de ni lha dang mir bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten dag gis sngon thos nas/ /chu yi zla ba g.yo ba
101b1(bstod tshogs): bzhin/ /so sor rab tu g.yos par gyur/ /bzang dang ngan pa nyid du ni/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba tha dad pa/ /thams cad rkyen la rag las na/ /byed po ci ga mchis 'gyur ram/ /'ga' la rang dbang nyid mchis na/ /byed por 'gyur na de mi rigs/ /de lta lags pas
101b2(bstod tshogs): chos kun la/ /byed po med par khyod kyis gsungs/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la/ /chos 'di stong pa nyid kyi ni/ /seng ge sgra yi rnga brdungs nas/ /mtshams bcad bgyis te gnas pa lags/ /de yis nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du/ /'jig rten snang
101b3(bstod tshogs): bar bgyis pas na/ /de las gzhan pa'i tshig kun ni/ /shin tu cir yang ma rung gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las gsung rnam par dag pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u lnga
101b4(bstod tshogs): pa'o// //chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa/ /'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma/ /mya ngan 'das zhi zhes bgyi ba/ /mtshan nyid 'di gsum chos kyi rgya/ /smra ba kun gyi yul min pa/ /mi byed khyod kyis bzhag pa mdzad/
101b5(bstod tshogs): ji skad brjod kyang 'jig rten na/ /rang bzhin las ni gang zhig 'da' / /gal 'dzin pa yis shags la ni/ /goms par bgyis kyang su zhig gis/ /me nyid grang ba lta bur ni/ /de nyid gzhan du bgyi bar nus/ /nam mkha' thogs pa med pa la/ /'ga' yis
101b6(bstod tshogs): rma phyin 'gyur srid kyi/ /chos kyi phyag rgya 'di la ni/ /chos dang mthun par 'gal ma lags/ /chos nyid de nyid mkhyen khyod kyi/ /dka' la nag po chen po dag /bstan pas 'di ni mchis grags kyi/ /smra ba gzhan la mchis ma lags/ /tha dad lta
101b7(bstod tshogs): la brten pa yis/ /'jig rten rnams ni rtsod par ltung/ /khyod ni gcig pus rtsod med pa'i/ /gnas kyi go 'phangs thugs su chud/ /long ba rnams ni rtsod gyur kyang/ /mig can gzugs rnams mthong ba ni/ /ji ltar rtsod par mi 'gyur pa/ /de nyid khyod
102a1(bstod tshogs): dang byis pa'i dpe/ /chos bzhin gsung ba khyod la ni/ /'ga' dang lhan cig rtsod mi mnga' / /legs par smra phyir mkhas dang min/ /khyad du gsod phyir mi mkhas min/ /'dod pa rnams ni mi snang gyur/ /lta ba'i dra ba rab tu bcom/
102a2(bstod tshogs): gzhi ma mchis na ci slad khyod/ /gzhi ma mchis pa'i rtsod par 'gyur/ /rgyal thabs brnyes pa khyod lta bu'i/ /brtan pa ci zhig rtsod pa mdzad/ /'od zer stong ldan ro lta bu'i/ /mun dang lhan cig ci zhig 'gyed/ /mkha' la lcag gis 'ju ba bzhin//
102a3(bstod tshogs): brtsad pas khyod la rdzi mi 'gyur/ /rlung gis bzlog phyogs gtor ba'i rdul/ /'thor ba nyid la 'bab cing 'go /'jig rten rnams ni brtags par ltung/ /yang dag ji bzhin spyod yul khyod/ /de slad phyin ci log gyur pa/ /mang po rnams dang
102a4(bstod tshogs): khyod mi mtshung/ /dper na lcags dang gser bzhin du/ /log par mngon bar zhen rnams dang/ /mngon zhen mi mnga' khyod du ni/ /lhan cig sgrun du ga la mchis/ /byis pa rnams ni ma 'tshal te/ /mgon po phan dang bde bzhed pa/ /do
102a5(bstod tshogs): min khyod la bsngo bgyid pa/ /bdag gis bdag nyid brlag par bas/ /bdag gis bdag nyid me 'bar ba'i/ /phreng ba 'khrigs par mi bsngo yi/ /rgyal ba thub pa med pa yi/ /gzi byin can la bsngor mi rung/ /khyod la 'dir brgal dus
102a6(bstod tshogs): btab nas/ /khyod kyis slar gzhan dus btab pa/ /brtod pa dam pos btags pa bzhin/ /stan las ldang bar nus ma mchis/ /khyod kyis tshogs par bden smra'i bu'i/ /rgol ba'i mche ba bcag pas na/ /pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyi/ /
102a7(bstod tshogs): rwa yang bcag pa nyid du 'gyur/ /pha rol rgol ba kha cig ni/ /khyod dang phrad nas 'dud par bgyid/ /kha cig thag ring slar ldog ste/ /gzhan dag spyan sngar zhum nas mchis/ /kha cig khyod kyis dam pa'i chos/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyi char phab pas/
102b1(bstod tshogs): yang dag sgrub pa phun sum gyis/ /dam pa'i chos la brten par bgyid/ /kye ma mgon po thugs rje'i bdag /kyi hud gti mug nyon mongs ngan/ /kyi hud sred pa rnam par 'phro/ /kyi hud nga rgyal phung bar byed/ /dam chos ma yin 'di gsum gyis/ /skye bo
102b2(bstod tshogs): 'di ni kun dkrugs te/ /mi bzad rgyun gyis 'das pa bzhin/ /khyod kyi gzhung dang bral bar bgyid/ /'di yi gzhi yis lta ba dang/ /the tshom la sogs nye nyon mongs/ /so sor lam gyi bar gcod pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs thams cad 'phel/ /ka la
102b3(bstod tshogs): ping ka'i skad thos nas/ /khwa yi sgra la chags med ltar/ /khyod kyi chos kyi ro myong na/ /gzhan gyi tshig la chags mi 'gyur/ /gang dag chos la rgyu bshams nas/ /khyod kyi bka' la zhugs gyur ba/ /ngan ngon thos pa de la'ang de/ /rnga mo sbrang rtsi bzhin
102b4(bstod tshogs): du 'gyur/ /bden zhing go sla don dang ldan/ /bsam pa dang ni chu 'phrul bcas/ /zad mi shes la 'dor 'dus pa/ /gcig tu mthu ni chen bar ldan/ /snying po mchog ldan ro mchog ldan/ /rnam grangs ldan zhing thabs dang ldan/ /yongs su rdzogs
102b5(bstod tshogs): la ma 'dres pa/ /gzi brjid dang ldan grags dang ldan/ /de 'dra'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i/ /khyod gsung thos pa su zhig ni/ /de las bzlog pa gzhan gyi tshig/ rul pa lta bu snom par bgyid/ /sdug bsngal yang rung bde yang rung/ /don dang
102b6(bstod tshogs): mi ldan gang yin pa/ /de ni yongs su spang bya zhing/ /bzlog pa bsten par bya bar gsungs/ /'dod dang mi 'dod bsten pa la/ /de ltar phyad par gsungs khyod kyi/ /lam mal thang chad smra ba rnams/ /ji lta bur na rjes 'brang 'gyur/ /spyad pa rnams
102b7(bstod tshogs): la khyod kyis ni/ /'di yi ched du bstan pa gang/ /de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni/ /gzhan gyi tshig gi mtshams rdzogs pa/ /khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig /ji ltar khyad par che zhugs pa/ /dug dang bdud rtsi de lta min/ /mun dang snang ba'ang
103a1(bstod tshogs): ma lags so/ /khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig /ji ltar khyad par rgyang chad pa/ /mtho ris ngan song de lta min/ /zil dngar skus te bor ba'ang min/ /de ni tshig tsam snying po ste/ /'di ni tshig dang tshig don ldan/ /de yis
103a2(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi bka' dang ni/ /gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par bshad/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod dang ni/ /smra de rnams kyi khyad par gang/ /de nyid khyod kyi bka' dang ni/ /gzhan gyi tshig gi mtho dman lags/ /ji ltar sring dang thar pa'i khyad/ /de ni dpyad
103a3(bstod tshogs): du med pa ltar/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi bka' dang ni/ /gzhan tshig khyad kyang de dang 'dra/ /'jug dang ldog pa gang lags dang/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang gang/ /de nyid dpa' bo khyod bka' dang/ /gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par lags/ /'di ni
103a4(bstod tshogs): gcig pu de bzhin nyid/ /de ni bslu chos 'ba' zhig na/ /khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ de las khyad zhugs gzhan ci 'tshal/ /'di ni gcig bu dge la de/ /gcig tu bar chad bgyid lags na/ /khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi
103a5(bstod tshogs): tshig /de las mi 'dra ci zhig mchis/ /de yis bsgos shing nyer bsgos pa/ /'di yis dag par bgyid 'gyur ba/ /de nyid mgon po khyod bka' dang/ /gzhan gyi tshig gi khyad par lags/ /de kun dam pa ma yin brdol/ /'di gcig
103a6(bstod tshogs): legs gsungs de yi slad/ /khyod kyi bka' dang gzhan gyi tshig/ brtsan dang mi brtsan nges pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las brtsod pa mi mnga' bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste
103a7(bstod tshogs): le'u drug pa'o// //'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la/ /'gro 'di'i rang bzhin gang lags dang/ /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun/ /so sor gang las me 'da' ba' i/ /lugs mthun lugs dang mi mthun pa/ /tshig bcu
103b1(bstod tshogs): gnyis kyi yi ge gnyis/ /de ni dam chos nyi ma yi/ /nyi ma mchod pa'i 'os su bstan/ /de nyid brdzus te skye ba yi/ /srid gcig yan lag ma tshang bas/ /ji bzhin yan lag so so la/ /bzhi ru bsgres pas gsum mchod lags/ /de nyid yan lag tshang
103b2(bstod tshogs): ba las/ /yi ge bcu gnyis tshig dag gis/ /bden pa'i lugs su snga ma bzhin/ /bsgres na rab tu 'gro ba lags/ /tshangs pa 'di ni khyod bstan la/ /gang dag ji bzhin bsten bgyid pa/ /bram ze de dag tshangs 'gyur ba'i/ /gsang gsum 'thun pa'i
103b3(bstod tshogs): tshangs pa lags/ /tshangs pa'i tshul dang tshangs pa dang/ /tshangs tshul 'bras bu tshangs pa'i don/ /tshangs mchog khyod kyi bstan pa las/ /gzhan la mchis pa ma lags so/ /tshangs pa'i tshul ni ma mchis par/ /'ga' yang bram zer 'gyur ma lags
103b4(bstod tshogs): drang bo yi ni lam 'di yang/ /gzhan ni 'ga' la'ang ma mchis so/ /rig dang gzhabs su ldan pa ni/ /tshangs pa lags par bram zes bshad/ /rig pa de dang zhabs de yang/ /khyod kyi bstan las gzhan la min/ /slob dang mi slob rig pa de/ /zhabs ni de thob bgyid
103b5(bstod tshogs): pa lags/ /gzhan la chos kyi lam de ni/ /ming yang mchis pa ma lags so/ /gang zhig goms par bgyis pa yis/ /rigs kun bram zer 'gyur bgyid pa/ /bdud rtsi'i sgo ni ring zhig nas/ /bcad pa khyod kyis dbye ba mdzad/ /lta ba ngan dang yid
103b6(bstod tshogs): gnyis kyis/ /zin pa bram zer ci zhig 'gyur/ /khyod kyi gzhung lugs ma gtogs par/ /gzhan gyis mdud pa 'di ma chod/ /bram ze tshangs pa'i bu yin te/ /snying dang kha las skyes zhes pa/ /'jig rten gyi ni grags pa de/ /khyod la 'bras bu bcas
103b7(bstod tshogs): par 'gyur/ /tshangs khyod tshangs lam khyod la mnga' / /khyod ni bram ze'i khyu mchog ste/ /nye bar 'dren dang ston pa'ang khyod/ /khyod ni dus mchod mdun na 'don/ /khyod kyis legs par bstan pa yi/ /bram ze mi gtsang 'gyur ma lags/ /nye bar
104a1(bstod tshogs): drangs pa'i bram ze yang/ /tshangs pa'i tshul las ltung mi 'gyur/ /khyod bstan las gzhan 'ga' la yang/ /bram zer 'gyur ba'i chos ma mchis/ /tshangs pa yi ni mchod pa dang/ /tshangs pa'i lam yang mchis ma lags/ /tshangs
104a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i bden pa gsum dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams gsum dang/ /tshangs pa'i mchog rab gsum dang ni/ /tshangs pa'i rigs kyang mchis ma lags/ /'jig rten legs bshad ji snyed pa/ /thams cad khyod kyi bstan las 'byung/ /skyon med mngon
104a3(bstod tshogs): par brjod pa 'di/ /bde gshegs kho na'i ma 'dres pa/ /khyed las gzhan pa gang dag cig /ngag las skyon med gda' ba de/ /thams cad chos kun mkhyen khyod kyi/ /legs par gsungs pa'i bram ze lags/ /srin bus zos pa'i yi ge ltar/ /'di las
104a4(bstod tshogs): gzhan pa'i legs bshad gang/ /de ni lcags la gser bzhin du/ /de la 'tsham pa ma lags so/ /e raN Da yi shing khrod du/ /tsadan sa mchog bzhag pa ltar/ /ltag 'og 'gal ba de la de/ /mchis par su zhig yid ches 'gyur/ /gang zhig nim
104a5(bstod tshogs): pa'i shing la ni/ /a mra'i 'bras bu smin btags pa/ /de las skyes shes yid ches te/ /gzhan la legs bshad yod sems grang/ /ma la yal ga tsandan bzhin/ /khyod las gzhan la lhar bcas pa'i/ /'jig rten 'di na legs bshad pa'i/ /rin
104a6(bstod tshogs): chen 'byung ba ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las tshangs pa dang mthun par gsung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// //brgya la res 'ga' gang zhig gis/ /
104a7(bstod tshogs): mi gsung thugs las chung dgyes pa/ /rang byung bse ru lta bu rnams/ /rnam par 'gying zhing bzhung gyur ba/ /nyams par 'gyur ba'i lam mang bas/ /rtogs par yang na rib dka' ba/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam de ni/ /khyod kyis lam
104b1(bstod tshogs): chen srol du btod/ /de ni glang bo che rnams ltar/ /dga' mgur gzhon nu dag dang ni/ /stobs dang blo ni sor gnyis pa'i/ /bud med kyis kyang goms par bgyis/ /de ni gzi byin ldan pa'i mchog/ khyod la bsten pa'i cho 'phrul te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni ma 'dres pa/ /
104b2(bstod tshogs): mthu dpag med pa'i gzi byin lags/ /kun nas nyon mongs sbrul dag gis/ /rnam pa du mar zin rnams la/ /khyod ni spyi yi gnyen po yi/ /skyon med 'byung gnas ma 'dres pa/ /'dod chags la sogs 'bags rnams la/ /skyon ni skyon med mdzad khyod kyis/
104b3(bstod tshogs): mi sdug sgom pa la sogs pa'i/ /chos kyang rab tu bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod kyis lam gyi tshogs kyi chos/ /dge ba zag bcas bstan mdzad pas/ /dngos po rnams kyi nang gi ni/ /phan tshun khyad par dag kyang bstan/ /de yang nye ba'i nyon mongs dang/ /'bags
104b4(bstod tshogs): phyir spyi yi rnam par bcom/ /dur khrod mgal ba'i yog ba ltar/ /de dag ye shes me la bsregs/ /byang chub pa yi snga rol du/ /'jug pa bde ba'i rgyu chos bstan/ /de nas byang chub brnyes nas ni/ /ldog pa bde ba'i chos kyang bstan/ /sangs rgyas
104b5(bstod tshogs): nas kyang dge ba'i chos/ /zag bcas de dag ma bshad min/ /phal cher mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /rgyu mthun nyid du yongs su bsngos/ /khyod kyis gang las 'gro ba dag /ma drangs rgud pa de gang mchis/ /gang dang 'jig rten ma sprad pa'i/ /phun tshogs de
104b6(bstod tshogs): yang gang zhig mchis/ /khyod kyis yid gnyis mdud pa bcad/ /lta ba don ba'i tsher ma dkrugs/ /srid pa'i dug gi lcug ma bsregs/ /khro ba'i dug kyang thams cad bcom/ /ma rig pa yi ling tog bsal/ /nga rgyal gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgyel/ /
104b7(bstod tshogs): sems kyi tha ba rnams kyang bcom/ /rnam par 'chid ba rnam par gtubs/ /mdud pa thams cad rnam par bkrol/ /chu bo la ni gzings kyang bcas/ /khyod kyis chu bo rnams kyi gzhi/ /mtsho chen gang lags de yang bskams/ /skyon dang snyigs
105a1(bstod tshogs): ma yon po dag /sems la mi mngon 'khras bgyid pa/ /kun nas nyon mongs dug shing gi /rtsa ba khyod kyis drungs nas byung/ /phyin ci log gis 'tshal ba yi/ /ngan pa'i lam ni thams cad bcad/ /'chi med bgrod pa
105a2(bstod tshogs): gcig pa yi/ /dpal ldan lam ni drang po phye/ /gzhan dag gdul bar bgyi ba yi/ /skyon brgyad las ni nges drangs nas/ /'dod pa'i yan lag brgyad ldan pa/ /cang shes bzang po'i gnas su bkod/ /kun nas nyon mongs srin 'khrugs pa'i/ /mi gtsang rgyun
105a3(bstod tshogs): nas drangs nas kyang/ /nyon mongs min pa'i yan lag can/ /dri med chu la 'phyo ru stsal/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims skyon bsal nas/ /tshul khrims kyi ni byug pas byugs/ /ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod pa'i/ /dri med dgos kyis dags pa mdzad/ /dam pa'i chos
105a4(bstod tshogs): rgyan dkar po ni/ /spa ba dag gis brgyan mdzad nas/ /de dag bsam gtan seng ge'i khri/ /chen po'i rkyen du 'bab la bzhag/ byang chub yan lag me tog ni/ /zag med dri zhim rnams kyis gtor/ /chos kyi dga' ba 'phags pa'i ngos/ /zang zing med
105a5(bstod tshogs): pas tshim par mdzad/ /srid pa'i bran ni 'tshe mang ba/ /thog ma med pa las bton nas/ /nyid kyi sras po gtan du ni/ /nyams pa med pa kho nar mdzad/ /gzhan dag ma 'ongs dus na ni/ /rang rgyal ba yi snod du mdzad/ /gzhan dag theg pa chen po yi/ /
105a6(bstod tshogs): rgyal chab mchog tu dbang yang bskur/ /chos kun gyi ni tshig mkhyen cing/ /don rnams kun gyi gzhi la mkhas/ /skad kyi dbye ba kun mkhyen cing/ /phyogs rnams kun tu spobs dang ldan/ /nga ni mgon med khyed rnams kyi/ /grogs su gyur pa zhes
105a7(bstod tshogs): sgrogs shing/ /thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba ni/ /mdza' dag 'khyud pa bzhin du bzhugs/ /ston pa thugs rje che mnga' ba/ /brtse bar ldan zhing thugs brtser mdzad/ /der brtson le lo mi mnga' ba/ /khyod dang 'dra ba gzhan su mchis/ /khyod ni sems can
105b1(bstod tshogs): kun gyi mgon/ /spyi yi rtsa lag bzang po lags/ /mgon du khyed bzhugs ma 'tshal bas/ /de slad skye bo bying bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig yang dag blangs nas ni/ /tha shal bas kyang grogs nus pa/ /grogs byed pa yi chos dag ni/ /khyod las gzhan pa 'gas
105b2(bstod tshogs): mi rtogs/ /phyi yi yan lag stobs kun ni/ /khyod kyis yang dag bsgrubs lags te/ /nang gi stobs dag ma tshang bas/ /byis pa rnams ni sdug bsngal bsten/ /'jig rten spyod pa med dang sbyar/ /chos nyid zab pa dang yang sbyar/ /dman la mos pa nyid dang sbyar
105b3(bstod tshogs): lam ni ngan pa mang dang sbyar/ /thog med dus nas goms pa yi/ /brel ba ngang gis 'byung dang sbyar/ /bgom pa 'bad pa chen pos kyang/ /thob par dka' ba dang sbyang na/ /'jig rten du ni khyod lta bu/ /chos dkar yang dag blang ba yi/ /dngos po gsal bar ston
105b4(bstod tshogs): pa'i rtsa/ /bzang po gal te ma byung na/ /'gro kun mun par 'gyur lags te/ /mi 'dod tshor ba byung ba yis/ /nyam thag 'o dod cher 'bod pa'i/ /ngan song rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur/ /khyod la gang gis 'gro rnam gsum/ /de ni gzhan gyis sgrub par bas/ /khyod
105b5(bstod tshogs): ni dgra bshes bar ma la/ /bshes mchog nyid du brtse bar mdzad/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las phan par mdzad par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //bgo bsha'
105b6(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa'i chos nyid ni/ /khyod gcig pu la rdzogs mnga' yi/ /gzhan la phan gdags bgyi ba la/ /skye bo gzhan ni tshogs shing mchis/ /khyod kyi slob ma bsdu ba yi/ /dngos la mkhas par gda' ba gang/ /de yang rdzogs par mi mkhas pas/ /khyod kyi cha
105b7(bstod tshogs): shas rjes su 'brang/ /bcom ldan khyod kyi zang zing gi /bgo bsha' srog gi bar lags te/ /dam pa'i chos kyi bgo bsha' ni/ /slob dpon dpe mkhyud bral ba lags/ /khyod ni bgo bsha' bgyi pa'i las/ /bla na med pa'i mdzad pa po/ /phun sum thams
106a1(bstod tshogs): cad rdzogs mnga' ba/ /khyod ni btang bar bgyi ba lags/ /'gro ba phal cher mi bzang ba/ /gzhan la gnod pa bgyid par dga' / /khyod ni 'jig rten rang bzhin te/ /rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs su 'jug /byas pa gzo gang de dag nyung/ /phan
106a2(bstod tshogs): 'dogs bgyi ba 'ga' tsam ste/ /de yang phal che re ba can/ /khyod gcig dag pa'i chos can lags/ /phan btags pa yis khyod mi 'jug /gnod pa bgyis pas ldog ma lags/ /skal ba mchis shes thams cad la/ /khyod ni mnyam pa nyid du 'jug /
106a3(bstod tshogs): mtshan mo me tog ku mu da/ /kha 'phye 'gyur zhing pad+ma zum/ /nyin par pad+ma kha 'byed zhing/ /cig shos zum par 'gyur mod kyi/ /'on kyang nyi ma zla ba yi/ /'od la phyogs su lhung ma mchis/ /de nyid khyod kyis byis pa dang/ /mkhas pa dag la bstan pa'i
106a4(bstod tshogs): dpe/ gang tshe mgon khyod mdzad pa ni/ /thams cad gzhan don kho nar bas/ /dpag med phan pa mdzad pa po/ /khyod la lan cis lon par 'gyur/ /sems can dar par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /sgrub pa khyod la 'ga' mi mnga' / /khyod kyi dbugs phyung tsam yang ni/
106a5(bstod tshogs): 'gro la phan dang bde ba bskyed/ /sangs rgyas dbugs ni phyung pa'i ngang/ /dri kun zil gyis gnon mdzad pa/ /tshor na zhe 'gras gyur pa yang/ /khyod la dang pa bskyed par bgyid/ /sangs rgyas dbugs kyi ngad bab na/ /bag med pa yi lha rnams kyang/ /lha
106a6(bstod tshogs): yi yul yang spangs nas ni/ /'dul ba dag la mngon phyogs 'gyur/ /khyod las dam pa'i chos mnyan pas/ /thams cad tshim par 'gyur ma 'tshal/ /de slad dam pa'i don du na/ /khyod nyid ngoms 'gyur tshim mdzad lags/ /skye dgu rnams la char
106a7(bstod tshogs): bzhin du/ /khyod ni mkhas pa kun gyi gsos/ /'di ltar khyod kyi gsos 'gyur gang/ /de dang de ni mchis ma lags/ /dgrongs par 'tshal ba rnams la yang/ /khyod kyi phan dgongs ci 'dra ba/ /de blo ma sbyangs byis pa yis/ /yid ches bgyi
106b1(bstod tshogs): bar nus ma lags/ /khyod ni sdang ba rnams la yang/ /legs pa ci 'dra sgrub mdzad pa/ /sa de yid la smon pa'i yang/ /yul las 'das par gyur pa lags/ /la la phan 'dogs mdzad pa yi/ /ro mchog rtogs pa de dag kyang/ /khyod kyi chos kyi bgo skal la/ /spyod
106b2(bstod tshogs): par 'gyur pa'i gnyen lags so/ /gal te sems can 'di dag gis/ /khyed mnga' thugs rje'i dgongs pa 'tshal/ /khyod kyi bstan pas 'tsho bzhin du/ /kun tu 'bar ba'i mer yang 'jug /gang slad bdud kyi dgras thebs pas/ /rtogs par mi 'gyur de slad du//
106b3(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi bstan las 'gal bgyid pa'i/ /byis pa rnams ni bdag nyid 'gums/ khyod kyi bstan las gzhan phyogs pa/ /g.yang sa chen po'i mun pa dang/ /yongs su gdung ba myong ba rnams/ /kye ma yun ring 'khyams par 'gyur/ /khyod kyi chos la mi phyogs
106b4(bstod tshogs): pa'i/ /skye bo gti mug gis ljongs pa/ /srid rtse'i bar du son nas kyang/ /sdug bsngal yang 'byung srid pa sgrub/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i rjes 'gro ba/ /bsam gtan dngos gzhi ma thob kyang/ /bdud kyi mig ras btsa' bzhin du/ /srid pa dag ni zlog par bgyid/
106b5(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis dang por lta bu yi/ /bdud kyi me tog rgyal mtshan bsnyal/ /de nas nyon mongs bdud kyi ni/ /nga rgyal rgyal mtshan mthon po brtib/ /khyod kyis byang chub ma brnyes par/ /'dod khams dbang phyug las rgyal te/ /byang chub bar chad med lam la/ /
106b6(bstod tshogs): khams gsum dbang phyug las rgyal lo/ /dbang phyug khyod nyid 'jig rten 'dir/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' rab ste/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur skye bo la/ /dpa' ba' i rab tu gang zhig rtsi/ /khyod kyis rang gzhan gnyis ka yi/ /rgyun la nyon mongs sde btsam
106b7(bstod tshogs): pas/ /khyod las dpa' mchog gzhan dang ni/ /mi bzad g.yul rgyal gzhan ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las lan mi lon par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// //
107a1(bstod tshogs): spyan gyi yon tan mthon mthing dang/ /dkar gnag gsum po gang lags pa/ /de la gtsor bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /yon tan rnams kyis khyad mi khong/ /spros gong dpal gyis bla na med/ /'og ma dpal mnga' gnyis ka yang/ /'byung
107a2(bstod tshogs): dang 'byung ba las gyur pa'i/ /phun sum tshogs pa bla na med/ /de dag 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ /zla mthun 'ga' yang ma mchis pas/ /gong ma gang gis lhag gnas gyur/ /'og ma'ang gang gi gzhi bor 'gyur/ /khyod kyi sgros ni dpal gyi gnas//
107a3(bstod tshogs): phan tshun 'tsham par gyur pa 'di/ /e ma'o legs par zung du 'brel/ /e ma'o 'phrod pa bla na med/ /ston pa'i dus na g.yo 'gyur zhing/ /gsal ba nyid la g.yo mi mnga' / /tshems kyi zla ba shar ba'i dpal/ /nang nas bag tsam gda' 'gyur
107a4(bstod tshogs): pa/ /nyid kyi gnas nas 'byung ba'i sgra/ /me tog bzhin du 'grems mdzad cing/ /gzhan gyis nye bar bskyed rnams kyi/ /'gro ba'i lam la phan 'dogs pa/ /zangs zhun 'od 'dra 'di dag gi/ dpal 'bar 'di yi thad na ni/ /byin pa'i 'bras bu
107a5(bstod tshogs): mtshams sprin dang/ /utpal dmar mdzes ro dang 'dra/ /khyod kyi sgros ni mdzes bskyod pa/ /gang gis mthong ba de dag gis/ /legs par mig rnyed de dag gis/ /mthong ba'ang 'bras bu mchis pa lags/ /mgon po mu tig phreng bas min/ /kun
107a6(bstod tshogs): ta ku mu ta phreng min/ /gang can rtse mo sbrengs pa'i lus/ /zla ba'i 'od kyis bab pas min/ /ston ka'i chu bo sun 'byin pa/ /mkha' 'gro dkar po'i phreng bas min/ /sprin med mkha' la lhag ge ba/ /ston ka'i zla ba tshes bas min/ /dul ba khyod kyis tshems
107a7(bstod tshogs): rnams kyi/ /phreng ba 'od gsal dkar 'di la/ /mar me'i 'od kyis nyi 'od bzhin/ /cha shas su yang phod ma lags/ /rdo rje myu gu'i phreng ba la/ /'phags pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi'i ros/ /brlan pas bsgos pa 'di dang ni/ /'dra bar 'gyur ba'i dngos
107b1(bstod tshogs): ci mchis/ /ku mu da zla kun da sogs/ /dkar po'i dper brjod bzhi po dag /khyod kyi tshems phreng byung gyur nas/ /thabs ni shor ba lta dub gda' / /'jig rten du ni 'di byung bas/ /dkar po dang ni mdzes pa yi/ /rdzas rnams thams cad ma lus pa/ /dri ma can dang 'dra
107b2(bstod tshogs): bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi ljags dang sgres par na/ /'di dag thags bzang gnas pa ni/ /rtogs dang zhi ba'i bar dag na/ /rnam par grol ba bzhin du mdzes/ /khyod kyi dpal gyis 'gro ba 'di/ /tshems kyi phreng bas zil mnan par/ /gzigs nas rgyal bar gyur to
107b3(bstod tshogs): zhes/ /du mtshon lta bur mche ba sgreng/ /khyod kyi mche ba mnyam pa zlum/ /mdzes shing rtse mo rno dkar ba/ /dpe kun thabs kyis mnan nas ni/ /'bar ba bzhin du gnas pa lags/ /zla ba tshes pa 'jig rten na/ /yon bor gsal gyur gang lags te/ /
107b4(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi mche ba mi yo zhing/ /mdzes pa'i lus can rnams kyis bgyis/ /tshes pa'i gnas skabs mche ba yis/ /nya ba zhal ras bzang po yis/ /kham pa 'phral bas 'khyil pas ni/ /'dom gang 'od kyis zil mnan te/ /thub pa zla ba khyod kyi ni/ /
107b5(bstod tshogs): gzugs kyi yon tan phun tshogs bas/ /zla ba'i yon tan phun sum kun/ /gnas skabs kun du nyams par bgyi/ /bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi sku/ /gser gyi pad+ma'i snying po ltar/ /ba spu g.yas 'khyil nyag re ba/ /'jam la dri med gyen du
107b6(bstod tshogs): 'khrungs/ /snum la ma 'dzings ma 'khrugs pa/ /in+d+ra nI la'i rngams lta bur/ /sngon pos rin chen bskyil ba ni/ /phra mo lta bur spras par gda' / /skyes bu glang chen khyod kyi ni/ /glang po che mtshan ma 'dres gang/ /nang dang phyi yi dri ma yis/ /
107b7(bstod tshogs): shin tu nye bar ma gos gang/ /khyod kyi yan lag rgyan 'dra gang/ /yan lag mdzes pa de legs te/ /lhad med gser las blugs pa yi/ /khor yug lta bur gnas pa lags/ /rang gi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yi/ /cang shes gtso bo thams cad kyi/
108a1(bstod tshogs): skyes kyi mtshan ma mdzes pa dag /zil gyis mnan te gnas pa gang/ /mgon po tshangs spyod gnas slad dang/ /dbyibs kyang shin tu mdzes slad du/ /khyod kyis spa ba nyid lags shing/ /spa bar bgyi ba min pa'ang lags/ /thugs
108a2(bstod tshogs): rjes the tshom can rnams la/ /khyod kyis mtshan ma gzhan tshul gyis/ /sprin mthongs zla ba'i gzugs lta bur/ /shin tu lam mang bstan pa gang/ /ngo tsha shes dang khrel yod ri/ /mi g.yo bskyod pa ltar mdzad nas/ /thugs rje chen po'i mig gis ni/ /blo yi
108a3(bstod tshogs): yul du mdzad pa gang/ /dal gyis 'bab pa'i pad+ma ni/ /cung zad kha bye'i za ba'i tshogs/ /mgon po yan lag mdzes khyod kyi/ /mdzes pa de la des mi bskyod/ /dpal ldan zla ba nya ba la/ /'khyil bar gnas pa mchis na yang/ /'on kyang yan lag mchog khyod kyi/ /dpe yi gzhe bor
108a4(bstod tshogs): rdzogs mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams brgya phrag rgya chen gyi/ /las kyis sprul pa mdzes lam la/ /de las gzhan pa'i sems pa yis/ /'phangs pas yong yang rjes slabs sam/ /nyid kyi sbubs dang na bza' dang/ /sdom pas shin tu bkab kyang ni/ /mtshan gzhan phun sum tshogs
108a5(bstod tshogs): pa yis/ /gsal bar gyur pa lta bu lags/ /yan lag dam pa ldan khyod kyi/ /yan lag mchog gyur de la ni/ /mgos btud yid rab dang ba dang/ /ngag gis kyang ni mchod par bgyi/ /dad par bgyi ba rnams kyi mchog /blta bas mi ngoms khyod la ni/ /gal
108a6(bstod tshogs): te khong khro bgyid mchis na/ /mun nag tha shal ngan pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las sku'i phyogs gcig la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu pa'o/ //sems can
108a7(bstod tshogs): rnams kyi mos pa ni/ /khams rnams ji bzhin gnas lags pas/ /re zhig bdag gi bsam pa ni/ /yangs pa'i ljags la rgya cher dang/ /su zhig mgo dang yid dang ni/ /dag gis ljags yangs mchod mi bgyid/ /de ni gsung rab 'di kun gyi/ /yum ste rin
108b1(bstod tshogs): chen bskrun pa lags/ /bdag la gtso bo khyod kyi ni/ /mdzad pa bla med thams cad kyi/ /nang na yangs pa'i ljags 'di ni/ /bla na med pa'i phul du gda' / /'gro la bstan pa rab sgrogs pa/ /chos kyi phrin las mdzad slad du/ rgyal po bzhin du mtshan kun gyi/ /nang na gtso bo lags par
108b2(bstod tshogs): gnas/ /gzhan gyi the tshom bcad slad du/ /gang zhig zhal nas mngon byung na/ /ston gyi mtshams sprin tshogs lta bur/ /zhal ras zla ba khebs pa lags/ /de ltar yangs shing mdzes pa de/ /tshems kyis gtams pa'i zhal nang du/ /dogs pa med par gnas pa yang/ /
108b3(bstod tshogs): de las ya mtshan che ci mchis/ /de ni nges par dpag med pa'i/ /mthu can bzang po de yin ni/ /shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang ni/ /mnyen pa nyid kyi mthu lags so/ /khyod zhal 'brug sgra sgrogs pa na/ /'dzam bu'i chu gser zhun ma ltar/ /zangs bzhu ba yi 'od lta bu/ /glog phreng
108b4(bstod tshogs): 'gyur ba lta bur mdzad/ /bslab pa bzang po phun sum gyi/ /rgyal thabs lta bu brnyes nas ni/ /khyod kyi zhal nas bag yangs su/ /gnas gzhan dag tu rol zhing spyod/ /gang gi dri zhim tshor nas 'di/ /me tog bsung ba zhes sgrogs pa/ /gsung gi me tog skyon med pa/ /de dag
108b5(bstod tshogs): 'dis ni 'grems par mdzad/ /de nyid slad du rgyal khyod las/ /mchog tu bsnyan pa'i gsung snyan 'byung/ /de yi dri rab zhim pas khyod/ /snyan pa gsung zhes rnam par grags/ /gang gi mthu yis khyod 'dra ba/ /bdud rtsi stsol bar rab grags pa/ /gdams ngag
108b6(bstod tshogs): rjes su ston pa de/ /'di nyid la ni rag las so/ /gang gis lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de/ /nyid kyi 'o brgyal mi gzigs pa /dag pa 'di yis bgyis pa lags/ /gang gis rin chen bkram pa ltar/ /legs par bshad pa brgyas
108b7(bstod tshogs): bkang nas/ /'jig rten 'di ni snang bgyis pa/ /de ni 'di yi mthu lags so/ /rigs dang spyad par mngon brjod pa /chos kun gsung ba'i 'phags pa ste/ /dpag bsam ljon pa'i lcug ma ltar/ /rin chen sna tshogs 'bras bu stsol/ /ljags yangs med par
109a1(bstod tshogs): 'jig rten na/ /kun mkhyen nyid ldan spobs pa ni/ /so so yang dag rig pa yi/ /spobs pa'i khur ni su yis bkur/ /khyod kyis dgongs te de la ni/ /chos ni gang dang gang bshad pa/ /'di ni snyoms las mi mnga' bar/ /me tog bzhin du
109a2(bstod tshogs): phreng bar brgyud/ /gal te 'di yis ma bstan na/ /khyed la kun mkhyen mngar sus 'tshal/ /thugs rje chen po mnga' bar sus/ /yon tan gzhan yang mngar sus 'tshal/ /bstan pa dag ni ma mchis na/ /khyod 'dra'i mkhas pa mngon mi 'gyur/ /bstan
109a3(bstod tshogs): pa yang ni ljags yangs la/ /gzhung la dngos grub bzhin du brten/ /rnam pa sna tshogs chos gsung zhing/ /rnam pa sna tshogs ro bstar yang/ /'dam rdzab kyis ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /rol chags pas gos mi mnga' / /mi gsung bzhugs pa'i rjes su
109a4(bstod tshogs): mthun/ /gsung ba la yang skyon mi mnga' / /mi mthun chos ni gnyis ka la/ /gcig tu yang ni mthun pa lags/ /mi gsung bzhugs na spro mi mdzad/ /ston par mdzad la skyo mi mnga' / /cang mkhyen nyid kyis dge ba ste/ /thams cad la ni snyoms par
109a5(bstod tshogs): 'jug/ 'di ltar thams cad gsung spyod pa/ /chos rnams 'ba' zhig bka' stsol ba/ /spyod pa la ni 'jug pa mtshar/ /rigs pa la yang gzhol ba mtshar/ /'byung ba las gyur bsod nams dang/ /chos gsung ba yi rang bzhin gyis/ /sangs rgyas
109a6(bstod tshogs): pa yi dri zhim pa/ /gnyis kyis rtag tu bsgos pa lags/ /mig gi spyod yul dag pa dang/ /bsod nams snyan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /shin tu rnam par grags pa yi/ /snyan pa gnyis kyi phyogs su grags/ /gang gis skyon kun med pa 'di/ /zhal nas phyung
109a7(bstod tshogs): ba mthong gyur ba/ /skye bo de dag mig dang ldan/ /mig de dag kyang dpal dang ldan/ /gang gis de yi gsung snyan pa/ /mngon sum rna ba'i snyim pa yis/ /bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang 'dra 'thungs pa/ /mkhas pa de dag ches dpal ldan/ /sgra rnams brgyan par
109b1(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa bzhin/ /sgra yis sa rnams brgyan pa bzhin/ /bshad pa mdzad na khyod kyi zhal/ /shin tu sba bar mdzad pa bzhin/ /'di ni nyid mdzes yon tan gyis/ /thub pa khyod kyi zla zhal ni/ /'jig rten rgyan du gyur pa yang/ /lhag pa'i rgyan du gyur pa gda' / /'dog
109b2(bstod tshogs): dang dbyibs dang snyan gsung dang/ /shin tu 'jam pa nyid dang 'thus/ /ljags yangs lta bu gzugs can gyi/ /rdzas ni 'ga' yang ma mthong ngo/ /gal te lha mo dbyangs ldan ma/ /de ni gzugs can 'ga' mchis na/ /skyon kun med pa'i yan lag can/ /
109b3(bstod tshogs): ljags yangs 'di ni de lags grang/ yangs pa'i ljags kyis chos kyi rnga/ /kun tu rdung bar zhugs pa'i tshe/ /lha dang mi yi sgra rnams ni/ /thams cad ro bro med par 'gyur/ /ston pa khyod dang ljags 'di dang/ /bla na med pa'i bka' 'di ni/ nyon mongs
109b4(bstod tshogs): dug kun 'joms pa yi/ /yan lag gsum ldan sman gyi mchog /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las ljags la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //khyod dang 'dra ba'i
109b5(bstod tshogs): zhing dag ni/ /'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te/ /khyod ni sbyin gnas rnams kyi mchog /gral gtsang mdzad pa'i gtsang ma lags/ /nam mkha' mthar thug ma mchis pa'i/ /chu dang zhang dag ji lta bar/ /khyod la sman gnod bgyid pa yi/ /rnam
109b6(bstod tshogs): par smin pa thug ma mchis/ /gang dag khyod la bar mar gnas/ /de yang re zhig tshad med pa'i/ /mun pas bsgos pas ma rung na/ /skye bo log bgyid smos ci 'tshal/ /ji ltar bla med yon gyi gnas/ /khyod la yang dag sgrub bgyid pa/ las gang
109b7(bstod tshogs): lags pa de yi ni/ /dar ba'i mthar thug mi mthong la/ /yang dag sgrub pa'i mthar byon pa/ /khyod la log par zhugs pa gang/ /las de rgud pa'i mthar yang ni/ /de bzhin thug pa ma mchis so/ /gang gis rnam pa thams cad du/ /stobs ldan khyod la
110a1(bstod tshogs): ma btsas pa/ /rab tu mtshams ni mi zin pa'i/ /ma rabs mi rtag nyid reng na/ /kye ma'o 'khor ba bdag nyid ngan/ /e ma'o mya ngan 'das pa zhi/ /khyod 'dra'i thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /mnga' mchis pa'ang de ru gshegs/ /ma
110a2(bstod tshogs): 'ongs 'jigs pa rnams kyang gsungs/ /chos kyi tshul yang bshad pa mdzad/ /'khor ni rnam pa bzhi po yang/ /mi 'jigs pa dag thob par mdzad/ /lam bzang 'di ni bsrung slad du/ /blo gros sbyangs pa bgyis gyur pa/ /'od bsrungs che dang kun
110a3(bstod tshogs): dga' dang/ /de la sogs pa bskos mod kyis/ /'jig rten gyi ni mig gcig pu/ /dri ma med pa khyod zum na/ /snang ba mchis kyang 'jig rten 'di/ /mun pas khebs dang 'dra ba lags/ /bde bar gshegs pa bde gshegs kyi/ /bka' 'di
110a4(bstod tshogs): 'ang mchis la khyod kyi sras/ /sras kyi dam pa slob pa dang/ /mi slob 'di yang mchis mod kyi/ /'gro ba'i mgon khyod mi bzhugs na/ /gza' skar gsal bas mtshan pa yi/ /nam mkha' zla bas stong pa bzhin/ /shin tu brlag gis ma mchis
110a5(bstod tshogs): so/ /khyod mi bzhugs na gsung rab 'di/ /klu 'phos pa yi mtsho yi dpal/ /ring po mi thogs 'jig pa ltar/ /mtsham pa'i snying po dang bral bas/ /yon tan gzi yang mi dpa' la/ /cho ga gzhan dang lugs gzhan gyis/ /'phan dang
110a6(bstod tshogs): rma yang phyung lags pas/ /lus kyi brjid kyang yal du cha/ /sangs rgyas mnga' dbang bskur ba rnams/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das bsams na/ /srid pa ral gri 'bar 'dra la/ /su zhig 'jigs par mi bgyid lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom
