110a7(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las srid pa las skyo ba bskyed par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa
110b1(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba slob dpon mi tra tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sarbA dz+nyA de ba dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // */ /snyan ngag rtsom la
110b2(bstod tshogs): skal chen po/ /khyod la brten nas bdag gi blo/ /dbyar ka yi ni chu bo ltar/ /chung nguAng shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur/ /mi yi rnyed pa rnyed dka' dang/ /lce 'di rnyed par gyur nas ni/ /mgon de'i yon tan sgrogs byed pa'i/ /rang la phan pa su mi byed/ /khyod
110b3(bstod tshogs): sku mtshan gyis sbras gyur ba/ /mdzes gyur mig gi bdud rtsi ni/ /sprin med ston ka'i nam mkha' la/ /skar ma'i tshogs kyis spras pa 'dra/ /thub pa gser gyi mdog ldan pa/ /chos gos kyis g.yogs mdzes gyur pa/ /gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo ni/ /mtshams
110b4(bstod tshogs): kyi sprin gyis dkris pa 'dra/ /mgon khyod rgyan gyis ma brgyan yang/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor mdangs gang yin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas gyur pa/ /sprin dang bral la de ma mchis/ /khyod kyi zhal gyi pad+ma dang/ /pad+ma nyi mas kha phye ba/ /bung bas mthong
110b5(bstod tshogs): na pad+ma ni/ /the tshom dpyad thag la 'ju 'gyur/ /khyod zhal gser gyi mdog ldan par/ /tshems dkar mdzes par gyur pa ni/ /gser gyi rigs bston ka yi/ /zla zer dri med zhugs pa 'dra/ /mchod 'os khyod kyi phyag g.yas ni/ /'khor lo'i mtshan gyis
110b6(bstod tshogs): mdzes gyur pa/ /'khor bas skrag pa'i mi rnams la/ /phyag gis dbugs 'byin mdzad pa lags/ /thub khyod gshegs par gyur pa'i tshe/ /zhabs gnyis dpal gyi pad+ma 'dras/ /sa gzhi 'di ni bris gyur pa/ /pad+ma can gyis ji ltar mdzes/ /khyod ni gshegs
110b7(bstod tshogs): stabs mnyam med de/ /glang chen mchog ni myos pa dang/ /dad pa chung mar ldan pa 'am/ /khyu mchog pas kyang brtan par gshegs/ /tshul khrims phung pos sku che zhing/ /ting 'dzin shing gis rnam par brgyan/ /ye shes 'bab chus khyab gyur pa/ /
111a1(bstod tshogs): rgyu ba'i gangs can ri bo lags/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyod gang gi /sus kyi khyod la reg gyur ba/ /lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa'i/ /'bab stegs su ni de de mdzad/ /khyod kyi gnas ni grub pa'i zhing/ /mthong bas sems dag gyur lags na/ /dag
111a2(bstod tshogs): par 'dod pa'i mkhas pa rnams/ /sgra ngan zhing gis ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni pha rol phyin drug dang ldan pas yang dag mdzes gyur pa/ /zla ba rgyas par gyur pa ni/ /smin drug gis ni brgyan pa 'dra/ /gdul bya'i skye bo pad+ma ni/ /gnyid log khyod kyis sad mdzad pa/
111a3(bstod tshogs): nyi ma shar bar gyur pa yis/ /pad+ma kha byer byed pa 'dra/ /nyon mongs dug gis zin gyur la/ /khyod ni ye shes sman stsol ba/ /mche ba'i dug can gyis zin la/ /'gro skyob kyi ni dug gsal mtshungs/ /khyod kyi ye shes nags mi yis/ /lta ba'i dra ba
111a4(bstod tshogs): bsregs gyur pa/ /nags me shin tu 'bar ba yis/ /shing gi lcug phran bsregs dang mtshungs/ /ye shes rang bzhin 'bar ba yis/ /thub khyod nyi mas nyon mongs pa'i/ /rang bzhin 'dam ni skems mdzad pa/ /'di ni nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/
111a5(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gsung gis mi yi sems/ /bya ba ma yin las zlog pa/ /kha lo sgyur chen zhags pa yis/ /ba lang mi 'khrul zlog dang mtshungs/ /gal te re ba khyod gcig pu/ /nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol na/ /'on kyang gzhan dag grol mdzad
111a6(bstod tshogs): pas/ /phal cher mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur/ /khyod kyi gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /nyon mongs kyis gdungs tshim mdzad pa/ /so ga'i tsha bas gdungs pa la/ /mtshan mo'i zla zer ji bzhin no/ /gdul bya'i skye bo chos kyis ni/ /skom gdungs khyod zhal rtog pa
111a7(bstod tshogs): ni/ /khug rta skom gyis gdungs pa ni/ /dbyar gyi char sprin tshogs ltar mtshungs/ /khyod gsungs chos kyi sgra yis ni/ /gdul bya kun la dga' mdzad pa/ /snyan pa'i klu yi sgra yis ni/ /ri dags 'gro ba'ang sdod dang mtshungs/ /skyabs 'dod gang dag
111b1(bstod tshogs): skyabs 'os pa/ /khyod la skyabs su mi mchi ste/ /mu stegs la ni skyabs 'gro ba/ /skyabs med yun ring sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /brgya byin mig ni stong gis kyang/ /de nyid mthong bar ma gyur gang/ /khyod kyis ye shes spyan gyis de/ /gzigs shing gzhan la'ang/
111b2(bstod tshogs): ston par mdzad/ /bstan bcos des shes rlom pa can/ /rtsid ba smra ba mang po ni/ /khyod kyi gzigs pas zhum gyur cing/ /bung ba lta bur rnam par 'khor/ /khyod kyi gsung ni gcig tsam gyis/ /pha rol char gcod mdzad pa na/ /gzhan dag mi smra'i
111b3(bstod tshogs): tshul gnas pa/ /dgun gyi khu byug lta bu lags/ /khyod kyi slob ma bzang po'i shing/ /dge ba'i me tog ches rgyas pa/ /dpyid ka'i shing ni me tog gis/ /brgyan pa lta bur mdzes pa lags/ /thub pa khyod kyi blo gros mangs/ /shes bya'i 'ben ni phug gyur te/
111b4(bstod tshogs): dga' byed grong na gzhu rgyal gyis/ /sngon chad phug par ma gyur to/ /mkhas par rlom pa'i dregs pa can/ /khyod kyi thar lam ma 'tshal bas/ /srid pa'i dgon par 'khyams gyur pa/ /'brog stong dmus long tshogs dang mtshungs/ /las 'bras
111b5(bstod tshogs): yod dam med 'gyur zhes/ /'jig rten pa ni the tshom skyes/ /dge ba'i las kyi dbang por ni/ /gyur pa khyod sku 'di lags so/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyod yon tan/ /mthar thug bdag gis mi rtogs te/ /nam mkha' bai DUrya sngo mdog /bya yis mdza' rtogs mi
111b6(bstod tshogs): 'gyur mtshung/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags pa las dpe las bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o/ //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bsngags par 'os pa bsngags
111b7(bstod tshogs): pa zhes bya ba slob dpon ma tri tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// (//dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa bzhugs//)
112a1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ tri ratna maM sha la sto tra/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa rab tu dag pa'i gser zhun mdog 'dra 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can//
112a2(bstod tshogs): pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i spyan mnga' zhal ras zla 'dra dbu skra bud pa'i mdog lta bu/ /tshangs pa brgya byin ku be ra dang bdud kyi cod pan pad+ma'i zhabs gtugs pa/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma shin tu dri med dam chos 'od zer 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu che ba'i sangs rgyas nyi
112a3(bstod tshogs): ma rigs pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba de nyid las/ /dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer gang dag rnam par 'phros pas phyogs kun gsal mdzad cing/ /gang gis 'jig rten rgyun tu gnyid kyis log pa 'di dag yang dag sad mdzad pa/ /gang zhig rtogs pas thub rnams
112a4(bstod tshogs): zhi bar gshegs pa'i dam chos de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag nyid kyis rgyas mdzad grags pa gang/ /thos pa'i rdzing bu tshul khrims dri zhim byang chub yan lag rnams kyi sdong bu mdzes/ /bsam gtan gzugs
112a5(bstod tshogs): med dag gi chu bsil rnam dag mya ngan 'das pa'i snying po bzang/ /sa steng dge 'dun pad+ma'i tshal rgyas dag la gus pas legs par mchod phyag 'tshal/ /dkon mchog gsum la bkra shis kyi bstod pa slob dpon ma ti tsi Tas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
112a6(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi dyA ka ra saM ha pra b+ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bande dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // */ (/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan pa bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ saM myaksaM
112a7(bstod tshogs): bud+d+hA ya ka ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mtshan la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha dang lha min rnams kyis rgya cher mchod gyur cing/ /bcom ldan mdzes pa yid 'od mdza' yas dang ldan
112b1(bstod tshogs): pa'i/ /zas gtsang rigs rnams kyi ni rgyan gyi mchog gyur ba/ /gangs ri lta bur rgya cher mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig khu byug bung ba sngon po lta bur 'jam gnag 'khyil zhing mdzes pa'i dbu/ /gser gyi ri ngos tsam pa ka dang ldong ros lta bur dpral ba dri ma
112b2(bstod tshogs): med/ /gangs dngul ku mu da dang pad rtsa mu tig zla 'od las lhag mdzod spu dkar/ /btso ma gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'phyang zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i snyan/ /in+d+ra nI la bud ba sprin nag dang 'dra smin ma dri med 'jam/ /shangs kyi gzengs mtho rab mdzes smin ma
112b3(bstod tshogs): rgyas pa lta bur mkhur tshes dmar/ /mchu ni bim pa gzhon zhing 'gram pa seng ge dang 'dra ko ko'i dkyil 'khor mdzes/ /mnyam zhing thags bzang tshems mnga' utpal rgyas pa'i 'dab ltar dkyus ring gnyen pa'i ljags/ /dad pa khu byug ka la bidka lta bur
112b4(bstod tshogs): yid du 'ong ba'i gsung/ /lha rnga mchog dang 'brug dang tshangs dbyangs lta bur snyan cing dri ma med pa'i dbyangs/ /zlum rgyas mgur ni dung 'dra yangs shing dkyus ring rgyas pa'i thal gong mtho/ /gser sbyangs dang 'dra gser gyi ri ngos mtshungs shing phrag gong dri ma med/
112b5(bstod tshogs): sum cu gsum dbang glang po'i sna 'dra btso ma gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i phyag /mdzes par 'khyil zhing bkra shis lcags kyo nya dang 'khor lo dag gis phyag mthil mtshan/ /bung ba'i lus dang khu byug mdog 'dra ba spu re re g.yas su 'khyil/ /gser gyi ri rtser
112b6(bstod tshogs): pad+ma rA ga'i myu gu mthon pas khyab dang 'dra ba yi/ /mchog gi rab mchog pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i dbus na lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil/ /'doms kyi sba pa sbugs nub pus mo'i lha nga'i dkyil 'khor 'bar 'bur med cing mnyam/ /gser gyi chu shing 'dzam bu
112b7(bstod tshogs): na da dang ni gser gyi ta la 'dra ba'i brla/ /legs skyes rim gyis phra zhing seng ge dang ni ri dags lta bur rje ngar zlum/ /dad pa'i rgyal po lta bur mnyam la dra bas 'brel zhing rab tu mdzes pa'i zhabs/ /dal zhing brtan la mi g.yo seng ge dang ni glang po'i
113a1(bstod tshogs): stobs su mdzes par gshegs/ /ngos dmar mtshams kyi nyi ma dmar bas khyab pa lta bur 'od zer rnam par 'phro/ /gser dang nor bu chu shel lta bur mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i sku/ /dri med nyi ma dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bcom ldan g.yas
113a2(bstod tshogs): phyogs gshegs pa'i sku/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang ba'i zhabs brtan yang dag brtson 'grus mdzes pa'i snam logs can/ /bcom ldan seng ge lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang pos mchod byas zhabs/ /bdud kyi bu mo zur mig lta bas gang gi ting 'dzin mi g.yo
113a3(bstod tshogs): mi ltar brtan/ /dpa' bo'i mtshon gyis mi bsnyil cod pan gyis btud dbang chen rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das la bdag gis mngon par bstod pa bgyis pa las/ /bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de yis 'gro kun
113a4(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas myur grub shog /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la bstod pa/ snyan ngag mkhan chen po slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/gcig 'phros bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad
113a5(bstod tshogs): du/ e kot+ta ri ka sto traM/ bod skad du/ gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos gcig la ni mngon dgyes shing/ /rtag tu gcig tu bzhugs pa dang/ /'jig rten rnams kyi mig gcig
113a6(bstod tshogs): 'gyur/ /'jig rten gnyen gcig phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog gyur cing/ /bden pa gnyis ni rnam par bsgom/ /grogs gnyis pa ni mi mnga' ba/ /gnyis med gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ting 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa
113a7(bstod tshogs): dang/ /dkon mchog gsum dang cha mnyam pa/ /sdug bsngal gsum gyi chu las rgal/ /'jig rten gsum sogs phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstan pa rnam pa bzhi po dang/ /bsam gtan bzhi po'i rnam pa can/ /sbyor ba pa dang rnam bral ba/ /bden
113b1(bstod tshogs): bzhi mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po lnga yi chags bral zhing/ /dbang po lnga ni rnam sgom la/ /yan lag lnga dang rnam bral ba/ /'gro lnga gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang drug chu bo las brgal cing/ /rgyun drug las ni rnam par gnas/ /pha rol phyin drug
113b2(bstod tshogs): yongs su rdzogs/ /mngon shes drug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun gsol ba po/ /yan lag bdun dang rnam bral ba/ /srid bdun gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yan lag brgyad lam las byung ba'i/ /gang
113b3(bstod tshogs): zag brgyad ni ston mdzad cing/ /'jig rten chos brgyad spangs pa'o/ /mi khom brgyad 'joms phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dgu'i chags las rnam grol zhing/ /khong khro dgu ni rnam spangs la/ /shin tu sbyangs pa dgu brnyes pa/ /sa dgu mkhyen la phyag
113b4(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun bcu chos can/ /sgrib pa bcu ni gcod par mdzad/ /'phags pa'i gnas bcu la dgyes pa/ /stobs bcu ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar 'phags pa stobs bcu ldan la tshigs gis mchod pa'i phyir/ /bstod pas
113b5(bstod tshogs): bdag gis deng ni dge ba gang thob pa/ /des 'dir dmyal dang yi dags dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis khyab pa'i/ /'gro ba srid pa rgya mtsho rnams las rgal ba'i don gyur cig /gcig las 'phros pa'i bstod pa/ /slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
113b6(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harma sh+rI bat+ta dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa// // */ (/bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta pany+tsa tri ratna nA ma ma la sto traM/ bod skad du/
113b7(bstod tshogs): bde bar gshegs pa sum cu so lnga'i bstod pa/ /mtshan rin po ches spras pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyob pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu skyabs
114a1(bstod tshogs): su mchi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis gdul dka' ba/ /snyigs ma lnga yi rtsod dus 'dir/ /brtson 'grus brtan pos sangs rgyas pa/ /shAkya thub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /snying po byang chub mchog bsnyes
114a2(bstod tshogs): pa/ /bdud dpung rdo rje snying po yis/ /rab tu 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen sku las 'od 'phros pas/ /ngan song sdug bsngal zhi mdzad cing/ /bdud rnams rnam par skrag mdzad pa/ /rin chen 'od 'phro phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar klu chen dpa' 
114a3(bstod tshogs): bo yis/ /gling rnams char gyis tshim byed ltar/ /stong gsum chos kyi char 'bebs pa/ /klu dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis bstan pa 'dis/ /bdud dang mu stegs skrag mdzad cing/ /gdul bya kun mkhyen 'god mdzad pa/
114a4(bstod tshogs): dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes gzhan don rab bsgoms pas/ /nyid kyi sku srog gtong ba la/ /mgu ba po ltar rab bgyes pa/ /dpal dgyes la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /mkhas pa rnams la don snang mdzad/ /bar ma'i rgyud rnams smin
114a5(bstod tshogs): mdzad cing/ /tha ma'i nyon mongs bsreg mdzad pa/ /rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun dang skal ba mnyam/ /mchog tu shes rab snang ba yis/ /phyogs rnams snang bar mdzad de 'khrungs/ /rin chen zla 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku
114a6(bstod tshogs): ni blta bas mi ngoms shing/ /'dom gang 'od kyis sa le yang/ /gang gis khyod mthong skal ldan pas/ /mthong ba don yod phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku gsung thugs ni rin chen mchog /dri med spros bral sangs rgyas pas/ /'gro kun nyon
114a7(bstod tshogs): mongs gdung ba sel/ /rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam chos dri ma med pa'i chus/ /thog mar bdag nyid dag mdzad nas/ /gzhan dag mchog tu dag mdzad pa/ /dri med dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams byas pa'i tshogs dag ni/
114b1(bstod tshogs): sems can kun la yongs bsngo bar/ /thub pa khyod kyis ston mdzad pa/ /dpal sbyin la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rigs dang zhabs su ldan pa po/ /tshangs pa lags par bram ze bzhed/ /rig gsang zhabs ldan khyod mnga' ba/ /tshangs pa'i mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/
114b2(bstod tshogs): tshangs pa'i zhabs bzhir rab sgoms shing/ /tshangs spyod 'bras bu mchog bsnyes pa/ /tshangs pas 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /tshangs pa sbyin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dag /yang dag blangs pa gtsang mar mdzad/ /
114b3(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs sdig pa 'khru mdzad pa/ /chu yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten pa dag bde byed mchod/ /bde byed klu chen ma dros mchod/ /chu lha des kyang khyod mchod pas/ /chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dren pa kun gyi mchog gyur cing//
114b4(bstod tshogs): khyod ni mtshungs med rab zhi bas/ /'gro ba kun gyi dpal mdzad pa/ /dpal bzang la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod la rgol ba'i nyon mongs pa/ /do gal byed pa thams cad kyang/ /tsan dan spangs pa ltar bsil mdzad/ /tsan dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/
114b5(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba'i dpal dang gzi brjid ni/ /sus kyang 'gran par mi bzod de/ /mig gis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /gzi brjid mdza' yas phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i 'od zer rab byung bas/ /nga rgyal khengs pa zhi mdzad cing/ /dman rnams spro ba
114b6(bstod tshogs): bskyed par mdzad/ /'od dpal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma mya ngan 'das la zhi/ /khyod 'dra thugs rje'i bdag nyid can/ /mnga' brnyes pa yang bde gshegs pas/ /mya ngan med dpal la phyag 'tshal/ /sred pa med pa goms mdzad
114b7(bstod tshogs): cing/ /'dren pa kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /stobs chen thams cad zil gnon pas/ /sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pas/ /mdzes pa gzhan kun zil gyis gnon/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rab rgyas pa/ /me tog
115a1(bstod tshogs): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang 'od zer gyis/ /'jig rten thams cad khyab mdzad pa/ /tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol/ /mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od kyis gang la reg pa yang/ /chags
115a2(bstod tshogs): med bde ba rab rgyas pa/ /pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol/ /mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i bsod nams 'od zer gyis/ /'gro rnams zang zing tshim mdzad pa/ /khyad par 'phags pa'i nor sbyin pas/ /nor dpal la yang phyag
115a3(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /dran pa rnams la mnga' brnyes pas/ /thog ma med cing rab mkhyen pa/ /gang gis khyod dran 'phongs sel bas/ /dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /snyan pa'i ba dan sa gsum grags/ /yon tan grangs
115a4(bstod tshogs): med mtshan gyi dpal/ /shin tu yongs grags phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs dang dbang po mchog brnyes pas/ /nag po'i phyogs rnams pham mdzad de/ /dbang po'i spyis btud dbang po'i tog /rgyal mtshan rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos por grags
115a5(bstod tshogs): pa'i rtog ge la/ /phra zhib ye shes rdo rje yis/ /seng ges glang po ji bzhin du/ /shin tu rnam gnon phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag gzhan nyon mongs sde bcom pas/ /khyed la dpal mchog gzhan man chis/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug g.yul las rgyal/ /
115a6(bstod tshogs): shin tu rnam rgyal phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgrod pa cig pu'i lam chen du/ /'gro kun ded dpon rab mdzad de/ /bdud dang ngan song 'jigs las sgrol/ /rnam par gnon gshegs phyag 'tshal lo/ /thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul rmad byung bas/ /sprul pa
115a7(bstod tshogs): bye ba dpag med 'gyed/ /gdul bya kun la snang gyur pas/ /kun snang bkod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu stegs thar pa phyir bzlog cing/ /nyan thos zhi ba phyogs gcig la/ /khyod kyis sras mchog rin chen rnams/ /pad+ma ltar smin phyag 'tshal lo/
115b1(bstod tshogs): bsod nams tshogs las rin po che/ /ye shes tshogs rdzogs pad+ma'i gdan/ /sku gsum lhun grub rab tu bzhugs/ /ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i mtshan/ /rin chen spras pa'i bstod pa 'di brjod pas/ /thub
115b2(bstod tshogs): pa'i dbang po'i spyod pa ci 'dra ba/ /bdag gi spyod kyang de dang 'dra bar shog /bde bar gshegs pa sum cu rtsa lnga'i bstod pa mtshan rin po ches smras pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma
115b3(bstod tshogs): ka ra warmma dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // */ (/tshigs su bcad pa brgyad pa'i bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ pa darb+hya aSh+Ta ka sto traM/ /bod skad du/ tshigs su bcad pa
115b4(bstod tshogs): brgyad pa'i bstod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla rgyas zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan/ /seng ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stabs 'dra zhing/ /ri dbang ltar brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs/ /lha dbang bla ma'i thub dbang phyag
115b5(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan/ /gnod sbyin klu yi mig 'dras gzigs mdzad cing/ /thar pa thob mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring ba/ /spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mchog du ma'i yan lag mchog gis btud/ /
115b6(bstod tshogs): gtso ma'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku/ /mtshan bzang mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku/ /bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros yangs shing gser ltar dri ma med/ /blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan/ /sangs
115b7(bstod tshogs): rgyas mkha' ltar dri med spyan mnga' ba/ /dpa' bo mi g.yo'i blo mnga' de la 'dud/ /smra ba'i mchog 'gyur snyan pa'i don gsung ba/ /yang dag don gsungs 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing/ /smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bas mi bskyod gsung/ /bden
116a1(bstod tshogs): zhig gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan du mi 'dul 'dul ba'i don tu btul/ /nyon mongs spong sogs rnam par dag pas 'dul/ /thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs 'dul mdzad/ /snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan
116a2(bstod tshogs): mgon la 'dud/ /bsod nams dpag med bsags pas sku mdzes la/ /'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sku/ /gser sbyangs btso ma lta bur dri med sku/ /srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor lo mtshan zhabs rab mchog ldan
116a3(bstod tshogs): pa'i zhabs/ /lha dbang spyi bos legs par btud pa'i zhabs/ /zhabs sor dra bas legs brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs/ /dpal be'u g.yung drung gi ni zhabs la 'dud/ /tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mdza' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
116a4(bstod tshogs): */ (/dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/) /rgya gar skad du/ tri ratna sto tra/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyob pa chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsum la rtag tu
116a5(bstod tshogs): bdag phyag 'tshal/ /tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub/ /rnam rtog mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen/ /chos sku mkha' 'dra gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan/ /sangs rgyas dpag bsam 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos nyid rgyu mthun
116a6(bstod tshogs): gsung rab bcu gnyis dang/ /chos la skye 'gag med cing spros la dben/ /de la dmigs te yon tan kun grub pa/ /legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyon mongs sgribs dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag /gnyen pos rim par
116a7(bstod tshogs): bsal nas sangs rgyas sar bzhugs pa/ /sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing sbyong ba'i/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa/ /slob dpon chen po ma ti tsi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
116b1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ tri ratna sto stra b+hi ti/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa gsum gyi bla ma dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ni 'gro ba rnams kyi mngon
116b2(bstod tshogs): par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mdza' dag bskyed pa'i rgyu yin pas na de'i phyir de dag la phyag 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas gtso la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ /ma 'dres pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ma rig pa dag ma lus par spangs pa ni sangs pa ste/
116b3(bstod tshogs): gnyid rab tu sangs pa bzhin no/ /yang na nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa spangs pas shes bya mdza' dag la blo rgyas pas rgyas pa ste/ pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa lta bu'o/ /de ltar de dag ni spangs pa dang/ /ye shes phun sum tshogs pas bstod pa ste/ nyid kyi
116b4(bstod tshogs): don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang du byas te/ gtso zhes smos pa las sa gsum dbang phyug chen por gyur pas na gtso bo ste/ de dag ma lus pa gnon pas lci bar gyur pa ni/ gzugs la la lci bar gyur pa ni srang gi
116b5(bstod tshogs): mgo mnon pa lta bu'o/ /des ni thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'dul zhes bstan par 'gyur ro/ /yang na phyin ci ma log pa'i yon tan rin po che sbyin pas na bla ma ste/ de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni sgo gsum gyis rab tu 'dud pa'o/ /skyob pa chos la
116b6(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ 'dis ngan 'gro dang srid par sdug bsngal ba las skyob cing sdug bsngal sel la bde ba sbyin pas na skyob pa zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyis na chos te rnam par ltung ba las 'dzin pas so/ /de yang gang gis don dam pa'i chos de rtogs
116b7(bstod tshogs): nas/ slar ngan song dang 'khor bar mi ltung ba'i phyir ro/ /de rtogs pa'i rgyud pa'i rgyu ni bstan pa'i chos yin la/ dngos kyi rgyu ni lam gyi chos yin pas de dag la'ang btags te 'dzin pa zhes brjod do/ /yang na skyob pa zhes bya bas ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa phun
117a1(bstod tshogs): sum tshogs pa bstan la/ chos zhes bya bas ni rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa 'dzin pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /dge 'dun che la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba la/ 'di dag ni
117a2(bstod tshogs): lha'i bu'i bdud dag gis kyang ston pa dang lta ba mi phyed pas na dge 'dun te/ de la ston pa mi phyed pa ni shes nas dad pa thob pas so/ /lta ba mi phyed pa ni bdag med pa'i ye shes rnam par dge ba thob pa'i phyir ro/ /de yang nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba dang/ byang chub sems
117a3(bstod tshogs): dpa' yang rung ste/ kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pa'i 'phags pa rnams ni slob pa dang/ mi slob pa yang rung ste/ dge 'dun no/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni shes bya'i sgrib pa mdza' dag kyang spangs la/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs mdza' dag kyang rdzogs
117a4(bstod tshogs): pas/ dge 'dun gyi nang du drang bar bya ba ma yin la/ /sa gsum gyi 'gro ba dam pa dang/ slob pa dang mi slob pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pas dgra bcom pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ltar mi phyed pa ni rang gi don thob pa yin la/ gzhan gyi don thob par byed
117a5(bstod tshogs): pa'i phyir na che zhes smos te/ 'di dag gzhan gyi yon sbyong ba che bas na chen po ste/ phul ba dang yongs su longs spyad pa gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams mchog 'phel ba'i phyir te/ de yang slob pa dang mi slob pa de dag ci rigs par sred pas cha shas
117a6(bstod tshogs): lhag ma lus pas zas dang gos la sogs pa la 'dun pa'i 'dod chags phra mo bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yod pa dang/ sngon gyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu phung po lnga 'dzin pa zas la sogs pas da dung gso dgos pas longs spyod kyi/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos
117a7(bstod tshogs): ni de ltar ma yin pas so/ /de dag la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma dang 'dra'o/ /gsum la rtag tu bdag phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bya ba ni don go sla'o/ /de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzang po thams cad kyi gtso bo spyi
117b1(bstod tshogs): gtsug ltar mi mthong ba 'thob pa'o/ /rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'khor bar skyes pa na mgo bo gdugs lta bur 'gyur ba dang/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba'o/ /dbang gi 'bras bu ni phyi rol gyi dngos po yid du 'ong ba rnams de'i shes pa'i
117b2(bstod tshogs): yul du 'dud pa ltar snang zhing 'gyed pa dang/ gzung du mi rung ba ltar snang bar mi 'gyur ba'o/ /de ltar dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa mdor gsungs pa de dag rab tu gsal bar bstan pas 'gro ba dam pa rnams de bas kyang shas cher dad par byas pa dang/ rang gi
117b3(bstod tshogs): tshogs dri ma med pa bsags pa'i phyir/ slob dpon ma ti tsi tra'i zhal snga nas bstod pa rgyas pa gsungs pa/ tshogs chen gnyis rdzogs mkhyen bzhi sku gsum grub/ ces bya ba la sogs pa brjod pa yin te/ 'dis rdzogs par byed pas na tshogs de sbyin pa la sogs
117b4(bstod tshogs): pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug go /de bdag nyid chen po ste rang bzhin dpag tu med pa dang/ bskal pa dpag tu med pa dang/ yul dpag tu med pa la sogs pa'o/ /gnyis zhes bya ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes so/ /de yang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa ni
117b5(bstod tshogs): bsod nams te/ bsam gtan dang shes rab ni ye shes so/ /brtson 'grus ni gnyi gar gtogs so zhes 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las gsungs so/ /de gnyis rdzogs pa ni bskal pa chen po grangs med par dang po sbyor ba'i lam sbyangs shing/
117b6(bstod tshogs): gnyis par sa bdun pa'i bar dang/ gsum par sa bcu pa'i bar sbyangs shing dag par byas pa ni/ rdzogs shing mthar thug pa'o/ /des rgyu khyad par can bsags pa bstan nas/ da ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/ /mkhyen
117b7(bstod tshogs): pa bzhi ni me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa bzhi 'o/ /de la me long lta bu'i ye shes ni kun bzhi rnam shes gnas gyur pa/ shes bya thams cad la sogs pa med pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas
118a1(bstod tshogs): gyur pa/ bdag med pa las bdag med par mkhyen pa'i ye shes so/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa kun rdzob kyi dngos po ma lus pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar ma 'brel bar mkhyen pa'o/ /bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes
118a2(bstod tshogs): ni sgo lnga rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa 'gro ba rnams gdul pa'i bya ba gang yin pa ma lus par mdzod mkhyen pa'o/ /de dag bsdus pa ni sku gsum grub ces bya bas bstan te/ de yang bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni gzugs sku gnyis 'grub
118a3(bstod tshogs): la/ /ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i 'bras bus ni chos kyi sku 'grub bo/ /de la me lta bu'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku ste/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las grol la rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba tsam gyi ye shes so/ /de'i chos te stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa
118a4(bstod tshogs): sogs pa ye shes tha dad pa du ma tshogs pas na chos kyi sku zhes bya ba ni/ /ka ya'i sgra tshogs la 'jug pas so/ /ye shes de yang dngos su na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so/ /so sor rtog pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni
118a5(bstod tshogs): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste/ de yang sku de'i nang gi ye shes skye mched tha dad pa la rag las pa las grol ba kun rdzob sna tshogs mkhyen pa dang/ bdag med pa la bdag med par mkhyen pa rnam par dag pa'o/ /bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni sprul pa'i sku ste
118a6(bstod tshogs): longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i skye mched tha dad pa las skye ba 'od zer gyi rnam par snang bas 'dod pa'i khams la sogs par/ /shAkya thub pa la sogs pa'i skur snang bas gang 'dul bar 'os pa 'dul ba'o/ /de nas 'dir sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku thams cad
118a7(bstod tshogs): kyi gzhi ni rnam par smin pa'i sku ste/ de'i me tog pa'i ye shes dang sgo lnga'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi snang ba las chos dang sprul pa'i skur bzhag cing de gnyis kyi rten ye shes gnyis dang bcas pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes brjod do/ /yod
118b1(bstod tshogs): ni bsod nams kyi tshogs mdza' yas pa las grub pa'i lus khyad par can dang/ de'i 'od zer gzugs khyad par can snang ba'i gzugs kyi sku gnyis te/ gang mig gi yul du gyur pa de nyid gzugs so/ /rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i snang ba'i ye shes ni
118b2(bstod tshogs): gtso bo ste/ sna tshogs shes pa dang bdag med par shes pa yang ye shes kyi tshogs las byung bar brjod par bya'o/ /de las gzhan pa bdag med pa tsam de ni dam pa'i chos dkon mchog du bzhag gis sangs rgyas su mi bzhag ste/ de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi
118b3(bstod tshogs): ye shes kyi yul yin la/ thob par bya ba'i 'bras bur bzhag par bya'o/ /des na rang gi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i sku ni gsum kho nar brjod par bya'o/ /nga ni sku gsum po de dag nyid las dpe dang mtshan nyid kyis gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam rtog
118b4(bstod tshogs): mi mnga' ci yang sa le mkhyen ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs gsum 'am/ bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir rnam rtog mi mnga' ba ste/ gnyis su 'dzin pa mdza' dag drungs nas phyung ba'i ye shes chen po'o/ /de'i phyir mi mnga' zhes
118b5(bstod tshogs): bya ba'i dgag pa 'di ni ma yin par dgag pa ste/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs de dag ni yod pa ma yin la/ des dben pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni mnga' ba'o/ /des na ci'ang ste ci'ang rung rdul phra rab dang ri rab la sogs pa de dag sa le
118b6(bstod tshogs): zhes bya ba rab tu gsal bar mkhyen cing ba ste/ ci ltar mkhyen ce na/ sgra spyi'i rnam par rtog pas sgro btags pa dang/ bskur ba btab pa dang/ bral zhing phan tshun mi sgrib pa thogs pa med cing mun pa med la shel dang lhang chor ltar gsal ba'i rnam
118b7(bstod tshogs): par dbyer med pa mkhyen te/ de nyid ye shes de'i las yin no/ /de'i dpe bstan pa ni chos sku mkha' 'dra zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus ma byas nam mkha' thogs pa med cing mi sgrib pa ltar me long lta bu'i ye shes kyang shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med cing
119a1(bstod tshogs): sgrib pa med la/ dmigs pa dang rnam par yongs su ma chad par snang ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to/ /'dir ye shes lhag ma gsum ni gzugs la sogs pa dang/ gang zag la bdag med pa tsam dang/ 'dul ba'i 'gro ba'i bsam
119a2(bstod tshogs): pa dang/ bag la nyal la thogs pa dang/ 'dul ba'i thabs shes pa la yul so sor nges pa'i ye shes yin la/ ye shes 'di ni yul de dag dang bcas pa'i ye shes de dag nyid kyang chos can du gyur pa dang/ de'i chos nyid la rang bzhin gyis 'od
119a3(bstod tshogs): gsal ba'i spyi'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba ste/ chos can dang chos nyid du bcas pa mdza' dag mkhyen par gyur pa'o/ /gzugs sku mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni mtshan dang dpe byad rab tu 'bar ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang/ sprul pa'i sku'o/ /sangs
119a4(bstod tshogs): rgyas kyi don ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no/ /dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dpe ste/ 'gro ba rnams kyis dpag shing bsam pa ltar yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na/ lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing chen po rnam pa bzhi po
119a5(bstod tshogs): dang 'dra ba ste/ bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod ring ga la byung zhes bstod pa lta bu'o/ /de yang sku de dag gsum char yang sngon gyi smon lam gyi sa bon dpag tu med pa 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa sngon ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin da
119a6(bstod tshogs): lta gdul bya'i don la 'bad pa med par 'byung ba yin la khyad par du gzugs kyi sku ni thogs pa med par byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyi tshe ba'i gang zag dang/ 'gro ba yongs su smin par byed pa la song bas su yang 'jug go /kha cig na re gzugs
119a7(bstod tshogs): sku zhes bya ba ni spyir bstan pa ste/ mdzes skur ldan zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/ /dpag bsam 'dra zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku'o/ /sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ni sku gsum char gyi dbang du byas pa'o zhes zer ro/ /de lta bu'i sku gsum po de
119b1(bstod tshogs): dag la lus zhing gi rdul snyed du mos pa'i sprul te/ phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ tshig gi don sngar ji lta ba bzhin no/ /chos nyid rgyu mthun gsung rab bcu gnyis dang zhes bya ba ste/ bstan pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos nyid zhes bya ba la chos nyid bdag rnam pa
119b2(bstod tshogs): gnyis kyis stong pa nyid do/ /bdag med pa dang/ bdag dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba spyi'i mtshan nyid don dam pa'i bden pa'i ngo bo'o/ /de'i rgyu mthun pa ni bstan pa'i chos bdag med pa dang/ /bstan pa'i gsung rab te/ /'dir
119b3(bstod tshogs): mthun pa'i rgyu ni rgyu mthun pa ste/ bskyed par rung ba dang thob par nus pa'o/ /de la bskyed par rung ba ni rgyu des phyin ci ma log par yongs su grub pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'o/ /thob par nus pa'i ni ye shes de skyes pas mi 'gyur bar yongs su grub pa de bzhin nyid
119b4(bstod tshogs): de thob par nus pa'o/ /de dag ni rab tu phul du byung ba'i gsung yin pas gsung rab ste/ phyi rol pa'i tshig la ni snga ma lta bu'i rung ba dang nus pa med pas rab ma yin no/ /bcu gnyis ni mdo'i sde dang/ dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang/ lung du bstan pa dang/
119b5(bstod tshogs): tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng gzhi'i dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ de lta bu byung ba dang/ skyes pa rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa dang/ rmad du byung ba dang/ gtan la phab pa'i sde zhes bya ste/ de dag dang po ni ston pa'i zhal nas
119b6(bstod tshogs): grog go /de'i 'og tu gang zag gi blo la gnas pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu glegs bam du bris ba'o/ /de yang dang po de la dmigs nas thos pa dang/ shes rab skye zhing de nas sgoms pas chos nyid de thos pas mthun pa'i rgyu brgyud pa nyid du nges pa'o/ /de bas na slob dpon
119b7(bstod tshogs): ba su ban dus bshad pa/ ston pa'i zhal nas byung ba skye bo'i mig ni zhi bar mdzad pa bkra shis kyis/ /'byung gnas sems la zhog cig gang phyir 'di ni lus can rnams kyi rna ba'i bdud rtsi de/ nyon mongs pa yi dug kun sel bar mdzad pa yin pas de'i
120a1(bstod tshogs): don yang dag bsam par gyis/ rgyu 'di rnams kyis rtag tu gus par sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung dag mnyam pa'i rigs zhes so/ /chos la skye 'gag med cing spros la dben/ de la dmigs te yon tan kun sgrub pa/ zhes bya ba ni don dam
120a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i chos la bstod pa ste/ chos la don dam pa'i chos so/ /de la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa med cing gzhan yang spros pa ste/ rtag pa dang chad pa dang/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang/ gcig dang tha dad pa'i spros pa de dag las dben pa'o/ /de yang
120a3(bstod tshogs): don dam pa'i chos ni bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yin la/ spros pa de dag ni bdag tu 'dzin pa'i dbang gis btags pa tsam du zad pas na bdag tu 'dzin pa log ma thag tu de dag kyang ldog la/ bdag med pa'i ngang la de dag dang po nas kyang med kyi btags
120a4(bstod tshogs): pa glo bur bar zad pas so/ /de ltar spros pa dang bral ba bdag med pa la bdag med par shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis dmigs pas/ bdag tu 'dzin pa log pas de ma thag tu 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yon tan 'phags pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa du ma dang/ stobs
120a5(bstod tshogs): dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan kun grub pas na/ 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams ni 'dus ma byas las rab tu byung ba lta bu'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/ /legs rgyu dam pa'i chos la zhes bya ba ni lam gyi chos kyi bstod pa ste/ de la
120a6(bstod tshogs): legs pa ni nges par legs pa ste/ nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba'o/ /de'i rgyu ni skyes par byed pa ste/ des bdag med pa'i ye shes bskyed la nges kyang nges par legs pa de 'thob pas so/ /'dir zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i sngon du rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge
120a7(bstod tshogs): 'dzin skyes pa des ni legs rgyu'i mthar thug pa yin la/ des mjug brtul ba mthong ba'i lam gyi bar gyi legs rgyur rigs par bya'o/ /de nyid dam pa ste/ 'phags pa rnams kyis nyams su myong bar gyur pa dang/ ltung ba las bdag tu 'dzin
120b1(bstod tshogs): des na dam pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no/ /nyon mongs sgrib dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ /gnyen pos rim par bsal nas sngar zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bstod pa ste/ de la sems kun nas
120b2(bstod tshogs): nyon mongs par byed pas nyon mongs pa ste/ 'dod chags la sogs pa drug go /de dag nyid sgribs te zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa'i ye shes la sgrib pa dang mthong ba'i gegs byed pas so/ /shes bya ni chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/
120b3(bstod tshogs): des sgrib pa ni brjod par byed pa sgra'i spyi la yod par 'dzin pa ste/ dngos su gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ji snyed pa'o/ /sgrib pa de gnyi ga yang rab tu dbye ba mang po dang ldan pas na mang po'i tshig can no/ /gnyen pos zhes bya ba ni bdag med shes
120b4(bstod tshogs): pa'i ye shes so/ /rim par bsal nas zhes bya ba ni de dag cig car mi spong gi dang po mthong bas spong la de'i 'og tu sgom pas spang par bya ba spong ba'i phyir ro/ /de las 'bras bu 'thob pa bstan pa/ sar zhugs pa zhes bya ba ste/ sa ni 'jig rten las
120b5(bstod tshogs): 'das pa'i sa ste/ brgyad pa dang/ mthong ba dang/ bsrabs pa dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang byas pa rtogs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la zhugs pa dang/ yang rab tu dga' ba dang/ bri ma med pa dang/ chos kyi sprin gyi bar la zhugs
120b6(bstod tshogs): pa'o/ /'dir bden pa bzhi'i rnam pa bcu drug dag yid la byed pas ye shes kyi skad cig bcu drug gis phra rgyas brgyad cu rtsa brgyad spangs pas mthong ba'i lam la brgyad pa'am/ rab tu dga' ba'i sa pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu tshul de nyid kyis bsgom
120b7(bstod tshogs): pas spang bar bya ba bcu spangs pa las ni nyan thos dang/ rang rgyal ba'i lhag ma dag bzhag pa ste/ rnam pa gsum pa'i bar dang/ 'dod pa'i rnam pa drug pa dang/ dgu pa dang/ srid rtse'i dgu pa zad pa las mthong ba dang/ bsrangs pa dang/
121a1(bstod tshogs): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa pa'o/ /cig car kho nar spang ba dang/ lam rdzogs pa ni bse ru lta bu'i sa pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sa lhag ma rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa las rnam par bzhag par
121a2(bstod tshogs): rig par bya zhing/ de dag nyid nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa sgom pas spang bar bya ba ni/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis cig car spong la shes bya'i sgrib pa ni sa re re la yang rim gyis spong ngo/ /la la ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yang sa re re la rim gyis spong ste/ spong byed ni chos la
121a3(bstod tshogs): bdag med pa'i ye shes kyis zhes zer ro/ /de ltar ye shes kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan nas/ /da ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la gnas pa bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can don mdzad sangs rgyas zhing spyod ba zhes smos te/ sems can rnams kyi don ni dgongs pa
121a4(bstod tshogs): ste/ bde ba dang phan pa'o/ /de dag mdzad pa ni bsdu ba'i dngos po dang tshad med pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis ji ltar nus par byed pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing ni snod dang bcud do/ /de dag sbyong ba ni rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs pa ltar te/ sems can
121a5(bstod tshogs): gos ngan pa dag mthong na/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni sems can rnams lus gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o/ /me tog 'bul na bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dus thams cad pa'i me tog rab tu rgyas par
121a6(bstod tshogs): gyur cig ces smon lam gdab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/ /mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni smon lam gyi mthus sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun che la zhes bya ba ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las ring du song bas na 'phags pa ste/
121a7(bstod tshogs): dge 'dun ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no/ /che ba ni grangs dang yon tan gyis che ba ste/ grags pa mdza' yas pa dang/ legs par zhugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan chen po mnga' ba'i phyir ro/ /phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa dang bcas pa'i yul
121b1(bstod tshogs): gyi yan lag thams cad rab tu 'dud pa'o/ /de ltar yon tan mdza' dag ma lus pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal nas/ de dag la skyabs su song na/ ngan song rnams su mi skye bar lha'i nang du skye ste/ gsum pa skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ngan
121b2(bstod tshogs): 'gro las yang dag par 'da' ba' o zhes gsungs pa dang/ 'di ltar shin tu dad pa'i sems de la yid zhugs pa gzhan du ma yengs pa'i yid gsal bas/ sangs rgyas sam/ chos sam/ dge 'dun la skyabs su song na de 'chi ba'i dus byas na bde 'gro
121b3(bstod tshogs): ? ris kyi 'jig rten zur na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni der shin tu dad pa'i sems de skyabs su song ba'i rgyus skye bar 'gyur ro/ /der skyes nas kyang de'i lus gzi brjid dang ldan zhing rang gi lus rang gi 'od kyis brgyan la bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/
121b4(bstod tshogs): gal te phyag 'tshal ba dang skyabs su song ba'i dge ba de yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan na ni ji ltar bsngos pa'i thar pa'i rgyur 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// //de ltar nyes pa kun spangs shing/ /yon tan mdza' yas gtar gyur pa/ /dkon
121b5(bstod tshogs): mchog gsum po'i bstod pa'i tshig /cung zad bshad pas dge ba'i tshogs/ /gang rnams de yis 'gro ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas par shog /dkon mchog gsum la bstod pa'i 'grel ba/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
121b6(bstod tshogs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na shan+ti dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bande dpal gyi lhun po'i sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ tri ratna sto tra/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/
121b7(bstod tshogs): dmigs med chos kyi sku/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ /cir yang sprul sku la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam dag chos kyi dbyings/ /sgrub pa'i 'phags lam brgyad/ /ston pa'i gsung rab la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems rnams
122a1(bstod tshogs): dang/ /dgra bcom dag la sogs/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams la/ /gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa/ /slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// (//brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba bram ze  
122a2(bstod tshogs): rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ sha ta pany+tsA sha ti ka nA ma sya sto tra/ bod skad du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/ /gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing/ /gang
122a3(bstod tshogs): la'ang rnam pa thams cad du/ /yon tan thams cad gnas gyur ba/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing/ /de bstod de ni bkur ba dang/ /de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang
122a4(bstod tshogs): nyams mi mnga' / /nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang/ /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga' / /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ /gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la/ /zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang/ /chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing
122a5(bstod tshogs): bu ga ru/ /rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar/ /dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i/ /mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brel zhing/ /las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ /bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go /snying po ci phyir blang mi bya/ /de
122a6(bstod tshogs): ltar thub pa'i yon tan gyi/ /yul lta grangs med shes mod kyi/ /rang gi don la gus pa yis/ /de yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod/ /gang gi yon tan grangs dag dang/ /mthu la thug pa ma mchis la/ /rmad byung phrin las dpag med can/ /rang  
122a7(bstod tshogs): byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di snyed bgyi ba'i mdza' med na/ /'di ltar lags zhes ci zhig smos/ /khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag /bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes/ /bstod pa gleng bslang ba ste le'u dang po'o// //
122b1(bstod tshogs): spyod dam mi spyod snyam pa yi/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam spangs nas/ /'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes/ /khyod ni ma bcol legs mdzad pa/ /khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams/ /khyod ni ma drin mdza' bshes te/ /'brel
122b2(bstod tshogs): ba med pa'i bsnyen 'dun lags/ /nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na/ /dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal/ /legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni/ /slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btad/ /nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis/ /lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyi/ /
122b3(bstod tshogs): lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /lan brgya phrag tu blu ba mdzad/ /ngan 'gros bsnyengs slang ma lags la/ /bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags/ /dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis tshul khrims goms par mdzad/ /rtag tu gya gyu rnams
122b4(bstod tshogs): spangs shing/ /drang bstan rnams ni rtag bsten pas/ /yongs su dag pa'i las rnams kyis/ /khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur/ /sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba na/ /khyed kyis dge ba'i thugs kyis ni/ /nyon mongs rnams la sran btsugs nas/ /
122b5(bstod tshogs): skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse/ /khyod kyis gzhan gyi don slad du/ /sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang/ /de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las/ /bsos pa rnams la'ang 'byung ma gyur/ /khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par/ /gtubs kyang sdug
122b6(bstod tshogs): bsngal mi dgongs par/ /bshed ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang/ /gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang/ /khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te/ /dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen/ /de gzhan skye bos 'o la mi mchis
122b7(bstod tshogs): dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par/ /go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces/ /de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par/ /khyod kyi brtson 'grus legs par spel/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung/ /de slad khyod kyi khyad
123a1(bstod tshogs): par rnams/ /thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis/ /thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi/ /shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags/ /gzhan dang thun mong ma lags pa'i
123a2(bstod tshogs): bde ba gang de gya nom yang/ /dam pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dra la/ /gnod par bas kyi sman ma mchis/ /'dres pa las ni legs bshad nyid/ /snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig /khyod kyis kun bzhes thugs la bzhag /nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs/
123a3(bstod tshogs): rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis/ /legs bshad srog gis 'jal ba na/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan/ /de slad grangs med gsum dag tu/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na/ /brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grogs gyur  
123a4(bstod tshogs): pas/ /go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes/ /rgyu la bstod pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing/ /dma' la rngan chan mi mdzad la/ /mnyam la 'gran pa mi mnga' bas/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor
123a5(bstod tshogs): gyur/ /khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams la/ /mngon bgyis 'bras bu rnams la min/ /yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis/ /khyod kyi yon tan pha mthar phyin/ /ji ltar khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang/ /bsod nams skye ba mched 'gyur ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis
123a6(bstod tshogs): legs spyad pas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad/ /nyes pa nyams smad rtsa nas bton/ /yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs/ /gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod/ /grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa lags/ /ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de/ /
123a7(bstod tshogs): bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ /ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang/ /'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas/ /bdag nyid la ni yon tan
123b1(bstod tshogs): bsgrubs/ /'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun/ /gegs 'gyid pa dang sgrib pa can/ /re zhig ba dang nyi tshe ba/ /shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags/ /khyod kyi yon tan bla med la/ /gegs bgyid ma mchis rtogs ma mchis/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas/ /dpe lta mchis
123b2(bstod tshogs): par ga la 'gyur/ /gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dgyel/ /gting dang pha rol med brtags na/ /rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni/ /gnag rjes lta bur se ler gda' / /chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod pa/ /khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsams na/ /sa yi brtan pa nyid kyang ni/ /
123b3(bstod tshogs): shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung/ /thub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi/ /snang bas mi shes rab rib dag /'joms pa'i thad na nyi ma yang/ /me khyer tsam duAng mi spyod do/ /khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams/ /dag pa'i gnan ston zla dang/ /chu dang nam mkha' i
123b4(bstod tshogs): dag pa rnams/ /dri ma can ni lta bur gda' / /'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung/ /thams cad bsngos na'ang der bas te/ /nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor/ /rin chen chos gang brnyes nas khyod/ /
123b5(bstod tshogs): mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang/ /khyod du bsgrun zhing de dag ni/ /khyod dang bsgrun ldom kho nar bas/ /gang la spyi tsam bstun nas ni/ /cung zad brjod par bgyid pa de/ /smra ba po yi rang dga' dang/ /thabs dang gcam bu tsam du bas/ /dpe med pa la
123b6(bstod tshogs): bstod pa ste le'u gsum pa'o// //khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang/ /bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams na/ /chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo/ /sdang bas rgol bar rtsol byed pa/ /mang po'ang gzhon
123b7(bstod tshogs): par bya ba ni/ /khyad par gnas la brten pa yi/ /bzod pa'i tshegs su mtshar mi che/ /gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba/ /de yi nub mo kho na la/ /nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa/ /de nyid rmad du byung ba lags/ /'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i//
124a1(bstod tshogs): nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis mu stegs las/ /rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar/ /'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang/ /zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can/ /gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste/
124a2(bstod tshogs): gsum pos rtag tu gsum dag btul/ /dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang/ /dam chos ma lags smos mdzad kyang/ /dam pa dag dang tha ma la/ /khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga' / /dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/ /rjes su chags dang khong khro bar/ /khyod
124a3(bstod tshogs): kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur na/ /khyod la bstod du ci zhig mchis/ /yon tan rnams la'ang ma chags la/ /yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga' / /kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni/ /rab dang yongs su dag pa lags/ /dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba/ /dus rnams
124a4(bstod tshogs): rtag tu mi nyams pas/ /khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag /mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda' / /rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang/ /mdzad spyod bzang bos bsgrags pas na/ /khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag /rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags/
124a5(bstod tshogs): rmad du byung ba'i bstod pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong/ /'bar la gnod pa mdzad mi mnga' / /dul la rngom brjid che ba yis/ /sku 'dis su zhig dad mi mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku de gang gis ni/ /lan brgyar
124a6(bstod tshogs): mthong dang gang zhig gis/ /dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka /'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir/ /blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin bas/ /mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing/ /dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags/ /rten gyi yon
124a7(bstod tshogs): tan dag dang ni/ /rten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du/ /'tsham pas khyod gyi sku dang ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bar ba/ /khyod kyi sku las ma gtogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di/ /
124b1(bstod tshogs): gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur/ /khyod sku rten pa'i yon tan la/ /da dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar/ /de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar/ /des legs bkod ces gsung ba 'dra/ /sku la bstod pa ste le'u lnga pa'o// //
124b2(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /khyod med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag /dgrol slad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams/ /dang por khyod la phyag bgyi 'am/ /'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod/ /skyon mkhyen yun ring
124b3(bstod tshogs): de lta bur/ /bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi/ /dben pa'i bde ba spangs gyur khyod/ /mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang/ /de khyod thugs rjes dus 'das pa/ /glags shig thod nas bgyis par bas/ /rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas/ /klu bzhin
124b4(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi thugs rje yis/ /dgon pa'i zhi gnas grong gi mthar/ /gdul ba'i don gyi slad du drangs/ /nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du/ /thugs rje gtso dang ldan pas na/ /rol mo mkhan gyi sgyu rtsal yang/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar mdzad/ /
124b5(bstod tshogs): rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni/ /nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang/ /de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi thugs rjes bstan pa lags/ /gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi /nyid kyi don la brtse med pas/ /mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la/ /thugs rjes thugs
124b6(bstod tshogs): rje mdzad ma gyur/ /'di ltar res 'ga' brtan pas gang/ /gzhan don bsgrub pa mdzad slad du/ /khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu/ /gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags/ /de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang/ /nongs pa can du mi rtsibs/ /khyod kyi  
124b7(bstod tshogs): bzhed pa kho na dang/ /mthun 'jug pa ni legs par gda' / /thugs la bstod pa ste le'u drug pa'o// //tshig bzang ba dang don che dang/ /bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang/ /zab gsal gnyis ka'i don ldan dang/ /bsdus dang
125a1(bstod tshogs): spros pa dang ldan pa/ /khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu/ /khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang/ /thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes/ /su zhig nges pa skye mi 'gyur/ /mang po ril gyi snyan ma lags/ /bcos ma 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags/ /khyod
125a2(bstod tshogs): kyi gsung don grub pas kyang/ /thams cad legs gsungs kho na lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na/ /gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang/ /gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag /thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i//
125a3(bstod tshogs): 'phrin las rnam kyang rab tu bzo/ /de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi/ /snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so/ /khyod zhal blta na rab sdug pa/ /de las mnyan na snyan pa yi/ /gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las/ /bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bzhin du gda' / /khyod kyi gsung ni
125a4(bstod tshogs): 'dod chags kyi/ /rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra/ /zhe sdang sbrul ni gdon pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba lags/ /yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra/ /nga rgyal ri bo mngon 'joms pas/ /brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra
125a5(bstod tshogs): ba lags/ /don gzigs pas na mi bslu ba/ /nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun/ /legs par sbyar bas go sla ste/ /khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan/ /re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung/ /nyan pa rnams kyi yid 'phrog mdzad/ /de nas yid la bsam
125a6(bstod tshogs): bgyis na/ /rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel/ /phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin zhing/ /bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad/ /bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas/ /khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug /mkhas pa rnams kyi dga' ba bskyed/ /bar ma
125a7(bstod tshogs): rnams kyi blo yang spel/ /tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas/ /gsung 'di skye bo kun la sman/ /lta ba dag las dgar mdzad cing/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /nyes pa sel mdzad khyod kyi gsung/ /yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs/ /kun
125b1(bstod tshogs): la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing/ /dgongs pa'ang kun tu nyer gnas pas/ /de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun/ /thams cad la yang bslu mi mnga' / /gang slad yul min dus min dang/ /snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa/ /de slad khyod gsung don mchis te/ /brtson
125b2(bstod tshogs): 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin/ /bsung la bstod pa ste le'u bdun pa'o/ //bgrod pa gcig dang thabs bde dang/ /legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas/ /khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med/ /
125b3(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu/ /gcig pu phangs la lta chags pas/ /byis pa gal te smod bgyid na/ /lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis/ /gzhan ni 'gro ba'i don slad du/ /sdug bsngal mang bstar gang lags pa/ /de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang/ /gnas
125b4(bstod tshogs): par bgyi ba la thug na/ /phan pa gsung zhing phan mdzad pa/ /khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te/ /mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas kyang/ /ci yi slad du sgrub mi bgyid/ /khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang/ /byang chub bde dang zhi ba dang/ /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa
125b5(bstod tshogs): dang/ /legs pa bzhi po 'di kun 'thob/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi bstan pa 'di/ /mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la/ /bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing/ /lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin/ /'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi/ /sa chen dag na
125b6(bstod tshogs): spyod bgyid pa/ /mi thogs zlog pa ma mchis pa 'ang/ /khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis gnan/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba/ /dga' na bskal par yang gnas la/ /gang du bdud kyis mi brdzi ba/ /der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi/ /lung
125b7(bstod tshogs): go don ni bsam pa dang/ /bsgom dang gus par mnyan pa yi/ /dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni/ /bstan las gzhan la mchis ma lags/ /drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan/ /de ltar legs pas khyab 'di la/ /ma gus gang lags de las ni/ /
126a1(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis/ /bstan pa la bstod pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o// //khyod thos pas ni spro ba skye/ /mthong bas dad pa skye bar 'gyur/ /khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te/ /bstan pas rnam par
126a2(bstod tshogs): srol bar mdzad/ /khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur/ /'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga' / /gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ldog pa na ni rgud par 'gyur/ /bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad/ /khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur/ /btsal bas  
126a3(bstod tshogs): blo gros skye 'gyur te/ /yongs su shes pas rnam par bdag /khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed/ /bsten pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur/ /bsten na 'jigs pa med par mdzad/ /bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pas
126a4(bstod tshogs): dag /bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang/ /shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs pas/ /khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags/ /khyod sku ltar 'os rin chen te/ /legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags/ /chos ni sbyang 'os rin chen pas/ /
126a5(bstod tshogs): khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags/ /khyod ni chu bos 'das pa'i gling/ /smas pa'o bdag nyid skyob pa ste/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs/ /thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags/ /tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog /zhing gshin 'bras
126a6(bstod tshogs): bu phun sum tshogs/ /srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir/ /grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so/ /phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdza' bshes te/ /'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug /zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong/ /yon tan kun mnga' mchod
126a7(bstod tshogs): 'os khyod/ /sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad/ /sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad/ /don kun 'grub phyir dpal yangs te/ /yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags/ /smon lam la bstod pa ste le'u dgu pa'o// //khyod ni
126b1(bstod tshogs): rtan then bgyid la skul /chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod/ /gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god/ /dal bus bgyid la gzhen skul 'debs/ /dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyor/ /dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad/ /de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi/ /kha lo sgyur ba bla med mchog /khyod
126b2(bstod tshogs): ni nyan thag rnams la brtse/ /bde bar gnas la phan par bgyes/ /phongs par gnas la thugs rje bas/ /kun la phan par bzhed pa lags/ /khyod ni dgra bo rnams la'ang byams/ /nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas//
126b3(bstod tshogs): khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags/ /phan 'dogs bgyid slad pa ma dag /gal te bla mar 'tshal nag go /khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas/ /bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal/ /rang gi don la mi lta bas/ /nyid kyi dgra bo ltar gyur cing/ /g.yang sa'i mun na gnas
126b4(bstod tshogs): rnams la/ /rab lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod/ /'jig rten gnyis kar sman gdags dang/ /'jig rten las ni 'da' slad du/ /mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ /khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad/ /yul la nye bar spyod pa na/ /lha ma'i spyod pa tha dad kyang/ /chos
126b5(bstod tshogs): kyi longs spyod thun mong bas/ /khyod la dbye ba mi mnga' o/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang/ /na tshod rigs dang yul dang ni/ /dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyis/ /'di dag kun la sman yon btags/ /khyod kyi nyan thos srid bral zhing/ /ya mtshan 'dzin pa med
126b6(bstod tshogs): rnams la'ang/ /lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing/ /ya mtshan che ba lta bur mchod/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi/ /nyid khur gyur pa byung ba brjid/ /des na mi yang lha rnams kyis/ /smon par bya ba nyid du gyur/ /lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa
126b7(bstod tshogs): ste le'u bcu pa'o// //mnyel dang zhi bde nyams gyur dang/ /skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang/ /mi mthun pa dang mang po yi/ /skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing/ /'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i/ /thugs kyis brtsod
127a1(bstod tshogs): pa mdzad pa gang/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do/ /bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing/ /res 'ga' bsnyung ba dag kyang mdzad/ /nyam nga'i shul duAng gshegs mdzad cing/ /rang rong can
127a2(bstod tshogs): duAng mnal ba mdzad/ /mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang/ /gdul bya rnams la byams slad du/ /sku ngas rdo dang gcam tshul dang/ /skad dang cha lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad/ /kun gyis dga' mgur rang don phyir/ /bran bzhin bskor bar bsgrims pa las//
127a3(bstod tshogs): mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/ /mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ khyod la gang dang gang du yang/ /ji skad bskul yang mi spong ste/ /nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las/ /'da' bar 'gyur pa ma mchis so/ /ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la/ /phan pa lhur
127a4(bstod tshogs): mdzad de lta bur/ /skye bo dag ni phan bgyid pa'ang/ /phan pa de ltar lhung mi bgyid/ /khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la/ /phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te/ /rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la/ /yon tan 'ba' zhig go tshal ba lags/ /khyod ni gang na dug bcas
127a5(bstod tshogs): shing/ /zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa/ /dor ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang/ /khyod la bdud rtsi can du gyur/ /bzod pas mi snyan brjod pa dang/ /'khu bdag ni bde legs kyis/ /mi snyan smra la bden pas te/ /khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas btul
127a6(bstod tshogs): thog ma med dus goms pa yi/ /mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang/ /khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas/ /skad cig nyid la yongs su bsgyur/ /bka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o/ //rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang/ /
127a7(bstod tshogs): 'jungs pa rnams ni gtong phod dang/ /gtum pa nges par bgyis pa gang/ /de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas lags/ /dga' bo'i dbang po nyer zhi dang/ /nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang/ /sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi bgyis na/ /su zhig ngo mtshar bskyed mi bgyid/ /
127b1(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi chos kyi 'os tshim pas/ /gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas/ /don mang nyid pa'i gnas mal du/ /stan rnams bsod nams nyal bar bgyid/ /khyod kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas/ /res 'ga' zhus na'ang mi gsung la/ /spros gyur gzhan la bstan
127b2(bstod tshogs): pa dang/ /drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ /dri med gos mtshon bzhin du/ /thog mar sbyin sogs gtam ngag gis/ /sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni/ /phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni/ /'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du/ /
127b3(bstod tshogs): ? gang zhig ma stsal ba'i/ /thabs dang spyod pa de ma mchis/ /sku yi cha lugs rnam mang dang/ /gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du/ /gdul bya'i bsam pa tha dad pa/ /de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad/ /de dag kun kyang dag pa dang/ /mi 'gal ba dang  
127b4(bstod tshogs): ? ? dang/ /brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni/ /sman 'dogs bkur ba sha stag lags/ /smra dang bgyid ba phal cher ni/ /legs par rdo thog ma lags kyi/ /bden par gsung ba khyod la ni/ /de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags/ /bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' 
127b5(bstod tshogs): zhig bas/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad/ /'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing/ /'jig rten gsum na mchis ma lags/ /thog med srid pa nyam pa bar/ /snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ khyod ni de ltar brtson
127b6(bstod tshogs): pa lags/ /mkhas pa la bstod pa ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //gang gis khyod drin lan lon pa'i/ /sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid de/ /skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das/ /de dag gis kyang lan ma lon/ /khyod kyi chos
127b7(bstod tshogs): la gnas de dag /rang don kho na bgyid par bas/ /de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang/ /de la lan go ci zhig lon/ /khyod ni sems can gnyid log pa'i/ /rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs tse ba/ /bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni/ /grogs bzang bag dang bcas
128a1(bstod tshogs): pa lags/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad/ /bdud kyi g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod/ /'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /phan dgongs thugs rje can gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la
128a2(bstod tshogs): bgyi 'tshal ba/ /gang zhig khyod kyis ma 'tshal ba/ /gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye/ /gal te chos ni 'di dag dang/ /spo ba zhig tu btub na ni/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni/ /lhas byin la brten kun la'ang stsol/ /de slad 'gro la brda' sprod pa/ /
128a3(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba'i mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /'di na phan tshun byed pa po/ /med pa skad du nges par gsungs/ /'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /yun rings sa steng dam chos bshad/ /'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i/ /slob ma dam pa'ang mang du
128a4(bstod tshogs): bskrun/ /mngon du gdul bya'i tshogs kyang ni/ /mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas/ /de ko khyod la sems can gyi/ /bu lon lhag ma ci mchis na/ /'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas/ /'jug tu 'ang khyod kyis
128a5(bstod tshogs): shin tu ni/ /dka' spyad yal bar mdor ro/ /gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag /gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes/ /'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la/ /khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /de slad chos sku ma lus pa/ /sras kyi mchog la gtang mdzad de/ /
128a6(bstod tshogs): gzugs sku til 'bru ltar bshig nas/ /khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /e ma'o gnas pa e ma'o tshul/ /e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni tshes rnams la/ /ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis/ /phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug /
128a7(bstod tshogs): sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa/ /khyod la'ang sdang bar rab bgyid pa'i/ /rmongs pa mi bzad pa la gzigs/ /bsod nams rgya mtsho rin chen gter/ /yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs/ /khyod la sems can gang 'dud pa/ /de dag la yang
128b1(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lags/ /mgon khyod yon tan mi bas kyang/ /bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas/ /des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du/ /glo nga la ni gcags bzhin mchis/ /khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab/ /bstan min grangs kyang
128b2(bstod tshogs): ma mchis pa/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags grang/ /mtsho chen chang ni bas par ma gyur kyang/ /skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ /khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma sgrags kyang/ /bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis/ /bdag gis thub la dad
128b3(bstod tshogs): pas spobs skyes pa'i/ /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis/ /ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas dkrugs pa yi/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog /bu lon med par bstod pa ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o/ //
128b4(bstod tshogs): brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa slob dpon mkhas pa chen po bram ze rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI sh+rad+d+hA ka ra warmma dang/ lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyi bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
128b5(bstod tshogs): */ (/brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel ba 'jugs pa lags//) //rgya gar skad du/ sha ta pany+tsa sha ta nA ma sya sto tra TI ka/ bod skad du/ brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spel mar bstod
128b6(bstod tshogs): pa phyogs glang pos/ /zab mo nye bar bshad pa ni/ /brgya ni lnga bcu pa yi don/ /rmad byung de las rnam shes nas/ /rgyal ba la ni gus pa yi/ /dga' byed snyan pa'i dge slong gis/ /de yi phyogs la dad pa yi/ /rnam par dbye ba rab tu bya/ /de
128b7(bstod tshogs): la 'dir brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa re zhig dang por gleng ba dang/ rgyu dang/ 'bras bu dang/ sman 'dogs pa'i sgo nas bstod pa dang bcu gsum du rab tu bstan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gleng bslang ba'i bstod pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu thun mong ma
129a1(bstod tshogs): yin pa'i phyir gcig du byas nas rgyu la bstod pa'o/ /'bras bu la bstod pa ni dpe med pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum ste/ /dpe med pa la bstod pa dang/ rmad du byung ba la bstod pa dang/ sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba'o/ /sman 'dogs
129a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i bstod pa ni snying rje la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa brgyad de/ thugs rje la bstod pa dang/ gsung la bstod pa dang/ bstan pa la bstod pa dang/ smon lam la bstod pa dang/ lam la 'jug pa la bstod pa dang/ dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa dang/ mkhas
129a3(bstod tshogs): par bstod pa dang/ bu lon med pa la bstod pa zhes bya'o/ /de rnams kyi bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dag ni/ /gleng bslang bstod dang rgyu la ni/ /rnam drug 'bras bu dpe med dang/ /rmad du byung dang de bzhin sku/ /sman 'dogs rnam brgyad de yang ni/ /thugs
129a4(bstod tshogs): rje gsung dang bstan pa dang/ /smon lam dang ni lam 'jug dang/ /dka' mdzad nyid dang mkhas pa dang/ /bu lon med dang bcu gsum mo/ /bstod pa bcu gsum po de rnams kyi re re'i bshad pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni phyis bshad par bya'o/ /de la gleng bslang ba
129a5(bstod tshogs): zhes pa ni dang por brtsam pa'o/ /gleng bslang ba der don gang dang gang gis bshad pa zhes bya ba bstan pa dang/ rgyu la bstod pa la sogs pa rnams la yang tshigs su bcad pa gang gis don gang bshad pa de yang rab tu bshad par bya'o/ /re zhig gleng bslang
129a6(bstod tshogs): pa'i bstod pa'i tshig gi don ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyu nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyes pa ma lus pa zad pa rjes su dpag pa dang/ yon tan ma lus pa mi shes
129a7(bstod tshogs): pas kyang bcom ldan 'das la yon tan gyi phyogs gcig tsam gyis bstod pa dang phyag 'tshal ba'i yon tan gyi tshogs tsam bshad pa zhes bya ba'o/ /'dir yang bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ni/ /ston la skyabs 'gro sogs mchod 'os/ /
129b1(bstod tshogs): nyes pa med pa rjes su dpag /yon tan mdza' yas kyang ni chas/ /bstod pa 'dir ni phyag 'tshal phyogs/ /de la gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa gnyis brtsam par bya ste/ gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/
129b2(bstod tshogs): gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing/ /gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du/ /yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing/ /de bstod de ni bkur ba dang/ /de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /gang zhig
129b3(bstod tshogs): la na nyes pa kun/ /zhes smos pa la/ de nyid la ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig dang sbyar ro/ /gang zhig ces bya ba ni thun mong gi sgra yin yang don gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kho na la 'jug go /gang gi phyir nyes pa thams cad zad pa dang
129b4(bstod tshogs): yon tan ma lus pa dang ldan pa ni gzhan med pa de'i phyir 'di ltar bshad de thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga' / /nyes pa bag chags bcad de yang/ /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga' / /zhes bya'o/ /nyes pa zhes bya ba
129b5(bstod tshogs): ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste/ nyes pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /yang na lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud la nyes pa byed pa ni snod ma yin par byed pa zhes bya bas na nyes pa'o/ /mi mnga' zhes bya ba ni mi mnga' ba de/ skyon du gyur pa ma brnyes pa'i phyir ro/
129b6(bstod tshogs): yong ye zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas ngo mtshar ba gsal bar byed pa'o/ /yang na tshig kha bskang ba'i phyir tshig gi phrad do/ /gang zhig la nyes pa mi mnga' ba de skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa zhes bya'o/ /phyi rol
129b7(bstod tshogs): gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ /slob pa rnams la nyes pa med pa'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir 'dir bshad de/ thams cad ces bya ba ni ma lus pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /
130a1(bstod tshogs): gal te phyi rol gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba de rnams kyi nyes pa med na yang de bzhin du srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyes pa nges par ma spangs pa'i phyir dang/ slob pa po rnams kyi yang ji lta bar sbyor bas khams gsum dang/ gnyis dang/ gcig gi
130a2(bstod tshogs): thob pa'i bsgom pas/ spangs par bya ba rnams ma spangs pa'i phyir ro/ /dgra bcom pa rnams la yang khams gsum gyi nyes pa med na de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes pas na/ /bshad pa/ gtan nas zhes bya ba
130a3(bstod tshogs): ni dus thams cad du'o zhes bya ba'o/ /don gang yin zhe na/ gal te dgra bcom pa rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad med mod kyi gtan nas med pa ni ma yin te/ yongs su spangs pa'i dus su yod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyis yongs su ma spangs pa'i
130a4(bstod tshogs): chos can yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyes pa thams cad gtan nas med pas de la yang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bas na de rnams las kyang khyad par du bya ba'i phyir/ bshad pa/ rnam
130a5(bstod tshogs): pa thams cad ces bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gang gi phyir de rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa spangs par ma gyur te/ /de rnams kyi bag chags ma spangs
130a6(bstod tshogs): pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na de rnams kyang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os ma yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das la yang nyes pa thams cad ni gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du mi mnga' o/ /de'i phyir na nyes pa ma lus pa shin tu mi mnga' ba'i slad du/ /bcom ldan
130a7(bstod tshogs): kho na la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin no zhes bshad do/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun mi mnga' / /zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i go rim gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di ltar gdon na rjes su mthun par mi 'gyur ro zhes pas na/ tshigs su bcad pa dang rjes su
130b1(bstod tshogs): mthun pa'i phyir na gtan nas dang/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni go rim du gdon pa'o/ /phyi rol gyi ri bo la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams la gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du nyes pa med na de rnams la yang skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os su thal bar 'gyur zhes
130b2(bstod tshogs): pas na/ /de dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa/ thams cad nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yon tan ces bya ba dang sbyar ro/ /yang yon tan thams cad gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang thun mong du nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ smon lam
130b3(bstod tshogs): gyi ye shes la sogs pa'o/ /thun mong ma yin pa rnams kyang ma 'dres pa dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'o/ /de rnams kyang chung ngu dang/ 'bring la sogs pa'i dbye bas ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang chen po nyid la gnas pa zhes bya bas na/
130b4(bstod tshogs): bshad pa/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba ni khyad par thams cad kyis zhes bya ba'i don to/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung/ /de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams/ /thog drung rim pa dbyer ma mchis/ /zhes pa gang 'chad par
130b5(bstod tshogs): 'gyur ba'o/ /gang la zhes bya ba ni don gyis bcom ldan 'das kho na dang sbyar ro/ /'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni khyad par gyi rgyu gsal bar byed pa'o/ /nyes pa ma lus pa zad par gyur pa dang/ yon tan gyi khyad par ma lus pa dang ldan pa'i phyir de nyid la ni skyabs
130b6(bstod tshogs): su 'gro ba'i rigs so zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /gnas gyur ces bya ba ni yang dag par gnas pa ste/ bzhed pa tsam gyi phyir dang/ mngon du gyur pa'i nus pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yon tan ni sngar bshad pa ste/ nyes pa'i gnyen por bgrang zhing goms par
130b7(bstod tshogs): byas na zhes bya ba'i phyir ro/ /bshad pa ni 'di yin te/ nyes pa med pa tsam gyis yon tan med pas skyabs mi nus so/ /skyabs kyi don ni skyabs kyi don zhes bya ste grub pa'i mdza' o/ /ri bo la sogs pa de rnams kyang yon tan med pa'o/ /bcom
131a1(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das ni nyes pa mi mnga' ba dang/ yon tan dang ldan pa'o/ de bas na de nyid skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin gyi ri bo la sogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir mang po skyabs su 'gro ba ni/ ri bo dag dang nags
131a2(bstod tshogs): tshal dang/ /skyed mos tshal dang shing drung dang/ /mi rnams 'jigs pas bsdigs pa yi/ /skyabs 'gro 'di ni mchog ma yin/ /skyabs 'gro 'di ni dam pa min/ /de la skyabs su 'gro bas ni/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol mi 'gyur/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das
131a3(bstod tshogs): kyis gsungs pa'o/ /gal te rnam pa thams cad du yon tan gnas par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos la sogs pa rnams las khyad du gyur pa'i phyir skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa yin na yang de bzhin du spangs pa phun sum tshogs pas
131a4(bstod tshogs): kyang bcom ldan 'das bstod par 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya bas na/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad do/ /de zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa yang
131a5(bstod tshogs): ngo/ /nyid ces bya ba ni nges par bzung ba'o/ /nges par bzung ba gang yin zhe na/ skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'o/ /de ltar gyur pa las gzhan pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i snod ma yin no zhes bya ba'o/ /skyabs 'gro zhing zhes bya ni skyabs khas blangs pa'i
131a6(bstod tshogs): phyir ro/ /skyabs kyi don ni zhes sngar bshad de/ /des ni yid kyi las la spro bar byed do/ /de bstod ces bya ba ni yang dag par gyur pa'i yon tan la bstod pa'o/ /'gro ba'i rigs zhes bya ba ni thams cad la sbyar ro/ /des ni ngag gi las la spro bar byed do/ /de
131a7(bstod tshogs): ni bkur ba dang zhes bya ba ni thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pas bsnyen bkur bya zhes par dgongs pas so/ /des ni lus kyi las la spro bar byed do/ /de yi bstan la gnas zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid dag gis des bkag pa mi spyad pa dang/ rjes su gnang ba
131b1(bstod tshogs): sgrub par byed pa'o/ /de lta bus ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur te/ des ni sgrub pa la spro bar byed do/ /rigs pa zhes bya ba ni rigs pa las ma 'das pa ste/ rigs pa dang mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni zhes bya ba ni
131b2(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid la phan pa'i sems bzung bar bya ste/ gtso bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag la phan par sems pas na zhes bya'o/ /gzhan du na phyugs rnams la yang sems yod de/ de rnams kyis ni nyes pa dang yon tan brtag pa'i nus pa dman pas bdag la phan par mi
131b3(bstod tshogs): sems pa'o/ /de bas na bdag la phan par sems pa gang yin pa des ni nyes pa thams cad mi mnga' ba dang/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa la skyabs su 'gro ba bya ba dang/ de'i bstan pa la gnas par bya'o zhes bstan to/ /de bas na tshigs su bcad pa de gnyis
131b4(bstod tshogs): kyis ni ston pa la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os bstan to/ /dgongs pa gang gis slob dpon 'di nyid kyis skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa 'di lta bus gsal bar byas so zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ 'dir yang slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos zhar la
131b5(bstod tshogs): bstan to/ /kha cig na re skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa mi shes pas 'di skad zer te/ de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/ /ji srid bdag la sems yod na/ /gang gi bstan la gnas pa dang/ /gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi/ /zhes bya ba de'i phyir
131b6(bstod tshogs): gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba rgyas par slob dpon gyis bshad do/ /'dir yang 'di ltar 'chad par 'dod pas gang gi phyir 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa tshol bar byed pa rnams gang la 'jigs
131b7(bstod tshogs): pa gang gis 'di nyid smras pa zhes bya'o/ /'di nyid spel ma'i spel mar gnas brtan shAkya blo yis bshad pa ni/ 'bar zhing tsha ba'i 'dod chags sogs/ /me yis lus ni bsregs gyur cing/ /skye mched kun la gnod byed pa'i/ /dmyal bar yid ni skrag
132a1(bstod tshogs): gyur pas/ /de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/ /zhes pa ni rgyas pa'o/ /bshad pa ni 'di yin te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i mes yang dag par gdungs pa'i lus dang ldan pa dbang po kun gnod pa'i dmyal ba las yid skrag nas skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs
132a2(bstod tshogs): pa'i mchod 'os pa tshol bar byed pa dag gi dbang du byas nas/ gtan nas rnam pa thams cad du zhes bya ba ni rgyas par bshad do/ /skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i mchod 'os pa de dang 'dra ba gang yin zhe na/ mngon sum du ma bshad pa de'i phyir 'di bshad par
