195a7(bstod tshogs): kyang ma mchis pa/ zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /tshad ma mchis zhes bya ba ni yongs su gcod mi nus pa ste/ yon tan gyi nus pa gcig kyang rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ /gcig la sogs grangs kyis bgrang mi nus pas na grangs kyang
195b1(bstod tshogs): ma mchis pa ste/ yon tan mdza' yas pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas las sems can gzhan gyi yul ma yin pas na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ /bstan pa ni dpe'o/ /bstan min ni dpe med pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ /bdag nyid ni bdag nyid kyis so/ /nyid ces
195b2(bstod tshogs): bya ba ni nges par 'dzin pa'o/ /bdag nyid kyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog dang rang rgyal ba rnams kyis ni ma yin no/ /bdag ces bya ba ni rang gi sgra'i rnam grangs so/ /dper na 'jig rten pa kha cig smra ba ni rang gi bdag nyid kyis bdag grong
195b3(bstod tshogs): du 'gro bar bya zhes bya ba'o/ /rang gi zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid dang gzugs kyi sku'i ngo bo nyid do/ /khyod ces bya ba ni nges par 'dzin pa'o/ /ci zhig nges par 'dzin zhe na/ kha cig 'di skad smra bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan
195b4(bstod tshogs): du yang shAkya'i sras dang dus mnyam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su byung de dag phan tshun yon tan rgyas par mkhyen pa zhes bya bas na de dag dgag par bya ba'i phyir nges par 'dzin pa ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa khyod nyid kyis bdag
195b5(bstod tshogs): nyid mkhyen gyi/ gzhan gyis ni rngo mi thog go zhes bya ba'o/ /de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snga ma dang phyi ma'i de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis 'jig rten du dus mnyam du 'byung ba de ni gnas dang go skabs med do zhes bya ba de ni mdo'i tshig go /de bas na khyod kho
195b6(bstod tshogs): nas bdag nyid mkhyen pa'i mchod 'os yin gyi/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i ni ma yin te/ kho bo cag mi gtsang ba'i srin bu dang 'dra bas lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i phyir na khyod kyi/ mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang/ /skye
195b7(bstod tshogs): bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ /khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam ma bsgrags kyang/ /bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis/ /khyod kyi yon tan cha tsam zhes bya ba la/ yon tan rnams kyi cha ni cha ste/ de'i skra tsam gyi rtse mo ste nyung ngu zhes bya
196a1(bstod tshogs): ba'i don to/ /de nyid bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi ma bsgrags pa ni ma bstod pa ste/ yon tan thams cad lta ga las so/ /de bzhin du yang mchog ni phan par du'o/ /bdag ni bdag gi'o/ /dga' ba ni rangs pa'o/ /glo ba ni glo ba la mchis pa'o/ /
196a2(bstod tshogs): yon tan gyi cha tsam ma bsgrags pas dga' bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na zhes bya ba'i brgal ba'i lan bshad pa ni bas par ma gyur kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la/ bas par ma gyur zhes bya ba ni bas par ma gyur pa'o/ /mtsho chen chab ni chab po/ /
196a3(bstod tshogs): skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar ni zhi bar 'gyur ba'o/ /ltar ni gang gi phyir ro/ /de bas na tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi mtsho chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi cha tsam la bstod pas bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis zhes pa ste mdor bsdus
196a4(bstod tshogs): pa'o/ /da ni bstod pa'i 'bras bu yongs su bsngo ba bshad par bya ste/ bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i/ /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis/ /ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs pas bkrugs pa yi/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du
196a5(bstod tshogs): gnas par shog /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis zhes bya ba ni rgyas pa'o/ /'bras bu 'khrungs pa ni 'bras bu byung ba yis so/ /'di'i ni brgya lnga bcu pa'i bstod pa las byung ba ste/ dge ba ni ngag gi ngo bo nyid kyi dge ba'i las kyi'o/ /ci
196a6(bstod tshogs): 'dra ba zhig ce na/ smras pa/ thub pa la dad pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni thub pa la dad pa las byung ba'i spobs pa ni shes rab ste/ de las skyes pa ste byung ba gang yin pa de ni thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa ste/ dge ba'i las de'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pa yis so/ /
196a7(bstod tshogs): 'dod chags dang gnod sems la sogs pa ni ngan rtog go /de nyid yul rnams la sems rnam par g.yeng ba'i phyir rlung dmar 'tshubs pa'o/ /de yis 'tshubs pa ni ngan rtog rlung dmar 'tshubs bas dkrugs pa'o/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par
196b1(bstod tshogs): shog ces bya ba ni skye bo thams cad kyi sems dbang du gyur nas dgra bcom par gyur cig ces bya ba ni dgongs pa'o/ /de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dbye bas brgya lnga bcu pa'i rigs pa'i 'grel pa'o/ /bde gshegs la bstod pa bshad pa yis/ /bdag gis dge
196b2(bstod tshogs): ba gang thob pa/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir/ /de las bde gshegs 'gyur bar shog /brgya lnga bcu pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa'i 'grel pa dge slong dga' byed snyan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rI
196b3(bstod tshogs): sh+rad+d+ha ka ra warmma dang/ lo tsA ba shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te bstan la phab pa'o// // */ (/gaN+Di'i bstod pa bzhugs//) //rgya gar skad du/ gaN+Di sto trA gA thA/ bod skad du/
196b4(bstod tshogs): gaN+Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sngon du byang chub shing gi drung du nyi ma'i lam nas song cig gA gred gA gred/ /gA gA gred gA ga gA gred g+ha na g+ha g+ha na g+ha gred lus la go chas bcings rnams dang/ /gang zhig
196b5(bstod tshogs): gzugs mdzes bud med rnams kyis Dhu Du pa ti Dha DU b+hi:Dhu DU Dhu b+hi(bstod tshogs): Dhu Du rnams kyis/ /'di ltar rjes su mi 'khrugs lha dang mi yis phyag byas gang de shAkya seng+ge nyid kyis srungs/ /gang zhig 'dod lha'i lus can ma rnams ka ha ka ha ka ka hA hA hI ti zhes
196b6(bstod tshogs): dgongs rnams dang/ /gang tshe dregs can rnams kyis ta Ti ta ta Ti ta TI tA Ta TA ti zhes rab tu smra ba rnams dang ni/ /kud kud bud bud ku kU tsi ta ku tsi ta ku ha ra tsi ta bran po rnams kyi ngag rnams kyis/ /mi skrag thos pas dri ma kun zhi gang yin thub pa'i dbang
196b7(bstod tshogs): po de yis zhi gyur cig /smin ma 'khyog po bskyod dang 'dod dran mnga' yi rol pas rdzi ma mig 'bras 'bebs rnams dang/ /rtsol ba'i lus can ma rnams yal ga rol pas rtse ba'i yan lag can ma rnams dang ni/ /ngo tsha dang bcas zur gyis smra dang
197a1(bstod tshogs): yid 'ong snyan 'jam rab tu dga' byed sna tshogs pa'i/ /tshig rnams kyis ni thugs mi 'khrul ba 'dod dran las rgyal gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa gzhi kun tu g.yo dang rno ba'i mda' yi tshogs kyis bar snang la ni gtibs pa
197a2(bstod tshogs): yi/ /'bar ba rnams dang khro bo'i mi rnams phyogs dang phyogs su 'bar bas chu tshogs rnams 'khrug dang/ /'phang mdung ral gri 'khor lo sog le rnon po can gyi bdud kyi dpa' o sgra 'byin pa/ /byams pa'i mtshon cha gang gis rab tu zhi zhing mngon rgyal
197a3(bstod tshogs): de yis thub dbang khyod kyis srungs/ /rnam par 'phro ba las skyes khro ba rab gsal rnam gtsigs dge ba nges par sgrogs 'jigs pa'i/ /'brug sgrog char sprin dra ba rab gsal glang po'i bum bgyings bcings pa'i mun nag 'thibs pa dang/ /'dod
197a4(bstod tshogs): lha'i dpung tshogs 'joms pa'i me 'phro ba dang ral gri'i 'od kyis sna tshogs ma lus gsal/ /me tog mda' can sde rnams gang gis skad cig gis 'joms sangs rgyas khyod kyis srung bar mdzod/ /mdzes pa'i rna ba'i drung gang pad ma'i 'dab ma
197a5(bstod tshogs): lta bu'i rdzi ma mig gi 'bras bu ga-yo/ /shin tu chags pas rnam par sgrin ma rab tu rnam rgyas mthun pa dang bcas pa smin rol pa'i/ /mig can bdud kyi lus can ma rnams yongs chags gyur dang mdza' dmar zhi ba min rnams kyis/ /kun tu drang
197a6(bstod tshogs): bar ma btub skyon bsal gyur pa'i drang srong mchog de la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /gang gi thugs ni 'khrul par ma gyur bdud rnams gsal ba rnam par gtsigs dang dog par bcer dang lce bskyod dang/ dpal gyi rtse mo lag can rnams dang
197a7(bstod tshogs): glang po rta yi gdong can dang ni seng+ge stag gi gdong rnams dang/ /rab tu mdzes pa'i 'dod pa'i lha ni rtswa bzhin rtsi ba med pa 'khor bas 'jigs gang gis/ /bsdigs pa bsal ba 'jig rten mgon po thub pa'i dbang po sangs rgyas gang yin
197b1(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis bsrungs/ /gang gi blo ni la drugs pa med de sa gzhi chu bo'i klung dang rgya mtsho chu 'dzin rnams dang ni/ /'brug sgrogs rnams dang bdud kyi dpa' o sna tshogs brgya phrag gdong dang drag po'i gzugs can mdza' yas dang/ gang zhig me tog can de rtsa bzhin ma
197b2(bstod tshogs): brtsis thams cad mkhyen pa dang ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/ /dpal ldan sangs rgyas dpa' o sdig pa'i 'jig la 'phrog pa rnam 'gyur med pa de yis bsrung bar mdzod/ /bdud rnams phung chen lag na ral gri dgra sta gzhu dang mdung thung lhag par rtse mo rno
197b3(bstod tshogs): rnams dang/ /skar mda''bebs dang sreg byed du ma sgra gsang sgrogs pa 'jigs par byed pa 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyis/ /gang gi thugs ni mi 'khrug ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa dam pa skyil mo krung bcings pa/ /srid gsum 'jigs pa 'phrog
197b4(bstod tshogs): byed sangs rgyas dpa' bo shin tu dpa' ba de la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthon bor a Ta Ta Ta Tar rgod rab gsal rnon po myur bar bcings pa'i dril bu sgrogs pa dang/ /bsgyings pa dang bcas bgyed pa gtsigs pa ral pa bsgril ba'i sgra can mig yon
197b5(bstod tshogs): bran rnams kyis/ /'joms par bya bar ma nus rnon po'i ba Ta ha gsal ge rdungs pas gang gis byang chub tu/ /nga rgyal can rnams la ni bya rgod phung por gsal ba'i pa Ta ha gsal sangs rgyas dpa' bo bder gyur cig /ko kaN DaM rA ma ra Na TaM pra ti b+ha
197b6(bstod tshogs): ya ku ha raM bar pa Na Na DaM ra Na Na DaM/ /Dom baN Da ma baN Du Dim baN Da ha Dhu ha ka Dhu haM straing kha la streng kha la strai ma/ /dzam branyi dzim branya dza dza mi brang kha mu kha mu khu khu mAng khu(bstod tshogs): khu mang khu(bstod tshogs): khu mang khu(bstod tshogs): khu mang khu sogs rnams kyis mi 'jigs
197b7(bstod tshogs): lha dang mi yis phyag byas shAkya seng ge khyod kyis srungs/ /gang gis bdud kyi chu 'dzin thogs pa'i lus kyis yongs su bsgyings pa'i nga rgyal mtshan mo grol/ /bdud kyi lus can ma rnams kyi ni gdong gi padmo'i nags dpal mi mthun phyogs gcig
198a1(bstod tshogs): pa/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub zla ba dang ni ston ka'i ku mu da bzhin yongs thob pa/ /de 'dir chos kyi pho nya sgrogs pa chos kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyi gaN+Di'o/ /gsod pa ma thob tshim med skad cig kyang ni rnam
198a2(bstod tshogs): par dpyod pa'i mthar byed 'di la ring po nas/ /der ni sems rnams chud pas dus kun tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par legs par spyod par byed pa yi/ /'dir ni dkon mchog gsum gyi bka' bsgor zhugs pa yang yang srog chags rnams la slob pa
198a3(bstod tshogs): gang yin pa/ /'di ni phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du ni mi dman rab tu grags pa rtsub pa chos kyi gaN+Di'o/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du skar ma'i tshogs las rnam rgyal bas/ /'bar te mu stegs skye bo dang ni rgyal ba'i bstan la 'dir/ /sa
198a4(bstod tshogs): gzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan gyi snying po gaN+Di 'di/ /g.yul las rgyal ba'i cang te'u gtum po bzhin du grags pa'o/ /gang yang khyod ni skrag pa ma yin dza mi dza mi Dhu Dhu ma rinya dza De na nA Di nA De/ /Dom ban Dim ban Du Dim ban Da b+ha Da b+hu Dhu Dhu
198a5(bstod tshogs): b+haM DhA Di b+hAn nA Di b+haN Da ma/ /raN Di ruN DaM ru ru Na Di ya ra la ba kha kha maM kha(bstod tshogs): kha maM kha(bstod tshogs): kha maM kha:/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams bcir la 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten pa yis ltos/ /sa gzhi rab tu
198a6(bstod tshogs): g.yo ba'i g.yo ba las byung ri bo rab tu bskyod cing ri rab rgyal po ga-yo/ /lha'i tshogs dang gdon gyi 'od zer dang ni klu'i rgyal po ma lus pa rnams skrag pa dang/ /mu stegs rnams kyis gaN+Di gtum po sna tshogs 'jigs par byed pas thos pas
198a7(bstod tshogs): skrag pa dang/ /sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi ni zhi ba zhi ba'i rgyur gyur pa bzhir sgra sgrogs dge 'dun la 'dir sgrogs/ /'di ni gtsug lag khang gi rtse mor rab tu sgrogs pa'i gaN+Di ste/ /sprin gyi sgra bzhin byed pa sgra rnams de ring yid du 'ong ba ni
198b1(bstod tshogs): ma ltar shin tu gnyen gshin pa yis legs par phyi rol song rnams kyi/ /bu rnams zas dus la ni yongs su 'bod par byed pa'i gaN+Di'o/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lo yongs su 'joms pa mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rin chen thams cad kyis ni
198b2(bstod tshogs): klugs pa'i/ /sgra sgrogs byed pa'i lha yi rnga chen dang mnyam sgra chen gyi/ /gaN+Dis sdig pa ma lus rnam par 'joms par byed pa'o/ /'dis ni lha dang lha min lto 'phye chen pos mchod byas pa/ /zhi ba mchog tu nye bar bzhud pa'i de bzhin gshegs
198b3(bstod tshogs): pa yi/ /gaN+Di sgra sgrog 'chi ba med pa'i rnga chen dang mnyam sgras/ /mu stegs can gzhan gyi ni snying ni rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /'dir ni gaN+Di 'di sgrogs pa yi mi rnams dang/ /lha dang mi dang lha ma yin rnams 'bod pa ste/ /bzang po rnams kyis bde gshegs
198b4(bstod tshogs): gaN+Di 'di nyon cig /lus pa med pa'i dge slong tshogs kyis yongs su bskor/ /glang chen rnams kyis 'jigs pa'i dus tshigs 'khrugs pa'i dus kyi nam mkha' chu 'dzin khyab bzhin gyis/ /'gro ba rnams ni 'joms dang yang ba dang 'jigs pas 'dar ba
198b5(bstod tshogs): bzlog par byed pa'i rgyu/ /nye bar zhi ba mu stegs ma lus pa yi nga rgyal de yis shin tu med byed pa/ /thub pa mchog rnams kun gyis chos rnams 'phel ba'i don bzhag pa de'i gaN+Di khyod kyis srungs/ /bsod nams mchog gyur de grub gyur cig
198b6(bstod tshogs): 'tsho ba g.yo ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi/ /mtho ris dang ni byang grol rab ster ngan 'gro ster byed sdig par ma gyur cig /'dir ni dbus na 'dug pa'i sbrang ma sgra 'byin lta bur bdag gis smra ba yi/ /bdud dgra'i zhabs kyi chu skyes dag la me tog snyim
198b7(bstod tshogs): pas gtor ro khyod kyis srungs/ /brgya byin la sogs lha tshogs rnams kyis shin tu gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang/ /mkha' la sil snyan sgrogs pa rnams kyis yongs gang gus pas me tog gtor rnams dang/ /mtho ris nas ni sa la
199a1(bstod tshogs): babs par grags pa yun rings bskral byas gang yin pa/ /snying rje'i gter chen bcom ldan 'das kyis gaN+Di rab gtum de yis 'gro ba srungs/ /yum gyi lhums nas 'thon ba tsam gyis rang gis gom pa bdun du bzhud pa po/ /'khor ba mthar
199a2(bstod tshogs): phyung ngag gi tshig ni rab tu brjod pa blo gros mi chung ba/ /gang du skye ba'i dngos por srid pa gsal bar brjod pa rnams su gyur pa yis/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mun pa dum bur byed pa'i gaN+Di de yis rgyal gyur cig /lhun po mchog gi stong dang rin chen ri bo nor bu'i 'od can kun
199a3(bstod tshogs): gyi ngos dang ni/ /ri dbang rgyal po gangs ri'i sdeng dang mi yi yul dang klu yi 'jig rten dag na gnas pa'i/ /'chi med 'dod khams dbang po dang ni gling bzhi'i mi bdag nyi zla lha min dbang po rnams/ /bde gshegs chos kyi gaN+Di thos pas thams cad bde gshegs dgongs pa bzang
199a4(bstod tshogs): la 'bod pa'o/ /sa gsum kun na yod pa'i mi sdug rigs mang glang chen dregs pa mang po rnams bzung zhon/ /thams cad mche ba ring po phyir bton rdo rje 'bar ba'i phrang ba'i rtags ni gzung byas nas/ /bsdigs pa'i rigs kun 'ongs pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bla ma mkhas pa'i hUM sgras 'jigs
199a5(bstod tshogs): mdzad pas/ /'jig rten kun las rgyal ba byung zhes sgra sgrogs zhabs drung 'dud cing sangs rgyas cod paN brgyan/ /bdud kyi bu mo khri snyan sa le dang 'dra mig ldan nu ma mkhrang zhing rgyas ldan pa/ /ngang pa'i 'gros 'dra bran mo'i steng du bzhon zhing glu len rnga yi tshogs rdung mgyogs 'gro
199a6(bstod tshogs): pa/ /rgya mtsho chen po 'phyur ba'i chu bo bzhi ltar rgyun ma 'chad par mang po 'ongs rnams la/ /TuM TuM b+h+raM b+h+raM khyad 'phags sgra rnams rgyun mi mchad par sgrogs byed gaN+Di nyid yin no/ /bdud kyi stobs las rgyal byas 'jigs pa chen po bstan pa byas nas skyon zad pa'i/ /'dir
199a7(bstod tshogs): ni de bzhin shin tu mdzes pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa gang/ /ma lus yon tan bzang po dang ldan sangs rgyas dag pa'i thugs rje can de yi/ /gaN+Di gtum po sdig 'phrog byed pas mi rnams kyi ni dum bur byed gyur cig /tshangs pa lkugs pa ltar gyur
199b1(bstod tshogs): lha ni bla ma'i snyems pa med gyur thams cad 'du/ /'tsho byed blo chung gyur to skal ba dang ldan khyab 'jug ci yang mi smrar song/ /'dir ni gang gi yon tan grags pas lha rnams gang de ngo tshas yan lag khums/ /thub pa'i gaN+Di 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa med pas 'gro rnams ngan
199b2(bstod tshogs): 'gro las ni srungs/ /tshangs pa mig stong dbang po khyab 'jug nyi zla srin po gnod sbyin rnams dang ni/ /dri za lto 'phye mi 'am ci dang lha min mi dang bdud ris yi dags dang/ /gang zhig langs pas sa yi gzhi rnams gsar 'od 'bar 'gyur gos ser can de kun/ /thams
199b3(bstod tshogs): cad ma lus de bzhin gshegs pa bla mas chos ni nyan du 'bad pa'o/ /gang gis skye bar chung zhing dman pa'i dgongs can mu stegs pa rnams skrag pa 'thob/ /khyad 'phags 'phel ba'i blo can sangs rgyas pa rnams spro ba rab tu 'phel 'thob pa/ /gang 'di'i yon tan rnams
199b4(bstod tshogs): 'thob rgya chen po yi skyon ni zad par 'gro ba yi/ /gaN+Di de yis rtag tu rtsod dus srid pa rnams kyi sdig pa zad gyur cig /rnam dag dgongs can gang la chog bzhin du phyag byas mthon po'i 'gro bgrod dang/ /gang gis mi mthun phyogs ni thams cad myur du zad pa ster bar
199b5(bstod tshogs): byed pa dang/ /'khrug long gti mug rab rib thub pa'i chos kyi gaN+Di de yis 'joms gyur cig /tshe dang ldan pa rnams kyis srid pa ma lus byung 'jigs pa de ni khyod kyis chom/ /'di thos dge bas sa 'dzin pa yi tshangs sogs sa gzhi'i mthil du myur du lhung/ /sa
199b6(bstod tshogs): 'dzin rnams ni 'dar zhing sa gzhi myur du sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba dang/ mu stegs pa rnams 'jigs par byed pa gzhan la phan rtsom dag pa'i bdag nyid can/ /sangs rgyas pa rnams myur du nye bar zhi 'gyur gaN+Di de ni 'du bar mdzod/ /gaN+Di'i bstod pa tshigs su bcad
199b7(bstod tshogs): pa slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi mdzad pa rdzogs// //mkhas pa chen po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang/ lo tsA ba btsun pa d+harmmA yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ (/sbel mar bstod pa bzhugs/ /)
200a1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ mi sh+raka sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gting mdza' med pa'i 'khor ba yi/ /rgya mtsho'i nang du rnam par gnas/ /'dod chags la sogs mi bzad pa'i/ /chu srin
200a2(bstod tshogs): gyis ni lus zos pas/ /de ring gang la skyabs su mchi/ /ji srid bdag la sems yod na/ /gang gi bstan pa gnas pa dang/ /gang bstod gang la bsnyen bkur bgyi/ /gang zhig la ni nyes pa kun/ /gtan nas yong ye mi mnga' zhing/ /gang la'ang rnam pa thams cad du/ /
200a3(bstod tshogs): yon tan thams cad gnas gyur pa/ /gzhan gyi gnod pa bsal ba'i phyir/ /gang gi nyes pa zad gyur pa/ /gzhan mngon mtho dang thar pa'i phyir/ /yon tan goms byas bdag gi min/ /gal te sems shig yod na ni/ /de nyid la ni skyabs 'gro zhing/ /de bstod de ni
200a4(bstod tshogs): bkur ba dang/ /de yi bstan la gnas pa'i rigs/ /gang zhig nyes de gzhan la gnod/ /de ni yon tan gang gzhan smad/ /nyes pa rang gi nyes bcom pa/ /'tsho ba rang don yon tan no/ /thams cad mkhyen la yon tan kun/ /mnga' la de yang nyams mi mnga' / /
200a5(bstod tshogs): nyes pa bag chags bcas de yang/ /skyob pa gcig pu la mi mnga' / /spyod pa la ni mi smod phyir/ /thub pa skyon ni med par grub/ /bde bar grags pa'i chos spangs nas/ /skye bo dkar ba smod pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang ni/ /gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la/ /
200a6(bstod tshogs): zhe 'gras gyur pa gang gis kyang/ /chos dang ldan par glags mi rnyed/ /che ba'i yon tan cha yis kyang/ /tshig rnyed nges par ma blangs pa/ /gal te ston bstod mi byed na/ /mi khom gnas bzhin bdag bcom 'gyur/ /rgya mtshor gnya' shing bu ga ru/ /
200a7(bstod tshogs): rus sbal mgrin pa chud pa ltar/ /dam chos dga' ston cher bcas pa'i/ /mi nyid bdag gis thob nas ni/ /mang du bcad par gyur pa ste/ /mthar yang bskal pa'i skyon gyis gnas/ /lce ni don can ma gyur te/ /gzhan du bdag ni bslus par gyur
200b1(bstod tshogs): mi rtag nyid dang rjes 'brang zhing/ /las kyi glags la dogs bcas pa/ /bdag gi lce 'di nyid kyis go /snying po ci phyir blang mi bya/ /yon tan gyi mdza' ma rtogs pas/ /gal te bstod pa mi byed na/ /shA ri'i bu la sogs pas kyang/ /nges par bstod par mi 'gyur ro/ /de
200b2(bstod tshogs): ltas thub pa'i yon tan gyis/ /yul lta grangs med shes mod kyi/ /rang gi don la gus pa yis/ /de yi phyogs gcig bsgrims te brjod/ /gang zhig gzhan la slob pa dang/ /dman phyir legs par ma bslabs gang/ /nyes pa zad kyang de slob cing/ /gang phyir don gyis
200b3(bstod tshogs): khyod mi slong/ /gang gi yon tan grags dag dang/ /mthu la thug pa ma mchis la/ /rmad byung phrin las dpag med can/ /rang byung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan grangs kyis mthu yis ni/ /slob la smra bar nus pa dang/ /mdza' can gzhal bar byed nus kyi/ /
200b4(bstod tshogs): mi slob pa yi mdun du min/ /'di snyed bgyi ba'i mdza' med na/ /'di ltar legs shes ci zhig smos/ /khyod kyi yon tan slad du bdag /bsod nams snyam nas spyi brtol skyes/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las
200b5(bstod tshogs): bstod pa gleng bslang ba zhes bya ba ste le'u dang po'o// //bde gnas snying rje med pa ni/ /spyod dam mi spyod rnam mi spyod/ /rang gi bde bas gzhan dbang phyir/ /de nyid dang ni nges par sbyar/ /spyod dam mi spyod snyom pa yi/ /rnam
200b6(bstod tshogs): par rtog pa rnam spangs nas/ /'gro ba 'di ni nyam thag ces/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis zhal gyis bzhes/ /snying rje rnam par spangs nas ni/ /gzhan gyis gzhan ni bcol ba byed/ /la lar bdag phan la brtson pas/ /rang gi bde phyir rab tu 'jug /khyod ni ma bcol legs
200b7(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa/ /khyod ni rgyu med bzhin du byams/ /khyod ni ma drin mdza' bshes te/ /'brel ba med pa'i gnyen 'dun lags/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i phyir/ /thugs rjes 'gro ba blangs nas ni/ /slob la dgyes pa 'phel
201a1(bstod tshogs): 'gyur ba/ /ba spu du ma ldang dang bcas/ /nyid kyi sha yang stsol mdzad na/ /dngos po gzhan lta smos ci 'tshal/ /legs mdzad khyod kyis srog kyang ni/ /slong ba'i skye bo rnams la btang/ /bdag la bdag nyid spangs nas ni/ /gzhan la bdag nyid blangs
201a2(bstod tshogs): bas na/ /rtswa yis rin chen rigs chen ltar/ /dgyes pa mi nyams ldan pa yis/ /nyid kyi sku dang srog dag gis/ /lus can gshed mas zin rnams kyis/ /lus dang srog kyang khyod kyis ni/ /lan brgya phrag tu bslu ba mdzad/ /'jig rten bdag lta'i bsam pa can
201a3(bstod tshogs): snying rje'i sems ni med pa ste/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs sam bde 'dod pas/ /tshul khrims kun tu blangs nas srung/ /ngan 'gros bsnyengs slad ma lags la/ /bzhed pa'i 'gro ba'ang sgrub ma lags/ /dgongs pa dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis tshul khrims goms
201a4(bstod tshogs): par mdzad/ /phyi rol rkyen gyis ma rdzogs dang/ /rang sbyor phun tshogs med pa'i phyir/ /bsam pa rnam par dag pas kyang/ /tshul khrims pha rol dag mi 'gyur/ /rtag tu gya gyu rnam spangs shing/ /drang brtan rnams ni rtag bsten pas/ /yongs su dag pa'i las rnams
201a5(bstod tshogs): kyis/ /khyod ni gzhi rten gcig pur gyur/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i rgyu/ /thugs rje'i dbang gis mchod bya yang/ /ma 'ongs sdug bsngal bsnyengs pa yis/ /gzhan nyid rang nyid la nyes pas/ /sdug bsngal mang pos gzir ba ni/ /khyod kyis dga' ba'i thugs
201a6(bstod tshogs): kyis ni/ /nyon mongs rnams ni sran btsugs nas/ /skye bo nyon mongs can la brtse/ /gzir bar gyur pa rnams la yang/ /nyes pa rnams ni mi sems pa/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin 'dod phyir/ /byas pa nyid ni rjes lta bas/ /khyod kyis gzhan gyis don slad du/
201a7(bstod tshogs): sku srog btang nas dgyes gyur gang/ /de 'dra srog chags 'gum pa las/ /bsos pa rnams la'ang byung ma gyur/ /phan byed mchod pas dga' gyur pa/ /ngo mtshar che ba'i sems mi rtsi/ /mgon po khyod ni dgyes pa gang/ /bdag gis de ni ngo mtshar dgongs/
201b1(bstod tshogs): khyod ni lan 'ga' ma lags par/ /gtubs kyang sdug bsngal mi dgongs par/ /gshed ma bgyid pa'i sems can la'ang/ /gtso bo thugs rjer gyur pa gang/ /gang yang gshed ma nyid kyis ni/ /ral gri nyid kyis bcad byas nas/ /byang chub gnyer bar gzigs
201b2(bstod tshogs): nas ni/ /byams pa la ni bzhugs par gyur/ /khyod kyi thugs ni rin po che/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bon te/ /dpa' khyod kho nas snying por mkhyen/ /de gzhan skye bos 'ol mi mchi/ /de ltar bdag nyid gyur pa yang/ /sems can rtag tu sdug bsngal can/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos
201b3(bstod tshogs): rnams la/ /so sor brtags nas brtson 'grus bya/ /dka' spyad las ni ma bgyis par/ /go 'phang rnyed dka' mi 'thob ces/ /de slad nyid la'ang ma gzigs par/ /khyod kyis brtson 'grus legs par spel/ /khyad par yon tan rnyed nas ni/ /nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang/ /
201b4(bstod tshogs): sems can don du khur khyer yang/ /thugs ni kun tu mi bsnyel te/ /khyad par 'phags par bgyi ba la/ /khyod la thang lhod 'ga' ma byung/ /de slad khyod kyi khyad par rnams/ /srog drung rim par dbyer ma mchis/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dag pa'i rjes su cis
201b5(bstod tshogs): mi mchi/ /lta dang nga rgyal snang med pa/ /gang gi shes rab kyis ni bsal/ /thugs ni thugs rje chen po dang/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brel slad du/ /ting 'dzin 'bras bur bcas pa yi/ /shin tu bde la'ang khyod ma chags/ /kha cig mu stegs pa rnams ni/ /longs spyod kyi
201b6(bstod tshogs): ni nges legs 'thad/ /gzhan la gcig tu nyid kyis ni/ /longs spyod dgag pa ma mdzad do/ /gzhan dang thun mongs ma lags pa'i/ /bde ba gang de gya nom yang/ /dam pa'i spyod ldan khyod 'dra la/ /gnod par bas kyis sman ma mchis/ /khyod kyi shes rab mtshul
201b7(bstod tshogs): min te/ /dud 'gro du ma rnams la yang/ /gang zhig ye shes rnam dag phyir/ /ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid/ /'dres pa las ni legs bshad pa/ /snying po skyon med nyi tshe zhig /khyed kyis kun bzhes thugs la bzhag/ nyes bshad dug bzhin yongs su spangs/ /legs
202a1(bstod tshogs): bshad chen po sku srog gis/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i phyed tsam yang/ /gang zhig shes rab rnam 'phel phyir/ /ji ltar rjes su mchi mi bgyid/ /khyod nyid gcig pus rnam mkhyen mdzad/ /rin chen snying po mkhyen khyod kyis/ /legs bshad
202a2(bstod tshogs): srog gis 'jal ba na/ /skye ba de dang de dag tu/ /byang chub slad du dpa' rtsal bstan/ /sems can brtson 'grus 'phags pa ni/ /grangs med par ni gyur pa yang/ /spyod med zha bo rnams kyi gang/ /skye bos thob par mi nus so/ /de slad grangs med gsum dag tu/ /
202a3(bstod tshogs): khyod ni de ltar brtson pa na/ /brtson 'grus 'ba' zhig grags gyur pas/ /go 'phang bla na med pa brnyes/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyed pa zhes bya ba las rgyu'i sgo nas bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// //
202a4(bstod tshogs): yon tan thams cad cung zad gzigs/ /gsol ba na yang mnal mi mnga' / /nye bar blangs pa brtan mdzad cing/ /khyad par la ni thugs ni chags/ /mtho la phrag dog mi mdzad cing/ /dman la rngan chan mi mdzad la/ /mnyam la 'gran pa ma
202a5(bstod tshogs): mchis pas/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gtso bor gyur/ /dka' bas sgrub la nyams mi mnga' / /yun ring du ni mi gnas shing/ /chags bcas kyang ni phal che ba/ /'bras bu las ni shin tu chung/ /khyod ni yon tan rgyu rnams la/ /mngon dgyes
202a6(bstod tshogs): 'bras bu rnams la min/ /yang dag sgrub pa de nyid kyis/ /khyod kyi yon tan pha mthar phyin/ /thub dbang nyid ni dka' bas grub/ /de ltar smra ba'i skye bo rnams/ /snying rjes phongs pas mi sems pa/ /brtson 'grus mi g.yo blangs nas ni/ /ji ltar
202a7(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi zhabs rdul yang/ /bsod nams skye ba mchod gyur pa/ /de ltar khyod kyis legs spyad pas/ /bdag nyid rab tu bskrun pa mdzad/ /'jig rten pa yi 'phags lam dang/ /brtson 'grus shes rab kyis kyang ni/ /tshe rabs snga ma'i mthar
202b1(bstod tshogs): yang ni/ /khyod ni yang dag byung ba yis/ /nyes pa nyam smad rtsa nas bton/ /yon tan spel nas rnam par sbyangs/ /gzhung lugs bzang po des na khyod/ /grub mchog lhag par brnyes pa legs/ /rtag tu ngal zhing mgon med pa/ /slong zhing bde ba ma mchis te/ /sems can
202b2(bstod tshogs): rnams la nyams med pa'i/ /nyon mongs mang po spyod mthong nas/ /ji ltar bdag gi rgyud la de/ /bag chags lhag ma'ang ma lus pa/ /de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/ /nyes pa khyod kyis rab tu bcom/ /gzhan gyi phun tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /khyod ni gtso bor
202b3(bstod tshogs): mthong nas ni/ /bdag gi yon tan dman pa'i phyir/ /gzhan min brtson 'grus phrin las can/ /ji ltar gzhan la de dag dang/ /'dra ba tsam yang mi gda' ba/ /de ltar khyod kyis bsags bsags nas/ /bdag nyid la ni yon tan bsgrubs/ /chung dang
202b4(bstod tshogs): dman dang 'tsho ba med/ /kha na ma tho chags bcas dang/ /tshim par mi byed legs mdza' med/ /thun mong gsal dang mi ldan te/ /'jig rten pa yi dpe dngos kun/ /gegs bgyid pa dang sgrib pa can/ /re zhig pa dang nyi tshe ba/ /shin tu rnyed par sla ba lags//
202b5(bstod tshogs): mang ba dang ni rab kyi rab/ /kun tu mtsho dang dri ma gcod/ /tshim par mdzad dang bde mdza' can/ /thun mong min pa'i snang ba mnga' / /khyod kyi yon tan bla med la/ /gegs bgyis ma mchis rtog ma mchis/ /brtan pa dang ni rgyun chags pas/ /dpe lta
202b6(bstod tshogs): mchis par ga la 'gyur/ /nyan thos blo mchog rnams kyis kyang/ /bskal ba rnams kyis ma rtogs pa/ /lha ma yin gyis gting rnyed pa'i/ /khyod kyi dgongs 'dra ga la mchis/ /gang tshe khyod kyi dgongs pa'i dkyil/ /gting dang pha rol med brtags
202b7(bstod tshogs): na/ /rgya mtsho zab pa nyid kyang ni/ /gnag rjes lta bur sa ler gda' / /'dod pa'i mdza' la ma chags pas/ /gang zhig kha cig gis skyon min/ /khyod kyi bka' ni brtan bcas pa/ /su zhig gis ni 'jal bar nus/ /chos rnams kun gyis mi bskyod
203a1(bstod tshogs): pa/ /khyod kyi brtan pa mngon bsams na/ /sa yi brten pa nyid kyang ni/ /shir sha'i ge sar rtse ltar chung/ /bde ba 'dod pas phyi rol pa/ /nyi ma'i rjes su nyal byed de/ /khyod ni nyi ma dang mtshungs min/ /thun mong gi ni dbye bar brjod//
203a2(bstod tshogs): grub pa khyod kyi ye shes kyi/ /snang bas mi shes rab rib dag /'joms pa'i thad na nyi ma yang/ /me khyer tsam du mi spyod do/ /sbyor dang bsam pa dag pa yis/ /sngon yang nyes pa mi mnga' la/ /khyod kyi spyod pa bsam min pas/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni sus bsam nus//
203a3(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi gsung thugs mdzad spyod rnams/ /dag pa'i gan na ston zla dang/ /chu dang nam mkha' i dag pa rnams/ /dri ma can nyid lta bur gda' / /gzhal du med pa'i yon tan rnams/ /dpe yi tshul gyis sus gzhal nus/ /khyad par la ni sbyor ba'i phyir/ /tshig
203a4(bstod tshogs): tsam yang ni mang po yin/ /'jig rten legs pa gang ci'ang rung/ /thams cad sngon na'ang der bas te/ /nyon mongs 'jig rten chos rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas chos la khyad mi khor/ /bse ru'i rwa dang 'dra ba gang/ /gang yang khyod kyi rjes 'gro slob/ /grol ba
203a5(bstod tshogs): tsam gyis khyod dang mtshungs/ /rmad byung yon tan nyid kyis min/ /rin chen chos gang brnyes nas khyod/ /mchog tu gyur pa de nyid dang/ /khyod du bsgrun zhing de dang ni/ /khyod dang bsgrun ldom kho nar bas/ /yang na de yang khyod mtshungs min/ /gang phyir
203a6(bstod tshogs): gnyis ka mnyam pa ni/ /tshad ma mkhan gyis brjod mi nus/ /des ni sus kyang rtogs mi 'gyur/ /gang la spyi tsam bsgrun nas ni/ /cung zad rjod par bgyid pa de/ /smra ba po yi rang dga' dang/ /thabs dang gcam bu tsam du bas/ /sangs rgyas bcom
203a7(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las dpe med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// //'gro las bdud las rnam par rgyal/ /rjes su dpag pas rnam par lhag /khyod kyi nyan thos kyis kyang ni/
203b1(bstod tshogs): mnyam gnas bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /khyod ni bdud las rnam rgyal te/ /'gro kun dad par mdzad pa yang/ /bdag gis chos nyid rjes bsams nas/ /chen po ltar gang ma mthong ngo/ /khyod ni stobs gnas ma yin yang/ /gang gis rgyal bar bya ba'i rigs/ /de
203b2(bstod tshogs): yis srid gzhan rgyal ba'i phyir/ /bdud kyi nan dang mngag gzhug rnams/ /sdang bas gol bar rtsol byed pa/ /mang po'ang gzhol bar bya ba ni/ /khyad par gnas la brten pa yi/ /bzod pa'i tshegs su mtshar mi che/ /g.yeng ba'i rkyen dang mjal na yang/ /gzhan
203b3(bstod tshogs): la mi bsten pa yis ni/ /'khor ba thog ma med pa ni/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis dgyes par mdzad/ /gang tshe bdud rnams mngon btul ba/ /de yi nub mo kho na la/ /nyon mongs shin tu che spangs pa/ /de nyid rmad du byung ba lags/ /gang gis de ltar bsam min yang/
203b4(bstod tshogs): lhag par nyon mongs las rgyal gyur/ /skye bo gzhan dang thun mong gang/ /mu stegs las rgyal de smos ci/ /'od zer phreng ba stong ldan pa'i/ /nyi mas mun bsal gang lags dang/ /dpa' o khyod kyis mu stegs las/ /rgyal bar mdzad pa ci zhig mtshar/ /chags
203b5(bstod tshogs): sdang gti mug bcas pa dang/ /de nyid dang ni 'gro ba srid/ /phra rgyas spangs pa rnams kyis ni/ /rgol ba'i tshe na rnam dpyod yin/ /'dod chags bral bas chags bcas dang/ /zhe sdang bral bas zhe sdang can/ /gti mug bral bas rmongs pa ste/ /gsum
203b6(bstod tshogs): pos rtag tu gsum dag btul/ /btang snyoms gnas la gnas pa gang/ /ngo mtshar min zhing dka' ba min/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngo mtshar zhes bya ste/ /dam chos rab tu bstod pa dang/ /dam chos ma lags smod mdzad kyang/ /dam
203b7(bstod tshogs): ba dag dang tha ma la/ /khyod ni chags dang khro mi mnga' / /yun ring por ni mngon 'dod pa'i/ /yid la re ba skong ba dang/ /mi rigs pa ni rtsod pa yis/ chos nyid la ni gegs byed la/ /dgra bcom pa dang mu stegs la/ /rjes su chags dang khong khro bar/
204a1(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi thugs ni mi 'gyur ba/ /khyod la bstod du mi zhig mchis/ /gang zhig 'phel ba'i rgya mtshan phyir/ /srog kyang khyod kyis mi dgongs na/ /gzigs pa dang ni gsan pa dang/ /khyod kyis ma gzigs ma gsan bzhin/ /yon tan rnams la'ang
204a2(bstod tshogs): ma chags la/ /yon tan can la'ang bzhed mi mnga' / /kye ma'o khyod kyi thugs stobs ni/ /rab dang yongs su dag pa legs/ /phan tshun rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir/ /nges par lus dang sems dag gi/ mya ngan dga' sogs gnas skabs ni/ /re dogs kyis kyang shin tu
204a3(bstod tshogs): bsgribs/ /dbang po rnams ni rab dang ba/ /dus rnams rtag tu mi nyams pas/ /khyod thugs rtag tu dang ba dag /mngon sum gyur pa bzhin du gda' / /shin tu nyung ngu 'dod pa yis/ /'bad pa yis ni sbas na yang/ /nyes zad shin tu ma lus pa'i/ /gzhan
204a4(bstod tshogs): don gyis ni drangs pas na/ /rang bzhin dam pa legs gsungs dang/ /mdzad spyod bzang pos bsgrags pas na/ /khyod kyi blo gros dgongs pa dag /rnam dag byis pa'i bar la grags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya
204a5(bstod tshogs): ba las rmad du byung bar bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bzhi pa'o// //gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong bas/ /sems ni dang bar mi gyur pa/ /de la mig ni med pa ste/ /yang na yod kyang don med pa'o/ /nye bar zhi la yid du 'ong/ /'bar la gnod pa mdzad
204a6(bstod tshogs): mi mnga' / /dul la rngom brjid che ba yi/ /sku 'dis su zhig dang mi mdzad/ /gang yang lta dang zhi ba 'am/ /yul ni shin tu rnyed pa na/ /thams cad chags dang bral 'gyur zhing/ /'di ni mthong ba'i nang na mchog /khyod kyi sku de gang gis ni/ /lan brgya mthong
204a7(bstod tshogs): dang gang zhig gis/ /dang por mthong ba de gnyis ka /'dra bar mig ni mgu bar mdzad/ /rnam par sdang ba'i sems ldan yang/ /mthong bas ngoms par cis mi 'gyur/ /khyad par la mkhas ma yin yang/ /gang zhig yi dags rnams kyis ni/ /khyod
204b1(bstod tshogs): kyi sku ni mdzes pa'i phyir/ /blta bas mi ngoms rang bzhin pas/ /mthong ngo cog ni phyi phyir zhing/ /dga' ba skyed par mdzad pa lags/ /ngub par ma dgongs ngo mtshar te/ /rjes su mthun pa'i don mdzad cing/ /phrin las gsal bar gyur pa na/ /gang gis 'bad
204b2(bstod tshogs): pa seng por 'phrul/ /rten gyi yon tan dag dang ni/ /brten pa'i yon tan phan tshun du/ /'tsham pas khyod kyi sku dang ni/ /yon tan phun tshogs mchog dang ldan/ /khyod la yon tan mi mnga' na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di ni/ /gzhan pa gang zhig pa ni rten/
204b3(bstod tshogs): gzhan mi bas ni rnam par spras/ /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 'bar ba/ /khyod kyis ? bas ma gtogs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 'di/ /gzhan gang zhig la legs gnas 'gyur/ /phun sum tshogs las lhag pa'i sku/ /gzhan dang mtshungs min
204b4(bstod tshogs): thob pa ni/ /rten pa yi ni khyad par gyis/ /phun sum tshogs pa lhag par 'chad/ /khyod sku rten pa'i yon tan la/ /de dpal che zhes gsung gsung ltar/ /de yi yon tan rnams kyang slar/ /nged legs bkod ces gsungs ba 'dra/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
204b5(bstod tshogs): 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las sku la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u lnga pa'o// //gsod dang bkres skom grang dro dang/ /mi srun smad pa la sogs mang/ /gsum la ngub pa med bzod cing/ /ngan song
204b6(bstod tshogs): gi ni sdug bsngal yang/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni/ /khyad med nyon mongs rnams kyis bcings/ /khyod ni 'gro ba'i nyon mongs dag /dgril slad yun ring thugs rjes bsdams/ /bcings pa'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pas/ /'gro ba yis ni nyon mongs bzod/ /
204b7(bstod tshogs): khyod ni thugs rje yis bcings pas/ /bzod pa gang de ngo mtshar la/ /dang por khyod la phyag bgyi'am/ /'on te gang gis 'khor bar khyod/ /skyon mkhyen yun ring da lta bur/ /bzhugs mdzad thugs rje che la bgyi/ /de ltar sdug bsngal btang snyoms nas/ /dben pa'i gnas su bzhugs 
205a1(bstod tshogs): par mdzad/ /shin tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir/ /de ltar gyi yang bzod par mdzad/ /dben pa'i bde ba spangs gyur khyod/ /mang po'i nang du bzhugs pa gang/ /de khyod thugs rje dus 'das pa/ glags shig thod nas bgyis par
205a2(bstod tshogs): bas/ /'jig rten spyod pa 'dra ba mang/ /ma 'ongs bde ba la brten nas/ /da ltar byung las gus pa yis/ /sems can rnams la rnam dpyad nas/ /rig pa yis ni mtsho nang nas/ /klu bzhin khyod kyi thugs rje yis/ /dgon pa'i zhing gnas grong
205a3(bstod tshogs): gi mthar/ /gdul ba'i don gyi slad du drangs/ /gzhan la chags shing dgongs pa yis/ /thugs rje btsun mos mi bya med/ /yang na khyod ni de chags pas/ /rang dang mthun pas spangs nas gang/ /nyer zhi mchog la gnas bzhin du/ /thugs rje
205a4(bstod tshogs): gtso dang ldan pas na/ /rol mo mkhan gyis sgyu rtsal yang/ /khyod kyi zhabs kyis 'dor bar mdzad/ /don dam pa ni ma brnyes pas/ /sngon ni de bzhan dka' spyod min/ /sangs rgyas nyid ni brnyes pa yis/ /zhi gnas bdag nyid spangs nas kyang/
205a5(bstod tshogs): rdzu 'phrul seng ge'i sgra dang ni/ /nyid kyi yon tan brjod pa gang/ /de ni bzhed spyod mi mnga' ba/ /khyod kyi thugs rje bstan pa lags/ /gal te sems can don mdzad 'di/ /sems can yod ni mi 'gyur ba/ /gus pas gzhan du mi 'dra la/ /ji
205a6(bstod tshogs): ltar mi bzad ltar brtse med/ /gzhan gyi don du rab bzang gi /nyid kyi don la brtse med pas/ /mgon po khyod nyid 'ba' zhig la/ /thugs rjes thugs rjes mdzad ma gyur/ /yang na khyod nyid dka' ba rnams/ /spyod pa ma nyams des ni mdzad/ /khyod
205a7(bstod tshogs): kyis nyid don las lhag par/ /gzhan don rjes su gzigs par mdzad/ /'di ltar res 'ga' bstan pas gang/ /gzhan don grub par mdzad slad du/ /khyod ni lan brgyar phyogs dag tu/ /gtor ma bzhin du btang ba lags/ /gang zhig rjes su mi mthun pa'i
205b1(bstod tshogs): rol mo mkhan gyi bze sogs ni/ /ngan pa'i las la'ang drang bar mdzad/ /de nyid de ni mi 'thad do/ /de ltar khyod la gnod mdzad kyang/ /nongs pa can du mi brtsi bas/ /khyod kyi bzhed pa kho na dang/ /mthun 'jug pa ni lags par gda' / /gtong min yod de chags
205b2(bstod tshogs): pa min/ /chags pa yod de dngos mi shes/ /kha cig dngos po shes na yang/ /rjes su mthun min gtong ba yang/ /gtong ba min la chags pa yang/ /dngos po shes na rjes su mthun/ /thugs rje de yi spyod legs mang/ /gang gis smra bar byed par nus/ /
205b3(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las thugs rje la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u drug pa'o// //tshig bzang ba dang don che dang/ /bden pa dang ni snyan pa dang/ /zab gsal gnyis ka'i
205b4(bstod tshogs): don ldan dang/ /bsdus dang spros pa dang ldan pa/ /nyon mongs 'joms dang rtsub min dang/ /gsal dang bde blag rtogs pa dang/ /sna tshogs don ni ma 'khrugs dang/ /snying po can dang mang ba yang/ /khyod kyi gsung ni de lta bu/ /khyod kyi dgra bos thos na yang/
205b5(bstod tshogs): thams cad mkhyen pa lags so zhes/ /su zhig nges pa bskyed mi 'gyur/ /rjes su chags dang bar ma dang/ /sdang bas gnod pa byed pa la/ /nyes kun skyug par mdzad pa'i phyir/ /thams cad la ni thugs mnyam mnga' / /mang po ril gyis snyan ma lags//
205b6(bstod tshogs): bcos pa 'ga' tsam snyan pa lags/ /khyod kyi gsung ni don grub pas/ /thams cad legs gsung kho na lags/ /mos khams dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /gang phyir bsam pa sna tshogs pa/ /de bas thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /skyes bu 'dul mchog
205b7(bstod tshogs): kha lo sgyur/ /khyod kyi gsung ni rnam brtags na/ /gang zhig 'jam dang rtsub pa dang/ /gang yang de gnyis ldan pa dag /thams cad ro gcig nyid du 'gyur/ /yun ring 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni/ /thugs rje brtson 'grus phun tshogs pas/ /dgongs pa yang dag
206a1(bstod tshogs): shes rab kyang/ /thams cad la ni brtson dang ldan/ /e ma'o shin tu yongs dag pa'i/ /phrin las rnams kyang rab tu bzo/ /de yis rin chen gsung rnams kyi/ /snod 'di 'dra ba 'di bgyis so/ /snod kyi skyon dang 'brel bas na//
206a2(bstod tshogs): rnam par bdud rtsi 'di 'dra ba'ang/ /ro ni phrogs par gyur pa ste/ /lha yi chu ni rgya mtshor bzhin/ /khyod zhal bstan rab sdug pa/ /de las mnyan na snyan pa yis/ /gsung 'di dag ni zla ba las/ /bdud rtsi 'jig pa bzhin du gda' / /sngo ba thi sogs
206a3(bstod tshogs): dbye ba yis/ /mi sdug pa ni bstan pa dang/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje yang/ /spyod pa'i gnyen po'i phyogs kyis ni/ /khyod kyi gsung ni 'dod chags kyi/ /rdul rab zhi mdzad char sprin 'dra/ /zhe sdang sbrul ni gdon pa'i phyir/ /nam mkha' lding dang 'dra ba
206a4(bstod tshogs): lags/ /gzhan yang rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa yis/ /de bzhin las bdag gir bya ba/ /bdag med pa dang dbyer med pas/ /yang dang yang du mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib 'joms pas gdugs dang 'dra/ /nga rgyal ri bo
206a5(bstod tshogs): mngon 'joms pas/ /brgya byin mtshon cha 'dra ba lags/ /gal te 'di ni ma gsungs na/ /bde gshegs dgra bcom sangs rgyas dang/ /de ltar rtogs nyid phun tshogs pa'i/ /khyod kyi bden gsung sus rtogs 'gyur/ /don gzigs pas na
206a6(bstod tshogs): mi bslu ba/ /nongs mi mnga' phyir rjes su mthun/ /legs par sbyar bas go sla ste/ /khyod kyi gsung ni legs gsum ldan/ /zab pa dang ni snyan pa dang/ /go sla dang ni legs sbyar dang/ /gdul bya dang ni rjes su mthun/ /gdug pa la yang bden don
206a7(bstod tshogs): phyir/ /re zhig dang por khyod kyi gsung/ /nyan pa rnams kyi yang 'phrog mdzad/ /de nas yid la bsams bgyis na/ /rdul dang mun pa dag kyang sel/ /longs spyod nyung du tsam zhig dang/ /skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yang/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba
206b1(bstod tshogs): gzhan dbang la/ /nges par 'byung ba ston par mdzad/ /phongs pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin cing/ /bag med rnams ni skrag par mdzad/ /bde ba can dag skyo bgyid pas/ /khyod gsung kun dang 'tsham par 'jug /yongs smin dbang gis shes rab
206b2(bstod tshogs): ni/ /sgom pa'i rang bzhin bskyed mdzad cing/ /de las ldang ba'i dus su ni/ /thos bsam rang bzhin gyis kyang ni/ /mkhas pa rnams ni dga' ba bskyed/ /bar ma rnams kyi blo yang spel/ /tha ma'i rab rib rnam 'joms pas/ /gsung 'di skye bo
206b3(bstod tshogs): kun la sman/ /shes rab spyan ni zag pa med/ /dang po bden pa skyed par mdzad/ /de 'og dbang po'i dbye ba yis/ /bsgom pa dang ni mi slob lam/ /lta ba dag la dgar mdzad cing/ /mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'dren/ /nyes pa sel mdzad khyod
206b4(bstod tshogs): kyi gsung/ /yon tan rnams kyi char yang 'bebs/ /'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /sngon dus la rgyus gsung ba'i phyir/ /skal can rnams la don dam pa/ /shin tu ma 'das pa yis kyang/ /kun la ma thogs thugs mnga' zhing/ /dgongs
206b5(bstod tshogs): pa'ang kun tu nyer gnas pas/ /de slad khyod kyis lung bstan kun/ /thams cad la yang bslu mi mnga' / /khyod kyi nyan thos mchog rnams kyi/ /rigs dang smin dang mos pa yis/ /mi shes pas ni bsgrib pa'i tshig /khyod ni thugs dgongs ma nyams
206b6(bstod tshogs): pas/ /gang slad du min yul min dang/ /snod min rnams su mi 'jug pa/ /de slad khyod gsung don mchis te/ /brtson 'grus legs par brtsams pa bzhin/ /khyod gsung yon tan cha tsam la'ang/ /bdag gis bstod pa nus ma yin/ /gang gis
206b7(bstod tshogs): khyod kyang 'dod chung ba'i/ /rab tu gsal bar kun tu 'dren/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las gsung la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bdun pa'o// //bgrod pa gcig
207a1(bstod tshogs): dang thabs bde dang/ /legs par 'brel dang nyes pa med/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge bas/ /khyod kyi bstan 'dra gzhan la med/ /gzhan rnams kyang ni thar don min/ /dka' bas thob cing bde 'gro min/ /mi rtag phan tshun
207a2(bstod tshogs): 'gal ba ste/ /de lam 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/ /khyod kyi gzhung lugs de lta bu/ /gcig pu phongs la lta chags pas/ /byis pa gal te smod bgyid na/ /lta dang 'dra ba'i dgra ma mchis/ /byang chub sems ni nyer blangs nas/ /gzhan don la chags
207a3(bstod tshogs): thugs mnga' bas/ /khyod bskal bye bar skad cig bzhin/ /dmyal bar yang ni de bzhin bzhugs/ /'gro ba yi ni don slad du/ /sdug bsngal mang ltar gar lags pa/ /de bsams khyod bstan ngan na yang/ /gnas par bgyi ba la thug na/ /nyon
207a4(bstod tshogs): mongs bde ba chung byed pa'i/ /mi yi bdag po'i bka' lung gis/ /dmyal ba yi yang las rnams la'ang/ /byas pa gzo bas 'jug par mthong/ /phan pa gsung zhing phan pa mdzad/ /khyod kyi bstan pa ci smos te/ /mgo la zhugs ni 'bar bas
207a5(bstod tshogs): kyang/ /ci yi slad du bsgrub mi bgyid/ /zhi gnas ye shes rdzogs pa dang/ /rtogs par gyur nas dad pa dang/ /nyon mongs kun las rnam 'grel phyir/ /byis pa slob dang mkhas rnams kyis/ /khyod kyi bstan pas rang dbang dang/ /byang chub
207a6(bstod tshogs): bde dang zhi ba dang/ /khyod kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang/ /legs pa bzhi po 'di kun thob/ /stong pa nyid ni gsung ba dang/ /srid par smon pa mi mnga' dang/ /mtshan ma med pa rnyed mdzad pa/ /gang de chags sdang med pa'i phyir/ /dpa' o
207a7(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi bstan pa 'di/ /mu stegs thams cad skrag mdzad la/ /bdud ni sems khong chud mdzad cing/ /lha dang mi rnams dbugs kyang 'byin/ /bdag tu lta bas 'dus byas la/ /smod med mya ngan 'das mi 'thad/ /de slad de yi mi mthun
207b1(bstod tshogs): pa/ /'chi bdag gis ni 'tshe bar 'gyur/ /'chi bdag bstan pa khams gsum gyi/ /sa chen dag la spyod bgyid pa/ /mi thogs zlogs pa ma mchis pa'ang/ /khyod kyi bstan pas zil gyis mnan/ /skyes nas nges par 'jig pa'i phyir/ /'on te nyon mongs bzhin
207b2(bstod tshogs): 'chi 'phos khyod sras kyis kyang dbang thob phyir/ /de las 'di ni khyad ches 'phags/ /khyod kyi bstan pa'i lugs 'tshal ba/ /dga' na bskal par yang gnas la/ /gang du bdud kyis mi rdzi ba/ /der yang dga' mgur rab tu mchi/ /thabs sogs sgrub
207b3(bstod tshogs): la mkhas pa yis/ /shes rab gsum po rnam 'phel phyir/ /gang tshe sems ni nges sbyar dang/ /bzhag dang sdang ba zhes bya 'dis/ /lung gi don ni bsams pa dang/ /bsgoms dang gus par mnyan pa yis/ /dus gsum cha dbye khyod kyi ni/ /bstan
207b4(bstod tshogs): las gzhan la mchis ma lags/ /rigs pa lnga phyir ma 'phel zhing/ /bsam bya'i gnas dang bral ba'i phyir/ /mu stegs gzhan gyi mthong bzhin yang/ /lta la srid pa'i gdon gyis dkrugs/ /drang srong skyes mchog khyod kyi bstan/ /de ltar
207b5(bstod tshogs): legs pas khyab 'di la/ /ma gus gang lags de las ni/ /sdug bsngal chen po'ang ci zhig mchis/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bstan pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u brgyad
207b6(bstod tshogs): pa'o// //gang zhig snga mar smon lam mdzad/ /yang na mthong dang thos pa yang/ /'gro ba rnams la smon mdzad pa/ /da ltar yang ni don ldan 'khums/ /khyod thos pas ni spro ba skyed/ /mthong bas dad pa skye bar
207b7(bstod tshogs): 'gyur/ /khyod gsung thos pas dga' 'gyur te/ /bstan pas rnam par grol bar mdzad/ /kye ma'o gnas skabs thams cad du/ /skye dgu rnams la sman mdzad pa'i/ /chos bstan pas ni byed pa na/ /gang mthar bde bsgrub pa'i phyir//
208a1(bstod tshogs): khyod kyi sras kyis mgu bar 'gyur/ /'phel bas skye dgu rnams kyang dga' / /gshegs pa na ni phan 'dogs mdzad/ /ldog pa na ni 'god pa mdzad/ /gang zhig dad pas brlan sems kyis/ /yon tan dran pa gsal
208a2(bstod tshogs): bas kyang/ /gal te khyod ni bde mdzad na/ /de las ngo mtshar ma mchis lags/ /bsgrags pas sdig pa 'phrog par mdzad/ /khyod dran pas ni rangs par 'gyur/ /btsal bas blo gros skye 'gyur te/ /yongs su shes pas rnam par 'dag/
208a3(bstod tshogs): de bzhin skyabs 'gro len pa dang/ /sbyin dang slob pa rjes byed pa'i/ /'jigs 'joms mdzad pa ci ngo mtshar/ /gang zhig chos la mngon 'dod pas/ /khyod la bsu bas dpal du byed/ /bstan pas blo gros mchog tu 'gyur/ /bsten na 'jigs
208a4(bstod tshogs): pa med par mdzad/ /bsnyen bkur bgyis pas bde bar 'gyur/ /glags skabs tshol bar byed pas kyang/ /khyod kyi drung du nyer mchis na/ /phyi nas gdung ba dang ldan phyir/ /sman pa bzhin du de bzhin khyod/ /tshul khrims phun sum
208a5(bstod tshogs): tshogs pas dag /bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pas dang/ /shes rab phun tshogs mi 'khrugs pas/ /khyod ni bsod nams mtsho chen lags/ /mched 'bru ba la brtson pa ste/ /b+ha ra d+hwa dza la sogs kyang/ /nges legs dang 'dra
208a6(bstod tshogs): cis mi 'gyur/ /khyod la de ni ngo mtshar ci/ /khyod sku bltar 'os rin chen te/ /legs gsungs mnyan 'os rin chen lags/ /chos ni spyad 'os rin chen pas/ /khyod ni rin chen 'byung gnas lags/ /'jigs pa mi bzad
208a7(bstod tshogs): rnams su yang/ /khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis gang/ /zhi bar gyur pa de la yang/ /mtshar min gang zhig thugs rje'i bdag /khyod ni chu bos bdas pa'i gling/ /smas pa'i bdag nyid skyob pa ste/ /srid pa'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i skyabs/ /
208b1(bstod tshogs): thar 'tshal rnams kyi 'dren pa lags/ /me tog gcig ni rang 'phul bas/ /gang zhig ngan 'gror ltung ma gyur/ /de la dus nges bstan pa la/ /mtshar min khyod sngon 'di 'dra lags/ /tshul khrims dag phyir snod kyi mchog/ zhing gshin
208b2(bstod tshogs): 'bras bu phun sum tshogs/ /srog chags kun la phan mdzad phyir/ /grogs kyi phul yang khyod lags so/ /gang zhig gis khyod mthong tsam gyis/ /skyon yon la ni mi mkhas pa/ /dud 'gro dang ni gzhan min 'gyur/ /de la drin sogs
208b3(bstod tshogs): mtshar ma lags/ /phan 'dogs mdzad pas mdzad bshes te/ /'grogs na bde phyir snying du sdug/ zhi phyir gcig tu yid du 'ong/ /yon tan kun mnga' mchod 'os khyod/ /gang zhig mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ /ngan song gi ni sdug bsngal yang
208b4(bstod tshogs): nye bar zhi ba de la yang/ /gnas min 'jig rten dogs pa can/ /sdig pa med pas yid dang 'thad/ /sku gsung bzang bas dga' bar mdzad/ /don kun grub phyir dpal yangs te/ /yon tan legs rten bkra shis lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom
208b5(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las smon lam gyi bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u dgu pa'o// //snga phyir sems gnas bsgrub slad du/ /rmugs la sogs pa zhi ba'i phyir/ /phyi
208b6(bstod tshogs): rol g.yeng ba zhi don du/ /nang gi chog shes spangs pa'i phyir/ /khyod ni rngan then bgyid la bskul/ /chom rkun bgyid pa tshar yang gcod/ /gya gyu can rnams rnal du 'god/ /dal bus bgyid la bzhen skul 'debs/ /zhi gnas nges
208b7(bstod tshogs): par rdzogs nas ni/ /phyi nas bden la sbyar bar mdzad/ /bsgom pa khyad par mdzad slad du/ /sa bon med par spangs par mdzad/ /dul ba rnams ni lam la sbyar/ /dmu rgod rnams la btang snyoms mdzad/ /de slad skyes bu 'dul ba yi/ /
209a1(bstod tshogs): kha lo bsgyur ba bla med mchog /thad du phyin nas khyod mtshang 'bru/ /gang zhig sa bon med par spangs/ /'on kyang de la btang snyoms min/ /phan pa'i dus la gzhes par mdzad/ /khyod ni nyam thag rnams la brtse/ /bde bar gnas
209a2(bstod tshogs): la phan par bgyid/ /yongs par gnas la thugs rje bas/ /kun la phan par bzhed pa lags/ /gang zhig bar ma la phan bzhed/ /de ni shin tu ngo mtshar min/ /gang zhig slar yang byas 'joms pa'i/ /gnyen dang grogs rnams la ni bzhin/ /khyod ni dgra bo
209a3(bstod tshogs): rnams la'ang byams/ /nyams par gyur la phan 'dogs mdzad/ /gtum po rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /khyod ni ya rabs rmad cig lags/ /skye ba gcig tu phyi rol gyi/ /bza' btung gos la sogs pa yi/ /nyon mongs pa yi dbang gis ni/ /lus tsam
209a4(bstod tshogs): la ni phan byed dag /phan 'dogs bgyid slad pha ma dag /gal te bla mar 'tshal na go /khyod ni lhag par phan 'dogs pas/ /bla ma nyid gyur smos ci 'tshal/ /thar pa'i sa bon ji ltar yang/ /de rnams dge ba la btsud nas/ /dus gcig yongs su smin slad
209a5(bstod tshogs): du/ /dus ni kun tu 'da' bar mdzad/ /rang gi don la mi lta bas/ /nyid kyi dgra bo ltar gyur cing/ /g.yeng sa'i mun gnas rnams la/ /rab lta bur gyur pa'ang khyod/ /de nas ji ltar snod gyur pa'i/ /yongs su smin par gzigs nas ni/ /slar yang thu
209a6(bstod tshogs): ni ma bsnyel zhing/ /sman gdags bsam gtan la brtson lags/ /'jig rten gnyis kar sman gdags slad/ /'jig rten las ni 'da' slad du/ /mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ /khyod kyis shes rab snang bar mdzad/ /de las tha dad med pa yis/ /
209a7(bstod tshogs): rgyu bcas rgyu ni med pa yang/ /'phags pa'i lam la 'god mdzad dang/ /khyod kyis 'jig rten la ston mdzad/ /yul la nye bar spyad pa na/ /lha min spyod pa tha dad kyi/ /khyod kyi longs spyod thun mong bas/ /khyod la dbye ba mi mnga' o/ /gang du rgyu ni med pa la
209b1(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis bstan par rab btsud na/ /de la thar pa'i rgyu bcas la/ /mdor bsdus pas na smos ci dgos/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis skye ba dang/ /na tshong rigs dang yul dang ni/ /dus kyi skyon med chos rnams kyis/ /'di dag kun la sman yon btags/ /'di ni dman dang
209b2(bstod tshogs): 'od mchog ces/ /khyod kyis bltos pa bsal nas ni/ /de ltar yon tan 'phags 'dren pa/ /'bad pas ji ltar bdag nyid bzhin/ /khyod kyi nyan thos sred bral zhing/ /ya mtshan 'dzin pa med rnams la'ang/ /lha rnams thal sbyar smon bgyid cing/ /ya mtshan che
209b3(bstod tshogs): ba lta bur mchod/ /bdag nyid 'jigs pas bde thob pa'i/ /yul dag spangs par gyur nas ni/ /'gran zla bzhin du cig nas cig /mchog tu rjes su 'brang ba byed/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas 'khor ba yi/ /nyid khur gyur pa byung ba brjid/ /des na mi yang lha
209b4(bstod tshogs): rnams kyis/ /smon par bya ba nyid du gyur/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla stod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las lam 'jug pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste/ le'u bcu pa'o// //mnyel dang zhi bde nyams
209b5(bstod tshogs): gyur dang/ /skye bo ngan dang 'grogs pa dang/ /mi mthun pa dang mang po yi/ /skyon yang yon tan bzhin dgongs shing/ /gzhan la sman pa mdzad la chags/ /thugs rje yis ni thugs bcings pas/ /bskal pa grangs med gsum gyis ni/ /khyod kyis
209b6(bstod tshogs): sdug bsngal mi dgongs so/ /'gro ba'i don slad ma chags pa'i/ /thugs kyis brtson pa mdzad pa gang/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos nyid bcom ldan de rmad do/ /zhi gnas bde ba ma thob pa/ /sngon mdzad gang de ngo mtshar min/ /khyod kyis
209b7(bstod tshogs): zhi gnas thob pa yang/ /spangs pa'i mdzad pa ngo mtshar ro/ /bshos kyang phal pa gsol mdzad cing/ /res 'ga' bsnyung ba dag kyang mdzad/ /nyam nga'i shul duAng gshegs mdzad cing/ /rang rod can duAng mnal ba mdzad/ /slar yang phyag gi
210a1(bstod tshogs): bdud rtsi yis/ /gzhan rnams la ni phan pa mdzad/ /de nyid kyis ni mi 'grang pa'i/ /mi srun spyod pas phal pa bzhin/ /mgon khyod gtso bor gyur lags kyang/ /gdul bya rnams la byams slad du/ /sku ngas brdo dang gcam tshul dang/ /
210a2(bstod tshogs): skad dang cha lugs sgyur ba'ang mdzad/ /mang po'i rang don mthar thug dang/ /de ni khyod kyi che ba lags/ /de la mngon 'dod don la yang/ /de lta'i sdug bsngal bsdam pa mdzad/ /kun gyis dga' mgur dang don phyir/ /bran bzhin bskos par bsgrims pa
210a3(bstod tshogs): lags/ /mgon khyod rtag tu bdag nyid la/ /mnga' ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so/ /lci dang cha lugs yang dgongs pa'ang/ /de tshe khyod la ga la ste/ /gang phyir gzhan ma spangs nas kyang/ /sdug bsngal ldan pa mthar phyin pas/ /khyod la gang
210a4(bstod tshogs): dang gang du yang/ /ji skad bskul yang mi spong ste/ /nyid kyi sgrub pa bzang po las/ /'da' bar 'gyur ba ma mchis so/ /pha 'am yang na gzhan legs la/ /byams pa 'am yang na snying rje yis/ /khyod yon phrag dog gis gdungs dang/ /de bzhin rgyu
210a5(bstod tshogs): med dgra bo la/ /ji ltar khyod ni gnod bgyid la/ /phan pa lhur mdzad de lta bur/ /skye bo dag ni phan bgyid la'ang/ /phan pa de ltar lhur mi bgyid/ /nyes rtog gdon gyis zos pa ni/ /phyir zhing shin tu mi bzad la/ /mgon po rang sems rjes
210a6(bstod tshogs): mthun pas/ /khyod kyis nyes pa mthong ba la/ /khyod ni gnod bgyid dgra bo la/ /phan pa mdzad pa'i bshes lags te/ /rtag tu skyon dag tshol ba la/ /yon tan 'ba' zhig tshol ba'ang lags/ /shin tu dge ba'i spyod ldan pa/ /mgo dang yid dang
210a7(bstod tshogs): tshig dag gis/ /khyod ni phyag 'tshal mchod 'os la/ /rtag tu bdag ni phyag 'tshal bstod/ /khyod ni gang na dug bcas shing/ /zhugs dang bcas par spyan drangs pa/ /der ni brtser bcas gshegs pa dang/ /khyod la bdud rtsi can du 'gyur/ /
210b1(bstod tshogs): shin tu phan tshun 'gal ba can/ /sems can rnams kyi log rtog pas/ /mi bskyod de la lan 'jug pa'i/ /thugs ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzod pas mi snyan bzod pa dang/ /'khub dag ni bde legs kyis/ /mi snyan smra la bden pa ste/ /khyod kyis sdang ba byams pas
210b2(bstod tshogs): btul/ /dgra rnams la ni 'bang min pas/ /thugs kyis kyang ni rtag tu btul/ /bzlog la yang dag 'jog mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog ma med dus goms pa yi/ /mi yi rang bzhin mang po yang/ /khyod kyis ngan song rnam bzlog nas/ /skad
210b3(bstod tshogs): cig nyid la yongs su bsgyur/ /shin tu bzang min khams tsam yang/ /yun ring gis ni 'phel mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i spyod pa rjes 'jug pa/ /sman mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes
210b4(bstod tshogs): bya ba las dka' ba mdzad pa la bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o// //rtsub pa dang 'jam bgyis pa dang/ /'jungs pa rnams ni gtod phod dang/ /gtum pa nges par bgyis pa gang/ /de ni khyod kyi thabs mkhas
210b5(bstod tshogs): lags/ /rang rig rjes su mi gcod cing/ /dge ba gong du 'dren byed pa/ /skye ba gzhan du mdzad pa'i phyir/ /dge mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' bo dbang po nyer zhi dang/ /nga rgyal khengs pa 'dud pa dang/ /sor mo'i phreng ba'ang zhi ba bgyis na/ /su zhig
210b6(bstod tshogs): ngo mtshar skye mi bgyid/ /shin tu mchog don mdzad slad du/ /dmu rgod rnams ni bde ba yis/ /shin tu ngo mtshar gyur pa yis/ /'dul mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi chos kyi ros tshim pas/ /gser las bgyis pa'i mal spangs nas/ /ran
210b7(bstod tshogs): mang bting ba'i gnas mal du/ /brtan rnams bsod nyams nyal bar bgyid/ /gzhan gyi dbang gis lus tsam ni/ /shin tu tshim dang rjes mthun min/ /gang phyir gzhan gyis tshim byed las/ /tshim mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /khyod
211a1(bstod tshogs): kyis dus dang bsam mkhyen pas/ /res 'ga' nus na'ang mi gsung la/ /spros 'gyur gzhan la bstan pa dang/ /drung du gshegs nas bshad pa'ang mdzad/ /rgyun min mkhas pa ma yin phyir/ /thams cad du ni tshig mi 'grub/ /
211a2(bstod tshogs): de ni shin tu spangs mdzad phyir/ /bden gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med gos la tshon bzhin du/ /thog mar sbyin sogs gtam dag gis/ /sems la spro ba bskyed nas ni/ /phyi nas chos ni bstan pa mdzad/ /rig dang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i/ /
211a3(bstod tshogs): tshig gis sems ni 'gugs mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis sems ni bkug mdzad nas/ /'chi med gsol mdzad la phyag 'tshal/ /'khor ba mi bzad gting nas ni/ /'gro ba nyon mongs drang slad du/ /khyod kyis gang zhig ma stsal ba'i/ /thabs dang spyod pa de ma
211a4(bstod tshogs): mchis/ /kha cig pha rol 'dod slad du/ /brtson 'grus ldan la thabs mi mkhas/ /thabs mkhas brtson 'grus med pa las/ /'dren mdzad mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sku yi cha lugs rnam mar dang/ /gsung gis so so'i skad bzhin du/ /gdul
211a5(bstod tshogs): ba'i bsam pa tha dad pa/ /de dang der ni khyod kyis mdzad/ /gzhan gyi cha lugs sna tshogs ni/ /don med yang na gzhan gsod phyir/ /don ldan sku ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /don kun mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag kun kyang dag pa dang/ /mi 'gal ba dang mchod 'os
211a6(bstod tshogs): dang/ /brjid dang lha mi rnams la ni/ /sman 'dogs bskur ba sha stag lags/ /phyi rol rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ /gzhan gsod pa dang smod pa ste/ /bkra shis gzhan don kun ldan pa'i/ /spyod pa mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /smra dang bgyid pa phal cher ni/ /
211a7(bstod tshogs): legs pa rngo thog ma lags kyi/ /bden par gsung ba khyed la ni/ /de gnyis gzhan du gda' ba lags/ /gzhan gyi spyod pa tshig ni gzhan/ /nyon mongs phal cher 'khrugs pa yang/ /spyod pa dang ni don mthun pa'i/ /legs gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
211b1(bstod tshogs): bdag nyid dag pa 'ba' zhig gis/ /khyod kyis 'gro ba'i dpal zhing mdzad/ /'di ltar rnam pa 'di 'dra'i zhing/ /'jig rten gsum na mchis ma lags/ /gal te dbye byed rnams kyi ni/ /'ba' zhig khyod ni snod gyur na/ /de bzhin dpag med dge ldan pa'i/ /
211b2(bstod tshogs): sgo 'gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog med srid pa nyam nga bar/ /snga nas gcig tu nyams pa yi/ /sems can kun la sman slad du/ /khyod ni de ltar brtson pa lags/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa dad pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba la
211b3(bstod tshogs): mkhas par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// //gang phyir mya ngan gyis nyams pas/ /ston pa rnyed par dka' ba yang/ /slar yang dka' la brtson ldan pa/ /khyod la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis khyod drin lan
211b4(bstod tshogs): lon pa'i/ /sgrub de mchis snyam mi bgyid/ /skye bo gang dag mya ngan 'das/ /de dag gis kyang lan ma lon/ /rang don byed par bdag mchog cing/ /de ltar gang gis rmad byung gsungs/ /thog mar ma thogs phun sum tshogs/ /ston mdzad khyod la
211b5(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyi chos la gnas de dag /rang don kho na bgyid par bas/ /de yi slad du 'o brgyal gang/ /de la lan go ci zhig lon/ /khyod ni sems can gnyid log pas/ /rgyud la gzigs pa'i zhugs che ba/ /bag med gyur pa rnams kyi ni/ /
211b6(bstod tshogs): grogs bzang bag dang bcas pa lags/ /gti mug mnal ni bcom pa'i phyir/ /shin tu sad khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /snod dang snod min sogs dpyod phyir/ /'jig rten mkhyen la slar phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod kyis nyon mongs gzhom pa bshad/ /bdud
211b7(bstod tshogs): kyis g.yo dag bstan pa mdzad/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi bzad brjod/ /'jigs pa med pa'i phyogs kyang bstan/ /gal te gzhan gyi rgyud rnams kyi/ /nyon mongs bdud las rgyal gyur pa/ /bdud kun las rgyal smos ci 'tshal/ /phan dgongs
212a1(bstod tshogs): thugs rje can gyis ni/ /sems can rnams la bgyi 'tshal ba/ /gang zhig khyod kyis ma mdzad pa/ /gzhan go ci zhig mchis lags kye/ /mgon khyod grangs dang 'phags pa dang/ /bla ma yan lag gnyen 'dun gyis/ /dgongs
212a2(bstod tshogs): pa mdzad pa gang lags pa/ /de phyir kun bdag la phyag 'tshal/ /gal te chos ni 'di dag dang/ /spo ba zhig tu btub na ni/ /gdon mi 'tshal bar khyod kyis ni/ /lhas byin la brten kun la'ang rtsol/ /khyod kyis mdzad par mi spyod gang/ /de ni nges
212a3(bstod tshogs): par bgyid mi rigs/ /gnas ma yin las ldog pa dang/ /gnas la zhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten rnams la thugs brtse bas/ /yun rings sa steng dam chos bshad/ /'jig rten gsum phan 'dogs nus pa'i/ /slob ma dam
212a4(bstod tshogs): pa'ang mang du bskrun/ /bskrun nas gdul ba'i khyad par gyis/ /bstan pa rgyas ni btab nas kyang/ /mngon du btul ba'i tshogs kyang ni/ /mdzes bzang yan chad btul lags pas/ /da go khyod la sems can gyi/ /bu lon lhag ma ci
212a5(bstod tshogs): mchis na/ /chos kyi sku yis ma lus pa'i/ /'gro ba dag dang ldan khyod kyis/ /slob dpon khu tshur bcing min phyir/ /bu lon lhag ma gzhan ci mchis/ /'di ltar rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /sku gdung til 'bru bzhin blags nas/ /mjug tuAng
212a6(bstod tshogs): khyod kyis shin tu ni/ /dka' spyad yal bar ma dor ro/ /yang na gzugs sku'i mthar yang ni/ /sems can don mdzad nyid gzigs nas/ /nyid kyi bde la chags mi mnga' / /de las bltos pa dor bar mdzad/ /gzugs kyi sku dang chos 'di dag/
212a7(bstod tshogs): gzhan don kho nar mdzad do zhes/ /'jig rten yid ches dka' 'di la/ /khyod kyis mya ngan 'das pa bstan/ /de ni spyod bzang mthar thug pa'i/ /sems can gzhan don mdzad pa nyid/ /gang zhig thog ma dbus mthar yang/ /khyod kyis ma nyams
212b1(bstod tshogs): nyid du 'khums/ /de slad chos sku ma lus pa/ /sras kyi mchog la gtad mdzad do/ /gzugs sku til 'bru ltar bshig nas/ /khyod ni yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /de ltar thog ma dbus mdza' ru/ /chos gzugs sku gnyis bdag nyid kyis/ /sems can don la
212b2(bstod tshogs): phan mdzad phyir/ /bu lon mi mnga' la phyag 'tshal/ /e ma'o gnas ba e ma'o tshul/ /e ma'o yon tan e ma'o sku/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni chos rnams la/ /ya mtshan mi che 'ga' ma mchis/ /tshul khrims dang ni bsam gtan rgyu/ /de'i 'bras
212b3(bstod tshogs): gzugs dang gzugs med pa'ang/ /gang phyir khyod kyis ma dgongs te/ /de phyir bsam min khyod phyag 'tshal/ /phan 'dogs mdzad cing blta na sdug /sku gsung phrin las zhi gyur pa/ /khyod la'ang sdang bar rab bgyid pa'i/ /rmongs pa mi bzad pa
212b4(bstod tshogs): la gzigs/ /khyod la sdang bar byed pa la/ /sman mdzad pa ni bsam mi nus/ /de sman mdzad pa bsam min pas/ /rtag tu khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsod nams rgya mtshor rin chen gter/ /yon tan 'byung gnas chos kyi tshogs/ /khyod la
212b5(bstod tshogs): sems can gang 'dud pa/ /de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lags/ /khyod kyi zhabs rdul gyis brgyan pa'i/ /yul gang de la'ang phyag 'tshal nas/ /dge ba'i bstan pa la mkhas pa'i/ /mtshan gyis brgyan pa smos ci 'tshal/ /mgon khyod yon
212b6(bstod tshogs): tan mi bas kyang/ /bdag gi zho sha bas 'tshal bas/ /des na 'jigs pa mchis slad du/ /glo ba la ni gcags shing mchis/ /khyod ni rang sangs rgyas kyis min/ /nyan thos mchog gtso bos ma yin/ /byang chub nye ba'i byang sems kyis/ /
212b7(bstod tshogs): rtogs mi 'gyur na gzhan ci smos/ /khyod kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid/ /tshad ma mchis la bsam mi khyab/ /bstan min grangs kyang ma mchis pa/ /khyod bdag nyid kyis mkhyen lags drang/ /bsam min tshogs des phun sum tshogs thob pa/ /gzhan
213a1(bstod tshogs): don spyod pa ngo mtshar dge las kyi/ /yon tan cha tsam brjod par bdag rmongs pas/ /rang don dgongs pas mi nus par yang byas/ /mtsho chen chab ni bas par ma gyur kyang/ /skye bo'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bgyid ltar/ /khyod
213a2(bstod tshogs): kyi yon tan cha tsam ma sgrogs kyang/ /bdag ni mchog tu glo ba dga' zhing mchis/ /btsun pas mdzad pa'i bstod pa'i drung du ni/ /brjod nyung mdzes pa ma yin ci zhig 'gran/ /'o na'ang bdag ni mi shes pa yis spel/ /skye bo'i rna bar ji
213a3(bstod tshogs): ltar 'jug par 'gyur/ /bdag gis thub la dad pas spobs skyes pa'i/ /dge ba'i las 'di'i 'bras bu 'khrungs pas ni/ /ngan rtog rlung dmar tshul mas dkrugs pa yi/ /'gro ba'i sems ni rnal du gnas par shog/ sangs rgyas bcom
213a4(bstod tshogs): ldan 'das la bstod pa dang pa las spobs pa skyes pa zhes bya ba las bu lon med par bstod pa zhes bya ba ste le'u bcu gsum pa'o// //spel mar bstod pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po mi tra tsi Ta dang/ /slob dpon
213a5(bstod tshogs): phyogs kyi glang po dag gi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra ka la sha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong bsod nams bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
213a6(bstod tshogs): */ (/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstan pa 'gro ba kun gyis mchod
213a7(bstod tshogs): gyur cing/ /gzhan don rdzogs mdzad pa la rnam par mkhas/ /nyon mongs sprul chen kun tu 'byin mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /zag bcas bag chags thams cad spangs gyur cing/ /don kun
213b1(bstod tshogs): de nyid nges par gzigs mdzad pa/ /skye dgu thams cad don la brtson gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /dam chos rin chen 'byung gnas snod gyur cing/ /lam mchog mya ngan 'das pa ston mdzad la/ /yid la
213b2(bstod tshogs): re ba kun tu rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /'jig rten rnams la rjes brtser mngon par gus/ /byams dang thugs rje yongs su bsgos gyur cig /kun don spyod pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs
213b3(bstod tshogs): pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /kun don bsam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /gdul bya'i pad+ma 'byed pa'i spyan dang ldan/ /rgya chen slob ma dam pa'i yon tan bskyed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bskal pa mdza' yas
213b4(bstod tshogs): tshogs ni bsags gyur cing/ /tshangs dbang lha dbang rnams kyis phyag byas la/ /sku la 'dom gang 'od kyis brgyan gyur ba'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyes pa'i rtsa ba ma lus bcom gyur cing/ /ye shes me
213b5(bstod tshogs): yis dri ma'i shing bsregs la/ /shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /nyon mongs bag chags bcas kun rnam bcom zhing/ /grags pa chen po kun tu grags gyur la/ /
213b6(bstod tshogs): mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan/ /pad+ma lta bu'i spyan ni rab rgyas shing/ /btso ma'i gser gyi phung po 'dra ba yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /bsod nams rgya chen rmad byung 'di yis ni/ /bdag
213b7(bstod tshogs): nyid nyon mongs bag chags bcas 'byin cing/ /'khor ba'i nyon mongs rgya mtsho chen po 'dir/ /nub par gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'don par shog /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa rdzogs so// //
214a1(bstod tshogs): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn shAkya mu ne sto tra/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad/ /khyod ni 'jig rten don mdzad blo
214a2(bstod tshogs): gros bzang/ /snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba/ /'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyin pa dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba/ /gdul bya 'dul bzhin gdul bya'i pha rol byon/ /bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod
214a3(bstod tshogs): pa/ /gdul bya'i mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad cing/ /'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra/ /dge ba mtshan gyi dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba/ /srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol
214a4(bstod tshogs): gshegs pas gzhan gyi tshogs rdzogs shing/ /pha rol phas rgol tshogs 'joms mi g.yo ba/ /sems can gzhan gyi sems dang spyod la mkhas/ /pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgra bcom rgyal po nyon gcil dri bsal ba/
214a5(bstod tshogs): 'tsho ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas/ /lha yi lha mchog dri med dri bral ba/ /thugs rje mchog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi'i bka' mchid gsung/ /mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi bka' mchis can/ /mnyam
214a6(bstod tshogs): thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs/ /chos la mnyam gnas mi rnams kha lo sgyur/ /yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan/ /tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur snyan pa'i gsung/ /thams
214a7(bstod tshogs): cad dbyangs kyi yan lag gsung tshul rdzogs/ /bden pa snyan gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong pa mtshan ma med cing smon dang bral/ /zab mo blta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka' / /thar la 'jug par mkhas pa'i blo gros can/ /thar pa'i lam dgyes khyod la
214b1(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu la brten pa'i mkhas pa blo gros can/ /mdza' gnyis lta ba rtag tu mi mkhas pa/ /las kyi 'bras bu rnam smin kho nar gsung/ /lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang nas ma byon gang duAng gshegs ma lags/ /rtag tu dben pa'i
214b2(bstod tshogs): chos rnams rab gsung ba/ /smin rgyu sgyu bzhin nga yi mi mnga' ba/ /dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dang mi skye gang du skye ma lags/ /skye dang 'jig dang gang du mi gsal ba/ /chos kyi gnas nyid ji ltar gnas la gnas/ /gnas dang mi
214b3(bstod tshogs): gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung/ /rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la bzhugs/ /ri rab rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dra ba'i sku/ /mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa slob
214b4(bstod tshogs): dpon dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/yon tan mdza' yas par bstod pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ gun a baryan+ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ yon tan mdza' yas par
214b5(bstod tshogs): bstod pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan mdza' mi 'tshal bas gal te khyod bsngags mi brjod na/ /'ga' yang khyod bstod mi bgyid khyod kyi 'byor pa 'gro bas rtogs ma mchis/ /gang slad 'gro 'dis khyod la bstod
214b6(bstod tshogs): pa bgyis kyang nongs pa ma mchis pa/ /de slad don 'dir bdag ni blo gros rab tu chung yang brtson pa lags/ /srid gsum dag la phan brtson blo mnga' ngan song gnas na'ang bsngags par 'os/ /rang don smon pa'i blo gros can ni mya ngan 'das kyang ma
214b7(bstod tshogs): lags shes/ /de slad khyod ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas mi ldog brtan zhing mi g.yo bas/ /'jig rten skye zhing 'chi bas nyams thag yongs su bskyab par brtson pa lags/ /srid pa'i 'gro ba dag tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis smas pa'i sems can la//
215a1(bstod tshogs): bdag gi blo gros rtsub pos sdug bsngal rnam mang de dang de bsgrubs pas/ /de phyir bdag gis de dag rnams la bde ba bskyed phyir bzod bya zhes/ /de slad khyod ni 'gro la zhi ba'i bde ba bskyed slad brtson pa lags/ /sems
215a2(bstod tshogs): can gang dag ma rig mdongs pas bsam pa rgud pa'i blo gros can/ /pha dang bur gyur rnams kyis bdag la gnyen snyam byams pas phan btags pa/ /de dag btang nas gcig pu thar par byed pa bdag gi tshul min zhes/ /de slad khyod kyis 'gro ba mgon
215a3(bstod tshogs): med des thar bgyid slad smon lam btab/ /sngon chad 'khor bar sdug bsngal kun tu myong gyur tshe na bdag la ni/ /gang dag yun ring ngo shes byams sems ldan pas lan brgyar grogs byas pa/ /bde ba thob tshe de dag bkol nas ji ltar yongs su sbyar bya
215a4(bstod tshogs): zhes/ /de slad khyod ni bdud rtsi'ang sems can kun dang thun mongs gsol bar brtson/ /mchog sbyin 'gro bar sems can rnams dang lhan cig longs spyod 'das dgongs nas/ /de dag nges par yongs su mi gtong bas na khyod kyi bstan pa ni/ /ji
215a5(bstod tshogs): ltar khyod nyid ne tsor 'khrungs tshe ljon shing gzhon nu legs spyad ba'i/ /ljon shing rgas par gyur kyang yongs su mi gtong de ltar brtson pa lags/ /gang slad 'gro ba mya ngan mi 'das mya ngan khyed 'da' blo ma byung/ /bde gshegs go 'phang brnyes
215a6(bstod tshogs): par nus pa ma lags de mi mdzad/ /de slad khyod ni kun mkhyen yon tan gter dag brnyes mdzad slad du brtson/ /stobs bcu'i yon tan bdag gir mdzad pa las gzhan khyod la phra mi mnga' / /gang su la la dag gis bde gshegs go 'phang
215a7(bstod tshogs): brnyes pa de dag kyang/ /'di bas shin tu smad pa'i gnas skabs dag tu lhung ba byung ngo zhes/ /de slad khyod kyis nyam dar lhung ba'i tshe yang bdag nyid smad ma mdzad/ /bdag la smod pa mi rung skyes bu dar ba zhum par bgyid pa lags/ /gang slad
215b1(bstod tshogs): gal te rang la dag las 'bad pas byang chub thob gyur na/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyed dka' ma lags snyam du khyod kyis blo gros byung/ /de slad khyod kyis nyam pa'i dus suAng kun mkhyen smon lam brtan bzlog pa/ /dman la dga' ba rnams kyi tshig
215b2(bstod tshogs): dag khyod kyis khyad du bsad par mdzad/ /nyon mongs chu bo rab 'khrug pa dang ngan 'gro kha dag rtag tu gdangs pa dang/ /so so'i skye bo'i g.yo dang sdig pa'i grogs po rtag par rgyun du gnas pa dang/ /thub rnams rnyed par dka' zhes de ltar sems
215b3(bstod tshogs): zhum 'gro ba gtong ba'i rgyu/ /gang lags de nyid khyod kyi thugs rje rtag tu skye ba'i rgyur yang gyur/ /ji ltar 'gro ba rnams la khyod blo shin tu byams pa skye ba ltar/ /'jig rten 'di dag rang la'ang byams pa'i blo gros skye bar mi 'gyur la/ /'jig rten phongs
215b4(bstod tshogs): pa'i gnas skabs gyur na bdag nyid dag kyang gtong bar bgyid/ /khyod ni shin tu nyam nga'i dus suAng 'gro ba gtong ba bzhed ma mchis/ /gang zhig skye bo dman dang phongs pa re ba'i bsam ldan mthong na yang/ /brtse med 'bras bu 'dod pas snod gzhan yon tan
215b5(bstod tshogs): dag dang ldan tshol ba/ /bsam glag de ni sbyin pa byed kyang slong ba rnams dang mtshungs so zhes/ /de slad khyod ni thugs rjes slong ba rnams la sbyin par bzhed la bzhugs/ /'ba' zhig rang nyid ma dul bzhin du rig par ldan pa'i tshig smra yang/ /rang gi tshig dang 'gal
215b6(bstod tshogs): bar spyod pas gzhan dag 'dul bar mi nus zhes/ /khyod kyis dgongs nas de slad 'gro ba mdza' dag thugs la bzhag mdzad nas/ /re zhig bdag nyid ma dul ba nyid dul bar mdzad phyir brtson pa lags/ /gang slad mkhas pa rnams kyi mi dge'i las kyang zhi
215b7(bstod tshogs): ba'i bde bar 'gyur mod kyi/ /'on kyang 'phags pas mi dag pa dag kun tu bsten 'os ma yin zhes/ /de slad khyod ni rtag tu rang bzhin yongs su dag pas sdig las log /ngan song 'jigs pas ma lags lha yi bde spyad bzhes pa'i phyir ma lags/ /
216a1(bstod tshogs): gang dag 'gro la mi lta bdag nyid zhi bar 'gro bar bgyi slad spyod bgyid pa/ /des kyang ci ste brtson pa ma bsten slad chad bsam rdzogs mi 'gyur na/ /gang gis 'gro ba ma lus bsgral phyir brtson pa brtsams pas ci smos zhes
216a2(bstod tshogs): de slad khyod kyis rang gi bde la ma gzigs byang chub slad du brtson/ /khyod kyis 'byor ba chung ba'i tshe yang sbyin par bzhed pa ma spangs la/ /bdog pa chung yang slong ba rnams la zhum mi mnga' ba'i thugs kyis stsal/ /dbang phyug chen po mnga' yang
216a3(bstod tshogs): tshul dang 'gal ba'i tha snyad mi mnga' la/ /na tshod lang tshor gyur kyang 'dod pa rnams la thugs ni chags mi mnga' / /khyod kyis thos dang blo gros che ba'i che na'ang bdag bstod ma mdzad la/ /'gro ba yon tan chung ba gzhan rnams kyang ni mthon bor
216a4(bstod tshogs): bkur bar gyur/ /yon tan tshogs la gnas tshe nyid kyi spyod pa nyes pa chung nguAng bzang/ /'gro ba dmu rgod rnams la rtsol ba mi mnga' bde bar gnas pas bzhugs/ /khyod kyi thugs ni srid dang nyon mongs skyo bas zhi la bgyes gyur kyang/ /thugs
216a5(bstod tshogs): rje nyid kyis mdzad pa'i yon tan skye bo rnams dang rjes su mthun/ /byed pa ma gtogs gzhan gyis 'bras bu mi myong bar mi khyod mkhyen kyang/ /'on kyang sems can rnams kyi 'byor ba bskyed slad bsod nams gtar rnams bdar/ /khyod la
216a6(bstod tshogs): shes rab la sogs yon tan gang dag rtag tu mnga' gyur pa/ /de dag khyod kyis 'gro ba dag gi don rnams nyid du nye bar spyad/ /de las khyod kyi bsod nams 'bras bu gzhan du mchis pa ma lags la/ /de dag 'gro ba'i 'byor slad yongs su
216a7(bstod tshogs): bsngos kyang don ma mchis ma lags/ /khyod la gzhan la sman pa'i thabs dang bral ba'i dus 'ga' 'ang byung ma gyur/ /thabs chung ma gyur 'bras bu ma mchis ma lags 'bras bu chung ma lags/ /bsod nams chung ngu rtsom pa dag
216b1(bstod tshogs): la khyod ni mngon dgyes ma lags la/ /bsod nams chu bo dag gis doms par ma gyur chab kyis rgya mtsho bzhin/ /mtshan mo ston ka'i zla ba nya ba'i mdangs kyis nyams dgar gyur pa dang/ /rdzing bu utpal rgyas pa gnyid bral mig la rdom brjid byed rnams
216b2(bstod tshogs): dang/ /ri bo ljon shing me tog rgyas pa brgya yis rtse mo dkrigs rnams kyis/ /gzhan la gcig tu smin khyod kyi blo gros phrogs par rdo mi thog /'jig rten sdug bsngal dag gis smad tshe khyod ni nyid la byams pa yis/ /yul gyi dga' bsten nyams
216b3(bstod tshogs): su blang bya min zhes thugs rje'i blos mkhyen nas/ /gling bzhi'i dbang phyug mnga' yang yul rnams kyis ni thugs kyang mi phrogs la/ /khyod kyis gzhan sman lhur bzhes mdzad pas dus dag shin tu 'das par bgyis/ /phyug
216b4(bstod tshogs): cing 'byor pa slong ba rnams kyis legs par spyad par ma byas dang/ /dur khrod ljon shing me tog rgyas pa'i ljid kyis g.yur za mtshungs so zhes/ /de slad bsod nams dman pa'i 'byor pa dag la slong rnams mi spyod pas/ /khyod kyi dkor nor slong ba
216b5(bstod tshogs): ma mchis pa ni thugs la gcags par gyur/ /gang zhig brtse med srid pas tshong ba bzhin du 'bras bu'i phyir btsal nas/ /de ni 'bras bu yang ni slong ba rnams la sbyin par spro ma mchis/ /gang gi slad du khyod kyi gtong ba rnams dus gzhan
216b6(bstod tshogs): la sman gyur pa/ /de slad de yi 'bras buAng slong ba rnams kyis rang gi lags par bzung/ /ri ngos ljon shing 'bras bu smin pa dag tu bya rnams lta bu dang/ /dgon pa'i rdzing bu bskyed shing bzang pos bskor bar ngal rnams ltar/ /'dzem
216b7(bstod tshogs): med slong ba dgyes pa khyod la bag phebs 'byor pa 'tshal ba yi/ /slongs mo pa dag kun nas myur bar mngon du lhags na sdod cing mchis/ /dpal 'byor 'bangs dang btsun mo rang gi sha dang srog kyang gtong ba na/ /khyod kyis sras gzhon
217a1(bstod tshogs): rab sdug ston zla tshes pa dri med gzugs ldan pa'ang/ /slong ba rnams la gtong bar mdzad la brtson par gyur pa ji lta ba/ /de ltar gtong la goms pa khyod kyi thugs la brtan pa nyid kyang byung/ /gang zhig thos par gyur
217a2(bstod tshogs): na'ang 'jig rten 'di la gnod pa skye 'gyur dang/ /gang yang khyod nyid kyis kyang yun ring sku nyams pa zhes par mi spyod pa'i/ /spyod pa de dag khyod la goms pas dus su rang gi ngang nyid gyur/ /de slad yon tan dag ni yongs goms ma bgyis
217a3(bstod tshogs): spel bar dka' ba lags/ /ji ltar sman pa gdon gyis zin la gdon rnams bsal bar bgyid slad du/ /brdeg cing tshig rtsub smra ba spyod kyang zin pa nyid la brdeg mi bgyid/ /de ltar khyod kyang nyon mongs nyid la brtse dang bral bas spyod mdzad kyi
217a4(bstod tshogs): 'gro ba nyon mongs gyur pa la ni khyod nyid thugs rje mdzad pa lags/ /khyod kyis rtag tu yon tan nor lhag rnams la gus pas bsags pa mdzad// mnyam pa rnams la yon tan goms par bgyi slad byams pa'i thugs kyis spyad/ /dman
217a5(bstod tshogs): la thugs rjes brtson pa mchog gis yon tan rnams bskrun te/ /'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis ji ltar rigs par legs par mdzad par zhugs/ /ji ltar ma ma rang lus sna tshogs thabs tshul mang po 'dzin bgyid kyang/ /gzhon nu'i nad bsal
