261a3(bstod tshogs): slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //rgya gar skad du/ sapta ta thA ga ta sto traM/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i
261a4(bstod tshogs): bla ma lha mi 'jig rten phyir mchod cing/ /thugs rjes gsal zhing gzhan las phan pa'i thar pa ston/ /srid gsum chu chen mthar phyin bde la 'gro bar ston pa po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho mdza' 
261a5(bstod tshogs): dang pha rol med pa 'di/ /'jig rten nub cing 'dug par rab tu gzigs nas kyang/ /phan gdags phyir ni chos rnams rab tu ston pa gang yin pa/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor mnga' ba de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla dag las 'das pa'i gzi brjid mnga' ba des/
261a6(bstod tshogs): ye shes dang ni spyod pa'i ngang tshul rnams las kyang/ /rgya mtsho'i 'jing ltar gting dpag nus par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyod pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi grags pa zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba yis/ /sa steng mdza' dag rab tu
261a7(bstod tshogs): brgyan par snang ba dang/ /u duM wa ra'i me tog bzhin du rmad byung ba/ /thub dbang chen po log dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri ma med cing rtag tu phan par mdzad pa dang/ /chags pa med pa gang gis dri ma med pa'i thugs/ /rnam par 'phro bas
261b1(bstod tshogs): mun pa'i thibs po rab bcom zhing/ /lha yis mchod pa'i gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btso ma'i gser gyi phung po'i kha dog 'dra ba yi/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i nyi ma stod pas lhag pa mnga' / /skye bo kun gyis phyag byas 'jig rten mchog gyur pa'i/
261b2(bstod tshogs): 'od srungs mtshan gsol gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer mang pos pad+ma'i tshal 'byed ltar/ /gsung gi 'od zer mang pos 'jig rten sad par mdzad/ /ston pa shAkya thub pa thugs rje'i sgron ma can/ /mya ngan 'das pa gang yin de la phyag
261b3(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /gang gis byang chub skye ba gcig gis thogs gyur cing/ /byams pa zhes bya dga' ldan gnam gyi gnas nas bzhugs/ /sa steng bde bar gshegs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa/ /de la bdag ni snying nas rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i
261b4(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba bdun po dag dang phyis gshegs pa/ /brgyad pa byang chub sems dpa' bdag gis bstod pa yis/ /bsod nams mdza' yas dpag med bdag gis gang thob pa/ /des ni sems can rnams kyang skyon chen bral gyur cig /de bzhin
261b5(bstod tshogs): gshegs pa bdun gyi bstod pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+rad+d+ha ka ra dang/ dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa// //*/ (/de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod
261b6(bstod tshogs): pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta ta thA ga ta sto tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtshan gyi me tog rgyas shing dag pa la/ /dpe byad
261b7(bstod tshogs): bzang po'i 'bru chags mdzes pa'i sku/ /gang gis mthong thos dran yang dpal gyur pa/ /mtshan gyi rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen zla ba pad+mas rab brgyan cing/ /shes bya kun la mkhas pas mkhyen pa 'phags/ /rgya mtsho lta
262a1(bstod tshogs): bur zab pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /sgra dbyangs rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i gser ltar lhang nge ba/ /nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ /dri med gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu'i sku/ /gser
262a2(bstod tshogs): bzang dri med snang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan 'das shing bde ba'i mchog brnyes pa/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gdung ba zhi mdzad cing/ /'gro drug mgon dad dpal du gyur pa po/ /mya ngan med mchog dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos sgra chen pos
262a3(bstod tshogs): pha rol rgol ba 'joms/ /rgya mtsho lta bur zab pa'i sku mnga' zhing/ /'gro ba'i dug gsum ma lus sel mdzad pa/ /chos bsgrags rgya mtsho'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi blo gros gting dpag dka' ba'i tshul/ /rnam dag chos kyi
262a4(bstod tshogs): dbyings las rol mdzad cing/ /shes bya ma lus mngon sum gzigs pa po/ /chos blo mngon par mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i nad gso mdzad pa sman pa'i mchog /bai DUrya ltar dang ba'i sku mnga' zhing/ /sku yi 'od kyis 'gro ba sgrol
262a5(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa/ /sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rjes kun la snyoms pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ /mtshan tsam thos pas ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal sel/ /dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/
262a6(bstod tshogs): nyi ma lta bur ma rig mun pa sel/ /zla ba lta bur nyon mongs gdung ba sel/ dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mi'i ston pa sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ /bcom ldan 'jig rten gsum
262a7(bstod tshogs): la skyabs mdzad pa/ /dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni 'jig rten gsum gyi sman pa ste/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rtsad nas gcod/ /sems can thams cad bde la rab tu
262b1(bstod tshogs): 'god/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes spyan gyis 'gro ba kun la gzigs/ /thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba kun la khyab/ /dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan 'dus la
262b2(bstod tshogs): sogs/ /'byung ba bzhi po 'khrugs par gyur pa la/ /nad kyi gnyen por phyag g.yas a ru ra/ /sman pa'i rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku mdog mthing ga utpal sngon po 'dra/ /phyag g.yon bdud rtsi sman gyi lhung bzed bsnams/ /dug
262b3(bstod tshogs): gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyes pa rgya mtsho dag ni gzhir spangs nas/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dag gis pha rol phyin/ /thams cad mkhyen pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /smon lam
262b4(bstod tshogs): rgya chen yongs su dag gyur pas/ /yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gzhan don mdzad/ /dug gsum nad sel sangs rgyas sman gyi bla/ /bai DUrya yi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thabs mkhas thugs rjes shAkya'i rigs 'khrungs zhing/ /gzhan gyis mi thub bdud kyi dpung
262b5(bstod tshogs): 'joms pa/ /gser gyi lhun po lta bur mdzes pa'i sku/ /shAkya'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad la bstod pa slob dpon zhi ba 'tshos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/
262b6(bstod tshogs): su pra b+ha ta pra b+ha ta sto tra/ bod skad du/ rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'i bstod pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi tshogs dang grub pa dri za'i gtso dang sdom brtson dbang rnams kyis/ /bstod tshig sna tshogs dag gis
262b7(bstod tshogs): lha yul sa steng rnams su bstod mod kyi/ /bdag kyang ji ltar nub pas 'phags pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bstod bgyi ste/ /nam mkha' la ni mkha' lding 'phur zhes bung ba rnams ni cis mi 'phur/ /mi mthun phyogs spangs gyur pa lus pa med pa'i
263a1(bstod tshogs): skyon ni zad gyur la/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog can pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur yangs pa'i spyan/ /dpal ldan mdzes pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar
263a2(bstod tshogs): nam langs pa'o/ /bdud kyi dpung las rnam par rgyal ba nyam nga lam na gcod mdzad pa/ /sa gsum phan par mdzad pa 'khri shing dra ba gsum la dral mdzad pa/ /zhi ba'i bde ba rtsol bar mdzad pa mi shes ri bo 'jig mdzad pa/ /stobs bcu
263a3(bstod tshogs): mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o// //gang zhig lha min mi dang lha rnams kyi yang sngon du bde ba'i gnas thob pa/ /ma lus pa'i sa'i khams su 'jig rten gcig bsdus dbyangs gsang mthon po sgrogs/
263a4(bstod tshogs): shed las skyed pa bsgo byed rang byung pad+ma'i skye gnas can ni gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o/ /shar gyi ri'i rtse'i ngos la gnas shing dmar po'i 'od kyis gnang non pa/ /mun pa'i tshogs
263a5(bstod tshogs): rnams 'joms par byed par skye dgu rnams kyi mig gcig du/ /nyi ma de yang myos pas 'phyin cing rnam pa kun tu gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /glang po che ltar dkar bsil bsil ba'i zer
263a6(bstod tshogs): can ri bong mtshan/ /mtshan mo'i thig le lta bur mdzes pa kun gyi gtsug gi nor bu gang/ /dman pa'i mdangs dang bral ba nges ni rnam pa kun tu gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /rab mchog
263a7(bstod tshogs): lag pa bzhi pa bcu drug phyed phyed phyogs kyi gdong pa can/ /bzlas dang nyes pa'i cho ga shes shing nges brjod rig byed 'don pa po/ /dri med pad+ma'i skye gnas tshangs pa de yang rab tu gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu
263b1(bstod tshogs): rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /gangs kyi ri bo'i rtse la gnas shing sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang/ /grong khyer sum brtsegs sreg par nus gang stag gi pags pa'i gos gyon pa/ /rtse gsum can dreg ri mchog bu mo dang ni lhan cig gnyid log gyur/ /
263b2(bstod tshogs): stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /'bar ba'i rdo rje lag na thogs shing lha min rnams kyis thub dka' ba/ /lha yi gtso bo bde sogs bdag po rmongs pa'i bsam pas rnam par 'khor/ /mtshan mo min dang mtshan mo gnyid log
263b3(bstod tshogs): 'dod pa'i 'dam du nges par bying/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /utpal sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar sngo pad+ma ltar dkar yangs pa'i mig /lha min gtso bo thams cad bcom gyur thams cad byed pa sna tshogs gzugs/ /
263b4(bstod tshogs): khyab 'jug kyang ni yun ring gnyid log mngal gyi gnas las thar ma gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar nam langs pa'o/ /gang zhig ral pa ser skya'i tshogs bstan dmar po zangs mdog khrag gi mig /phyugs bdag dga' ba'i
263b5(bstod tshogs): dus su gcig du chags pa 'joms par nus pa bo/ /'dod pa'i lha yi mda' sreg lus can me lha de yang gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /zla ba kha ba ku mu da mtshungs chang mthus mig ni dmar gyur
263b6(bstod tshogs): la/ /'dod pa brtan sra sgeg po thong gshol lag na 'dzin par brtson/ /stobs can de ni nam gru'i mgul nas 'khyud cing 'di na nyal bar gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /glang chen gdong can mche ba gtsigs
263b7(bstod tshogs): pa rnam pa kun tu 'gegs byed pa/ /'gram pa'i ngos gnyis myos chu rab 'bab nus pa sgra gsang mthon po sgrogs pa yi/ /tshegs kyi bdag po yang ni chang gi btung bas myos par gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/
264a1(bstod tshogs): zar ma'i me tog ltar sngo gang gi lag pa mchog na mdung thung thogs/ /pad+ma sar ba lta bu'i lus can gdong drug lha min khrung khrung bsad/ /mig gsum ldan pa gzhon nu'i tshul can de yang gnyid 'thug log par gyur/ /stobs bcu
264a2(bstod tshogs): mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /zas la rab chags dman lus rtag par rnal 'byor rjes su dga' gyur pa/ /gnod pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan pa'i yi dags lta bur tshig pa'i lus/ /zla dpung 'gro ba rnam bral gang yin gcer bu de rnams
264a3(bstod tshogs): kyang gnyid log /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /bas mdza' i gnas chen 'di na drang srong ngan spong aM gi ra sogs dang/ /kun tu rgyu sogs gnas 'jog rgyas pa grog mkhar ba dang dga' byed rnams/ /gzhon nu mas skye gnas chags
264a4(bstod tshogs): shing rmongs pa de rnams kyang gnyid log /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /gshin rje chu bdag lus ngan gnod sbyin 'dre dang lto 'phye'i dbang po dang/ /de bzhin 'jig rten skyong gzhan lha yul sa steng nam mkha' la gnas pa/ /
264a5(bstod tshogs): gzhon nu ma la rab chags zur gyi lha dang lha min rnams kyang gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying gyur gti mug dra bas khebs pa'i lus/ /thub pa ser skya gzegs zan kun tu 'khor
264a6(bstod tshogs): zhing blun pa'i bsam pa can/ /zhi ba'i bde ba yongs su nyams pa de rnams kyang ni gnyid log gyur/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba khyod ni rtag tu rab tu snga bar sad pa'o/ /mi shes mtshan mo mun par sregs pa mal cha 'thug gyon cing/ /yul gyi sngas rtan
264a7(bstod tshogs): la ni rab 'thug gnyid log gyur pa'i tshe/ /dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dre log byed pa na/ /rtag pa nyid du gnyid sad gang yin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu 'gram dag du ba lang rigs brgya rnams kyis chu 'thungs te/ /ngoms nas 'gro bar gyur
264b1(bstod tshogs): na'ang tshul bri bar mngon pa med/ /de bzhin thub pa snyan dngags mkhan brgyas yang dag bstod gyur kyang/ /yon tan rgya mtsho legs pa'i gter chen zad par gyur ma yin/ /rab tu nam nangs khyod gcig pu yi ye shes spyan phye gyur bstod pas/ /'jig rten
264b2(bstod tshogs): gsum mgon rta bdun 'od kyis 'gro 'di rtag tu snang byas te/ sna tshogs lam thob lam ngan las bzlog 'byor ldan dpal gyis byas pa dag /dgos mod rang dgar bde blag dngos grub rnam pa kun tu spyod gyur cig /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
264b3(bstod tshogs): la/ /kha che'i rgyal po sh+rI ha ri sha de bas bstod pa rdzogs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ aSh+Ta mahA s+tha na tsai dya banda na ma sta ba/ bod skad du/ gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa/ /'jam dpal
264b4(bstod tshogs): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bltams dang byang chub mnyam med chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor/ /mchod rten thog mar 'jig rten gsum mchod dang ldan cho 'phrul chen po dang/ /gangs ri'i kha dog ltar gsal lha las babs pa'i gnas 'di
264b5(bstod tshogs): dang/ /gang du bde gshegs mya ngan 'das pa de la spyi bos bdag phyag 'tshal/ /yangs ? ba ra NA se byis pa gsod ri 'jigs rung bcings 'gram dang/ /mnyan yod dang ni byang chub shing drung ku sha'i grong mchog ser skya lum+bi ni/ /kau sham bi dang mdzod
264b6(bstod tshogs): 'thug mnyam pa'i grong mchog dga' skyong yul 'khor dang/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal/ /kha che dang ni rgya yul kha ba ya mun zhes dang/ /sing ga la dang aau Di sind+hu shing 'phel ba ga mang ba kha ko la/ /bal
264b7(bstod tshogs): yul ka ma ru dang bum pa'i klong mchog kan ci bzang po'i yul/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i gdung bcas gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal/ /ti se gangs ri gangs can la gnas manDa ra dang ri rab rtse/ /klu gnas rnam rgyal nor sbyin gnas dang
265a1(bstod tshogs): rig 'dzin grub pa'i gnas/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug gnas dang phyugs bdag nyi ma zla ba'i gnas/ /stobs bcu ldan pa'i mchod rten gzhan gang yin pa de la'ang spyis phyag 'tshal/ /stobs bcu las byung rin chen snying can
265a2(bstod tshogs): mchod rten brgyad po gdung bcas bum las grub/ /sol ba de bzhin rin chen mchod rten gangs dang dngul 'dra rab mdzes pa/ /sa 'og sa steng lha yul rtser bzhugs mchod rten ji srid ma lus dang/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs gang bzhugs de la
265a3(bstod tshogs): nyin re bzhin du spyi bos phyag bya'o/ /gnas chen po brgyad kyi mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i bstod pa/ /kha che'i rgyal po sh+rI ha ri sha de bas yum gyi ched du mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rA dza sh+rI dz+nyA na mi tra
265a4(bstod tshogs): dang/ lo tsA ba kha'u brgad yon tan dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o// // */ (/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/) rgya gar skad du/ ta thA ga ta nA ma saM gI tI kalpi ka b+ha drA la ka ra mA la
265a5(bstod tshogs): nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ /sangs rgyas thams cad la gus pa'i gtsug gis phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdzes snang bskal par rnam par brgyan zhing du/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal
265a6(bstod tshogs): yul 'khor srungs sras stong/ /sangs rgyas yon tan mdza' yas rin po che/ /sna tshogs bkod pa'i rgyal pos bskal bzang 'dir/ /rgyal 'gyur lung bstan sangs rgyas stong dag dang/ /rdzus skyes mched gnyis la yang phyag 'tshal nas/ /rgyal
265a7(bstod tshogs): kun yul rigs 'od dang yab yum sras/ /rim gro shes rab can mchog rdzu 'phrul can/ /'dus tshad tshe tshad bstan pa gnas pa'i tshad/ /sku gdung mchod rten tshul dang sems bskyed tshul/ /re re 'ang bco lnga bco lngas rgyas gsungs mod/
265b1(bstod tshogs): 'dir ni gus pas mtshan tsam brjod par bya/ /bde gshegs 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub dang/ /'od srungs shAkya'i skyes mchog byams pa dang/ /seng ge rab gsal thub pa me tog dang/ /me tog gnyis pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar
265b2(bstod tshogs): bzang dang ded dpon lag chen dang/ /stobs chen rgyu skar rgyal po rtsi sman dang/ /snyan pa dang ni tog dang 'od chen dang/ /grol ba'i phung po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad nyi ma'i snying po dang/ /zla ba 'od 'phro 'od bzang mya ngan med/ /skar
265b3(bstod tshogs): rgyal dang ni rab gsal phreng thogs dang/ /yon tan 'od la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /don gzigs dang ni mar me mthu ldan dang/ /sman pa dang ni des pa mdzod spu dang/ /brtan ldan lha yi dpal dang gdul dka' dang/ /yon tan rgyal mtshan
265b4(bstod tshogs): rnams la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra gcan tshogs ldan tshangs dbyangs tshig brtan dang/ /mi 'gyid 'od mdzad lhun po chen po dang/ /rdo rje dang ni sdom can mi bsnyengs pa/ /rin chen rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad can stobs sde me tog 'od
265b5(bstod tshogs): gzer dang/ /ye shes dgyes dang gzi chen tshangs pa dang/ /'od dpag med dang klus byin brtan par gshegs/ /don yod mthong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtson 'grus byin dang bzang skyong dga' bo dang/ /'chi med seng ge rgyal mtshan
265b6(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba chos/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po kha lo bsgyur/ /dgyes par gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu lha dang ni yon tan yan lag dang/ /spos kyi glang po rnams gzigs 'brug sgra dang/ /legs sems yid bzang dri med zla ba
265b7(bstod tshogs): dang/ /grags chen rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtsug na nor bu drag shul seng ge'i stabs/ /ldon pa rnam rgyal can dang shes rab brtsegs/ /legs gnas dang ni blo gros yan lag skyes/ /blo mdza' yas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/
266a1(bstod tshogs): gzugs bzang dang ni mkhyen ldan 'od zer dang/ /brtul zhugs brtan dang bkra shis bden pa'i tog /pad+ma sred med bu dang lag bzang dang/ /ye shes 'byung gnas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan 'od 'phro tshangs
266a2(bstod tshogs): byin rin 'byung gnas/ /lha yi me tog dang ni don legs sems/ /chos kyi dbang phyug blo gros spobs pa brtsegs/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan phan bzhed phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rol ldan mun bral sgra gcan lha/ /ri bo'i rgyal mtshan
266a3(bstod tshogs): tshogs 'od rin chen snying/ /shin tu mthor gshegs skar rgyal ru rings dang/ /yon tan grags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla nyi 'od skar mkhan seng ge'i tog /dus mkhyen rgyal po dpal snying srid mdza' gzigs/ /glog 'od
266a4(bstod tshogs): gser gyi ri bo seng ges byin/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog dga' grags pa brtson 'grus brtan grags rdzogs/ /bsnyengs bral mchod 'os lha dang sgron chen dang/ /'jig rten 'od dang spos dri zhim po dang/ /
266a5(bstod tshogs): yon tan mchog 'dzin mun bral phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i 'gram dang rin chen grags skyon zhi/ /bdud rtsi 'chang dang mi'i zla shin tu gzigs/ /rab brgyan nor 'od ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog /chos 'byung don des ldan la'ang phyag
266a6(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /tshe byin rin chen 'byung gnas skye dbang mtshungs/ /stabs kyis gshegs dang blo gnas gdugs mdzes dang/ /gtso bo shin tu 'phags pa dpal seng sgra/ /rnam par rol ldan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu 'od
266a7(bstod tshogs): me tog ri dang klu dga' dang/ /spos kyi dbang phyug shin tu grags stobs lha/ /yon tan 'phreng rgyan klu'i lag mig brgyan dang/ /legs par sbyangs pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /zil gnon mdza' yas spyan dang bden pa
266b1(bstod tshogs): gsung/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang des blo mdza' yas gzugs/ /rnam snang rin chen tog dang the tshom spangs/ /'jig rten 'das pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don yod rnam par gnon dang tog mdzad dang/ /me tog rgyal mtshan ri dbang rgyal gzi chen/ /
266b2(bstod tshogs): don mdzad gzigs dang grags yas rin chen la/ /don mkhyen blo rdzogs rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mya ngan med dang dri bral tshangs lha dang/ /sa dbang me tog spyan dang rnam 'byes sku/ /chos 'od kun gzigs yon tan 'od gsal dang/ /dri med zla
266b3(bstod tshogs): ba'i zhal la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen 'od dang rin chen tog dang ni/ /grags pa'i bla ma 'od byed gzi dpag med/ /dus mkhyen seng ge'i sku dang mkhas bla dang/ /rgyal dka' yon tan phung po phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba'i tog dang mthu ni thob pa
266b4(bstod tshogs): dang/ /mthu rtsal mdza' yas zla ba dri med dang/ /don rnams thams cad gzigs dang ngas 'o dang/ /'byor ldan bsod nams sgron ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan 'od 'phro blo ni yangs pa dang/ /legs skyes nor lha yid gnyis spong ba dang/
266b5(bstod tshogs): 'dzin pa dpag med mchog sred tshoms med dang/ /mi gnas pa dang der gnas phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshogs chen gtso bo 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang/ /phal chen rgyal bu gzi brjid mdza' yas dang/ /don blo sman pa'i rgyal po tha ba spangs/ /
266b6(bstod tshogs): rims nad med dang legs byin phyag 'tshal lo/ /grags byin me tog byin dang skyes bus byin/ /rdo rje'i sde dang phal chen byin pa dang/ /zhi ba'i blo gros spos glang sred med bu/ /nges pa dang ni mi tshugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla glog gi tog dang
266b7(bstod tshogs): mchod pa dang/ /dpal sbas dang ni ye shes nyi ma dang/ /don grub lhun po brtsegs dang dgra 'dul dang/ /pad+ma dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes 'gros dang nyon mongs bral ba dang/ /'dam bu dang ni spos bzang yul 'khor
267a1(bstod tshogs): rangs/ /lha grags srid zla gzigs dang zla ba dang/ /sgra gcan rin chen zla la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen rgyal mtshan dang ni bsam gtan dgyes/ /rdzogs ldan rnam rol yon tan rin chen dang/ /dgra bcom grags
267a2(bstod tshogs): pa pad ngos mdzod spu ldan/ /spobs grags rdo rje nor bu phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshe dpag med dang nor bu bkod pa dang/ /dbang chen yon tan 'byung gnas lhun po grags/ /'od zer bcu pa ma smad glang po'i 'gros/ /yid zla rin chen zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/
267a3(bstod tshogs): zhi ba rab gsal rgyal po kha lo bsgyur/ /dga' ba'i dbang phyug gtsug na rin po che/ /bsnyengs bral rin chen snying po zla ba'i zhal/ /dri ma med grags zhi brjid phyag 'tshal lo/ /dga' rtog sgra gcan lha dang na tshod bzang/ /lha dga' rin chen phung
267a4(bstod tshogs): po mdzes par gshegs/ /seng+ge'i phyogs pa shin tu mthor gshegs dang/ /skye dbang blo gros bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'od dang rin chen gzi brjid dang/ /skal ldan shing rta kun rgyal dga' ba bkod/ /stegs mdzad dang ni spos glang
267a5(bstod tshogs): blo 'od 'phro/ /ri bo'i rgyal mtshan spos bzang phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos brtan dang ni gzi brjid drag shul can/ /chos kyi nor bu bzang sbyin bde gshegs zla/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs dad seng ge zla ba dpal/ /legs skyes thub med tshogs
267a6(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /grags pa bshes gnyen dang ni bden pa dang/ /dka' thub chen po lhun po'i 'od zer dang/ /yon tan brtsegs pa mchod grags chos grags dang/ /sbyin 'od glog 'byin bden gsung phyag 'tshal lo/ /'tsho byed na
267a7(bstod tshogs): tshod bzang po legs tshogs can/ /rnam nges blo gros srid mdza' nor bu'i spos/ /rgyal dgyes seng ge'i 'od zer rnam snang mdzad/ /grags mchog thugs rang gzhung la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu zla ba drag shul 'od zer dang/ /brtul
267b1(bstod tshogs): zhugs bung med 'gros mchod nor bu'i tshogs/ /'jig rten bla ma glang seng zla ba dang/ /rin 'od sgra gcan sbed la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgya mtsho 'od zer ldan pa dang/ /rab tu zhi stabs 'jig rten bzang po dang/ /mya ngan med pa shugs bcu
267b2(bstod tshogs): stobs dgyes dang/ /mthu dpal mthu thob mthu chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan snying po bden par spyod pa dang/ /dge mchog rgyal po dkar rgyal 'od zer che/ /glog 'od yon tan rgya chen rin po che/ /dpal 'od dang ni bdud 'dul phyag 'tshal lo//
267b3(bstod tshogs): go bgos seng ge'i phyag dang me tog bzang/ /rin chen mthon po dang ni rgya mtsho dang/ /sa 'dzin don blo mnga' ba yon tan bsags/ /yon tan tshogs dang rin me phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten zla ba dang/ /dbyangs snyan
267b4(bstod tshogs): tshangs pa'i tog dang tshogs can gtso/ /seng ge'i stabs dang drag shul byin pa dang/ /chos dbang gzi 'od 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen grags pa tshogs gsal grags mdza' yas/ /'od zer don ldan lha yi drang srong dang/ /skye dbang
267b5(bstod tshogs): dge 'dun brtan dang phyogs bzang dang/ /tog dang yul 'khor me tog phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi blo gros rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs/ /legs bsam grags pa snang ldan lha tshogs dang/ /yon tan srung don blo gros bsnyengs pa med/ /
267b6(bstod tshogs): grogs brtan 'od gnas mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor zhabs thar pa'i gzi brjid ngos bzang dang/ /blo yangs kun tu gzi brjid ye shes mchog /tshangs par gnas dang bden pa gsung ba dang/ /blo bzang dang ni stobs byin phyag
267b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /seng stabs me tog tog dang shel 'byung gnas/ /me tog byin dang yon tan snying po dang/ /rin chen grags pa grags pa rmad byung dang/ /mi tshugs bsnyengs med nyi 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs gshegs lha yi mthu rtsal ye
268a1(bstod tshogs): shes dgyes/ /lha bden nor bu'i snying po yon tan grags/ /ye shes dpal dang bcings med brtul zhugs brtan/ /lha yi gzi byin rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs thub dal bzhud brtul zhugs dka' thub dang/ /
268a2(bstod tshogs): 'od gzer phung po dang ni gzi brjid che/ /tsam pa ka dang dga' mdzad tshogs can bzang/ /dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dgyes chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /sna ma'i me tog 'od dang tshogs can 'od/ /skrun mdzad mdangs 'gro don legs nges pa dang/ /khyu
268a3(bstod tshogs): mchog dang ni lag bzang 'od zer che/ /bsam sbyin bsod nams 'od la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen dbyangs dang rdo rje'i sde dang ni/ /'byor ldan seng ge'i stobs dang dri med spyan/ /'od srungs dang ni blo gsal ye shes 'gros/ /gzi brjid drag shul
268a4(bstod tshogs): 'od chen phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i 'od dang dri ma med pa'i 'od/ /gzi brjid rnam 'byes khengs med sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ /zla 'od glog 'byin rab zhir gshegs pa dang/ /mi 'khrugs dgra bcom grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi yon tan zhing
268a5(bstod tshogs): bzad bkod rgyal po/ /mngon par 'phags dang sbyin sreg 'od 'phro dang/ /pad dpal rin chen bkod dang shin tu bzang/ /rin chen mchog dang thugs gzhungs phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgya mtshos byin dang tshang tog zla ba'i gdugs/ /'od 'phro
268a6(bstod tshogs): dri med rgyal po ye shes grags/ /kun rgyal yon tan 'od dang sgra grags dang/ /zla rgyas rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /padmo'i 'od zer brtul zhugs bzang po dang/ /sgron rgyal glog gi 'od dang 'od zer rgyal/ /skar mkhan grags rdzogs
268a7(bstod tshogs): pad+ma'i snying po dang/ /rgyal dang spyan mdzes rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnyog pa med don dang ni drag shul sde/ /bsod nams gzi brjid mthu rtsal thogs med blo/ /sgra can lha dang shes phu kha lo bsgyur/ /skyes mtshungs me tog
268b1(bstod tshogs): tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra gcan 'dzin dang sman chen rgyu skar rgyal/ /sman rgyal bsod nams glang po mchod mdzad dang/ /rnam grags rgyal po nyi ma'i 'od zer dang/ /chos mdzod blo gros bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan dbang mtshungs dang ni rdo rje'i sde/ /shes
268b2(bstod tshogs): rab brtsegs pa legs gnas blo dbyangs dang/ /tshangs dbyangs yon tan mchog dang 'brug sgra dang/ /mngon shes tog dang tog 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba tshangs pa skyes mchog spyan sdug pa/ /klus byin bden pa'i rtog dang brgyan pa dang/ /zhum pa
268b3(bstod tshogs): med pa'i dbyangs dang rin chen 'od/ /dbyangs byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge dang ni 'od zer sna tshogs dang/ /ye shes dpa' bo pad phung me tog rgyal/ /mthu stobs bsod nams phung po gzugs mchog dang/ /skar mkhan zla ba sgron ma
268b4(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzi brjid phung po byang chub rgyal po dang/ /ma zad mngon rtogs spyan dang yan lag rgyas/ /yul 'khor shes rab mchog ma gzi tshim mdzad/ /shes byin mgon po 'jam dbyangs phyag 'tshal lo/ /chags pa med pa'i mdzod dang gtso
268b5(bstod tshogs): bos byin/ /gtso chen ye shes mthu rtsal 'od 'phro can/ /dbang po dang ni shugs 'chang dkar rgyal dang/ /'od bzang grags pa byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs bzang dang ni rgyal po don grub dang/ /seng ge'i sde zhes bya dang nor lha'i bu/ /grags pa
268b6(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba rgya chen snying po dang/ /bsod nams 'od zer smrad 'don phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgron ma'i rgyal po dang ni ye shes brtsegs/ /lha mchod sa bdag grol brnyes gtsug gi gser/ /sgra gcan bzang po thub dka' thub gsal dang/ /zla ba'i 'od
268b7(bstod tshogs): zer rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser 'od legs byin lha yi yon tan dbang/ /chos gdugs bsod nams lag dang chags shed dang/ /ye shes gya nom blo gros zhi ba mo/ /gzi byin thams cad rtsi sman phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam grol tog dang 'od
269a1(bstod tshogs): mdzad ye shes rgyal/ /'jigs mdzad chu bo spong dang thogs med grags/ /bden pa'i phung po dbyangs snyan ri dbang mtshungs/ /chos brtsegs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa'i gzi brjid legs mdzad rab zhi'i sku/ /yid
269a2(bstod tshogs): 'ong gsung dang blo dbyangs chu yi lha/ /'gros mchod seng logs chos kyi mthu rtsal dang/ /bskal bzang rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi 'khrugs mdog dang gzi brjid rgyal po dang/ /rtogs mdzad spyan legs don la gnas pa'i blo/ /
269a3(bstod tshogs): snang ba'i 'od zer spobs gzi kun dga' grags/ /don yod gshegs dang khro bcom phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzugs mchog legs gshegs rab sbyin grags pa dang/ /'od gtsang lha yi nyi ma shes rab byin/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i bdag nyid
269a4(bstod tshogs): gzi mdangs dang/ /rgyal rigs skal ldan shing rta phyag 'tshal lo/ /gser mchog rnam grol gtsug dang chos ldan dang/ /spos gnas dregs pa spangs dang ye shes mdzod/ /tshangs par gshegs dang tsan dan mya ngan med/ /seng ge'i 'od zer
269a5(bstod tshogs): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yul 'khor rtog dang pad snying gzi mdza' yas/ /lha 'od shes rab me tog mkhas pa dang/ /ye shes 'byor ldan dang ni tshangs pa'i dbyig /phyag na rin chen dbang phyug phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs par gsungs dang mchod
269a6(bstod tshogs): gsung mchod 'os dang/ /skar rgyal nyi ma dang ni 'dam las rgal/ /ye shes brnyes dang grub pa rma bya dang/ /chos byin rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phan par bzhed dang ye shes ldan grags pa/ /'od zer dra ba dang ni rnam par bcom
269a7(bstod tshogs): bai DUrya snyid me tog lha rgyal po/ /zla ba dang ni dran 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'od yon tan mchog 'od rin chen dpal/ /skyes bu zla ba dgra can bdud rtsi'i 'od/ /'jig rten mchog dang skar 'od zhi ba'i stabs/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rnams la
269b1(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /ri dbang rab zhi yon tan mthu stobs dang/ /lha dbang dang ni dbyangs snyan ngos bzang dang/ /don gnas yon brjid mkhyen ldan zla med dang/ /nga ro dpag med rgyal ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od bzang thugs gzhungs don dgongs gti mug bral//
269b2(bstod tshogs): dbyangs kyi yan lag khyad 'phags mchog mdzes gshegs/ /zhi don skyon med blo bzang dge ba dang/ /bang mdzod 'od zer bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /spobs pa'i mdog dang stegs bzang tshogs dbang dang/ /bsnyangs bral ye shes bzhes pa spobs pa'i rgyan/
269b3(bstod tshogs): blo mchog zla ba rin chen zla 'od dang/ /bsnyengs med rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzigs pa che dang tshangs dbyangs dbyangs bzang dang/ /shes rab che stegs blo gros zla med dang/ /rdor 'khregs byang chub blo gros ljon shing bzang/ /gdangs snyan bsod nams stobs la'ang
269b4(bstod tshogs): phyag 'tshal lo/ /mthu dpal 'phags pa dgyes dang mthu stobs dang/ /skar ma dgyes dang sprin sgra spyan sdug zhal/ /ye shes bzang ldan 'byor ldan yon tan phung/ /gsal ba rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi rgyal mtshan ye shes nga ro dang/ /nam mkha' 
269b5(bstod tshogs): mchod sin nga ro shes bkod dang/ /yon 'od gzi brjid drang srong dbang blo ldan/ /spobs tshogs mchod sbyin bzang po phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla zhal shin tu gzigs dang rdul bral dang/ /yon tan tshogs dang tog ldan bsod rgyal mtshan/ /yul 'khor spobs pa rin
269b6(bstod tshogs): chen rab sbyin dang/ /zla dgyes seng ge'i stobs la 'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang sgyur rgyal po bdud rtsi gsal ba dang/ /bsam gtan bsnyoms dang 'khrug med dri ma zhi/ /phyogs ma bslad dang mdzes pa zhal bzang dang/ /shugs gnas ye ldan gsung dbang phyag
269b7(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /gzi brjid chen po blo gros zab bdud rtsi/ /chos kyi stobs dang mchod ldan me tog 'ong/ /khams gsum mchod gnas sgra gcan nyi ma'i 'od/ /lhas mchod thar pa'i rgyal mtshan phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge gtsug bdud rtsi'i 'od dang rdo rje dang/ /brtan
270a1(bstod tshogs): pa rin chen phung po mdzes gshegs dang/ /nyi ltar gshegs dang dag 'od yon tan gtsug /dpal rdzogs rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i stabs dang gyen 'phags me tog byin/ /'od dgyes pad ma dang ni ye shes dgyes//
270a2(bstod tshogs): dkon mdzes gti mug med gnas rma med pa/ /tog gi rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde dgongs gti mug med rgyal cho ga mkhyen/ /dag pa'i rgya mtsho rin chen mnga' mi mnga' / /dga' mdzad rma bya'i nga ro ma zhu dang/ /sring sreng dri ma spangs la'ang phyag
270a3(bstod tshogs): 'tshal lo/ /spyod pa'i stobs dang lha mar snyan bsgrags dang/ /rin stabs phyag par bsnams dpal dgra las rgyal/ /'byor grags yul 'khor bzang nga ro me tog 'od/ /seng ge'i nga ro rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zla ba ltar shar 'joms pa'i mchog mi g.yon//
270a4(bstod tshogs): phan ldan gshegs dang bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal/ /dbyangs bskul gau ta ma mdangs kyi stobs/ /blo gnas rang bzhin zla bzang phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub yan lag me tog bkra shis dang/ /legs ston ye shes gzi stobs dge ba'i sgron/ /mthu
270a5(bstod tshogs): rtsal brtan po lha sgra rab zhi dang/ /nyi zhal thar pa'i brtul zhugs phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshul khrims 'od dang brtul zhugs gnas brtul med/ /snying po 'phags dang mig dman 'phel bar mdzad/ /spos 'od dus mkhyen 'od dang dran pa'i dbang/ /thogs med
270a6(bstod tshogs): rgyal mtshan rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub mchog bgrod spyod gsal rin chen dgyes/ /chos dbang lha thams cad pa bshes gnyen tshe/ /gshes gnyen bzang po rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ /bdud rtsi bdag po lhun 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /
270a7(bstod tshogs): 'phags pas bstod dang snang ldan gzi brjid 'bar/ /snang ba gzigs dang legs spyad rnam par smin/ /legs dgyes mya ngan bral dang rin chen 'od/ /spyod ldan stobs la'ang gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rmad byung nga rgyal spong
270b1(bstod tshogs): bdud brlag mdzad dang bag chags brgal ba'i stobs/ /mi phyed blo mnga' rgya mtsho dag mdzad dang/ /tshogs can grol rgyal dga' 'od phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang rgyal ye shes rin chen shin tu bsil/ /tshangs rgyal ye shes dgyes dang rdzu 'phrul tog /skye dbang
270b2(bstod tshogs): mtshungs dang sa yi dbang phyug dang/ /nyi dgyes dgra can zla ba phyag 'tshal lo/ /me tog 'od dang sman bdag mdangs mnga' dang/ /bsod nams dgyes dang dga' stobs dbyangs snyan dang/ /chos kyi dbang phyug tshangs dbyangs spyod bzang dang/ /'khrul
270b3(bstod tshogs): pa med pa'i blo la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs chen snyan par grags dang tog ldan dang/ /gzi brjid rnam grags 'gro ba'i 'od zer dang/ /ljon pa gti mug rab bzang dpag med dang/ /zla bzang spobs yas tog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /brtul zhugs brtan
270b4(bstod tshogs): dang mchod gnas mya ngan brgal/ /dag dgyes 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs/ /zhabs mdzes utpal dul gnas me tog dang/ /spobs pa mdza' yas 'od zer phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong gsal ba yon tan brtson 'grus snying/ /lha bdag rin
270b5(bstod tshogs): chen mthon po gsal ba dang/ /skal ldan shing rta bsod nams blo gros dang/ /sbyin sreg 'od 'phro gzi phung phyag 'tshal lo/ /seng ge'i stobs dang mi g.yo rab gsal dang/ /'od spyad gu dbyangs dang ni 'khor lo 'dzin/ /dbyig mchog 'jig rten dag
270b6(bstod tshogs): dang chos zla dang/ /dge ba mdza' yas grags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sprin tog shes rab 'gros dang spos bzang dang/ /nam mkha' i dbyings dang lha dang lha rgyal dang/ /nor bu gsal dang nor bzang sgron ma dang/ /rin chen nga ro'i dbyangs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/
270b7(bstod tshogs): skye dbang rgyal po sgra gcan spod pa dang/ /dge mdzad sang blo rin chen grags pa dang/ /don mdzad mdzad mdza' gzigs dang sred med tog /mdzad spus spobs pa mtshungs med phyag 'tshal lo/ /ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro seng mche ba/ /mdzes
271a1(bstod tshogs): gshegs bsod nams sgron ma bkra shis ldan/ /yul 'khor myang med blo gros sems blo ldan/ /chos sgron shin tu gzigs la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /shugs 'dor stobs chen shes rab me tog dang/ /brtan pa'i dbyangs dang
271a2(bstod tshogs): bde ldan don gsung dang/ /dgyes pa gsal ba seng ge zhal gtsug phud/ /snang mdzad rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bskal bzang 'dir byung sangs rgyas stong gi mtshan/ /gang gis thos shing gus bcas sdig kun sreg /rgyal ba kun mthong
271a3(bstod tshogs): ngan song sdug bsngal spong/ /bzod ldan bde ba mchog brgyud myang 'das thob/ /byang chub sems dpa' mchog dga' rgyal po yi/ /drin gyis legs bsgos kha che paN chen gyis/ /sbyar 'di gzhan las don lngas khyad par 'phags /de ltar
271a4(bstod tshogs): nyes tshul sdig kun so sor bshags/ /bdag gis mos blos 'bad pa cher byas pa'i/ /dge ba 'di dang mdza' yas dge ba kun/ /'gro ba kun sbyin kun kyang rgyal ba yis/ /kun tu rjes bzung kun mkhyen myur thob shog /de bzhin gshegs
271a5(bstod tshogs): pa'i mtshan brjod bskal bzang rgyan gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba'i sras po kha che paN chen gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so// // */ (/sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba/) /rgya gar skad du/ yo ga tsa tu rde wa
271a6(bstod tshogs): sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sbyor ba bzhi'i lha la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stan mtshon seng ge'i khri steng na/ /sku drang dgongs pa shin tu bzhag /rdo rje skyil krung der bzhugs
271a7(bstod tshogs): nas/ /gang du ting 'dzin yongs 'du ba'i/ /ting 'dzin rgyal po zhes bgyi la/ /mnyam par gzhag cing dgongs mkhyen pa'i/ /de bzhengs 'phrul gyi spyan gyis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhing gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /sku gnas nyi shu rtsa gnyis nas
271b1(bstod tshogs): 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong drug cu drug cu ni/ /'byin pa'i sku de la phyag 'tshal/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /'od kyi snang bas khyab byed pa/ /'od des reg pa'i sems can rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa'i/ /'gro ba 'dren
271b2(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ba spu'i 'od dang rang bzhin 'od/ /mi mdzad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/ /'od kyi snang bas khyab byed pa/ /'od des reg pa'i sems can rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges gyur pa/ /'gro mgon shAkya seng ge 'dud/ /ljags
271b3(bstod tshogs): 'od bye ba khrag khrig ni/ /brgya stong rtse las pad 'dab stong/ /de steng bde gshegs thugs mnga' bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing du gshegs byon cing/ /pha rol phyin drug chos ston mdzad/ /chos thos sems can byang chub nges/ /'gro mgon
271b4(bstod tshogs): sprul pa'i sku la bstod/ /seng ge rnam grol ting 'dzin gyis/ /g.yo ldegs ltas chen bco brgyad kyis/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i ngan song kun/ /rgyun chad lha mi'i skal mnyam byas/ /tshe rabs dran zhing sangs rgyas 'dud/ /ngan song skyob
271b5(bstod tshogs): la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /mi mjed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /'od kyis zil mnan lha me ni/ /lhang nger bzhugs pa'i sku la bstod/ /rang bzhin sku brtan lha rnams kyis/ /mchod rdzas mchod de dbu steng du/ /byin gyis me tog
271b6(bstod tshogs): khang brtsegs gyur/ /rang 'od mi mjed phyogs bcu'i zhing/ /kun snang sems can mthong nas kyang/ /rang 'dun 'dug ste chos ston snyam/ /sku gcig du mar snang la bstod/ /rang 'od phyogs bcu'i zhing khyab nas/ /sems can ji snyed
271b7(bstod tshogs): 'khod pa yis/ /rang 'khor bcas pa snang byed pa'i/ /gser 'od shAkya seng ge 'dud/ /gzungs dang ting 'dzin rab thob pa'i/ /stong nyid mtshan med spyod yul can/ /rdol med pa yi smon lam ldan/ /chos mnyam gzungs dang bzod rab thob/
272a1(bstod tshogs): blo chen sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thog med spobs ldan bstan pa ni/ /zad mi shes shing so so ni/ /yang dag rig pa khong du chud/ /mngon shes chen po rnam par brtse/ /mngon shes ma nyams phyag 'tshal
272a2(bstod tshogs): bstod/ /mnyan pos tshig snyan le lo med/ /brtson 'grus lus srog mi lta zhing/ /tshul 'chos kha bsag grags pa med/ /khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pas/ /zang zing med par chos ston pa/ /chos zab bzod pa dam pa rtogs/ /mi 'jigs
272a3(bstod tshogs): thob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhum med bdud kyi las las 'das/ /las dang nyon mongs phyir rgol bcom/ /phas kyi rgol bas zil mi non/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rtogs dka' ba/ /las sgrib rgyun chad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par dbye zhing
272a4(bstod tshogs): bstan la mkhas/ /bskal pa grangs med smon lam rtsis/ /bzhin 'dzum thog ma khro gnyer med/ /snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan/ /chos rab rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha rol tshigs bcad dbyangs brjod mkhas/ /spobs pa mi chod 'khor
272a5(bstod tshogs): mdza' yas/ /zil gyis mnan pa mi 'jigs ldan/ /bskal pa bye ba mdza' yas par/ /bstan pa ye shes 'byung mkhas bstod/ /chos rnams sgyu ma smig rgyu dang/ /chu zla rmi lam sgra brnyan dang/ /mig yor nam mkha' dri za'i grong/ /
272a6(bstod tshogs): sprul dang gzugs brnyan khong chud pa'i/ /sems zhum med la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sems can sems rgyu shes pa phra/ /spyod mkhas khong chud byas la mkhas/ /sdang med bzod rlabs chos mnyam rtogs/ /chos zab ldan zhing gting
272a7(bstod tshogs): dpag dka' / /sems chos dbang thob las nyon mongs/ /lta sgrib la sgrol phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rten pa rtogs pa bstan la mkhas/ /rten 'brel tshul mi zad shes zhugs/ /lha dang bag nyal kun sbyor spangs/ /las dang nyon mongs
272b1(bstod tshogs): ? mkhas/ /kun ldang bral la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bden pa rab rtogs ye shes mkhas/ /chos rnams sgra brnyan lta bur mos/ /chos bstan tshad med 'jigs dang bral/ /bdag nyid ji ltar khong chud mkhas/ /zhing khams rnams dgongs rmi lam zin/ /grangs med
272b2(bstod tshogs): sangs rgyas dran la bstod/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba nye 'gro mkhas/ /sangs rgyas dpag med gsol btab mkhas/ /sems lta yongs bskyed nyon mongs zhi la mkhas/ /ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub/ /rnam rtse ye shes rtogs la bstod/ /bzang spyod
272b3(bstod tshogs): rin chen 'gyur la sogs/ /khyed kyi yon tan bskal par ni/ /mdza' yas brjod kyang mi lang ste/ /de sogs sems dpa' i tshogs la bstod/ /dgra bcom zag zad nyon mongs med/ /dbang gyur sems ni rnam par sgrol/ /shes rab shin tu
272b4(bstod tshogs): rnam par sgrol/ /cang shes glang chen bya ba byas/ /byed pa byas shing khur bor ba/ /rang gi don ni rab thob pa/ /srid pa kun sbyor yongs su zad/ /yang dag pa yi bka' yis ni/ /sems ni shin tu rnam par grol/ /sems dbang pha rol mchog thob
272b5(bstod tshogs): pa'i/ /nyan thos dge slong tshogs la bstod/ /dge bsnyen pha dang dge bsnyen ma/ /chos mthong ba yi tshogs la bstod/ /chos sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bstod pa/ /smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /ma skyes
272b6(bstod tshogs): mi 'gag nam mkha' i ngo bo nyid/ /so sor rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /stong pa bco brgyad chos kyi sdong po la/ /pha rol phyin bcu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /tshad med bzhi yi lo 'dab rgyas pa la/ /
272b7(bstod tshogs): skye 'gag med pa'i 'bras bu so sor smin/ /sa bcu chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhing khams thams cad gser gyi sa gzhi la/ /rin chen rnam pa mang po gcal du bkram/ /me tog punDa ri ka char bzhin 'bab/ /yum gyur dge ma khyod la phyag 'tshal
273a1(bstod tshogs): bstod/ /gnas med ji ltar nam mkha' bzhin/ /spros pa med cing snang ba med/ /khyod kyi thugs ni nam mkha' 'dra/ /nam mkha' mdza' dang dbus med pa/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid de/ /dus gsum las ni shin tu 'das/
273a2(bstod tshogs): dmigs med chos sku phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bla ma bsu skyel chos snyan bstod/ /gtsug lag mchog rten rjes bsgrubs shing/ /phud byas phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan/ /'khor mangs khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /yi dam brtan g.yas
273a3(bstod tshogs): zhabs gnas te/ /mi g.yo brtan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsdu ba bzhi ni goms byas pas/ /phyag dang zhabs gnyis dra bas 'brel/ /myur 'du'i lnga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bza' bca' btung zhim byin rtags su/ /phyag zhabs 'jam zhing
273a4(bstod tshogs): gzhon sha chags/ /sku bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ /btung zhing nyams bde'i snga ltas bstod/ /srog gcod spangs sogs yon tan gyis/ /rtings yangs sku tshe drang ba ste/ /sku che ring ba khyod la bstod/ /dge ba'i tshogs sogs blang byas
273a5(bstod tshogs): pas/ /zhabs gong mthe zhing sbu gyen 'khyil/ /mi mnyam chos ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig bzo rim gro gzhan byin sogs/ /e Ne'i byin pa lta bu ste/ /myur 'dzin snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdog pa thams cad btang byas pas/ /
273a6(bstod tshogs): phyag ni brla steng slebs pa ste/ /dul ba'i lnga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs spyod la sogs yon tan gyis/ /gsang gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ /bu mang snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /stan sogs gzhal med khang byin pas/ /gser gyi kha tog
273a7(bstod tshogs): mdog 'jam pa/ /gnas sogs bzang po thob phyag 'tshal/ /slob dpon la sogs rim gro byas/ /sku rabs g.yas 'khyil mdzod spus brgyan/ /mnyam pa'i snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi snyan mi smod yon tan sogs/ /seng+ge'i ro stod spyan
273b1(bstod tshogs): zlum mdzes/ /thub med snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /nad pa rnams la sman sogs byin/ /phyag sor rgyas shing ro mchog ldan/ /nad nyung snga ltas can la bstod/ /zam stegs la sogs byas pa yis/ /chu zheng gab cing spyi gtsug ldan/ /mnga' chen mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yun
273b2(bstod tshogs): ring tshig snyan nyams bde smras/ /ljags yangs srab pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /yan lag lnga ldan gsung mnga' bstod/ /yun ring tshig 'khyal spangs pa yi/ /seng+ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ /tshig mnyam snga ltas phyag 'tshal lo/ /rim gro mnyam med 'tsho dag pas/
273b3(bstod tshogs): tshems mnyam shin tu dkar ba ste/ /'khor ba snga nas bsags ltas can/ /bden zhing phra ma med tshig gis/ /tshems thags bzang zhing bzhi bcu tshang/ /'khor ba dbyer mi phyed la bstod/ /ma chags mi ldan blta byas pas/ /ba rdzi spyan gyi dkar nag dbyes/ /
273b4(bstod tshogs): kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas can/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan bstod/ /'du dben sen mdog zangs mdog 'dra/ /sems can phan sems sen mdog snum/ /rigs rgyud mtho phyir sen mo mtho/ /sor zlum kha na mtho med/ /dge ba'i tshogs rdzogs sen mo
273b5(bstod tshogs): rgyas/ /dge ba rtsa grub sor mo gzhol/ /'tsho bas dben pas rtsa mi mngon/ /nyon mongs mdung grol rtsa mdung med/ /long bu mi mngon dbyen chos mnga' / /mi mnyam sgrol bas zhal mnyam yin/ /seng+ge'i seng+ge'i 'gros bzhung bstod/ /glang po'i glang po'i
273b6(bstod tshogs): 'gros bzhung bstod/ /dang pa dang pa'i stabs bzhud bstod/ /khyud mchog khyud mchog 'gros bzhud bstod/ /mthun pa'i lam lnga g.yas phyogs bzhud/ /lta mdzes mdzes par bzhud la bstod/ /thugs g.yo mi mnga' mi g.yo bzhud/ /sku legs yon
273b7(bstod tshogs): tan ston pa ste/ /sku sbyangs sdig pa sbyangs pa yin/ /chos ston sku rim gzhol la bstod/ /sku gsung thugs gtsang sku 'jam pa/ /rnam dag sku mnga' sku rnam dag /chos 'dul mdzes pas yo byad rdzogs/ /yon tan yangs bzang sku che mdzes/ /mnyam pa'i
274a1(bstod tshogs): thugs mnga' sku mnyam bstod/ /'jam pa'i chos ston sku ni gzhon/ /mi zhum thugs mnga' sku zhum med/ /mi dge spangs pas sku rnam rgyal/ /'byung zad sku 'khregs khyod la bstod/ /yan lag rnams mdzes gzigs pa dag /nga
274a2(bstod tshogs): rgyal be'u bcom sogs kyis/ /phyal zlum phyal phyam phyal ma zhom/ /chos zad yang dag bzlog pas ni/ /phyal ni phyal le bzhugs la bstod/ /chos zab thugs chung yon tan rdzogs/ /lte zab lte ba g.yas phyogs 'khyil/ /'khor mdzes la sogs
274a3(bstod tshogs): yon tan gyis/ /mdzes gtsang sku la rme ba med/ /yang zhing byams pa'i yon tan sogs/ /phyag 'jam phyag ris zab cing snum/ /bzo dang bslabs pa'i yon tan sogs/ /phyag ris ring zhing zhal mi ring/ /gzugs skyes gzugs brnyan snang la bstod
274a4(bstod tshogs): 'jam pa sngon btang yon tan rdzogs/ /ljags 'jam ljags srab ljags dmar ba/ /bsnyengs pa mi mnga' yon tan rdzogs/ /glang chen 'brug sgra nyams che'i gsung/ /srid sbyor 'das sogs yon tan gyis/ /tshems kyi mche ba zlum zhing
274a5(bstod tshogs): ni/ /tshems mnyam rim gyis gzhol la bstod/ /shes rab ri la bzhugs sogs kyis/ /shangs mtho shangs gtsang ldan la 'dud/ /gzigs pa rnam dag yon tan rdzogs/ /spyan ring spyan dang rdzi ma sdug /smin 'jam smin ring dkar nag
274a6(bstod tshogs): phyed/ /smin snum smin mnyam khyod la bstod/ /chos mchog yangs shing don ldan rdzogs/ /snyan ring snyan 'jam snyan ma nyams/ /phas kyi rgol ba'i bdud sogs kyis/ /dpral yangs dpral ba legs pa grub/ /smon lam shin tu rdzogs
274a7(bstod tshogs): rtags su/ /dbu rgyas dbu skra bung ba ltar/ /gnag pa khyed la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /thugs 'jam mi gsung bslang gsung bral/ /bsgom spang bag nyal spangs sogs kyis/ /dbu stug dbu 'jam dbu mi sdug /dri zhim dbu mi rtsub la bstod/
274b1(bstod tshogs): phyag zhabs dpal be'u bkra shis 'khyil/ /dpe byad bzang po brgya bcu yis/ /brgyan pa khyod la phyag tshal bstod/ /sbyor bzhi'i lha la bstod zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po ratna kIrtis mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ (/bdag nyid chen po
274b2(bstod tshogs): grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa bzhugs so/) /rgya gar skad du/ mahA paN+Di ta ki d+hi d+hA dza stod traM/ bod skad du/ mkhas pa chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa/ 'jam dpal dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /blo gros rgya mtshor tshig gis me tog snyan tshig ze 'bru rnam
274b3(bstod tshogs): par spud pa'i bstod dbyangs kyi/ /phreng ba spel legs ngag gis rab rgyus dri med chun pos gang gi mgul la brgyan gyur pa'i/ /blo gsal stong gis khyed kyi rang bzhin bsngags par gyur mod de lta na yang bdag rmongs pa/ /dad pa'i stobs kyi ji ltar nus bzhin cung zad bstod la
274b4(bstod tshogs): mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par gsol/ /rgyu ma'i phreng ba'i las kyi tshul gyis rmongs gang srid pa'i chu gter du/ /bsod nams gru chags blo gros lus bying bshes gnyen dam pa dor ba yi/ /lus can rnams la byang chub yan lag drug phrag gsum gyi gzhung lugs
274b5(bstod tshogs): kyi/ /rlung drag gtsubs pa'i rba rlabs 'thor bas dam pa'i go 'phang pha rol son/ /grub pa dri med dge slong dge 'dun rig pa 'dzin pa'i sdom brtson dang/ /brtul zhugs grub pa blo gros gsal ldan rtog ge'i dbang po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /khyed kyi zhabs rdul
274b6(bstod tshogs): snyog pa med la rnam pa kun tu gdugs slad du/ /gangs can 'di na 'gran zlas dben par mngon du gyur bzhin kho bos 'tshal/ /dam pa khyod kyi legs bshad bsod nams sprin/ /dge ba'i lo tog 'phel ba'i char rgyun can/ /snyan pa'i 'brug sgra zab mo
274b7(bstod tshogs): stong sgrogs pas/ /skal ldan blo gros gnyid log rnam par bskul/ /khyod kyi kun chos sgrub gzhung mang 'chad pa dang/ /legs bshad rtsom dang kha don rgya chen dang/ /ting 'dzin dri med 'khor lo mchod pa'i tshul/ /rnam dag lta ba spyod lam dag pa
275a1(bstod tshogs): dang/ /gsang sngags rgya mtsho'i tshul la nyer bsten pa/ /khyed kyi kun spyod de dag thams cad la/ /rgol ba gzhan gyis kun nas mi rdzi bas/ /gsang sngags 'dzin pa gzhan la sngon ma mthong/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rin chen rang
275a2(bstod tshogs): bzhin dkon mchog gzhal med dpal ldan gtsug lag khang chen dang/ /dga' ston dam pa gsum la grags dang chags bral khyod ni dpal dang 'byor pa las byung rab dge zhing/ thub pa'i sku gzugs gsung rabs dag pa rin chen las bsgrub kun nas
275a3(bstod tshogs): mdzad pa rgya che ba/ /khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slad bdag blo spro ba'i chu klung dbyar gyi mtsho bzhin rnam par 'phel/ /bsod nams dri med zla zer zil gnon byams pa'i 'od zer rab 'phros pas/ /nam mkha' i zla ba rnyog can des ni khyod kyi dpal rab ma bzod ste
275a4(bstod tshogs): gzugs brnyan tshul gyis rgya mtsho'i kleng du 'jug par 'dod pa nyid snyam du/ /bdag gi blo gros de ltar sems pas mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur/ /gdung rgyud dri med yon tan rgya che ba/ /blo gros mtshungs med mkhas pas nyer bsten cing/ /gzhan la
275a5(bstod tshogs): phan dgongs phongs pa'i bsti gnas sa/ /mdzad pa rgya chen nye bar zhi ba can/ /khyod mtshungs ma mchis de slan dpe bral ba/ /khyed la rnam kun bstod par nus ma lags/ /'on kyang cung zad bstod 'di spro ba dang/ /dge slong mkhas pa byang chub 'od zer
275a6(bstod tshogs): gyi/ rjes snang thob nas de las gang snang ba/ /de bzhin 'di ni bdag gis gsal bar sbyar/ /mchog tu rmad byung grags pa rgyal mtshan la/ /mkhas pa bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal dag gis/ /legs par bstod la bsod nams gang yod pa/ /des ni 'gro kun
275a7(bstod tshogs): bla ma la gus shog /bdag nyid chen po grags pa rgyal mtshan la bstod pa/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ga ta sh+ris sbyar ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ shAkya'i dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
275b1(bstod tshogs): */ (/bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal gyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba/) /rgya gar skad du/ sang+gu ru d+harma rA dza sto tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab rgyas rta yi dpung
275b2(bstod tshogs): gi rba rlabs phreng ba mthong zhing zhags pa ral gri mdung rnon gyis/ /chu la rgyu ba rab mang 'jigs rung rnga chen sgra ldan hor zhes bya ba dus mdza' yi/ /chu gter 'di ni mdza' dag mkhas pa'i bla ma gang gis zur mig rol pas 'jig rten rnams/ /rab mchog zhi slad
275b3(bstod tshogs): rgyal ba'i tshul la zhi mdzad chos kyi rgyal po de ni rgyal gyur cig /nub phyogs bod kyi ri la shin tu dri med 'char ba thob cing shar phyogs dag gi yul/ /rim pas mnan pa gang gis rmongs pa pas skyes shin tu rab rgyas mun pa bcom byas nas/ /sems can byang chub grong
275b4(bstod tshogs): khyer phyin sdad/ /chos gsung 'khor lor dra bas mtshungs med sangs rgyas lam/ /rab tu gsal mdzad chos kyi rgyal po mchog gi 'od zer phreng ldan de ni rgyal gyur cig /gang gis mdza' dag skye bo rnams la phan pa bgyi slad rgyun tu rab mchog rgyal ba yi/ /khyu mchog
275b5(bstod tshogs): sems can dag pas bstan gang rdzogs pa de ni rkang pa bzhi dang gsum ldan la/ /rkang pas sman dang gnyis ldan dag la rkang zung gis rgyu rtsod la rkang gcig lhag ma can/ /gang gis sa la rdzogs ldan bzhin du rgyu mtshan chos kyi rgyal po de ni rgyal gyur cig /gang zhig 'jig rten
275b6(bstod tshogs): dag na sa gzhi 'byung po 'dzin byed nyi ma dag kyang 'jig rten na/ /snang ba dag dang ldan par byed cing sprin rnams chad pa 'bebs byed rlung yang rgyun du ga-yo/ /zla ba bdud rtsi'i rgyu ni rnam par spro byed nam mkha' go skabs sbyin la rab tu dpa' / /de bzhin chos kyi rgyal pos zos med snying rje sems can
275b7(bstod tshogs): kun la rab tu 'jug par byed/ /bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po la bstod pa/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan chen po/ /sh+rI lak+Sh+mI? ka ra yis sbyar ba'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong sde snod 'dzin pa/ /shor ston gyis dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o// //
276a1(bstod tshogs): */ (/dus mchod chen po bzhi tshig le'ur byas pa bzhugs/) /rgya gar skad du/ kA la su tsa ma ha tsa tu rkA ri ka/ bod skad du/ dus mchod chen mo bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas pa thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la zhugs rnams kyis/ /
276a2(bstod tshogs): skyabs gsum dag la bskyabs pa dang/ /gzhan yang bsod nams ye shes tshogs/ /rdzogs phyir dus mchod dam bca' o/ /ston pas legs par gsungs pa yis/ /dus mchod bzhi ni 'di yin te/ /cho 'phrul che dang mngon byang chub/ /chos 'khor lha las
276a3(bstod tshogs): babs pa'o/ /skar ma chu dang sa ga dang/ /chu bstod tha skar rim bzhin nya/ /me tog u dum wa ra dang/ /bsing ma khug chos spang brgyan rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du kha 'bus te/ /kha da co ga khu byug dang/ /sha ba rim bzhin sgra 'byin te/ /mdor na khyim rtsis dang sbyar
276a4(bstod tshogs): na/ /bum glang karka Ta dang srang/ /nyi ma gang ldog rgyal du rtsi/ /phyi tshes gcig nas nya yi bar/ /zla phyed cho 'phrul chen po yin/ /mnyan yod na ni lag len dar/ /bdud btul ba yi dus yin pas/ /cho 'phrul chen po zhes kyang grags/ /mdo sde mdzad pa
276a5(bstod tshogs): blun dag las gsungs/ /de nas dgung zhag dgu bcu'i nya/ /nyin zhag 'phrugs gcig rdo rje'i gdan/ /gnas mchog de na dus mchod 'di'i/ /lag len dar bar gsungs pa yin/ /mngon byang chub dang bstam pa ni/ /'dul ba'i gleng gzhi nyid las
276a6(bstod tshogs): gsungs/ /mdo sde rgya che rol pa las/ /lhum su zhugs pa zhes bshad do/ /bcu gnyis pa dang chen po las/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhes bshad do/ /de nas zhag ni zhe dgu 'das/ /tshes bzhi'i nyin zhag bden bzhi'i chos/ /wa ra NA ser bskor ba des/ /
276a7(bstod tshogs): de na 'di yi mchod pa dar/ /rgya cher rol pa'i mdo dang ni/ /sil bu las ni de ltar gsungs/ /de na bcu phrag bcu yi nya/ /ston 'bring hor zla dgu pa la/ /mchod pa yangs pa can na dar/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas ni/ /ston pas
276b1(bstod tshogs): ? gnas mdzad nas byon/ /mu stegs ston pa btul ba'i phyir/ /cho 'phrul chung ngu zhes kyang bya/ /'di ni mya ngan 'das sil bu dang/ /phran tshegs zhes bya'i lung las gsungs/ ` /de nas phan yon bstan pa ni/ /dus chen bzhi la mchod pa ni//
276b2(bstod tshogs): dam bcas mchog byas pa yis/ /phan yon spyi ni dpag med kyang/ /mdor bsdus pa ni 'di lta ste/ /dkon mchog gsum la ma gus dang/ /bla ma grogs po sun phyung dang/ /nad pa pha ma bsnyen mi bkur/ /dad zas za zhing
276b3(bstod tshogs): le lo byed/ /rgyun gtor chag dang dbul 'phongs la/ /sbyin pa gtong bar mi byed pa'i/ /las rnams myur du zad nas kyang/ /byang chub thob par the tshom med/ /dus mchod bzhi ni mchog na/ /gzhan yang dge slong sman pa ni/ /
276b4(bstod tshogs): brgyad kyi sma yang bsos par 'gyur/ /sdig grogs yul dang nye du dang/ /ma brtags brgyad dang dge slong ma/ /'du 'dzi sha chang bre mo'i gtam/ /de dag la chags dman ma yin/ /bla ma dam tshig nyams pa dang/ /
276b5(bstod tshogs): byang chub sems la ngan sems bskyed/ /rnyed phyir chos 'dra ston pa dang/ /sdig la sbyor dang dge 'dun gyis/ /yo byad brkus dang rtsa ltung byung/ /dkon mchog spong dang mtshams med byas/ /bstan la zhugs nas rtsod pa byed/ /
276b6(bstod tshogs): mdza' shes sbyugs dang bcu po ni/ /dmyal bar skye bar gsung ba'i lam/ /myur du zad nas kun mkhyen thob/ ` /dus 'dir 'chi ba blu ba dang/ /mi mthun 'dums dang mchod rten brtseg /rnying pa gso dang yi rang
276b7(bstod tshogs): bas/ /bsod nams dpag med thob par 'gyur/ ` /dus bzang gzhan yang bstan pa ni/ /bla ma dang ni mdza' bshes dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i dus/ /nyi zla sgra gcan
277a1(bstod tshogs): gdon gyis zin/ /mu ge sde rtsod yams nad 'byung/ /dus chen bzhi dang bcu gnyis la/ /de bzhin gshegs dang dam pa'i chos/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi/ /rjes su slob pa'i
277a2(bstod tshogs): dge slong dang/ /bla ma pha ma lha bzo ba/ /'gro ba'i nad gso sman pa rnams/ /zas skom rin chen sman sogs kyis/ /mchod na skye ba thams cad du/ /gnas dang longs spyod grogs la sogs/ /de dag mchog tu gyur
277a3(bstod tshogs): pa thob/ /lha yi bsrungs dang bar chad med/ /sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims ldan/ /snying rje gzhan gyi dbugs 'byin cing/ /nad med 'dod pa chung pa dang/ /gzhan gyis bkur ba'i 'os su byung/ /'tsho ba rnam par ma
277a4(bstod tshogs): dag dang/ /dam tshig nyams pa 'byang bar byed/ /dge 'dun byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /gnyen bshes rnams kyis brgyan du gyur/ /gnad gcod sdug bsngal mi 'byung zhing/ /shi 'phos gsum la
277a5(bstod tshogs): skyabs su 'gro /tshe rabs kun tu dal 'byor lus/ /thob nas rab tu byung ba dang/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten byed cing/ /bslab pa gsum dang 'bral mi 'gyur/ /dus chen bzhi dang tha mal pa'i/ /khyad par sil
277a6(bstod tshogs): bu myang 'das las/ /sa ya phrag brgya'i 'gyur du gsungs/ /nyi ma gza' yis zin pa'i dus/ /bye ba phrag ni 'bum 'gyur dang/ /zla ba bye ba bdun 'gyur ro/ /dus chen bzhi la nyi zla zin/ /de dag bsod nams khyad
277a7(bstod tshogs): par 'phags/ /dus mchod chen po bzhi'i tshig le'ur byas pa kha che'i paN Di ta shAkya sh+rIs mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta de kyi dang sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyi bsgyur ba'o// //
277b1(bstod tshogs): */ (/dpal shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa bzhugs/) /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchog gi byang chub rgyu ni dang por bskyed pa las/ /'gro ba rnam par phan phyir 'chi med thar mdzad de/ /yang dag 'bar ba'i
277b2(bstod tshogs): 'od 'phro bdud las rgyal ba can/ /rgyal ba shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 1 /thub pa'i rgyal po dam pa gzhan gyi mgon po mchog /gcig tu brtson pas tshangs pa mchog la nges gnas shing/ /so so'i blo can phal rgol lag ldan
277b3(bstod tshogs): dbang por ni/ /ri dwags bdag po shAkya thub la phyag bgyi'o/ 2 /thub pa mar me mdzad la sogs las mchog thob pas/ /'bar ba'i rin chen dam pa thor cog la 'chang ba'i/ /'dzin ma'i bdag po tshangs dang rgas med kyis
277b4(bstod tshogs): bstod pa/ /sdig spangs shAkya thub pa rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 3 /thub pa rgya che'i 'od zer rgyan gyi yongs su bskor/ /me chu'i yangs pa dag dang rab rgyas gsal pa'i 'od/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yul la khyab par spro ba can/
277b5(bstod tshogs): shAkya thub la dad bdag rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 4 /thub pa skyes mchog bden pa mchog tu ston pa po/ /bstan las lha dang lha min mya ngan 'das bgyid pa'i/ /thabs mdzad pa la cho ga bzhin du mkhas pa ste/ /
277b6(bstod tshogs): dge 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 5 /thub pa'i dbus su mngon dgyes thugs rjes gnas pa ste/ /ting 'dzin mchog gis 'dod dang drag po rnam rmongs shings/ /mchog gi bim pa lta bu'i zhal sgros
277b7(bstod tshogs): phul dang ldan/ /dam pa shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 6 /thub pa'i chos 'dzin pa las nad dang rims 'phrog cing/ /zhabs zung dag la 'phrog byed gtsug rgyan gyis rab mtshan/ /zung 'jug ting nge
278a1(bstod tshogs): 'dzin la rtag tu bzhugs pa yi/ /mchog sbyin shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 7 /thub pa seng ge dam pa mi yi seng ge mchog /tshangs pa mi brjed bdag pos mchod gyur gdugs bsgreng zhing/ /
278a2(bstod tshogs): nor 'dzin gtso mo'i re ba'i phyag gis mngon btud pa/ /phyag 'os shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 8 /thub pa zhi byed rnams kyi gtsug gi bde gshegs te/ /ma lus nyes pa spangs shing yon tan chu yi gter/ /
278a3(bstod tshogs): mdza' dag skye bo'i sdug bsngal sel la gter lta bu/ /sdig sel shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 9 /thub pa brtson pas 'gro ba'i don sgrub mdzad pa la/ /mkha' lding bdag po'i mgon de lta bur
278a4(bstod tshogs): sems can rnams/ /yang dag 'dren zhing pha rol bde bar mdzad pa yi/ /ston pa shAkya thub la rab tu phyag bgyi'o/ 10 /dpal shAkya thub pa'i bstod pa bcu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // 
278a5(bstod tshogs): 'di ni dpal nags kyi rin po che'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa ste/ /da ri dra pa rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur// // */ (/ye ka nA tha'i don 'brel/ /)
278a6(bstod tshogs): srid pa gsum gyi bla ma gnas skabs kun tu 'gro ba rnams la phan mdzad pa/ /mkhas shing gsal ba'i blo dang bsam gtan mngon shes thugs bsgom pa/ /stobs bcu mnga' ba rnal 'byor dang ni
278a7(bstod tshogs): mkhyen par ldan pa khyod 'dra las gzhan pa/ /lha yul sa la yod min 'jig rten 'dir min rnam thos phu yi gnas na'ang med/ /legs spyad dam pa rmad byung gcig tu mdzes pa mi yi mig la mdzes
278b1(bstod tshogs): rnams dang/ /bde bar gshegs pa dri med 'jig rten las 'das dge ba'i gsung dang mtshan rnams kyis/ /nye bar bsags pa'i sku ni gzi brjid 'phreng ba ldan pa khyod dang mtshungs pa ni/ /lha yi pho brang gnas mchog
278b2(bstod tshogs): dag na'ang rang? 'byor dang phyogs mtshams dag na'ang med/ /snyan cing mnyen la dag cing ma 'khrugs gsung gis mi dang lha rnams la/ /khyab bdag khyod kyis de nyid bshad pa brtsal te khyod dang mtshungs pa ni/ /
278b3(bstod tshogs): mang du 'di ci thub pa gang gis rnam dpyod bcas pas dwogs med par/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa'i nor 'dzin yangs pa kun tu rgyus kyang rnyed ma lags/ /zhi dang dul la dgyes shing yang dag gsung
278b4(bstod tshogs): ba lha dbang phyag byas pa/ /rgyags dang zhe sdang ma rig bral zhing yang srid spangs gyur pa/ /gdul bya'i bsams pa ji bzhin 'jam zhing phan pa'i gtam gyis dga' mdzad pa/ /skyes bu
278b5(bstod tshogs): khyu mchog khyod dang 'dra ba'i dge spyod chen po gzhan dag ga la zhig /de ltar stobs bcu mnga' ba skar rgyal bstod pa ji bzhin bdag gis kyang/ /nyin dang mtshan du ches char 'bad pa'i
278b6(bstod tshogs): blo gros las ni rang gi brtson 'grus kyi/ /mtsho chen pha rol son te khyad kyang pha rol gnon pa rgya che bas/ /'gro ba ma tshang med pa'i skyob pa de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo nyid gyur cig /
278b7(bstod tshogs): 'di slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o// //
279a1(bstod tshogs): rgya dpo las bod kyi skad du zha lu lo tsa bas bsgyur ba'o// //
279a2(bstod tshogs): oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShAn+ta thA ga to hya wa data/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e waM wa dI ma hA sh+ra maN:/ //
279a3(bstod tshogs): sarba mang+ga laM
279b1(bstod tshogs): [blank page]
